Amazing night 😃. This is a great thing to do to experience the nightlife of Playa del Carmen. Dana was our hostess and made sure we enjoyed the night. Brilliant value for money !!!! I went with my 19 year old daughter and had a great time with MUCHO TEQUILA. Would do it all again xx

Definitely recommend. We had a great time at playcrawl. My sisters and I had planned a girls trip to playa del Carmen and wanted to explore the nightlife. Booking was superstraightforward and Ivan was an awesome guide. We were able to get into every bar with prime seating and bottle service. Ivan was very knowledgeable and made sure everyone had a good time. Would definitely recommend booking.

Partying in Playa. This was my first time in Playa del Carmen so I figured a club crawl would be the best way to have fun. Booking Playacrawl was easy and straightforward. You get to choose your club day, and get a list of the different clubs that you may be going to. You get to have open bar throughout your trip, along with immediate admittance, and VIP seating. Be prepared with 5 USD as your overall tip for the servers who will be taking care of you for the night. The drinks were great, not premium, but honestly unless you are a super alcohol connoisseur, it will not matter. The crawl starts pretty early, so do not expect things to be jumping right off of the bat. Our guide was Dana, and she was absolutely AWESOME! My friend and I ended up not having enough pesos to equate to the 5 USD gratuity and Dana was nice enough to assist, and even made sure we had enough for a cab ride back home. The people that were in our group were all really nice, and all from England, so that was pretty cool. I would recommend this for anyone looking to party the night away, and experience different clubs all in one night!

Great!. This was the second Rockstar crawl we have done. The first one was in Cancun. Ivan our guide was with us the whole night making sure everyone was having fun. As advertised, we skipped all lines and had a reserves VIP area in each place we went. Never once would they let stand with an empty drink. Felt safe and had a blast. We chose the 10$ extra for round trip transportation to our resort (about 20 min drive) and this was a private van with our gouope of 10 only. I would highly recommend this outing!! Ivan rocks!!

Playacrawl is a must do experience!. This was my second time experiencing Playacrawl! This experience was just as good as the first...Ivan showed me and my girls an amazing time. He was very attentive and made sure we all had a great time. A special shout out to Sina as well. She was our tour guide the first time and came out just to hang with us..The next time I'm in Riviera Maya, I will definitely do Playacrawl and request Ivan, the party Ninja and Sina!! Thanks for showing us a great time! Great music, great drinks and great times!!

Awesome Club Hopping. This was the most fun I have had in a while. Ivan Ivan Ivan what a party Ninja!! :) He was so attentive to everyone in our group of 13 awesome people. No glass was ever empty. Skip lines..V.I.P in all clubs plus bottle service all night.!! ..Music was awesome. He made sure we didnt hit a wack club. Me and my crew already said this is a must do if we ever visit this area Again and Im sure we will!! Thanks to Ivan for showing us an awesome 1st time in this area!!!!!

Defiantly a must do.. Ivan is the best. . I'm currently still on vacation but felt the need to post this review asap. Ivan showed our group an awesome time last night. We were a fairly large group of 13 but he handled it quite well. He made sure every had a drink at all times and accommodated everyone on a personal level. This has truly been the highlight of our stay and will be booking again. Thanks Ivan from the group from Dallas.

If you are looking for crappy clubs and drugs offered to you by the tour guide, then this is for you!. We were all in our 30's and going out after our wedding dinner. We were ready to have a good time. I recently came from San Diego and went out plenty in the Gaslamp District and Vegas clubs . The places we went to on this tour were gross.The first lounge was ok, but it looked like there were much nicer places nearby to hang out at. The second place was a club. Like the kind of place you went to when you were underage, because it was the only place that would let you in at 18 years old. Our tour guide told us from the beginning that he could hook us up with drugs and not to buy off the streets (probably because he gets a cut from the drug dealers he works with). People in our group saw him doing lines of coke in the bathroom. My suggestion would be to anyone over the age of 25 is to get a VIP table at CocoBongo and not go on this tour. I am requesting some of my money back. It was such a disappointment for the night of our wedding.

This tour is a must do. . Like all of the reviews before this one say, this is a must do for partiers. Ivan is a rockstar and never a dull moment the entire night. We had a blast and will be doing this again.

BANE WEDDING BAR CRAWL WAS AMAZING!!!. This was our second time using Playacrawl in Playa Del Carmen and can't say enough good things! We had 22 people and paid extra for the transportation. Transportation is contracted out to a third party but it was on time and no issues. Only suggestion is to provide an auxiliary cord for music for the ride there. Sina was our party guide and her crew did a great job keeping track of everyone. They had VIP tables/areas at each bar and bottles flowing all night. No issues and very smooth operation. I would recommend Sina and Playacrawl to everyone!

Oh what a night!!. We had such a great time from beginning to end. We met up at the Tequila Barrel and from there headed to our first bar. The first bar was laid back and we were able to relax and have a couple of drinks and tequila shots. From there we went to two other clubs. The last club was HAPPENING and full of people. We danced all night and not once did we have to wait for a drink. Thanks Ivan for a great time! We will see you again!!

Playa del Carmen - AMAZING Birthday Crawl!. SUCH a great, and FUN experience! Ivan was fabulous, and made everything incredibly easy!! The ease of everything is amazing, and made our trip and celebration even better. Ivan is a ROCKSTAR!!! Playacrawl is the way to go, and we WILL be back and will book again :) Thanks for a GREAT time and tour!

AWESOME!!!!!. What a wonderful time!!!! Ivan, our host, definitely knew how to keep the party going and we didn't have to think about what to do next.... we simply relaxed, had a great time, and allowed Ivan to do the thinking for us :) Definitely a "must" for anyone who likes to drink, dance, and have a great time without any hassle or stress. We chose the option with transportation provided and it was so easy and stress-free. Thank you!!!!!!!
Amazing time!!!. Went with a bachelor party of 10 guys. Ivan is a rockstar - we partied all night without worrying about getting into places or finding drinks. Much better than doing this on our own!
COCO BONGOS. We did a pub crawl of 3 pubs before going into Coco Bongo for the show. this was organised by the reps at the hotel. Book it you wont be disappointed best show I have seen in ages.

Playa Crawl. I was in Mexico last week for a bachelorette party. We decided to do the playa crawl and I'm so glad we did. It was a great and most importantly safe experience. Ivan was very upbeat and was very attentive the entire night. We didn't have to worry about flagging down the waiters to get our drinks which was amazing- Ivan took care of getting us our drinks and we didn't wait long either. The atmosphere at each bar was awesome. I highly recommend the playa crawl if you're in town and want to have a night out with good music, dancing, and drinks. I will definitely do another playa crawl when I return to Mexico.

Dana, Playacrawl Host was awesome. Dana was our host for Playacrawl Club tour in downtown Playa. She was an excellent host and explained everything to us. She kept our group together and and sure we had VIP seating and our drinks were kept full. As we an older couple not usually going on this type of tour for 20 somethings and looking to check this event off on our bucket list she treated everyone the same. We met some great people in our tour group and had a great safe time.. Thanks Dana..

Great night out!. We had Dana as a guide for our night and she was great! Very upbeat and made sure that everyone was taken care of the whole evening. This was a great way to visit a few bars in one night and meet new people. Would highly recommend!

Rrrrraaaaa Ivan totally rules in Playa!. Decided to take a trip Solo to Playa and booked playacrawl for the first night, I've couldn't of made a better choice. Ivan took us to 12th Avenue and showed us what real VIP in Playa is all about. I had an awesome time, it's worth every penny. Ivan thank you my man, till Next Time!

Rockstar treatment. We felt like rockstars as we passed everyone waiting in line and were escorted to our reserved table. Even had our own security escort to the restroom when we needed it. Ivan is a fantastic host, very personable and boy, did he keep the party going! He kept the drinks coming (sometimes too fast) and kept things lively! Great time!

Legendary bachelor party . Ivan took awesome care of us. The single guys with us now think I am a BP diety. The strip club was not my thing as a 40 year old married guy, but the 20 something cousins were very impressed. The drink prices for the strip club were high for Mexico, but it was spring break so all drink prices were inflated. The club we went to next rocked. Ivan had the total hook up. Tip your waiter a $20 at the beginning and you will not be disappointed. The premium tequila was gross (self admitted tequila snob) but the beer was above average for a Mexican club in a spring break area. Overall a great time and I would highly recommend Ivan to be your guide.

bachelorette party. I booked this for my best friends bachelorette this spring break and it was perfect! Ivan is super sweet and takes good care of you. Highly recommend this, if you wanna have some fun in playa del carmen! It's perfect if it's your first time there too!! :)

Great time . Had a great night out, our host Ivan was fantastic. In the middle of the night one of our party had to go back to hotel, Ivan gave us his cell # and we met him as soon as we got back to the area. Ivan knew everyone at the bars and made sure we felt taken care of and safe. The 3 bars we weren't to we're all a great time, good, loud and fun music and dancing. The foam party at the blue parrot beach bar was a highlight of our vacation. I would highly recommend Playacrawl and Especially Ivan and we will definitely do this again on our next visit to Playa. Thanks Ivan! Chris and Bree

Bachelor & Bachelorette party . Cannot say enough good things about Playa crawl! A destination wedding has to have a destination bachelor & bachelorette party!! Sina made everything so easy and simple to coordinate with a large group and was so helpful when we had issues with our private transportation (Playacrawl does offer transportation to and from which after the private transportation fiasco might be the way to go, definitely an affordable option!) and Ivan was the BEST tour guide we could have asked for. He was so much fun and knew how to engage the whole group and didn't leave anyone without a drink the entire night ;-) He knew exactly how to give the bride and groom their perfect night! Well worth every penny! Not exaggerating when I say the entire group talked about this night the next three days of our trip :-)

ONCE IN A LIFETIME !!!. I'm not much of a drinker so I hesitated before agreeing to go on this Crawl, but my friends insisted saying it would be a "once in a lifetime experience". Well, they were right. It was lots of fun, but I found out that I don't drink enough to justify it, and I'm getting too old for this much fun.

Bachelor party in playa de Carmen . A foolish night, we hit the stripclub as well as two other bars, we were well looked after everywhere we went. Ivan or party guide was amazing, I would extremely recommend using this company when I playa de Carmen

AMAZING !. WORTH EVERY PENNY !! This is great if its your first night in town and you want to feel like a VIP ! No lines ! Drinks always in hand! Best seating in the place. AND IVAN WAS A ROCK STAR ! Great guy, made us feel comfortable and safe from beginning to end! We would totally do this again! Thank you for an awesome night on the town !!!

Great way to experience Playa nightlife!. My boyfriend and I booked this as a way to go out in Playa, we didn't really know anything about the nightlife so we figured this was a great way. We were matched with another couple and our tour guide was Dana. Dana was great and did a great job at making our night fun. In a small group like this, your night can only be as fun as you make it. I was kind of disappointed that we ended our night at Tribeca, a very crowded bar, where you have your own "table" but it is nothing like the VIP experience at the other bars. Like I said, this night can only be as fun as you make it. If you're not a crazy and wild person, you can't really expect a guide to be able to transform you. I highly recommend doing this tour, but go into it with an extremely open mind and let yourself have fun. I also feel this is would've been more fun with a larger group of people.I would absolutely recommend this tour. It makes club going extremely easy and cheap! With all of your drinks included (even shots!), cover charges (which tend to be $10 per bar), and table service, you can't go wrong with this tour.

Playa club crawl. We had Ivan for a tour guide and he was awesome! Super friendly and outgoing, knew everyone at the clubs by a first name basis... All the boys I had with me were seasoned bachelor party goers and they said this was one of the best they have had so far. I would recommend requesting Ivan if you decide to book Playa Crawl, he made the night flow flawlessly. Definitely book playa crawl if you are looking for a fun night out for the girls or guys!

Hangover the next day!. THIS WAS A GREAT NIGHT! I decided to go by myself to Playa and got this Rockstar Playa Crawl! And it was the best! Our guy Ivan was really good and always on top to make sure we got our drinks and tequila shots and anything with alcohol! We got VIP treatment as promised! No lines! And always got VIP areas reserved! I was with a pretty nice group from NY and Colorado! Overall was a great night and a great Party! Get this if you are traveling alone or in a group and want to taste all in one night

Ivan is the ultimate . We weren't sure what toExpect but this was certainly the premiere bar crawl playa has toOffer! Ivan is hands down the #1 person they have working for their company!!!!! He took great care of us , made sure we wereSafe and having fun and treated like royalty at all the clubs we went too! We cannot wait to go out with him and playacrawl again!!!!

Partyyyyyyyyyyyy. Ivan is the guy in Playa Del Carmen! First name basis with everybody, and the right guy with the right personality for the job-- he made our night out extremely fun the night of, and extremely painful the next day! Open bar, well tequila shots, no lines (huge huge plus!), tables to sit at, etc... etc... etc... The only thing I would recommend, is preparing for this like you would prepare to run a marathon! Eat well before, train your liver before coming to mexico, and don't drink before going out, because things get hectic (I mean this in a great way), fast! Thanks Ivan, hopefully see you around soon!

PlayaCrawl!. Had an absolute blast with PlayaCrawl last week! I had done PlayaCrawl on two previous visits to Playa del Carmen and this third time lived up to my high expectations. Ivan, our host, was great! He was really fun and outgoing, got us all in the mood to party and dance, and made sure we got VIP service at every bar we went to. If you are looking for a fun night out on the town in Playa del Carmen, then I definitely recommend PlayaCrawl.

Amazing night!. This is the best way to check out a few of the bars/clubs in Playa! We first went to Abolengo, which was a great way to start the night, not crowded, awesome service, great music and lots of drinks. Then we went to upbeat and super crowded Tribeca. We ended the night on the rooftop lounge of Mandala.Ivan took care of us the whole night - he made sure we were safe, together, drinks were full and we were happy. He even helped us with our bachelorette scavenger hunt, which I'm sure is embarrassing for men. Ivan was the best - super fun, great dancer, life of the party, and genuinely nice. We highly recommend hanging out with him :) Thanks, Ivan!
Great shopping. Only one thing to say, do not pay full price for merchandise except in the popular brands like Sketchers ,Victoria Secret
Boys Night!. Good vibes and times!.......Smooth and seamless transition from club to club. Our host Ivan made sure we were well taken care of at all times. He knew how to get the party started!!!

40th Birthday Celebration!. My girlfriends and I did this tour February 13th for our GFs 40th - Dana was amazing! 3 different clubs, VIP service, bottle service and never had to wait! Amazing time! Worth every penny - great value!

Amazing Night!. We had a great time with Playacrawl. Ivan definitely knows his way around the clubs, and he took great care of us! We never waited in a line, and we never had an empty cup. The foam party at Blue Parrot was a blast! Definitely an easy and safe way to explore the Playa nightlife! Thanks for the fun, Ivan!

Amazing Night!!. Dana was amazing. Four girls whooped it up for our friends 40th. We loved the no waiting in line, VIP service and seating. This was a great way to experience Playa del Carmen nightlife. Would highly recommend - safe and fun. Worth every penny!

Bachelor/bachelorette party was great!. Playacrawl made our night out super easy with one fee paid, no waiting in lines, all drinks included and VIP area at clubs. I highly recommend it for larger groups, thanks guys!

Bachelor/bachelorette party. We were up in Mexico for a wedding and I had planned an evening out for a bachelor/bachelorette party! We found playacrawl online and they were very quick to answer all questions. Ivan and SIna were amazing. They made sure we always had drinks, kept us dancing and kept us safe. We got instant access to all clubs, with tables and the option of bottle service. They took pictures throughout the night which is always a great keep sake. If I were ever to be in that part of Mexico I would use them again. It was an amazing night. I highly recommend them for your night out.
Fabulous evening!. Had the best time ever! Sina and Dana were full of energy and kept the party going! Well organized and safe. Would book again in a heartbeat!

30th Birthday Bash!. Ivan thank you so much for taking care of us and showing us a great time! We danced till early in the morning and had the best time! If you're thinking of going --- go! You won't regret it!

Great time!. Thank you for the amazing time on the Playacrawl. All the girls had a fantastic time! Ivan Was awesome and took care of us all night! We felt safe, had fun and Laughed all night!
Thank you again for making my sisters bachelorette Memorable!
Ontario, Canada

Great night out!. We booked the same day and although we weren't sure what to expect we had a great night! Ivan was awesome and made sure we were safe and comfortable. Would definitely go again next time
Fun night!. This is a safe exciting way to have a blast at all those crazy playa clubs. Ivan was a great host ! You're out all night so put your dancing shoes on.

Awesome, Amazing, FUN!!!. I had an amazing time at my friend's bachelorette and bachelor with this service . Ivan our ninja guide was A game at all times. He made my group had an awesome experience. Bottle service and VIP sits were the best. He made sure our glasses were never empty and that you are having the best time of your life. He even made sure we get to try the best tacos in town after a crazy night of fun.

Girls' trip for 30th birthday!. Booked a Playacrawl night out during a girls' trip with a total of eight ladies to celebrate three of us turning the big 30! We first met Ivan during our Playacrawl night out February 2015 when the same three of us turned 29. It was a phenomenal experience and we knew we had to return.Our January 2016 night out surpassed expectation. Even though we had a larger group of girls, we had at least one table reserved at three bars/clubs in the middle of the action. Between no waiting, no cover, reserved tables, unlimited bottles and shots....it is definitely worth it. Plus, we felt extra safe because either Ivan or one of the bar guys made sure we safely went to and from the bathroom. Very important! Bottom line: fabulous night out that I will do anytime/everytime I'm in Playa! BIG thanks to Ivan for the top night another year! Cheers,veronica

Best VIP night out!. Me and a group of my friends went to Mexico in September and we wanted a fun and safe night out. Ivan was a great host and took us to 3 bars that were packed, but we had our own VIP spot and didn't have to wait in any line. Our drinks were always full! We had such a great time and we will do this again!
Great VIP style night out. Great value and Ivan is great company :) Nice and smooth clubbing experience, no lines and no waiting at the bar for someone to take your order

Birthday on the town w/Sina!!. My friend and I wanted a fun yet safe night on the town in Playa. Playacrawl was great because we got to party with someone who knows their way around the area and knows the night life. The night entailed 3 clubs, all in close walking distance. The clubs were packed and full of energy. Music was a good mix of what you'd expect in a Vegas club and salsa/bachata. Sina, our guide, is real chill -she did a great job making sure everyone was doing OK, full drink in hand and having fun.

Great tour and night!. Hi,We used Playacrawl for a bachelorette party. It was great. They were on time, attentative to our group, and we had instant access to our private area at each club with bottle service. My only request is that there were an option for premium liquor as the mid-range stuff can give me headaches.

Great price for a great night!. I had arranged a booking with Playacrawl while in Playa Del Carmen for a bachelorette party. Sina was so helpful with organizing the event and offering to make arrangements for transportation if needed.Our guide Luis was fantastic and made sure we all had a great night. I would definitely do this again and highly recommend this for a fun night out on the town at a great price:)

Night on the town with Ivan!!!. My wife and I traveled to Playa del Carmen for a week vacation at the Azul Fives Resort. We booked the Playacrawl before arriving. The staff at the Playacrawl contacted us numerous times before our night out with updates. The evening of the event, we met Ivan and our party at the Tequila Barrel on 5th Avenue. We then went to Abolengo, Tribeca, and finally to Mandala. Ivan hosted us at each location. The drinks and atmosphere was awesome all night. We felt safe and truly enjoyed ourselves. This event is a definite MUST to anyone wanting to hang out for a wild night in Playa del Carmen!!! Thanks Ivan.....you're the BEST!!!

5th Avenue. You don't want to miss this area if you are traveling to Cancun/Riviera Maya. There are many shops and bars to go to for entertainment. You can purchase all of your souvenirs here, or just enjoy food and drinks or people watching. Be aware that all of the shop owners will be trying whatever they can to get you into their stores, including offering free shots of tequila, or free beers. That can work in your favor, or against you, depending on how many of those you have! You can haggle on price with nearly all of the shop owners, so you can find some really good deals. If you get a block or two off of the main row of streets, there are more shops that you can find deals in as well, but I probably wouldn't recommend getting much beyond that, as the areas start to get a little more scary in what the area looks like. I wouldn't be afraid to take children on the main drag, but definitely keep them close, as this is a super busy place.

A Great Night Out!!. This was my 2nd time and as before...We had a blast!! There's never a bad night to go, we all went on a Wednesday night before the peak time and it was amazing. Ivan is the MAN!! There was never a moment where we had an empty glass, a shotless moment nor a minute where Ivan wasn't making sure we were having fun. After going on numerous bar crawls...Playacrawl is the Best and well worth the price!!! Thanks Jorge

Excellent Time. An easy going and fun night. Ivan made sure to keep the party going but was never over the top or underwhelming. A perfect outing for those who want to discover the night life. Would definitely do it again. Thanks Ivan!
AWESOME!!!. Ivan is just awesome!!! we went for a bachelorette and Ivan prepared some props for the bride and the girls to wear! how thoughtful!!!
Great Time. Had a great night with Ivan!! My wife and I really enjoyed how they made feel like family. We had a blast! We will do it again!! Get your girl Ricky Martin!!

Just for fun. Absolutely awesome! My wife and I don't speak Spanish and wanted to feel safe but still take in some of the night life. Not only is Ivan extremely polite and a pleasant conversationalist, but he has a lot of connections that treated us like royalty. We had a blast and never once felt unsafe. Ivan is amazing at his job. Best time we had in Playa

Best way to experience the nightlife of Playa. Worth every penny! Ivan was amazing and this is hands down the best way to go out in Playa. We felt safe and it was so easy to get drinks and get access to different clubs.

A must do in Playa Del Carmen. Initially, I was not very ready about this crawl thing. However, because of heavy rains we couldn't manage to go for Cozumal. Then, I suddenly booked it for the same day. Honestly, I am amazed how worth my decision was. This is the best party experience we ( me and my wife) had. The host was Ivan and was just a great guy, entertaining and funny. In short this tour was worth every single penny spent. We went to three bars/clubs with all VIP treatment. Drinks inclusive, its amazing. I would highly, highly recommend this to all who visit Carmen

A must do if your visiting Playa!. Ivan was a champion host, loved to get involved and knew how to provide a crazy night out. It's so much easier with the VIP experience, no waiting, better service and you have your own area at each place, money well spent!

Great time in Playa del Carmen!. I would recommend the playa crawl tour to any group of girls that is going for a bachelorette party. Our tour guide Ivan was great! It was so nice to already have prepaid for all three bars and not have to deal with anyone at the doors (negotiating). We also already had our table and Ivan would talk to the waiters and get everything set up for us.... all we had to do was have FUN and focus on the bride to be. I also felt safer knowing a local was with us. Anyway, I would recommend Party Crawl and ask for Ivan!
amazing. the night life was amazing especially with the staff and the environment will surely recommend this place if you life to be out at night

Much cheaper going out in Playa this way... and a lot of fun!. If you go out clubbing in Playa, definitely do it VIP style. Much cheaper, less waiting, VIP areas, better table service... and Ivan rocks!

Playacrawl rocks!. Lots of fun and alcohol! Ivan is an amazing party ninja host. It is worth every cent. If you go out 5 nights in Playa, you are better off going with him every night as it would end up cheaper and better. No lines or ques... Better table service... I paid 1,000 bucks in Tribeca for VIP service... And I could save 10x just going with Playacrawl having a better experience.

Excellent time with Playacrawl. Great time had by all. Ivan was professional and made sure that all of the girls in my bachelorette party were safe and having a great time. We visited a few bars and the drinks were flowing. I would definitely recommend using Playacrawl if you are planning a night out in Playa del Carmen.
Bachelor party. Great time had by all ivan was fun and professional dont go in blind use playacrawl you wont regret it
Fun Night. This is a fun night out, visited 3 bars and then had standing reservations at Coco Bongos. The reps really do their best to make this enjoyable

Worth it. Ivan is so wonderful. If it had been anyone else, I probably would have been ready to go. It was like going out with my brother from another mother and I'm an only child! I wish transportation could have been arranged but other than that, a great time was had by all. Drinks were flowing and waiters were friendly. Police presence was appreciated. Bathroom had no water in one club but that was fixed soon after arrival.

Ivan with Playacrawl is aMAZing!. My Boyfriend & I did Playacrawl with Ivan 2 years ago as recommended through TripAdvisor & had an unforgettable time! Two Years later we were back in Playa & back with Ivan! Another two incredible nights out & we couldn't say enough good things about him!Ivan is professional, adaptable, knowledgable, awesome & all about creating your best night ever!! Absolutely the best & must do thing in Playa!

Once again didn't disappoint!!. Ivan was great... This was my 2nd time doing the playacrawl and once again it was so much fun! Ivan made sure we all felt safe and that our drinks were always full! Highly recommend!

Highly recommended. Ivan is the man. He takes care of just about everything for you. No stress about making decisions, which can be difficult in large groups. I'm not a club whatsoever, but I had a freaking blast. Again, highly recommended.

#1 choice for both new and experienced Playa partiers. This was the 2nd time I've done the Playacrawl and again... it surpassed all my expectations. I had 11 bros for a bachelor party and we got a VIP table in 3 of the hottest clubs in Playa with unlimited liquor (so much alcohol we spent much of the night sharing it with girls seated all around us). For the price, you honestly could not have a better deal and get more out of the entire Playa party experience. Went from 10pm to 5am in the morning and our man Ivan was there all the way til the end.
great night. Did this with our Thomson's rep had great night cost around £50.00 with all entry and drinks from 8.30 until around 2am

Ivan The Invincible!. Seriously, if you want a night out in Playa Del Carmen this is one thing you must do. No lines, no fuss, no worries. Just good times with the drinks flowing. While you get to go to the three hottest clubs happening that night, easily the most valuable part of the package is the host, Ivan. Ivan knows the scene and has great relationships with all clubs in PDC. He has an energy level that cannot be matched by anyone and he quickly gets the party started at the first venue. These sorts of crawls are only as good as the guide who takes you. In Ivan you have someone who truly loves talking, meeting and engaging with new people. His only concern is that you have a great night and he will stop at nothing to ensure you have a great night with your friends. He is a genuine cool dude and he infects everyone with his endless energy, enthusiasm and awesome outlook on life.Ivan is the real deal and makes this package a must for any visit to PDC. Ill definitely be calling Ivan when I go back.

Great time in PDC. We had a great time with Ivan on this bar crawl. Everything was advertised as we got VIP / Table service at every club we went to. I would give 5 stars but we had a little trouble at one of the clubs getting service, it was very packed and took a long time to get a drink. Ivan was on it right away and did the best that he could to fix the problem. Overall had a great time!!

Great choice for a great night out in Playa del Carmen. First of all, Ivan from Rockstarcrawls is a great host. His service alone is worth the $$ for the crawl. He made sure that everyone felt welcome, a drink in hand, and had fun. Meeting up in Playa del Carmen is easy as the Tequila Barrel cannot be missed. From there it was a great night. All of the bars are no line no cover and they're not some dives either. All of the clubs are in the heart of Playa del Carmen. When you get in there is a private area for the group to chill, drink and dance. There are waiters who serve you all night and bring you anything that you want to drink.The value you get from this is unparalleled; 3 bars and unlimited drinks for the price you pay...it does not get better than this. Money well spent.

Great Way to Party in PDC. I booked the Playacrawl for my boyfriend's 45th birthday. There were 6 of us and we had a great time with Ivan. Our resort was close to Fifth Avenue, so we met Ivan outside a bar at a designated time and then he took us out. We were with him from 10 p.m. to 3:30 a.m., and the time went by in a blink. You can opt for bottle service or order your own drinks. We ordered our own drinks, and Ivan had the waiters bring us shots throughout the night that were really delicious. The drinks were not too strong, which was good, because you need to pace yourself for the entire night. That being said, if you have bottle service you can make your drink as strong a you want, or just order more drinks, if you really want to get lit. You can't beat the VIP service for skipping lines, great location in the clubs, and bar service. Ivan is an amazing host and a great dancer. He made sure we were all having fun the entire night. You do not always go to the same locations on the Playacrawl, I think its based upon the guide's preference as well as what is the most happening place on a given night. We started out at a lounge (Abelongo), then to a went to a dance club (La Vaquita), and then ended up at the most happening place on the row (Mandala) where we had the best time. The Playacrawl is a great value - thank you Ivan!!

Jack&Jill Bachelor/ette Party. We picked 3-bar crawl in Playa after reading several positive reviews on Trip Advisor. Well let me tell you, you will not be disappointed!! Jorge was our party guide and made sure the 15 of us had an awesome time at time at every bar we visited. V.IP/Bottle service made the night a big success. We were able to arrange shuttle service to/from Playa, ensuring we returned safely back to the resort. Whether its a big group or yer just looking for a night out on the town, this group of party ninja's will not disappoint! :)

Great night out.. This was such a fun & great night out! You basically bar crawl around 3 bars to begin with, and then you end up in Coco Bongos. There is a lot going on in Bongos from tributes to acrobatics. The tribute are not live, just mining but still good fun.

Playacrawl. The playa crawl was awesome even though we went on a slow night (Sunday) but Ivan our guide made it very fun and enjoyable. He had so much energy and was enthusiastic about getting to know us! It was a great time!

Best night of vacation!. With a resort with almost zero nightlife, my group definitely needed a night out to party. Ivan (our host) made it happen. The night was perfectly planned with a lounge in the beginning to get us started and 2 clubs to follow. Ivan was a great host that kept the group partying until the night was over. He even showed us a nice taco join to finish the night off. I definitely would recommend this to anyone with the urge to experience the Mexican nightlife, and I would definitely book this again!

Greatest way to celebrate the bride!. A group of friends went out to celebrate the bride and we had an amazing time with Sina. We literally danced till we dropped! Such a great way to experience the club scene in Mexico!

Best Night of our vacation!!!. Total Blast. As a single woman traveling with two 20 year old girls I was a bit hesitant about the safety of going out clubbing. I read some reviews on Trip Advisor on this crawl and decided to go for it.We opted to pay the additional to have a van come pick us up at our hotel. Once we arrived in downtown Playa Ivan met us immediately. Ivan was the entire night. He made us feel safe, secure, taken care of. He made sure we had fun, always had a drink in our hands and danced with us. I would highly recommend this excursion, I would certainly do it again and again.

Bachelorette Playa Crawl. This booking was ideal for our trip! We did not have any bars/clubs in our resort so having one night off site was perfect. They picked us up at the hotel and took us downtown to where we were greeted by our guide, Ivan. He was the best and took great care of us all night! We all got bridal party gear to wear and all requests were granted for bottle service at all the stops! We had a designated reserved area in each club/bar and had the best time. Ivan really helped to make the party fun! We would definitely do that again!

Girls night out!!!. Me and my girlfriends had a blast with Ivan!!! We were celebrating my best friend last night of freedom, so we decided to have her a bachelorette party at Playa del Carmen (Ivan in his crew). Ladies if you are looking for a good time please try the party crawl you will not regret it. Really enjoy the different clubs and Ivan had such a fun personality. ;-) P

Amazing party experience. Ivan is the man!!! We dubbed him the "Turn Up King" as he definitely knows how to get the party started! Besides being a lot of fun, he was very attentive and responsible. We had 20+ people in our group and had no worries the whole night because of him. Definitely recommend asking for him! A+++
Amazing staff. A must do in Cancun.. Amazing!!!!! We had a blast. The staff makes sure everyone is having fun and is always looking out for everyone in the group. A must do in Cancun.

5th street done right!. Ivan was the best host ever!! If you go ask for him. Super nice guy, attentive, and can rock it on the dance floor! We got through all the lines and had the best spot in the club every time. My fiancé and I had such a great time and will definitely do it again!
Boss. Ivan is the best person to meet in playa... Playacrawl is amazing! He knows where to take you any night. No issues ever. Recommend only going with Ivan if you are in Playa.

Always a GREAT time!. Third Playacrawl in Playa!!! Always fun:) This year my daughter went with us, and, needless to say, we had a fantastic time! Once again, Ivan was our guide and he was great. He is just a sweet, kind person. We went on a Thursday night to avoid the weekend madness, but it was still crazy and fun. Well worth the money!

Best night in Playa Del Carmen!. We had an amazing time celebrating my bachelorette with Playacrawl. Jorge & Ivan were awesome! They brought lots of fun bachelorette props for me and made sure we had a great time. We started the night off at Abolengo, then went to La Vaquita and ended the night at Palazzo. We walked right in at every spot and had a table and bottles waiting for us with great service all night long. I highly suggest Playacrawl if you're going to Playa Del Carmen and want to party.

Really fun experience. Really cool experience, you are made to feel like you're a VIP everywhere you go which is impossible in the states. It seems expensive by Mexican standards but it's worth it in the end, a lot of fun.

No wonder they are Number 1. Best party in Playa del Carmen!. These guys really know how to make you have a good time! No wonder they are number 1, for the money you pay and the stuff you get this is a no brainer. No tonly the services but the experience at the end of the night is priceless. I wont even go through all the details of the night, I will just tell you if you want to have a great time and not worry about anything, Rockstarcrawls is the way to do it, period. Thanks guys from Izak and the guys from Chicago.

Amazing Bachelorette party in Playa del Carmen!. What can I say about the Playacrawl, well now I see why they are the #1 nighlife activitie in Playa del Carmen, they really provide a great service. Our case was a Bachelorette party and from the moment I contacted Jorge I knew this was the right choice, he got back to me within a few hrs of my email and sent me an email detailing the easiest way to set up a booking link I could send to all my girs so they could book individually ( this was awesome for me as I did not had to take responsability of all the bookings), They picked us up in a Hummer Limo with champagne bottles waiting for us, on arrival to our first club Ivan (our awesome party guide) was there to greet us, from the second we met him we knew it was going to be an amazing night, he is a really nice guy who keep the energy going all night, he is a GREAT dancer so he kept at all going and dancing the whole night. Some of the girls had never been to Mexico and were a little scared, Ivan made us feel so safe the whole night the girls didn't even remember they were concerned, it took 2 minutes of us arriving and meeting Ivan to forget this, they know everyone in every club and everyone was so polite and the services at the clubs were top notch, we made no lines had our tables waiting for us with bottle services, the waiters did not let us a single minute without an empty hand, I was amazed with the service. On top of that, our bride got to do the Playacrawl for free taking advantage of their special and we also got bachelorette supplies for free! What else can I say about it, for he price I was amazed at the services, they went above my expectations. On the Catamaran trip again, everything went perfectly, although we were a bit hangover we had so much fun and really enjoyed it, have only good things to say about Playacrawl, keep it going guys you are the best! Thanks for the amazing services and experience!

Nightlife Bar Crawl in Playa Del Carmen. My fiancee and I as well as my sister and her friend purchased a bar crawl experience through Rockstar Crawls when we were in Riviera Maya, Mexico last week. Our nightlife expert was Ivan and he made our experience memorable. He took us to Abolengo, Tribeca, and Blue Parrot. We didn't wait on any lines, we had a table when we got into the clubs, and the drinks were constantly flowing. Ivan made sure we were safe, having fun, and that our cups were never empty.

Awsome Playacrawl on a Wednesday. Ivan definitely knew how to party. Even on a Wednesday the clubs were happening. My girlfriends and I loved the scene and we never felt unsafe. Definitely worth itttt!!

Ivan knows THE BEST PLACES TO PARTY. Couldn't beat the deal of going to the best 3 spots in Playa Del Carmen for $75. Literally places that were packed with people and good music. Amazing vibes and would definitely HIGHLY recommend. Thanks again Ivan our host

Great night with Ivan!. We went on the playacrawl tour with Ivan on a Monday night. Given that it was a Monday, it was just our group with Ivan, which was cool. Ivan was very entertaining and we had a great night! We started at Abolengo, which was very chill. We then moved to La Vaquita and then to Mandala. The drinks weren't too strong so if you want something stronger you should order shots. The tour also gave us a good idea of where we wanted to go out on other nights and we went back to Abolengo and Mandala on Thursday night.I would definitely recommend if you want to get a feel for the nightlife!
Fun Times. Loved everything!!!! Company was great, people we friendly and the vistors were outgoing. Enjoyable atmosphere really felt special and appreciated all the hard work and devotion.

Awesome night out in Playa with Ivan!. Went to Playa with my girlfriend, and one of the main things we wanted to do that you can't do (safely) in many tropical destinations is to get off the resort, go out on the town, and experience the nightlife. After reading reviews here we booked Playacrawl, immediately received an email from Jorge, and then also also received text confirmation from him the day of. Upon arrival our guide Ivan was easy to spot & was waiting our arrival. Well from there, the night is history: 3 bars/clubs, 5 hours, & treated like VIP gold by both Ivan himself & all hosts, waiters/waitresses, & barstaff we encountered. Obviously he had a great relationship with these people & they paid it forward to us. Drinks & shots kept flowing all night & we avoided EVERY long line. We always had a spot to sit or stand ready to go for us & were always escorted directly to them so that way we didn't have to wait or deal with the crowds. Ivan knew exactly how to show us a good time & also keep us safe. We definitely will be doing this when we come back to Playa & will certainly will be hanging out with Ivan again. Thanks again for a great night, you rock!! -Rocco & Kait.
Best night out!. Loved the playacrawl Tour. Ivan was our tour guide was sooo much fun. It was a group of 10 of us and we all had a great time. Highly recommend it. Will def do it again.

Couldn't have gotten any better!. I booked the playacrawl months before my boyfriend and I were heading to Playa del Carmen based off of the Tripadviser ratings and not really sure what I was getting myself into.  Let's just say we are glad we did. It was the best night we had all week. You get unlimited drinks at three clubs/bars, you get to dance all night, and the people treat you like gold.  We had Ivan as our guide and he was absolutely amazing. Though Im sure the others are great too, if you get the chance to have Ivan as a guide then you are guaranteed to be safe, treated well, and to have an awesome time! I cannot wait to go back to Playa del Carmen for so many great reasons and the the Playacrawl being one of them!
awesome service. driver picked us up, delivered us to doorstep of first bar where our guide Ivan was waiting. he took great care of us all night! had.a.blast
Great way to spend night. Slow start but soon got warmed up it's not LA but still a great night and remember to tip the waiter as they look out for you then

Party, sun, beach... Have all for fun.. Excelent mood, fun, hot and party. Dont need friends, you Will meet nice poeple Just getting fun. Nice food around, and many place with nice poeple to get fun at day or night.

Fantastic Experience !!!!!!. Definitely a must to do activity if you visit Playa del Carmen!!! Attention was perfect! they treat you as a VIP IN EVERYTHING!!! drinks all the time, whatever you want, any time you want, No rows, great places and amazing people you get to meet! Great experience !!! Ivan is a great hoster!!!!

Sooo Much Fun. This is the best way to do the club scene in Playa. The night gets started at 10 ish and you get paired with a small group and host who makes sure you have fun. Ivan was our host and he was so much fun, got the group to interact which made the evening even more fun and makes sure you don't get lost in the chaos. This club crawl includes all the booze u can drink and a ton of fun! I would definately do this again and recommend to anyone who wants a super fun night on the town.

Solo trip, amazing time!. I booked Playacrawl so I could experience the night life in Playa without any worries, and that is exactly what I got! Ivan's group, a bachelor party, started with our group at Abolingo so I got to see him again (a great guide!), but there were so many groups that night, our guide was Luiz, who was apparently filling in and had done tours before. There were 3 couples and myself, a single gal, but we became instant friends and had the time of our lives! Our second stop was Mandala, very fun upstairs with great EDM and cool lighting, loved the interior decor. The best and last stop that I will definitely visit again was Palazzo and El Azteca was the entertainment for the night. AMAZING. Gorgeous place, lots of beautiful people, thumpin' EDM and a great show by El Azteca! Had so much fun, I didn't even notice my hurting feet from 5" stilettos all night until the next day and I didn't care one bit! AWESOME time and the best part was I had no worries as a single female. TAKE. THE. TOUR.

Fantastic. My trip was in April 2013. This was absolutely a great time!! Our "guide" was a complete blast and keep the party going. It was a great way to meet other people that were from different areas of the world.

Amazing, safe, Bachleorette party!. With six young women we felt it necessary to have some sort of guide/male with us our first time on 5th street in Playa. Not only did Ivan make us feel safe and secure he didn't let us forget we were at a Bachelorette party in Mexico. We went to some of the most high energy clubs I've ever been to. Bottle service at the table, dancing to awesome music... Nothing better. We never had to stop to ask for a drink, his people at each place completely hooked us up and had drinks in our hands all night long. I would HIGHLY recommend PlayaCrawl... On my next trip, we will be using them again. So happy to have found them!

Bachlorette party for the books!. We had an amazing time with Ivan/Jorge! We had a group of 16 girls which is a lot to handle but they made sure that we were all taken care of the entire time! The light up bunny ears were great for helping us stick together (we were traveling from the US so our phones didn't work). You would look across the bar or down the street and immediately were able to spot your group. I felt totally safe and had the best time. I would absolutely recommend them! They were a blast and I wish we could go out with them every weekend!!!

Amazing night for my 25th!. I'm not really a huge clubber, or for that matter drinker, in my day-to-day but I really wanted to have a good rager for my 25th birthday. I brought a bunch of my friends to Mexico and booked Playacrawl for 6 of us. Ivan was really exactly what I was looking for in a guide, easy-going and clear about the expectations of the night regarding him and the experience. He was there when you needed him, but he gave us space to hang out. We all loved all the places; Abolengo is a bar with fantastic service and a quirky aesthetic, TriBeCa is a loud, banging club and Blue Parrot was literally wet and wild.  We had bottle service, with some fine servers such as Ullyses. We all remarked how professional, fun and thoughtful they all were. We got tons of personal attention from the servers even though the alcohol and tip was already paid for up-front with Ivan. Really solid staff who were committed to giving guests a luxury experience in a completely open-air setting. We had bottle service and devoured a bottle of Jose Cuervo. It was definitely watered down, which we were actually glad about. It meant we could drink for longer and shots weren't too harsh, and no one got too wasted or sick. Music was perfect for the beginning of the night; TONS of late 90s and early 00's throwbacks with some new top-40. Originally the plan was to go to Mandala, which was right across the street, but Ivan remarked that the club was dead. Change of plans; we headed down the street to TriBeCa, a loud open-air club with a second-story open platform accessible by a ladder, an open second level seating area, sunken dance floor and recessed bar. It was not unlike partying on the set of a Broadway mainstage set up to look like a loud club. I'm trying to remember the music and I seem to remember electronic and top-40, but I honestly don't remember. I was definitely having fun at this point, being brought red cups of something lemon-lime flavoured en masse. Seriously, I'm pretty sure we had like 10 of these 16 ounce cups full of Sprite-and-something (vodka? I honestly don't know) lined up before any of us had finished our first. Our DD even got into it, spending about a half-hour on the platform dancing amusingly close to but completely separate from the three other people in the raised, 10 foot x 8 foot stage. Third was Blue Parrot. The Foam Party. At this point things just kept happening that were amazing. We arrived to receive wristbands in...a cave? I remember it being a cave. It was a cave that became a club. We were escorted to a comfortable outdoor seating area where bottle service was offered again. I believe I ordered a drink I was wise not to finish. I had worn a white bikini top, and this was the moment I decided to reveal it. My boyfriend and our friends frolicked in walls of foam 6 feet tall. A capeira (dance? Match?) suddenly started in the fighting ring, which was when we noticed that there was a fighting ring. We accepted this and proceeded to dance amongst ourselves with various levels of gropiness. After failing to perform a piggyback ride for my soap-laden friend, we all decided the night had peaked righteously and decided to cut out for some tacos before the ride home.  Enjoyed some exceptionally satisfying al pastor at Don Sirloin (shouts to the Don) and a much-needed public restroom visit we were off to our snug vacation rental.  Thank you so much Ivan, Jorge and Rockstarcrawls for an incredible night.

A must. So this was our second time around with this company. We did the cuncrawl in October. And it was just as fun as the last time. You become instant friends with your fellow partiers and carry on the night as if you've been friends forever! The drinks were flowing and the staff incredible. Make time for this excursion!

Wish I Could Remember it All!. (LOL)....HAD A BLAST!!!A Few years back, on a fellas trip, we did the crawl in Cancun - same company. So while in Playa Del Carmen for our wedding, the wife to be and I planned the crawl for our wedding guests. Once again, they did an OUTSTANDING job!!! Ivan was our guide - he has a great sense of humor & he took great care of us. Abolingo was our first stop and OH BUDDY, did we hate to leave there. But it only got better at the Blue Parrot!!! It was SOOO good there, EVERYONE in our group (12) wanted to stay there for the rest of the night....and was a night to remember....at least that's what SOME people said!!!
Amazing time. We had 11 people and Ivan showed us an amazing time. Our group was skeptical but 20 min into the crawl everyone had let loose and didn't stop til the end!

Awesome!. Booked them for a bachelorette party and they were excellent. Everything was set up as planned and they accommodated all our requests. Ivan was fantastic and made sure everyone was having a great time. Definitely recommend them!

A terrific night out!. Such a fun night! The service ensured that we had a fun, safe night in Playa with no planning on our part. We went there for a bachelorette party and our entire group had the best time! Our party guide Ivan took us to some really great bars, he also made sure that no woman was left behind. Ivan acted as our bodyguard, host, personal hype man, and the consummate insider. He also told us where to get tacos after. A must use service!

Best way to do a night out in Playa del Carmen!. We were in Mexico for a wedding and were looking around for what to do for the bachelorette party. We were so happy to find Playacrawl and have only positive things to say about our night out, our party guide and the company in general. They were super responsive and accommodating prior to our arrival, and our party guide Ivan was an awesome guy. He made sure we were all accounted for (so none of us had to worry about a bunch of drunk girls wandering around), made sure we all had drinks, and even got rid of some annoying dudes for us. The clubs they chose were super fun -- we felt like we were re-living our 20s when we ended up at a beachfront foam party for our final stop. We were out until 5am, and we had a great time. You are paying for convenience and a guaranteed amazing experience... and it is TOTALLY worth it. If you want a fun, boozy, no-stress way to party in Playa del Carmen - this is for you.
Had a bachelorette party there! Was Good!. Great clubs! Good music, vip service. The entertainer was fun and friendly. Nice atmosphere with good people
Fantastic Night. From Pick up to Drop off we had a blast. Safe all night. Comfortable and looked after like royalty. No Complaints at all!! Ivan was fantastic and was a the perfect host.
So much fun!!. Almost too much fun, missed the breakfast buffet the next morning, LOL. Ivan was fantastic, it was such a memorable night. We really felt like VIPs. Thank you Ivan for a great night!!!

Excellente!!! IVAN!!!. Vip service. As I was putting a smoke in my mouth a waiter already had fire for me to light it. My glass was always full. Because of Ivan I would come back to playa del Carmen and visit. I highly recommend this tour and ask for Ivan. He will keep you safe ,happy and hammered. Whoop whoop!!!!
Really great night!. Ivan was our host, and he really knows how to entertain. The three spots we went to were all great, from the atmosphere to the employees. Recommended highly.
It was good!. Thanks for the great evening, we really enjoyed it! We started of in a quiet bar and worked our way up to the club. Nice!

Oh what a night :). It was so nice to have our own area in the nightclubs and to have the guys there to keep us feeling safe. Bottle service was top notch and we enjoyed the pub crawl, well worth the money.!!

Best way to discover Playa's nightlife!. As a group of 5 french guys visiting Playa del Carmen for the first time, we decided to go with Playacrawl on our first night. We've been drinking the whole day at Mamita's and were concerned we will not be ready to party all night but as soon as we met Mo, the night was on!! The concept is awesome, you go to a great bar and to two of the city's best clubs, no line, no cover, best tables, and a party guide who is taking care of you! We had Mo and he was the best, having fun with us but also knew how to be discreet.On that night we were with 4 girls celebrating a bachelorette party and we ended up being best friends! Defiinitely a must-do in Playa! Probably our best night, thanks to Mo!

What a great night..... I went on Playacrawl for my bachelorette party and it was FANTASTIC! We had previously done Cuncrawl and we were hoping that this would be just as fun and we weren't disappointed.Everything was exactly as advertised...3 destinations, no lines, VIP treatment.... Our guide was Ivan and he made sure were having fun from beginning to end. He even got us pizza :-)If I go back to the area, I'm definitely going to go again. I can't think him enough for making our night so amazing. Book Playacrawl! Request Ivan!

Amazing!. Really nice bar tour with a super guide who take care of everything! From the beginning untill the end your guide will take care of everithyng. If you need to go to the bathroom or buy something at the corner store or food dont worry. VIP entrance at each club with a banket and open bar ! A must for everyone who enjoy night activitys!

3rd Time Playacrawler. This was our third year in a row going on Playacrawl. It's a always a fantastic time. This year we went to two clubs that we hadn't been to before. Ivan was a spectacular host and made sure we had a great time the whole way through. In past years we had always started at some more chill spots before hitting the club scene. I liked that a little better than jumping straight into the loud clubs. Allows us to ramp up the night a little more smoothly. Highly recommended either way though.

Amazing night. This is the best way to have good time in Playa, Jorge was very responsive and prompt prior to booking. Ivan was a great host and very engaging with the crowd and my group. We did not know what to expect, as it was a Mondday night, it ended up being an epic and fun night. Thanks a lot guys.

So much fun!. Every club was great. They were all 5 star clubs (nothing like I've ever been to in the U.S... and we go out often!) You get to sit in VIP sections with drinks of your choice all night. Moshi was our host and he was great, very accommodating! The group was small that night but we all got along great. I heard that the groups are pretty large every other night, either way, it's going to be a blast.El Palazzo was so much fun, it was butler themed and all of the servers tried to show you a good time by dancing with you and showing you special attention in the VIP section. There was a light up dance floor and everyone was in a good mood. Loved it and I highly recommend it. It was recommended to us by a close friend and we will continue to pass this recommendation on! Keep up the good work!

Very good experience!. I got married in Riviera Maya last week and took some of the guests on the Playacrawl a few days before the wedding. The whole experience was much better than what I expected. Ivan and Mo took us to 3 incredible bars, walked us in, put us in the best seats in the house and made sure we always had drinks in our hand. If any of the women in our group needed to leave the club for food or cigarettes they would walk them where they needed to go and get them back safely. They took care of everything for us so that we could all focus on having a good time. They are well worth the cost!

I was reluctant to go, but I'm glad I did. It was great. It was a lot of fun, Ivan was super cool and great to take us around and show us a good time. I would recommend this to anyone, especially people that are reluctant to go out in a different city

BEST NIGHT OF THE TRIP!!!. Found this right here on TripAdvisor and so glad I looked.This was one of the best nights we had, and this is the only way to go out while in Playa!I set everything up through Jorge who is the owner. He even came to the first stop and made sure everything was cool. Jorge is a really nice guy. Our group was two couples and we had 6 other people in our group. Our guide was Moshe (MO) and he was the man!! From the beginning to the end he set us up with the best tables, made sure our drinks were full, and all in all was just awesome. We never waited at the door and we handled the tips all up front so he took care of everything. This is the ONLY way to go out while in town. I highly recommend doing this and when I'm back I will most definitely do it again. We had a blast and thank you so much to Mo for making it happen. Hope yo be back soon to do it all over again.

Playa Crawl is a MUST when in Playa Del Carmen, Mexico. Myself and 9 other girl friends recently attended a playa crawl for my sister's bachelorette. It came at the recommendation from another friend who had done it before. Due to that we already had high expectations-- well, we were pleasantly surprised that it exceeded those expectations... to say the least! To start out, we were having trouble trying to pay through paypal but were given the option to pay in cash, the night of the crawl, which was very accommodating. Our party guide was Ivan-- he is awesome! He got the crowd hyped up and ready to party, we always felt safe and he provided an environment that was conducive to PARTYING! It was very inexpensive, fast (we breezed through long lines to get in and waiting at the bar for drinks) and definitely worth it. I would recommend this to anyone traveling through Playa, whether in a large group or even traveling alone.

Fantastic Playacrawl Bachelorette Party with Mo!. I'm just back from a great week in Mexico and wanted to share my thoughts on our amazing night in Playa del Carmen on Nov 23. I arranged to have my friend's bachelorette party with Playacrawl since I didn't know the city very well and they have great reviews. I arranged it all with Jorge, the owner, and Mo (Moshe) was our guide for the night. He helped make the night everything we had hoped for and more! My friend (the bride) and all the guests had a fantastic time dancing, drinking and having an absolute blast at the clubs we went to. I can't remember the names of all the clubs but one was Vaquita and the other two I don't remember. Mo is amazing! He danced with us all night, made sure we were 100% safe all night long and went above and beyond to make the night very special. I highly recommend this company if you want to have a fantastic night in Playa del Carmen! Ask for Mo because he is such a wonderful guy! Thanks so much, Mo! Lots of love,The Canadian ladies :D

an amazing night! Wouldn't change a thing!!. Went for our bachelor/ bachelorette party with about 15 people and had sooo much fun! All the staff were so helpful and made sure our cups were always full! Alejandro was absolutely amazing!!!! I would do it again

Great Time with Alejandro!!. My wife, our friends and myself celebrated a bachelor/Bachelorette party with playa crawl and it was awesome! A must do forsure!! Everyone had a blast and our quite Alejandro was awesome! He made sure we were all having fun! Well worth the money!

"Tonights gona be a good.. good time". celebrated my girlfriends bday with a trip to play del carmensince we were only there for 2 nights we needed to make the most of our timeso i booked our 1st night there with Playacrawlim not one to write reviews...so you know for me to write this it has to be good!!what can i say...we arrived a little late because our dinner reservations ran latebut NO worries...Jorge and Mosh were waiting for us right where they said they would bewith another couple who were awesome and a blast as wellforgive me but i forgot the actual names of the clubs (doesnt matter) because we left that all up to Jorge and Mosh s to lead us in the right directionthey Did not disappoint we had an incredible time. They would walk us right thru the lines to the best tables in the club, never had and empty drink and Jorge and mosh were a blastnot only did they show us a great time but Jorge and Mosh are truly 2 Great individuals and really cared about our well beingeverytime my GF went to use the washroom Jorge made sure she got there and back with no issues Thanks Again fellas and i hope anyone reading this would sign up with Playcrawalits a no brainer all you have to worry about is a bad hangover the next day!!Chitowntodd

Excited from the reviews - Disappointing on the night. We were on a family of 7 (age range 1-58) beach holiday and the 4 young ones of the group (21-30) wanted to get out and play. Having never been to Playa del Carmen before we thought an organised bar crawl would be perfect for us. After reading all the excellent reviews on Tripadvisor we were so excited for our Playacrawl which was booked for a Friday night.We we felt so gutted by the end of the night as it was far from excellent in our eyes. We had a female tour guide who was really nice but she didn't keep the party going ... it all fell flat after the Bachelorette Party girls all left after the 2nd club which was a shame as they kept us amused with their falling over and slurry conversations. We gave up at 2am wishing we had gone it alone from the start OR had the party guide Ivan than everyone raves about on here.

Ivan was the best!. Booked this tour for a girls night out for my friends birthday when we were in Playa. Hadn't been to the area and wanted to make sure we were safe and taken care of. Ivan was awesome in showing us a great time and making sure we were having fun all night! Will definitely book this again next time we are in town!!

Worth. Every. Penny! What a great night!. Having never been to Playa and not knowing what the best clubs were, we booked the playacrawl and it was so worth it. You would spend so much more money going to each club on your own and with booking this, you get Ivan who totally makes the experience! I will say that not waiting in lines, bottle service, your own section waiting for you at each bar was awesome. The other thing that was great is having a guide when we were three women from the states who then felt safe because we had a guide who knew everyone with us. Absolute best night of our trip! You won't be disappointed in booking this!

Worth the hangover!. We did the playacrawl for a bachelor/bachelorette party. $95 canadian per person. They pick you up from your hotel. 3 bars, front of line and bottle service/VIP section at each bar. Always felt very safe and had a great host! I don't think any of us remember the ride back to the resort..... a lot of fun!

What a night!!!. My friend and I wanted to go out and party but not by ourselves. So I looked up on Trip Advisor "things to do" in Playa and Playacrawl came up. It sounded like a great idea. We met in town and we were the only ones on this night that showed up so we had Ivan all to ourselves. We made him go into a couple stores before we went to the clubs. The clubs were a ton of fun lots of dancing and drinking! Everyone was super nice at the clubs. You feel like a Rock Star with VIP treatment every where he takes you.Ivan made sure we had everyting we wanted or needed.My friend and I will NEVER forget our Playacrawl !It was the BEST $ I spent on the whole trip.

Best Night Out!. Ivan took us to three bars and wow did we have fun! We are a couple in our late forty's but still feel like we are in our twenties, we hopped onto the van and discovered a couple around our age that actually live near our town and they met up with a cousin from another province. The five of us and Ivan had such a great time and ended at the Hooka lounge before heading back to our hotels. We never felt unsafe, Playa is a very safe area. We are going to Cancun this January and I am so glad to see this company offers a pub crawl there as well.

IVAN!. My boyfriend and I spent my birthday in Mexico. We wanted to spend our first night out in the town. Ivan is full of energy and is actually a friendly guy from the US. He made sure we always had a drink in our hand..whether it be water or alcohol. Haha. I felt pretty safe having Ivan take us around the night scene. He always kept an eye on the group. Thanks IVAN FOR A MEMORABLE NIGHT!

Best Night of Vacation!. If you want a wild night out at busy night clubs where you can dance the night away, PlayaCrawl is the way to go. This was by far the best night of our vacation this summer! Jorge was an incredible host. We were 12 girls on a bachelorette party and we had the time of our lives. Originally the boys in the wedding party had discovered PlayaCrawl online and the girls were very disappointed that we hadn't found it first. We contacted Jorge at PlayaCrawl to see if there was any way the girls could have a separate Pub Crawl so that we didn't run into the boys. Jorge didn't hesitate and set up our own pub crawl at different bars in order for us to avoid the boys and keep the bride and groom apart. This exceeded our expectations. We had VIP treatment every where we went and had a drink in our hand at all times. I would recommend PlayaCrawl to anyone and hope that I can participate in it again next time I go on Vacation in Mexcio! Thank you Jorge and PlayaCrawl for a fantastic night out!

Excellent night out!. Me and my partner were not disappointed with our crawl and cannot recommend this highly enough, Ivan was our host who done a grand job, we were treated to VIP treatment with our glasses kept full all night, the bars were all great and even a tropical thunderstorm didn't spoil our night one bit, I loved all the bars but especially loved palazzo the atmosphere was electric! For you guys a fri night bar crawl would be great as they have a catwalk with scantily clad beautiful women strutting their stuff on the bars catwalk, not for long and definately not tacky (so don't be put off girls!) I shall most definately be booking this again on our return to Mexico as this was 100% value for money and a damn good night, you will definately not be disappointed if you attend, keep up the good work Ivan!!

5 PlayaCrawls Later... Best Decision I Made For The Entire Trip!!!. So I'll start by saying that I went on FIVE Playacrawls in 8 nights that I was in Playa, and it was the best choice I made for the entire trip.So where do I even start with Playacrawl? I guess with the life of the party... My boy Ivan! The Playacrawl hits some great bars and clubs, but honestly Ivan makes the experience what it is. Everywhere that we went we were treated like regulars and had absolutely ZERO issues getting in or with any unruly people at the clubs. Throughout our various crawls, my two buddies from college and I were mixed in with couples, to bachelorette parties, to guys just rolling solo. Ivan got everybody mixing it up and kept the party going into the wee hours of the morning.The club line ups are fantastic. Kartabar is an awesome starting spot for everybody to take a few shots together and get to know one another. Typically the clubs that follow will be a mix of Mandala, Blue Parrot, Palazzo, or La Vaquita. My personal favorite was Palazzo, followed by Mandala, & La Vaquita (I didn't go on a crawl that went to Blue Parrot).The clubs here are very house music heavy and are definitely crazy loud. My recommendation is that when you are getting ready to head to Tequila Barrel and meet up with the group, just leave your inhibitions & hesitancy at the hotel. Embrace the fun, dance, make a fool of yourself, and just soak the experience in and you'll walk away having some of the best nights out you can hardly remember.Having gone out this last weekend with the same guys from the trip, we were all sitting there in Scottsdale, AZ saying "Damn, we miss Playa and running around partying with Ivan!" and trust me if you take the advice I gave above you will be having the same withdrawls when you leave.I can't recommend PlayaCrawl and Ivan enough. My friends and I are already in the process of booking another trip here in March and we will likely go on 6 crawls in 9 nights next time so we can get more time out at these awesome clubs mixing it up with the international crowd in Playa.Huge thank you Ivan & PlayaCrawl. We will be seeing you again soon.-Jayson, Erik, & Kevin

Ivan deserves a Raise ;). My sister and I joined Ivan and 4 other people last week.It was by far the best night out of our vacation!I would recommend it to everybody wanting to dance all night and get the VIP treatment as well as open bar !Ivan was the best host ever, always made sure everybody was having a good time!Wish I was still there!!! We would for sure book again and make a special request for Ivan to be our guide!

Incredibly good time!. Went out for a Bachelor party with Playacrawl in August 2014. We went to Palazzo and the Blue Parrot and one other bar I can't remember (surprise, surprise!). But all of the locations were amazing. We had VIP treatment and always had the best VIP areas at all of the bars. Our guide was Ivan and he was a blast! He did a great job of getting everyone organized, always made sure we were engaged and had a full drink, and kept us all together all night. Highly recommend this for anyone looking to have a great night out in Playa Del Carmen. Our girls went out as well, we requested to not meet up with them during the night and we never did. Jorge was their guide, and they had nothing but good things to say.

Great bachelorette with Playa Crawl!. It was well worth the money as the clubs they took us to were all great and had a great atmosphere. Jorge was fun and professional and the bride and all of us had a blast!

Awesome time. We recently went to Playa del Carmen for a bachelorette party (5 of us girls) and surprised our bride-to-be with Playacrawl. We had a BLAST. We were in a pretty big group of people from all around the world and of different ages, and it was as if they were celebrating our future bride's last days as a single woman with us. Ivan did a great job keeping the party going and the drinks flowing, but most importantly, he made all of us feel safe. I'm sure I will end up in Playa del Carmen again, and I would definitely do the Playacrawl again in a heartbeat. Totally worth it!

Fantastic Bachelorette Night!. 11 of us girls signed up for a night out with playacrawl. It was the best experience and a night to remember!!Jorge was with us the whole time so our drinks were always full, we felt totally safe, and he isn't that bad to look at either :)I would totally recommend playacrawl and would definitely sign up again the next time I visit Playa Del Carmen.Thanks for a great night Jorge!!
Playa crawl awesome. My girlfriends and myself had an awesome time...Our guide Ivan made sure we were enjoying our selfs and we always had a drink in our hand.

Best deal. Skip getting ripped off by the bars when drunk and ask playa crawl for Ivan as ur party guide. Someone in ur group being a debbidowner that day, dont worry and call playacrawl and ask for Ivan. Ivan got all of us in the party mood in the first ten minutes. We were all smiles after that. Had a great time, skipped club lines, and always had table reserved as promised.75 dollars per person is the best deal to go out and party at playa. Just do the math. All clubs have a 10 dllr cover charge if you dont buy thier all drinks included price. 8 dllrs a drink or 5 per beer quickly add up if bar hopping. Ivan took us to the best night clubs without having to worry about the tab or getting our next drink.If ur lucky kartabar ,a hookah bar ,is on the plan for that night and Ana gets to be ur waitress. The host thier also ensured we were having a great time.Defintely reserve this crawl for more than one night if u r planning to club. Safest and most fun you will have.

Best of Playa Nightlife!. We recently visited Playa del Carmen as a group of 12 (6 couples) and signed up for the Friday night pub crawl. No one besides me really knew what to expect, but everyone had a great time and was extremely impressed by the nightlife. Our guide, Ivan, met us promptly at our designated meeting spot and got everyone amped up for the night. Our clubs for the night were Karta Bar, Mandala and Palazzo. We had 2 of the best tables in the house at Karta and Mandala, but Palazzo was packed by the time we arrived, so we chose to go to a less crowded location where we could get some good real estate. Ivan was cool with our request and had no problem accommodating our needs!I also did this same trip Memorial Day Weekend with a group of 13 guys for a Bachelor Party. We went to the same 3 bars on a Thursday night and had hands down the best tables at all 3 clubs. That night we got the balcony overlooking the dance floor at Palazzo which was awesome.I highly recommend doing the crawl at least one night during your stay in Playa. The guides are great, and it is nice having everything besides a little tip money prepaid and taken care of ahead of time!

Playa Fun all night. Ivan was amazing. We went with two couples just so we did not have to hassle with all the crazy "salesmen" on the street (been there before). Ivan was very relatable and seemed to know everyone in the entire city :)Had three clubs for the night that seemed to build on each other. Very FUN and very SAFE!! Well worth the money as it included all covers and all drinks.

Great parties, great host and excellent service!. I highly recommend booking Playacrawl for all your partying needs when you visit Playa del Carmen. Our host Ivan was outstanding! He knew how to get everyone moving and made you feel like you've known him forever. He definitely made the experience a fun one. He was very attentive and partied along with us.The "clubs" chosen were some of the best in Playa and the service was above and beyond. At one point, some of us hid our glasses to stop the refills lol. The drinks were unlimited and the music was good.
