Everyone was pleasant, welcoming and really made you feel like VIP guests.One of the highlights for me, was meeting persons from different countries. Our group was a mixture of Mexicans, Belizean, Jamaican, Americans and British. To say we had a blast would be understatement.I would definitely recommend the Playa Crawl! It was EPIC!

FUN night with FRIENDS. Absolutely the best night; we went to three bars Kartabar, La Vaquita and Mandala. Everyone was friendly, great service, great booze. Ivan was amazing; didn't feel like we'd get into any kind of trouble because he was watching out for everyone. Music was awesome and was just the night for dancing.

Mauricio - Great vacation with Playacrawl. Thanks Ivan and Jorge for a great time at Playa! We went out to 3 different bars, that were full of people but we got in with out making any lines. Inside, we had a table and a waiter serving drinks from the open bar. Ivan was all the time checking on everyone making sure everyone was safe and that you everyone was having a great time. I end up going out with the Playacrawl 4 different nights because It was more fun and they new where are the best clubs on different days.

Great party, great people, good good times!. A friend back home recommended us with Playacrawl and he was not wrong we had the best time with the Playacrawl crew specially Sina and Jorge who made sure we did not have a dull moment the entire night. We would not been able to go to all the places we did and to drink as much as we did (normal drinks are expensive) and to have as much fun on our own. They know everyone at every single place and they get treated like they own the place. If you want to party, this is the way to do it!No wonder you are number 1, they do really care. If you can have a great time doing the Playacrawl than you cant have fun anywhere.

WOW!. Thank you Ivan and PlayaCrawl for such a great night. We met with Ivan about 10:15 that evening and went to three different clubs. Ivan was attentive to our group all night. It was wonderful that he knew the staff at the clubs and they all seemed too love him!We felt safe and comfortable at every club we went to. It was nice to be able to enter the clubs right away, have a designated space waiting for us and have drinks ready. Ivan took care of whatever we needed. Ivan also gave us great information about shopping, other clubs, restaurants, etc in the area.If this is your first time going to Playa Del Carmen, this is the way to go. Your group is taken care of the entire night. Thank you Ivan for making our night wonderful!!Kristine and TIM

Playacrawl is a great buy!. June 22nd, 2014 my sister and I did the Playacrawl in Playa Del Carmen--I specifically chose a Sunday night because I know how the bars and clubs get on Friday and Saturday nights:) Needless to say, our host, Ivan, helped to make it the best night out ever! This was my third Playacrawl and honestly, the funnest ever. I truly appreciated Ivan's positive and upbeat personality and the way he kept things lively even when we were just getting started. I recommend this activity. It is truly the best way to rock out in Playa's party scene. Everyone should try it. If you are lucky Ivan will be your guide!

Great time lots of fun!. From the start our host Ivan was awesome and made everyone feel comfortable. All the clubs were really good and the drinks flowed all night. I would highly recommend this crawl and would not think twice about going again.

Better than ever!. I have done the Playacrawl 4 years in a row and let me tell you these guys keep getting better, Kudos to your company Jorge you guys have a great one no wonder its growing so fast. This is my first review after 4 years doing it, I never write reviews but you certainly deserve one, one can really see when an owner really care about its costumers, keep the good work, and thanks for making us feel like home, (specially for taking care of my anoying drunk daughter :P) , Thanks and see you next year!

Playacrawl!!!. I decided to do this Friday night so I wouldn't have to worry about planning a big night out during my trip and I'm glad I did. The night ended up being a guys night out, just me and Ivan (host for the night), but it was a great night and by far my best night in Playa del Carmen. Ivan kept the drinks coming and I stayed fat, drunk and happy the entire night. I plan on visiting Playa del Carmen again and the Playacrawl is definitely on my list.Ivan, thanks for a great time! I'm looking for you next time I book!-Keith

Excellent night. Went on this with husband and daughter for my 50th birthday-was worried we would be too old but there was a mix of people and had a brilliant night. Well worth the money and will do it again next time in Mexico.

Enjoyed it, met some new people. We had a great host. We went to three different bars/club. I particularly liked that I did not have to take my wallet out and give my credit card to different people everywhere we went. Its nice just to have drinks served without worrying about the bill. Our host was able to keep the drinks coming as fast as we needed them. I am thinking the first stop was Kartabar, maybe, I remember the belly-dancer came out. Then we went to Mandala across the street. The top floor was colored with ambient red lighting, and you could look off in the street. Then we went to Palazzo which I remember being very large and entertaining. To be honest if I could remember more details it was probably not a good party.
Had a blast. This party is the one to pick if you want a fun night out! These guys know what places to see and take really good care of you.

Jorge was the best guide us girls could ask for.. This was well worth the money we paid for it. Not only were the clubs accommodating and super fun, but Jorge was the most amazing Guide ever!! He safely led us to each location, make sure we had everything we needed, and more! He acted as our photographer and bodyguard which is probably beyond his job description. I highly reccommend!

Amazing Night!. I couldn't have asked for a better bachelorette party. The girls and I went to Mandala and had our tables reserved especially for us and had open bar to anything we wanted. Jorge was very accommodating and treated us with everything that we needed and made sure that we were all having a great time. I would highly recommend their services to anyone looking to party in Playa del Carmen. They will take care of you and your guests. Worth the money for a truly amazing night. We were taken care of right from booking until the end of the night. The communication between the company and us was impeccable, we really appreciated it! Thank you playacrawl and Jorge! :))) We will definitely be back!!!

Fun Fun Fun!!!. Fun, great time, and a great host...what more can you ask for? I would highly recommend it to anyone who's looking for a great night in Mexico. No lines, three clubs with your own private table, unlimited drinks at each place, and a guide who made sure we both safe and having fun at the same time. Each club our guide, Jorge took us to was better than the last one. We came here for a bachelorette party and Jorge was nice enough to give us costumes (bunny ears, wings, etc.) since we were not prepared. He made sure our night was perfect and it was! Thanks Jorge!

Fun with a capital F. Great night. What more could you want than private pickup, no lines, drinks coming at you faster than you can drink them, awesome music, private booths and tables and a cute fun guide who is a dancing machine. This was perfect and a great way to kickoff our wedding festivities.

Absolutely amazing and so much fun!. So much fun! No lines, table service every club we went too and our guide Jorge was awesome. He made it fun and he was actually hanging out with us which made me feel pretty safe. All the clubs we went to had really good music. It was a big group of us and I think everyone had a great time! Jorge was so helpful with any questions we had. They supplied us with bunny ears and fun decoration since it was a bachelorette's party. They were so well prepared for us! We got our money's worth and more than expected. I would highly recommend Playacrawl to anyone visiting Mexico. Absolutely amazing!

Absolutely Brilliant!!!. Booked to go out with Playacrawl after reading about it on Tripadvisor and was highly delighted! We had such an amazing time, met new friends and danced till we dropped. Our guide Sina was brilliant and made sure the night was perfect. From the first bar to the last club it was all great. No waiting in lines, table service, great fun and energy. I couldnt have enjoyed it more. I would highly recommend this to anyone wanting to go out in Playa del Carmen, from someone who has been out round the world this was probably one of the best nights I have had, I didnt see the bottom of my glass all the the drinks were flowing!!! Great job and definitely be joining again next time we are there!!

Had a great time. I have gone on the playacrawl before and did it again 2 years later and just as much fun as first time. The staff is always first class and you feel like family they make sure you are always having a good time and are safe. If and when i go back to playa i will definitely do this again thanks guys.

Pub Crawl Playa Del Carmen. My husband and I wanted to explore the nightlife in Playa, so decided to try out Playa Crawl. We were grouped up with other people on the Pub Crawl and had an immediate bond. We went to three night clubs and had the time of our lives. Sina made sure everyone was having a good time, kept the beverages flowing, and got us right into the clubs. We had an awesome time and recommended this to anyone looking for a great clubbing experience in Playa.

Ivan is the best club guide!. Thanks to Playacrawl and Ivan for making my graduation after party a success. Ivan was our guide and he was very professional and a ton of fun. He arranged for our party of 14 to be picked up from our hotel (the driver was excellent also) and the fun began....Ivan made sure that we had the best seats, best views, and full cups at each club...We will definitely book with Ivan again! Oh...he even took us to a great taco stand on the strip...

Amazing time! Ivan and Grant won't let you down.. We had a group of 30 people on this outing and everyone had a good time. They are with you the whole time to make sure you're having a good time and that you are never without a drink in your hand. They made sure our whole group made it to the other bars. These guys know how to show you a good time.

Ultimate Bar Experience. A big thanks to Sina and Playacrawl for giving us the time of our life. They offer a VIP bar experience like no other. The staff and bar tenders make sure that you have a full drink and are always having a good time. Truly makes you feel like a VIP. No lines, open bar, and a personal host or hostess to make sure you have a safe and enjoyable experience. Would recommend to nanyone that is looking for a night out.

Best party night ever, hands down.. So my wedding was in the Mayan Rivieria just this past week, and I wanted to show my party animal friends from Toronto a good time during their trip. We frequent Toronto clubs quite a lot, partied in Vegas, Miami.... but I can honestly say, this may have been the best night for most of us so far. We had a group of 36 people aged 25-37 go out on a Sunday night in Playa Del Carmen. Transportation picked us up from Barcelo promptly, and dropped us off in Playa...Ivan and Grant showed us an amazing time... bottle service, 3 locations, each one only got better... took us to the right places at the right time when the party was the most happening. Hooked us up with the best tables, amazing top floor tables with the view of the whole club at Mandala... no waiters around and we needed more drinks (or water desperately at the end of the night)... these boys took care of us. They got the party started the minute we sat down... our group was sitting politely at the first bar on the comfy couches, and next thing you know, we are all jumping up and down on them. They were great sports, partied with us, but always professional. We never felt rushed, and the night just kept going on and getting better. We did not want to leave when 3 am arrived! We definitely would not have gotten the experience that we had without them. At the end of the night, they took care of us... did a head count, rounded up all the members of our large party from the club and got us home safe. It is an excellent value for all the drinks and club entrances you get... I am so so glad we ended up doing this! Thanks guys for an amazing night we will never forget.

You can't plan it better than Ivan. Simply put...if you want to have a blast partying in playa and want a hastle free good time...go with playacrawl.Ivan, our host, knew all the good spots...got us straight into all the clubs without a wait and made sure we never had an empty glass.He's also just a naturally fun and nice guy. The kind of guy you can trust to get you in and out of trouble.Pretty much the best thing to do in playa. Period.

Bachelar Party. Makes planning a night out in a foreign land easy. One fee - $85 US. Don't have to worry about getting home, don't have to worry about line-ups or looking at your Visa the next day. 3 clubs all you can drink. Tour guide to make sure you don't get lost and makes sure your group is taken care of.I believe we had Christina as our tour guide. She would dance with us, drink with us, and make sure everyone is having fun. She is awesome.It is only as crazy as you make it. The best part is the value. Cannot beat that price.

Bachelorette Party in Playa. We went on the PlayaCrawl recently for a bachelorette party. We had such an amazing time! Ivan was great, he always made sure that we had all the drinks we wanted and just wanted us to have a good time (he was a good dancer too) :) The seating was great in very packed clubs-VIP tables only!! It was perfect and we could not have planned a better bachelorette party!!
Bachelorette Success!. our guide Ivan was awesome. We felt very safe & enjoyed all 3 clubs we went to. It was well worth the $

Amazing Night!. Our last night of our trip to Playa del Carmen included Playacrawl and it was a great ending to a great vacation! Ivan was the best host and made sure that our experience was nothing short of amazing. We always had drinks available and went to the best clubs with VIP treatment with no lines or wait anywhere. Since I went with my girlfriend Ivan made sure to have the larger group get to know one another so by the end of the night strangers became friends. I would 100% recommend Playacrawl to anyone and everyone who comes to Playa del Carmen no matter if you're staying in the city or at a resort. Cabs are very cheap and were everywhere in the city so we had no trouble getting to our meeting point or back to the resort.

Bachelor/Bachelorette Party. The people there took care of us very well. I had a great time. Our chaperones were great. I would recommend this type of experience to anyone. If in the future I would definitely pay for this again.... And I want to thank u for showing me and friends a good time at our bachelor party! Tyrone Martinez

Great night!!. My husband and I did playacrawl last night. It was amazing!! Our guide Ivan was awesome! Lots of fun and very personable. He immediately put us at ease and made us feel welcome. Ivan did a great job of breaking the ice and keeping the conversation going. The clubs/bars we went to were great. The drinks were plentiful and while it is the job of the guide to ensure you have a good time Ivan was very respectful if you didn't want to partake in every round. The entire time we felt very safe. Thank you Ivan and playacrawl for a great night :) it was definitely worth the money and We would recommend this to anyone looking to have a good time partying!!

Playacrawl!!! BEST NIGHT OF MY LIFE! No exaggeration!. We did a stag & doe (bachelor/ette party) with playacrawl on March 18th, WOW! These guys go above and beyond! I talked to them forever before we got to Mexico and we booked it all before we got there. They made a special PayPal link for our wedding group where the group could book our specific night. I think our group was 25, they had the guys and girls separate for one of the clubs and we all met up at the last two. The guys went to Katrabar to start and the ladies went to the bar beside La Vaquita to start (can't remember the name) us girls (11 girls) finished 3 bottles of vodka before going to La Vaquita so they definitely keep them coming!! We had a blast at the first club which was a little slow but about 30minutes in, it was like a flash mob of people came because it was CRAZY busy in the blink of an eye!La Vaquita they had us in a little upper booth thing which had drinks for ages! That was BY FAR the best place of the night! They had a cow mascot that we were all dancing with and they did a little cinnamon fire show drink thing that was insane!! I have never had so much fun in my life! That bar was off the hook! We finished off at Mandala which was completely packed and such a wonderful time - again VIP tratment and section - we did not wait in line ANYWHERE and they really made sure we were having a wonderful night! If I ever do another pubcrawl - I will always use Rockstarcrawls wherever I am!! AMAZING AMAZING AMAZING!!!They made sure everyone stayed together and got back safely, they were always counting people and making sure everyone was together, great time! From the bride to the staff on the 18th - you guys gave me the best night of my life! Thank you so much for that!! Love you!!!!!!

best barcrawl ever. We were in Playa this March and thought of visiting the local bar scene there. We booked the playacrawl.
Ivan was supercool and made sure everybody was having fun. From drinks to the VIP lounges, it was truly a night to remember. If you are looking to see the best nightlife in Playa, I would highly recommend Playacrawl.

IVAN is the man! This is the only way to go!. I went to Playa with a bachelor party this past weekend. Before we left, we thought one night it would be cool to have a local show us around and take care of everything for us and it was a reasonable price (like $80-$90 pp). With a group of 10-14 each night, there is no other way to do it. He did an amazing job of keeping us all together and getting us to the next stop. It was like herding cats but he figured it out each night. After the first night, we decided to book Ivan for nights 2 and 3 as well. Everything was taken care of from start to finish and made sure the party kept going for all of us! We ended each night at "Palazzo" i think it was called, and it was packed each night but we still got in, still got a table/bottle and got to finish the night off strong.I recommend playacrawl and if you are lucky enough to get Ivan, buckle up!

STOP READING - START BOOKING! PlayaCrawl for LIFE!. Long time reading.. first time posting here on Tripadvisor.. and so glad its with some people who we have come to really love.. the team at PlayaCrawl. Cannot say enough about this team! Coming from a CruiseShip background working on a number of cruise lines I can say that these guys deserve an AWARD for everything they do.. professional, attentive, energetic and just ALL ROUND great guys!! We've used them twice... both times we've been to Playa and we'll never use anyone else again!! SO GOOD in fact we wanted to get them to come up to Cancun when we were there!!! Me and my partner Sara had two of the bests nights of our lives with Ivan... and I truly thought after the first night being SO good... we'd be let down second time round... but no.. just as good the second time round!!Ivan and the Owner made us feel welcome and like VIP's... as I said in the title STOP READING and just Book with the guys.. the $70 (or so) is EASILY worth it.. and honestly it coulda been $170 and I still would've booked just for the experience of being lead around by people who are in the know.. and someone to just look out for you when you wanna get LOOSE! Drinks are great.. but the hosts are better.. IVAN... you know we'll be hitting you up the next time we land in Playa!!PLAYACRAWL FOR LIFE.JOIN THE MOVEMENT ;-)

If you want a big night, contact Playacrawl. Just returned from Mexico for a friend's wedding. I was tasked with organizing a guys night out and chose Playacrawl to set it up. These guys are awesome. They provide the best of both worlds - professional, organized, and safe experience along with a wild night out at the clubs. The night wouldn't have been the same without them, they knew the best spots to go and took care of everything. I would definitely recommend Playacrawl!P.S. My wife organized the same night for their "girls night out", they had a great time as well!

Tons of Fun!. We used Playacrawl for my girlfriends stagette and it was an absolute BLAST! Jorger made it so easy to plan and lots of good advice for us, and Miguel took such amazing care of us and all the girls felt safe and had so much fun! We went to 3 great clubs and all of them had great nightlife and atmosphere! They did a bunch of special things for us as a group and the bride individually, which made her feel very special! If you are looking for a company who will show you a great time I highly reccommend Playacrawl! Thanks Miguel & Jorge for the amazing, unforgettable night!

Monday Funday!. We went in a group of about 16 and had a blast. The Monday of our trip was the only day that worked for us so I was a little nervous it wouldn't be a good time. Boy was I wrong! The 1st bar we went to wasn't very busy but great music and a good scene. It worked in our favour- the service was awesome and the drinks were plentiful!The 2nd and 3rd bars were amazing- huge and packed! But Ivan made sure to take care of our group so we always had our drinks full... I think at the 3rd bar we were getting shots poured directly into our mouths?? haha Anyways GREEEEEAT TIME! Thanks Ivan!Will definitely do this again next year!Although 1 recomendation- Get music and booze on the vans!!

Always a blast!. I say always because my girlfriend and I live in Playa del Carmen and we have lost count as to how many times we've done the Playacrawl with Ivan. He is attentive, energetic and an all around great person to be around. As far as value goes, we know all too well how easy it is to spend just as much (but often more) for just a few drinks at a club and only a fraction of the experience that you get with Playacrawl. Thank-you for the great memories, we'll see you again soon! - Devin & Jess

Super Fun. We had a blast enjoying the nightlife in Playa with Ivan. He was extremely attentive to us and was always making sure we were having the best time possible. I recommend him and Playacrawl to anyone looking for a crazy late night!
It was amazing!!. Everything was awesome!! Everyone was so nice and accommodating to everyone at the party!! I love the free drinks and the VIP treatment!!

WHAT A NIGHT! French&English review. We are use to attended Big party and big EDM festival and i have to admit that this night was incredible . We were me and my 3 friends and we decided to book before our trip because this attraction was the most popular on TripAdvisor . They were a group of 16 persons with us and the a guid that unfortunately I can't remember her name but I know that she was German . We started our night at Kartabar , this place was very quiet but it was good because anyway it was just 10PM . When we go in the club , they were a table for us and they were unlimited drinks for all the group and all you have to do is ask the waiter whatever you want and we smoke some shisha included too . Please guys/girl , dont drink too much at the first bar because you have to remember that the night its only starting and you still have 2 clubs to do . I will explain later why I said that .A 1h30 later , we switched to the club Mandela where everything began , we had the highest booth and the view was incredible , that place was still open bar but this time all kind of bottles was on the table and they were a private waiter for the group and you can ask me everything you want and it is gonna make it . The kind of music played over there its trance , edm , techno . and we really enjoyed it . And to finish at 1h30 we swtiched at the club Palazzo , and since that was the last bar for the night this is where we enjoyed the most because we use to drink alot . You remember that 16 peoples before , well nobody of their group show up because they were too drunk since they drink way too much the first bar . The guide has to take care of them and she did a really good job because she was taking care of us at the same time to make sure we have everything we wanted . The guide leave a 3am but she is telling you that if you want to stay its up to you and we stayed until 5h00am . The price was only 69$ US and it include all the club above and unlimited drink everywhere you go and you skip the line-up too . To compare , this is not my first time in playa del carmen and every club have a cover free of 40US if you book them separately . I HIGHLY recommand that attraction and I will do it again when I get back . Thank you PlayacrawlNous somme habituer a de très gros party et de gros festival mais je dois avouer que cette soirée était incroyable . Pour commencer nous étions une groupe de 4 amis et nous avons décider de réserver pour le Playacrawl vu la popularité de cette activité sur Tripadvisor . Nous étions notre groupe de 4 personnes et un autre groupe de 16 personnes qui nous accompagnais et malheureusement je ne peux me rapeller du nom de notre guide mais je sais quelle était Allemande . Nous avons commencer la soirée au Kartabar , l'endroit était plus tranquille mais vu qu'il était juste 10 heures c'était parfait . A l'arriver nous avions une table réserver pour nous ainsi que les drinks a volonté fourni sur la table plus nous avons fumer du Shisha qui était compris. Le service était très rapide et notre guide s'assurait que nous avions un drink toujours plein . SVP , veuillez ne pas boire comme des fous le premier bar parce que je vais expliquer plus loin ce qui c'est passé avec les 16 autres personnes de notre groupe . Ensuite nous nous somme diriger vers le Mandela la ou la soirée a toute commencer , nous avions la table la plus surélever du bar et notre vu était incroyable , le formule toutes inclus fournissant directement les bouteille sur la table et il avait un serveur juste pour nous . Le genre de musique jouer , Trance , edm . Ensuite nous nous somme diriger vers le Palazzo et vu que c'était le dernier bar c'est la que nous avons le plus profiter de notre soirée car nous avons bu comme des fous . Nous étions rendu juste 4 parce que les 16 autres avait tellement trop bu le premier bar qu'il était trop chaud donc il on du partir . Le guide était avec eux pour s'assurer que toute était correct et s'occupait de nous en même temps pour nous faire vivre une des plus belle soirée de notre vie . Nous somme partit du Palazzo a 5 heures du matin et je vous jure que cette activité est incroyable vous devez le faire . Pour le modique coût de 69 $ que nous avons payer vous avez acces au trois bar nommé plus haut ainsi que la formule toutes inclus toute la soirée et vous skiper le line up . A titre de comparatif chaque bar reserver individuellement est de 40 US . Je vous le recommende au plus haut point c'était toutes qu'une soirée et nous allons le refaire sa c'est sure . Merci le PlayaCrawl

Playacrawl - Jan 9-14. Oh my goodness what a night! From the shuttle from our Resort to the first club we went to it was an amazing night. we felt totally safe and had such a blast! The drinks were flowing all night and we danced so much. The guides Ivan and Ceena (sorry don't remember her name, was a lil intoxicated) were AMAZING! they took good care of us and joined in on the fun! I would recommend the playacrawl to anyone looking for a night of dancing in a safe environment!

Best Night Out. You wont regret this nite out on the town. The nite began at the Tequilla Barrel Bar where we met our Guide for the nite Miguel, he was punctual and greeted us with a smile and ready to go. We were the only ones signed up that nite so he was like our own private club guide. We began the nite at the first club with some shots and any drink we wanted at our table right on the street where we could see everything, we then headed to our 2nd club where we walked right in and to our private table with shots waiting for us. Miguel knows everyone on the street and in the clubs, felt very comfortable walking around with him all nite with my daughter and her friend and my wife. It was my birthday and Miguel arranged special flaming tower drinks at 2 of the clubs for me, it was really cool. We then headed to our 3rd club and once again walked right in to a waiting table and drinks in hand. We ended our nite a little early at 2:30 with smiles on our faces and a new friend made. We will definately book again and ask for Miguel next time we come to Playa and be ready for a Great Time out.

Best night out on our trip!. My husband and I were in Playa del Carmen for our honeymoon and we read so many great reviews about Playacrawl. One thing I can say is that the reviews are true, it's a great night out especially if your guide is Ivan! He's the best! We originally booked our night out for a Wednesday, and due to some unforeseen circumstances due to weather our night out wasn't the best. On the following day we received an email from George from Playacrawl inviting us back out to try another night on them, we immediately took them up on the offer. The second time around Ivan was our guide and we were so happy that we came back out. We simply had a blast! We were in a group of five people and we all had a great time. We danced, we drank, and we all bonded. Ivan got the party started by giving us a few round of shots, and let's just say not to long after that everyone was up and dancing. It was our last night in town and we figured we would go out with a bang, and we definitely did! We were so grateful that Playacrawl had amazing customer services and invited us back out. That was definitely something were not expecting, but very happy that it happened. Hands down we would come back and go to Playacrawl again and request Ivan. Tip: Make sure you request Ivan to be your guide. You won't regret it. He's awesome!

Best Night Out!. Booking PlayaCrawl was one of the best decisions my boyfriend and I made during our trip to the Riviera Maya. Despite being tired from a really long flight and our resort being located about half hr away from Playa del Carmen, we decided to venture out on our first night. Unfortunately we were running late but given that we knew the schedule instead of going to the meeting point we went to the first bar "Kartabar", there we found Ivan who directed us to sit and wait for our guide. Minutes later Sina got there, from the get go we knew we were going to have a good time. She quickly got us the first round of drinks and within minutes we had our first shot of Tequila. Since Ivan was hosting a Bachelorette party, we had the option of going with them or picking another place. We went with Sina to check out Blue Parrot but decided we wanted to stick with Mandala. We then headed there and let me tell you, I THOUGHT I partied hard but Sina and Ivan WOW, they made the night SO much fun, all I remember was drinking, laughing, tequila shot, dancing, and so on. After an hr or so in Mandala we headed to Palazzo, mind you I was already ##$%^4#@ UP! but the drinks kept on coming and we couldn't say no. Needless to say, we had to end our night early or so we think because we drank so much we blacked out and only remember waking up in our hotel at 10:15am, late for an excursion we had to miss because we were so hung-over... PlayaCrawl was worth it though! Best thing is we got to the hotel safe and nothing was missing, I'm sure Sina took good care of us. If you're reading this Sina, you're the best!!! You too Ivan!!! I'm not sure if we thanked you but thanks for the best night ever, we really had TOO much fun and can't wait to be back in PlayaCar to do it all over again!

Ivan PlayaCrawl. Hands down, this was one of the best decisions of the trip. There were three of us (gentlemen) that decided to participate in the crawl. After a long day on the beach, drinks, and getting stuffed at dinner, we didn't know if we would catch our second breath for the night ahead. We were wrong. We met Ivan (a.k.a. Tiger Woods) and knew instantly that the night would be ours. We started at Kartabar, then moved to Mandala, and ended the night at Palazzo. There are way too many advantages to doing a PlayaCrawl with Ivan to name. Particularly if you are new to the area, you want to save money (so many drinks), you don't want to deal with the hassle of getting a constant flow of drinks, etc you will love this. I plan on visiting again and will definitely do this again. My $70 has never been put to better use on a night out.

night out. awesome time out in playa. we were concerned about what to expect as people we had talked to said playa can be "creepy" at times. we never once felt that. Ivan was awesome all night. he gave us everything we wanted and expected plus more.I agree 100 percent worth the money. ask for Ivan for sure. he is very down to earth and will show you a good time, whether you are a big partier or not!!!

All you can expect and more!! Thanks Ivan :). I agree with all the great reviews we had a blast. We met in front of the Tequila Barrel and then started our night out, going to the hookah bar and the bar/ club with "the cow" and then to mandala! Your right on main and can see all the shops with no peddlers, etc. This was the best time out in Playa you can expect for what we paid and not standing in line and all you can drink!!! You cant ask for more. Ivan was great he made sure we were all taken care of! We will defiantly be back.

Great Night Out. Like most of the rest of the reviews, I cant say enough good things about our experience with Playacrawl. My wife an I are in our early fifties and wanted to experience the club scene in Playa the right way. We met our guide Ivan and he was a super nice and helpfful party animal. We started off in a mellow hookah bar where we got a chance to get to know everyone and then went to two other clubs. It was a busy night down town and we were escorted past the lines to reserved prime tables everywhere we went. Ivan made sure our glasses were never empty plus kept the shots coming all night long. While we were probably the oldest folks in the crowd, we felt comfortable and had a GREAT time. Will definitely do it again next time here. It was definitely worth the money. Ask for Ivan if you can - he was awesome!

Bachelor Party. We went out November tenth for a bachelor party. Having this company guide our night was my best decision of the trip. The guide arrived at our hotel 15 minutes early to pick us up. The guide had professional relations with all of the three club owners and also guaranteed our safety. As a regular club goer in Toronto. This company with their service and professionalism blew my mind. The best club night I have ever had. I would not only recommend this tour, but when I go back I'm doing it again. Thanks Angelo for turning up the awesome in Playa del Carmen.

Best night out in Playa del Carmen!. My dad and I did Playacrawl back in September 2013 - it was the best night out during our trip. Ivan was an incredible host - our group was never without a drink! The mix of bars/clubs were great too - great music, good crowds, and awesome service. The price is definitely worth it - you only need 10 dollars on top of the initial cost to cover tips for the entire night, which is a great deal. Make sure you bring something extra for Ivan or whoever is running the crawl, they definitely deserve it as they do a fantastic job!I can't wait until next time I'm in PDC, looking forward to another great night!

A great way to experience Playa nightlife!. Our guide for the night waited an hour for us because our flight was delayed We as two older ladies were shown a great time.I would highly recommend this as way to get wild yet feel safe and very spoiled.So worth the money

Crazy night with Ivan!. When we showed up were were a bit lost as to who to look for but once we saw Ivan we knew we were in for a crazy time! There was only three of us in the crawl but he made sure that we threw down all night! 3 bars,A ridiculous amount of shots and 10+ drinks later and my girlfriend was wasted! He made sure we were safe and throwing down all night! The highlight of the night has got to be his dance battle with some random guy. Ivan beat him so bad that he ended up leaving after being embarrassed! Awesome night and we will be doing this again when we come back to Playa!

I agree.. Epic night with Ivan!!!. My super awesome friend Kat brought me to Mexico to celebrate my birthday early.. She planned a bar crawl in PDC and told me its gonna be a great time.. She kept talking about the good reviews of playacrawl to convince me.. And she was right.. I had a blast.. Our host Ivan was loads of fun.. He always made sure we were having a good time.. He kept us on our dancing feet when we weren't taking shots.. we were having so much fun we didn't realize how fast we were drinking.. Lets just say Im so glad Ivan was there to take care of us especially when I had to help my awesome friend out of the bathroom while I was pretty out of it myself.. We will definitely do this again next time we're in Playa del Carmen..

Epic night with Ivan!!!. Wanting to try the nightlife in PDC for just me and my friend missy during our trip, two ladies out at night, was worried about safety.. I searched for bar crawls so we could go with a group.. I found out about Playacrawl through here at trip advisor and read some really good reviews.. Went ahead and booked it and Im so glad I did because we had a blast til it lasted.. Our host Ivan was awesome.. The other two ladies was running late, but instead of waiting at the meeting place, he took us to the first spot, Kartabar, to get the night started right away.. He had such good vibes, we were already at ease from the start.. He made sure we were having a good time and even kept us entertain w/ his moves.. we called him the mexican Chris Brown.. The two ladies joined us eventually at Kartabar.. more drinks and shots wich was all included, then headed to the next spot, Mandala.. it was a good transition from Kartabar, since its not as loud as Mandala so we were able to get acquainted first.. Mandala was a really nice open club w/ 2 floors and a sky bar, had the music blasting and just drew people in.. there was a line out but of course we got in right away VIP in the sky bar.. and really, that's all I could remember.. lets say me and my friends night ended a little earlier.. with me in the bathroom for half an hour and Ivan trying to get in the ladies room to help me and my friend out but of course they wouldnt let him.. when I finally got some strength to get up w/ help from my friend, Ivan was right outside.. He helped us to the taxi and told the driver where our hotel was.. Good thing my friend Missy was not completely intoxicated.. But Ivan took care of us til the end.. and even came out with us the next day.. I kept saying I didn't even get to dance and when I saw the pictures later.. there was me on the dance floor hahaha.. Epic.. so don't forget your cameras for the moments you might not remember.. When we come back to PDC, we will definitely do this again and strongly recommend this to all and ask for Ivan.. we didn't just meet a host.. we made a friend..

Another great night!. My husband & I went on our 2nd Playacrawl Sept 21, 2013. They have certainly made improvements to the experience since out 2012 trip. First the meeting location (Tequila Barrel Bar) was MUCH easier to find and was legit. I felt much more comfortable arriving there than the around the corner behind, the palm tree all the way upstairs location rom 2012. lol Our guide this year was Ivan and he is so much fun! He's funny, an awesome dancer and full of energy. We had a small group of just 4 people so I was concerned that maybe having such a small group wouldn't be as much fun since clubbing usually follows the "more the merrier" template but I was far from disappointed. Ivan kept our glasses full, had me and my hubby on the dance floor, laughing and having nonstop fun the entire night and trust me for my husband to do more than hold up walls during a night on the town is quite a feat. All in all this was a blast and I'd do it again a 3rd, 4th & 20th time. Totally worth it. Ask for Ivan...you won't regret it!

Most amazing night. Three great clubs, great company and non stop fun. Great VIP seating, drinks were there just at the right time and the music and atmosphere at all three clubs was awesome. Ivan was the perfect host and an awesome guy..Thanks for a night that i will never forget. Michael :)
Great Time - Expensive Drinks. This place was so crowded you couldn't move! But man it was fun. Lots of girls. Overall a great experience. Would go back! Recommended.

Have the best time ! Thank you Ivan!!. I had such a great time and felt safe! The last place we went was so packed on a Monday night!!The dance floor was so packed! So we dance right were Ivan got are tables for us, Ivan fit in with our group so very well, always knew where everyone in our group was at all times It was worth the money spent!

Fun night without having to worry about our safety.. It's was great to be able to walk away from our purses to go dance knowing they are safe. The guys always made sure we were all ok, and all together when leaving. Drinks are weak, but honestly a good thing since you're out drinking for several hours. Many of the clubs have cover charges and lines, but we didn't have to pay of wait to get in. Overall it was great for the price.

Amazing Bachelorette party in Playa del Carmen. I had no idea of the nightlife in Playa del Carmen until I emailed Jorge and he explain to me what the difference between Cancun´s nightlife and Playa´s nightlife was, and I am so glad we choose Playa not only because it was way closer to our hotel but we really enjoyed it. Jorge and Ivan really take care of us from the moment we arrived in out Hummer limo to the last minute of the night were they walked back to out limo, they are complete gentlemen and really know everyone at all the clubs we went to, we felt 100% safe and the party was non stop all night long. We went to the best clubs in town and we had reserved tables, VIP entrance and open bar all night! I mean that´s a deal. If you are looking for a GREAT bachelorette party, Playacrawl is definitely the way to go, Thanks you Ivan and Jorge we will be back for sure!

Super fun and safe!!!. I have been to Playa del Carmen several times and love the night life, however this time it was for a bachelorette party with a group of girls who were somewhat skeptical about leaving the resort. As the MOA I wanted us to do something fun and came across PlayaCrawl. Jorge was fantastic from the very beginning when I contacted him. He was also very helpful and accommodating with transportation to and from the hotel. Once we arrived at the first location, which was a Middle Eastern lounge Jorge was waiting to greet us. This venue was perfect to start out the night. From there we were taken to two different clubs, which were easily comparable to NYC/Chicago/Vegas clubs and had a blast at each of them. We had a table and bottle service at venue. One of our girls does not drink hard liquor.. .beer is her drink of choice and she was given her own pitchers. Our guides were fun and entertaining :) Most importantly they made everyone feel safe. Our bachelorette had soooo much fun that she does not remember some parts of the night so I recommend you take lots of photos ;) I highly recommend PlayaCrawl.

Fun, safe, great locations. We had an amazing time. We were taken care of at all 3 locations. . Definitely recommend.. the bride had so much fun she can't even remember what happened so take lots of pictures :)

Great way to enjoy playa nightlife!. Been to Cuncrawl in Cancun, part of same company, so I knew it would be great (see my past reviews). Well, they delivered again. I went on a Monday night, so it was just me and my wife and another couple we were traveling with. We had such a blast, went to 3 awesome clubs and our guide Pepe was great to hang out with. We got there a little late, but Pepe was patient and waited for us at the meeting point. Really enjoyed the night, love the Playa nightlife, which is more laid back than Cancun, but still lots of tequila!We ended the night more than tipsy and very hungry, Pepe was kind enough to take us to a local taco shop where we got our late night taco fix. Wouldn't go to Cancun or Playa bars and clubs any other way. Let them do the planning and sit back and enjoy!

Easy, safe, and FUN!. I recently planned a bachelorette for 20 ladies and am so glad I chose Playacrawl! Jorge and our host Miguel made everything run flawlessly! The evening had so many thoughtful touches like custom shots and hookah to start the night and the bride's name in lights at the second club. We felt like true VIPs with not only our own private area but the best location at every single bar. I was quite concerned about safety but never had to worry with Miguel and Jorge around. They were constantly checking and counting and making sure we had everyone with us. And they were extremely accommodating when we wanted to adjust the schedule. Everyone had a great time and the bride called the evening "Perfect". All around amazing hosts and very highly recommended!

THE TIME OF YOUR LIFE. You simply can't go out in Playa without Playacrawl. And if you're planning a bachelorette party (like I was), then it's an absolute must. They provide an unbeatable service that is absolutely worth it (and then some...)I actually worked with Playacrawl to arrange 2 nights for a bachelorette party. All of the girls in my group were visiting Playa for the first time, so we knew we needed to go to Coco Bongo one night, but we were up in the air about what to do the second night. After doing my research I found Playacrawl and thought it would PERFECT for the girls. I reached out via their website and Jorge replied back very promptly with details, etc. After cruising around their website I then realized that they could also arrange to purchase the tickets at Coco Bongo. So I figured... why not arrange both nights through Playacrawl.For our first night (a Wednesday), we were headed to Coco Bongo. As a group of girls we were late, but we didn't think it was a huge deal as we were chose to do the regular open bar entrance (not VIP) and we were only expecting to pick up our tickets at Will Call. Little did we know that Jorge actually set up a host for us to walk us in (VIP status) and set up a table for us in the most clutch location within the bar. We felt like rock stars getting ushered in while others were standing and waiting in line. We spent the night dancing on the bar, amazed at the spectacular show that was taking place in front of us. Amazing night!For our second night (a Saturday), we were doing the official Playa Crawl bar crawl around Playa. Our driver Eddie picked us up promptly from our resort and he shuttled us over to meet with Chris at KARTABAR. We started there with a couple drinks and shots to get warmed up, and after we made a couple of requests with the DJ, Jorge arrived to whisk us off to MANDALA across the street. At Mandala we went straight to the rooftop where a table and drinks were waiting for us. We danced and drank the night away. Great music and great company since Jorge also had a couple more of his hosts join the party. The night didn't end there of course, and we ended up going to yet another amazing club filled with chandeliers -- Palazzo. There too, a couple more of the hosts joined us in partying at our elevated table. All in all we went to three amazing clubs all with different vibes, and all delivering a different (and fitting) experience. We left the last venue some time around 2am (on our own accord since we were all partied out at that point), and were safely provided a ride home to the resort. Suffice to say... the night was a huge success. All in all we had the time of our lives in Playa thanks to Playacrawl. If/when I return to Playa I will definitely hire these guys again -- whether with a large or small group. For the price and the experience it is WELL WORTH IT.

NIGHT TO REMEMBER!!!. My partner and I went on a friday night, The area was so vibrant and full of excitement. The Playacrawl team are so welcoming and friendly. They made us feel comfortable and the drinks kept coming :). Highly recommended

WOW!. If you plan on going out in Playa del Carmen, PLAYACRAWL is an absolute must. The booking was online and simple. Jorge answers all your questions immediately. We arranged transportation for an additional cost and our driver Eddie was excellent. But the person who made the night for our group was our party host Chris. He made sure everyone was having the time of their lives. He never stopped, he knew every waiter, waitress, bartender, security guard and we never had one issue at any of the clubs. Highly recommended.

Loved Playacrawl!. We did Playcrawl at the end of May 2013. During our stay in Playa Del Carmen, it rained quite heavily but that did not stop us partying! We rescheduled our booking for the following night without any problem (Thanks Jorge!)On the night of the crawl, the other party members didn't show up, so it was only myself, my boyfriend and Miguel! Did that matter?! NO!Miguel was the most professional and friendly host, and got us very drunk and having the best time! Mandala was one of the best nights out I've had, with table service and tequila after tequila after tequila!We even had a fire show/tequila tower? So amazing!I DEFINIETLY recommend Playacrawl to anybody visiting Playa Del Carmen- these guys know how to party!I've already recommended Rockstar crawls to my brother who is going to Cancun this summer!

Amazing party!!!. We had a great time with "Playacrawl". Going out in a group make things better, you enjoy more and have more fun. We strongly recommend this team for a party night in Playa del Carmen. We went to 3 different places. Everything was already organized, the tables were ready for us, no line ups and the fee includes all you can drink. They made sure you really enjoy your experience and care about every member of the group. We liked so much that we went for a second night out. We enjoyed both nights, even though the groups were so different.

AMAZING! THEY GET YOU WASTED!. WOW, this was so fun. A must do for your trip to Playa DelCarmen. We arranged a pick up nd drop off. They were on time. We went to three nightclubs and our guide got us pretty wasted at the first club. We did a combined Bachelor/bachlorette party! We all got so wild, dancing in cages, streets, body shots, lap dances! They definitely make you have a good time. Bottle service at 2 clubs on the balcony outside. Its so worth the cost! Will do it again next time :) we went may 13 2013

Saturday Night in Playa. This was our second night with Rockstar, we did Friday in Cancun and Saturday in Playa Del Carmen.Very accommodating by letting us stay an extra hour even though the driver was waiting (left extra trip, of course).Honestly, I would not party in Cancun or Playa without these guys. Having a table at each club, local guide to keep the trouble away and excellent service at the clubs makes this easily worth double what you pay.

Don't miss out on this!!. We hired Playacrawl the first night we arrived in Playa del Carmen. We are so glad that we did! They really know how to get the party started! It was our best night out! We were 9 girls (in our mid to late 30's) and wanted something that felt safe where we didn't have to worry about anything. Christian and Miguel were awesome about getting the party going...and keeping it going! They know which clubs to go to and when to go! It's nice to not have to pre plan anything...just go! The night flew by! Don't wait until the last night to go with them...you might just want to book them again during your trip! The price is worth it! All drinks and cover charges included...no lines, VIP areas! We had them pick us up and drop them off at our hotel lobby...so convenient! Jorge checked in on us and made sure everything was going smoothly. I can't wait to hire Rockstarcrawl in Vegas, Cabo, Cancun, etc!

Incredible experience. Used Playacrawl for a bachelor party in Playa Del Carmen. It was a great set up and I'm sure we would have had a great time no matter what, but the guide, Christian, made sure the night was incredible. He made sure that everyone in our group was having a great time the whole night. We couldn't say enough good things about him. Almost made us want to do the crawl again the following Thursday, but we ran out of time. Recommend it to anyone looking for a good night out.

GREAT night out!. This was one of the most fun nights I've had in a long time. We went for a bachelor/bachelorette party. We had two guides waiting for us as soon as we got there, and the two groups went to separate clubs and then met up at the last club. It was excellent. The strip where all of the bars are is an amazing area, all open clubs/bars so there's music in the streets, everybody dancing and having a great time. Miguel was our guide, he made sure we were safe and having a great time. He was like our body guard and personal waiter. I never had an empty drink in my hand and felt totally safe. And you CANNOT beat the price. Couldn't have asked for a better experience for a bachelorette party. I would HIGHLY recommend this to anyone looking for a great night out while on vacation. I wish we had planned 2 nights of this instead of just 1!

My man Jorge!!. Even though there was a slight mix up in the beginning, Jorge came to the rescue!!! He was awesome! We went for a bachelor party and he fit in as one of the guys, he partied like a champ while keeping it professional and under control the whole time! I would recommend this to ANYONE going to the playa del carmen area. They show you the hot spots and make sure you are having a GREAT time the whole night!! The booze were flowing, the people were beautiful, and the music was bumping! It was exactly what we were looking for!

Yes they definitely delivered to our high expectations.. After reading all the great reviews I had to try it for my self, and they definitely delivered, great clubs, great guide h made sure the party never stopped, drinks never stopped, bottle service in 2 of the clubs, no lines, reserved tables, great clubs, great ambiance the whole works, they put all the necessary tools to make your night a blast but is really up to you to take advantage of this, on our group there was a couple who seemed they were not liking it so much, hey there is as much as these guys can do for you, thanks guys for showing us a great time! We will be back next year for sure!

The best Night out without a doub!. Truly recommend this if you want to party, best clubs, best guides, lots of alcohol, you truly feel safe and the best price, no complains on our part we were a Group of 8 friends and we ALL had our best Night when we did the Playacrawl, great Job guys!

Last place saved the day. We went to Playacrawl on a Tuesday, which started a little earlier: at 9:30. We met our host at Ula Gula. There was a soccer game on TV in the downstairs part, but when we told the waitress we were with Playacrawl, she took us upstairs. I'm pretty sure we opened the place. No one else was there. We were also the only ones with playacrawl. The drinks we very basic and limited (rum and coke). The DJ started playing stuff, but with no one else around, we just chatted with our host and left after an hour.Next we went to another place that was busy and music going. I thought this was going to start the night. Our host couldn't get us in. I started thinking I had really wasted my money. So we went to an alternate place, I think it was Palazzio or something like that. Again, we opened the place at 10:30. No one was there. We got a seat and they started the lights and music. After about 15 minutes others started coming in. The drinks here were much better, but still I thought not anywhere worth the $85/person. Our guide was real attentive and tried to entertain us and kept the drink flowing.We left about an hour later and went to Coco Bongo. Wow, what an incredible experience. I will write a separate review there. Our original host couldn't go into Coco Bongo without paying full price for himself, but he handed us off to another Playacrawl host inside. We got a reserved table, which was very important. Drinks, water and fun just came non-stop the rest of the night. This was looking at a one star review, before CB.I came to understand that Tuesday is the only Coco Bongo night for Playacrawl. This may be why some of the other places were more subdued. It certainly made up for it. I could have really done without the other two places and just gone to CB.In the end, the hosts were great and we had a blast for a very good price.

BEST NIGHT OUT ! Loved playacrawl !. Four of us went out on Monday march 25th. We met chris our guide at Ula Gula around 10:15 pm and stayed for just over an hour. It turned out it was just us for the night, but it didn't matter we had an absolute blast ! We were supposed to go to blue parrot but apparently it was dead that night so we spent the rest of the time at Mandala night club. That place was packed even on a Monday! The whole night is pretty much a blur..... They weren't kidding when they said take lots of pictures so you remember what you did !! He never let us without a drink or shot in hand ! We had bottle service at Mandala which we took full advantage of ! Our guide Chris was awesome and made our night ! He even took us somewhere after to get food. I think we got home around 4am. We would definitely recommend playacrawl to anyone who likes to have a great time and party ! Oh and we pre-booked this online from their website for $70 US each. I emailed them many times with questions and always got a quick response.

Fun night!. We did the crawl on March 23. We started off a mellow bar but were immediately given a shot upon arrival. Chris, our guide made sure we always had a drink and he was full of energy! The second bar had tables set up with all kind of liquor and mixers and you could have whatever you wanted. If there wasn't anything there, Chris would go right up to the bar and get what you wanted. The final club had the same set up and was much larger. I noticed that with all three places, techno was the choice of music. I'm not usually a fan but when you had many drinks, it doesn't matter! Highly recommend this crawl!

Epic Night!!. Booking Playacrawl was one of the best decisions in made in mexico! Chris was our guide and he ensured we had the best time and that we never went thirsty, not for a second! lol. For the most fun night out in Mexico and hilarious pics the next day, i highly recommend Playacrawl!

A night to remember. I found playacrawl via Tripadvisor and I am so glad I did. I celebrated my 30th with 3 of my closest friends and we had a blast! We started off at a mellow lounge and worked our way to up to the larger clubs which was perfect. Our host was so attentive and made sure we had a glass at all times. No lines, VIP access and great service. We went on a Thrusday and all 3 clubs were packed. This Birthday is going down in history as one of the best, thanks to an amazing night. Our host even made sure we found a taxi, kudos!!

Really Great Night. Our host was Miguel. And yes he was awesome! Our Playa Crawl was on a Thursday night, and it ended up being just me and my wife so Miguel called his brother and a few friends to join us. The first club always seems to be Ula Gula on 10th and 5th Ave. We got strapped and the drinks and shots started flowing. The music is good (deep house vibe) and the atmosphere is laid back. We styed there until 11:30 then we walked over to Mandala, our favorite club. We walked by the line and went up a few stairs to the VIP area with couches, tables and plenty of room to dance. The waitresses took great care of the group. Again lots of drinks and shots. We left Mandala around 1:30 and walked to Palazzo and again we walked right by the line and we were led to the VIP area next to the stage. We had a couch, tables and our drinks were already waiting for us when we got to the table. We danced for a while, but we had more fun at Mandala so we tipped Miguel said good night and we went back to Mandala and finished the night there. I was tipping our servers at each location and the service staff at mandala recognized us so we continued to drink for free. (I tipped servers and shot girls 100 peso notes which is about $8.00) We went back to Mandala 4 times over the next 12 days and were always very well taken care of. By the way Playa Crawl is a total bargin! There is no way you can do a night like we did for even twice the price. Thanks Miguel.

The Reviews dont lie! BEST PART OF THE 10 DAY TRIP!!!!. Had an absolute Blast with Playacrawl! Not only did We meet great people who we shared and incredible night with... We also saw the absolute best that playa had to offer. Our host (Christian) was incredible! Looking out for us socially (with LOTS of alcohol and shots) but also responsibly buying us water and reminding us to drink lots of it! I couldn't have imagined a better night! An absolute must do while in Playa!!!! I will DEFINITELY do this again on my next trip and recommend it to anyone!

Highlight of our trip!!! BEST TIME ever!. Me and my husband and a group of our friends had an awesome time doing Playacrawl!! We can honestly say it was the Highlight of our trip. Our guide was Christian, he was extremely awesome and he took great care of us! He kept the group dancing and made sure everyone was having fun. I loved his down to earth, fun personality. I've never met anyone who has so much energy as he does! He definitely seems like he loves his job and we enjoyed him so much! We met up with him at a bar/lounge at first where we met with another couple from a different resort (I forgot the name of the bar) then he brought us to Mandala and Palazzo (the hottest nightclubs!!) We had over the top VIP treatment everywhere we went (no cover, free drinks, no lines). We all had laughter and had the best time of our lives dancing the night away! I would recommend coming here if you're looking to party and have a great time with great people in a GREAT atmosphere! I definitely want to return and party like a rock$tar with Christian again. He's so much fun! :-) It was an amazing experience we would never forget. Until next time!!

Loved the Playacrawl!. We had a blast doing the Playacrawl.. Our host was amazing. It was very easy to meet up with our group at the meet-up spot. We went to one bar and two clubs all you can drink.. VIP the whole time. Definately do this if you like to have a good time and you're in Playa.

Playa del Carmen...Don't miss it!. I have been to the Mexican Riviera quite a few times and seen and done a lot but I had never discovered the charm, the fabulous restaurants, the shopping and great fun of Playa del Carmen. Don't miss it!

OMG - You have to do this. Just returned from Playa for the 2nd time in a month. Signed up for the Playacrawl online with Jorge and it was so easy. Made it to meet everyone at Ula Gula and what a blast. Sina was our excellent tour guide. It was just amazing and if there's only one thing you do on vacation in Playa it is the crawl. Our group was small but fun. Off to Mandala after that OMG a sea of bodies but we had a private entrance and special reserved seats and private service. Amazing and I had a terrfic time. I will never forget it. Sina thanks to you. Jorge so special to meet you. Christian - incredible thank you. You have to try this folks you will never ever forget it.

amazing bachelorette party. I highly recommend booking an outing with playacrawl. hands down the best time ever. in playa del Carmen its hard to find out whats the best place and also waiting in the line and also the line at the bars are the worst lots of waiting. We had Miguel as our guide and he was the best he was there right when we got out of our taxi and took us to our first hookah bar/club. Playacrawl also arranged other bachelorette party activities, just ask them they know all the hook ups and people in the area. We went to three different clubs and my favorite one was the club right off the beach and there was a long line and we cut and go in with no problem. Also whenever we need a drink Miguel was constantly taking care of us and making orders for us so we could actually enjoy our group and just focusing on having fun. Miguel definitely got our whole group dancing and having fun, he definitely knows how to make sure that everyone has fun. He was my official dance partner for the night and was awesome had the best time. I have been to mexico several times but this experience only elevated it and made it the best hands down. Also the other men at playacrawl are eye candy, ladies you will be in good hands ;)-michele

BOOK THIS NOW! Amazing night with great people!. I went with one of my girlfriends on a Tuesday night and wow, what an amazing time!! Booking with Jorge was no problem and he took the time to answer any questions...I only wish I had taken his advise and took more pictures to remember more of the night! :)Our guide, Miguel, was fantastic - he was attentive and accommodating...and an absolute blast to party with! He quickly got our group introduced and we all became fast friends. From there he always made sure we had a drink in hand and no one was on the sidelines. We also had Jorge and Christian with us too on this night and if you get to go out with any of these 3 guys I assure you that you're in for a great night...period!We would do this again in a heartbeat! The truth is that I wasn't expecting this night to be all that it was simply because it was $70. This included any entry fees, no line ups, bottle service at 2/3 bars and a kick-butt party. We expected fun but this was WAY better than we thought, and to us, the night was priceless. We probably would have considered booking a 2nd time if there was more time!When Playacrawl says you'll be taken care of, you are. Not only is the service from the Playacrawl guys great but all the bar staff also were outstanding - it's obvious they are well connected.So if you're making your way to Playa and looking for an awesome night out - do this, you won't regret it!

Too much to drink = lots of fun!. We loved our guide! He took us around and made sure we were all taken care of. It was just two couples and none of us had been out in Playa before. We never had to wait for drinks and never had any issues while we were out! I would do this again anytime we are in town. But be warned that the next morning is not going to be your friend :)

So much fun!. Loved the staff, he was so good looking after us and making sure we had a drink and were having fun at all times, the bars were great and the night club VIP acess and were so well looked after until 3.30am! Definitely worth doing If a solo or 2 people traveller to meet people! Cheers!

Solo traveler: A BLAST!. even if you THINK you don't like bar crawls, you will love PlayaCrawl. Each tour each night is tailored to customers. Thus, if the guide sees an older crowd, he will opt for the chill beach bars in Playa over the loud dance clubs. Our group last Saturday night, however, was of energetic partiers, so we headed to Kartabar, Mandala, Palazzo, and even a 4th club bonus (La Santanera). As the website duly advertises, the tour includes VIP wristbands and TRULY no wait in line for, open bar for 5 hours, visit at least 3 clubs (you spend about 1 hr, 20 min. at each), and bottle service in at least 2 of those venues. The best part? The one bar we didn't get bottle service at, we got 3 rounds of SHOTS, in addition to the 2-3 rounds of individual drinks we have time to order! Oh, and we even got to enjoy a belly dancer show! (this was at Kartabar btw)Considering how any given club charges (on average) US $45 for open bar (not including VIP treatment!), PlayaCrawl is a BARGAIN. It is not your fake Cancun VIP tour, in which the VIP line sometimes is longer than the regular line. Here, our group was passed to the very front as soon as we got to the entrance of each venue, were placed in a VIP seating area or booth, had our own dedicated waiters, and cups/bottles were never empty. I loved how we didn't feel rushed at all. We truly got to experience each and every venue; had a great taste of Playa Del Carmen nightlife. Given to the fact that venue selection changes every night and possibly every week, I can't wait to do it all over again when I go back to Playa Del Carmen! Thanks Jorge and Pepe! Had a blast! :D

Great Time, Great Host's, AMAZING. Thank you Jorje for setting up an amazing time for all 20 of us on November 4th! We started at Kartobar, then headed to the foam pit party at the Blue Parrot, finishing the night at Mandala, which was packed!! We all felt safe and secure with our 2 guides, and even had the pleasure of meeting Jorje (who responded to every email promptly, even with our sketchy wifi at the hotel!!!) at our last stop! Every person in our group felt safe, and were able to enjoy themselves to the fullest!! We had two people leave early, and our lovely hostess walked them get a taxi (turning 2 away b/c they wanted too much $, and finding one for 50peso's to playacar....AMAZING customer service!!). Thanks again for the great night, all of us are still talking about it!!! Next time we are in Playa, we will be on the Playacrawl!

money cant buy experience. Pepe of playacrawl ensured that we had the time of our lives. Its a great ice-breaker & i suggest you do this on the very first night itself. A lot of tips on what to do the next couple of days in playa.....like safe places, known tourist traps etc.....provided you remember the next day, as i assure you the crawl night will be a blur. A great way to meet people from around the world. Cheers pepe.

PlayaCrawl Oct. 10th, 2012. Hands down a huge success! I am a travel agent in SLC, Utah and we went to Mexico for my daughters destination wedding. I pre-planned this and was able to pre-pay online via a link they set up for us. It was an outstanding adventure and the entire group loved it! We had about 51 people partying with us that night as well. I highly recommend PlayaCrawl!!!

Safe - awesome fun. We were having a college friends reunion after 20 years and first time in Playa - so we took a chance and went with the playacrawl the 1st night there. After the 1st night we felt like locals moving around 5th street and meeting people who remember us at the various clubs as we bought the house down everywhere we went. Pepe our host was good and made it fun. He is a good friend now. I would recommend this to anyone visiting Playa even if it is their 2nd visit as we met so many new people - and when we went around as a group we got to know them better. Reasonable price - worth every cent.

Best places led by an exceptional PR. Either if you are going for a short or long trip to Playa this is the best option for your first night, bar none.You'll get to know ouststanding bars and nightclubs with free bar and time enough to dance, drink, meet people and have fun in each. Let your guide to lead you through this exhilarating tour and you'll be inmediately craving for more fiesta. Do not miss it.

This is a must when visiting Playa del Carmen!!. My best friend and I went on the Playa crawl last week and we had a blast!! This is the perfect way to kick off a trip to Playa del Carmen. A night on the town with someone who knows the area...perfect! Plus the cost is very reasonable once you see how much drinks cost at the hotels. Pepe was our guide and he was hilarious and so welcoming!! The two of us (females traveling alone) felt totally at ease and safe knowing that Pepe was heading up the pub crawl and showing us where to go. Pepe went out of his way to make sure his group of "crawlers" had drinks in hand and he never runs out of stories!! He even went out of his way to give us restaurant and sight seeing tips throughout the week. What a memorable (and effortless) way to experience the nightlife in Playa.

SOOOO FUN!!!. Had a killer night with Pepe on Halloween. Met up at Ula Gula had a few drinks, then headed over to Mandala for a couple hours and then ended up at Plazzoo where we partied till the wee hours. All 3 bars were awesome, drinks just kept coming and wicked service. Pepe is wicked awesome as a host, my friends and I had soo much fun. Will totally do this again 

paaaaartey :))). We scheduled the meet up with the guys in the last minute, didn't think we wanted to go out the first night we got there, but changed our minds. So after couple of last minute emails and text messages we found out that our meeting place is at 10pm at Ula Gula. After that we went to some awesome Hooka bar that is right across the street from Mandala, both were awesome. The Playacrawl people were awesome, ordered hookah and kept bringing some blue shots that gave me a hangover the next day. HahaI'm only giving it 4 stars just because when it's a big group, sometimes it's hard to coordinate, and if you are ready to go to the next place you have to wait for others, but it's just me, I like to dance to the beat of my own drum. Otherwise, I highly recommend their service especially if you are new to the area. Thank you guys!

Playacrawl.... Epic!!. Our host Pepe was awesome. He took us to the bar and then to the clubs where we had a crazy night. He made us feel completely safe and was very accommodating and friendly. We had bottle service at two clubs and man did we get drizzzunk! We got to the 2nd club and by that point we are already at blackout status.I can't say enough about how top notch the host Pepe was, my girl and I loved him. We met up with him at a bar and there was two other ladies from Wisconsin that were in our group. We could not have had more fun. It was a pleasant surprise!! We are life long fans of PlayaCrawl company.Thanks a lot for a fun night out guys!!Just a quick note on the crawl. This is all "well' alcohol you will have to pay more for top shelf.

What a night!!. Went out on this playacrawl for my friend's 28th birthday! What a night..I don't remember anything after the second club...and the drinks just kept coming! The hosts were pretty fun too! haha! And they made sure we didn't get lost in Playa on our way home. I definitely recommend this for a good time! I wish we would have taken more pictures, because we didn't remember much!

Playacrawl once again hits it out of the park!. Our 3rd time to do Playacrawl in Playa del Carmen, and as it always is, was the hit of the week for our group of 6. Our wonderful host, Sina, once again, made the night fun and exciting! We met at the usual geisha bar, and then hit 3 clubs. The first gets things started with drinks and fun....then on to the dance clubs. Bottle service, great time with waiters taking care of our every need. Sina is an incredible hostess. She makes everything so fun, and gets right in there and joins the party. We ended the night around 4-4:30am. Not sure where the time went, but the fun never stopped!  At $65, easily the best money you will spend in Playa on a party night. Don't think about it, just do it!....Tip your hostess well! :)

"A Bachelorette Party to Remember!!!". We just got back from Playa Del Carmen and I can't wait to go back again! We did the PlayaCrawl for the Bachelorette's "Big Fling Before the Ring" and it was amazing!!! Jorge helped with the booking and confirmation of the event and Miguel was there to meet us for our Crawl. We were able to make it to three bars due to our late start (sorry Miguel, dinner ran late) and Miguel was more than accommodating to our schedule and made sure we fit in as MUCH fun as we could. He had the best energy and really knew how to get the party started and make it last all night! We were entertained with Belly dancers, roof top bars, VIP table service, and tons of dancing!!! Every place we went we felt like ROCK STARS!!!! Miguel kept the group together and never had to worry about getting lost or feeling uncomfortable. What ever we asked for, Miguel was able to oblige. Event or no event, I'll make sure to book again just to experience the same fun all over again! I can't wait to go back!!! Thank you Jorge and Miguel for giving us an amazing night of fun and dancing we'll never forget!!!

Painted the town the brightest red possible!. This was one of the most fun nights out I've had in a while. My husband and I met our guide Sept 26, 2012 at the Geisha Rooftop Bar, and like some other reviewers have stated it is a little disconcerting. lol It's behind a palm tree, up some stairs....lol but it does make sense as a meeting place as it's quieter and easy to spot your guides. Our initial guide was Jorge who took us to our first stop. We then met up with Miguel, another PLayacrawl guide, who took us and about 10 other people on the actual Playacrawl The music was awesome there, We did have bottle service at all three clubs but my favorite by far was Mandala. All in all Jorge & Miguel are great. They have welcoming personalities and by the end of the night I was NOT ready to go home. My party pooper hubby though was a bit tired. If you enjoy going out then this is certainly for you!

What a night!. Definitely our best night out in town in Playa o man what a night! . From the minute I sent my inquiring email got an extremely fast and cordial reply from Jorge all the way to our party guide Pepe walking us to our taxi back to the hotel AAA service, we have no complaint they delivered on all the advertised on their website. You know when someone is running an honest business and this my friends is one. We felt very safe and out of worries all night we felt among friends,Thanks guys! And of course we had to do the Cuncrawl in our way out back home, same excelent night same excelent service. I will definitely recommend your Playacrawl or Cuncrawl to anyone going your way.

These ladies like to party!!!. Jorge knew just where to take us and all girls were all smiles!!! We had an absolute blast! No lines, no trouble, just pure fun. I would do it again in a heartbeat! We came to Playa for a joint bachelor and bachlorette party. We split the boys and the girls for a night. To say the least the boys were extremely jealous of our night. We showed them and it was all because of Jorge. If you are in Playa you ABSOLUTELY MUST DO THE CRAWL. Hands down, best night we sent in Mexico THANK YOU JORGE, TE AMO!!! Oh and PS Jorge is really hot so that was an extra plus :) BESOS!

Awesome Night Club!!. Great Club.. GREAt on Friday and saturdays night. Ordered a bottle of grey goose. $175 with tip included, i believe.
