Played universal music. everything from house to R&B.2 floors! dont forget to check out the terrace upstairs!.. very cool vibe!! very crowded so beaware. your on vacation so just go with it and have FUN!!(friday ) First NIght: they offered one drink free each for the girls and guys free(saturday) Second Night: charged $5 cover each because we did not order a bottle.

A must for PDC nightlife!. Playacrawl was the best $65 we spent on our vacation! We had unlimited drinks and no cover at 3 different bars/clubs and had our own areas in each place so we didn't feel over crowded by all of the other people there. Pepe was excellent! He made us all feel comfortable and made sure we were all having a great time at all times! He even walked us back to our hotel at the end of the night so we weren't wandering through the streets at 3 AM. I highly recommend Playacrawl if you are looking for a fun night out of your hotel at a great price!

Brutal night !!!!. Believe me, I;m from Mexico and I was some kind of skeptical about pay for something that in theory you can do by yourself, but no doubt would take you 2-3 days to realize about the different options and most of us don't have that time (tight agendas and tours already arranged).In our case we had an awesome experience with Playacrawl, our hoster Pepe was right on time at the first place, which was just a nice bar but the intention of this place is to warm up and break the ice among the group, 45 minutes later we moved to Mandala !!!! Totally packed and we got a nice area, table and view inside the place. I'm a beer guy but this time decided to get some Vodka and mix with 3 options of fruits ... great drinks !!!!! they opened the bottles in front of us and also served but you can pour more for a stronger drink in case you want to... We went high on this place and couldn;t believe when the guy said "time to move on", we then move to "Pallazo" ...waooo !!! bigger place and totally full !!!! climax !!!! more vodka, tequila shots, fancy drinks , etc... At this point Jorge (one of the Playacrawl owners) joined us, nice dude !!! even the tour finish by 3 am, places are open until 6 am, you go from there by your own but at least in our case they stayed with us until almost 4:30 and we stopped just because I had to drive so just want to keep having fun but not overhammered by the alcohol and mess the great time we were having, so if you are a party guy and want to see the sun, then its a good idea to book a cheap room at Playa del Carmen downtown (actually we found a hotel 4 blocks from the discos area right in front of the city hall for 500 pesos !!!! ) .. Jorge and Pepe, you guys are great dudes ! will come back with my teenagers next year for sure !!!!

We Crawled the Night Away!. My GF and I signed up for this crawl upon recommendation from a very cool girl at our hotel. I had asked her about a barcrawl that Apple Vacations was promoting. She said it sounded ok-but she had friends that ran one that was very fun and less expensive! So we went out, met up with a great crew of people and danced and drank all night. Miguel and Pepe had everything real smooth and we were VIP everywhere-with bottle service and no drama! 3 great spots-all different- they ran the show and again a great crew of people all out to have a great time. Good for cpls and groups all the same. Highly recommend-will do it again no doubt.

Small group but excellent night. We chose a saturday night, but unfortunately there were not a very large group of us, but fortunately we had met some people from our hotel as well and the rep was very helpful and if you know anyone who hasn't booked it appears they can turn up on the night and pay cash.The three main bars we went to were brilliant, fantastic night out and you certainly won't be wanting where drink is concerned.A fantastic night out and a brilliant overall idea.

Playacrawl lived out to our expectations !. Recommended to us by some friends that had done the Playacrawl a few months ago. They told us they had so much fun and that it was a great deal if you planed to go out an drink and dance, and they were not lying! Playacrawl lived out to our expectations and exceeded them, party guide was great! Kind, friendly and good looking girls ;) , drinks keep coming we got bottle service on 3 the places we went, no lines, reserved tables just as advertise. What is not advertised is the fun, o my we danced our shoes off . What I can say is that Playacrawl will provide you with all the tools you need to have fun is up to you to make it happen. There was about 15 in our group from all over the world we made new friends and we decided to do the Cuncrawl in Cancun too, same fun same good deal. If you really are up to having fun and don't want to be worrying about anything you definitely should do the Playacrawl. The price is unbeatable, I mean 65 dlls to drink all night and cover charges included + all the fun, I would of payed 100 dlls and still would of thought it was a great deal. I have traveled all over the world and have never seen an "all you can drink" bar crawl I had to drink it to believe it lol. Great job Playacrawl guys, Congratulations!

Depends on who you're with. I had a decent time with the group and I had a blast dancing by myself. The drinks are as strong as you make it because it is bottle service but with the heat and dancing you sweat out and work off the alcohol so keeping buzzed was a real effort. I went on a pub crawl in Ireland and it was one of the best experiences of my life. Perhaps if they added some of those elements like special shots that you can only get locally, quick fun facts about the clubs we were going to. I don't really know but some tweaking of the format would appeal to me but who knows everyone else seems thrilled with just plain drinking and dancing.I wish we got to have more fun with the staff like all the other reviews said. They were nice and professional but fun... meh wouldn't say that much. The people in my group were awful, and they were eventually kicked out but not before they grabbed my behind repeatedly (one of them was so drunk he couldn't keep his eyes open, spilled alcohol everywhere, and seemed like he would throw up on someone). This guy was very clearly over the line intoxicated at the first club once he arrived but he was allowed to stay until he was practically unmanageable. I wouldn't do it again.

Best time. I must say, when we first booked this I was not sure it was the best Idea since we were a group of 10, I mean 10 persons at 65 bucks each is 650 bucks for one night, so we were not sure if it was worthy or not. Boy was I ever wrong, We partied like there was no tomorrow, non stop drinks, VIP treatment, No lines, our own tables, we could not have asked for more. I dont have anything bad to say about this pub crawl, It is totally worthy everyone had a blast and the group consinsted of guys that were 18 to even my dad who is almost 50, everyone really enjoyed the night. Thanks to all the Playa crawl guides for such an amazing time.Saludos desde Canada y Venezuela!

Worth Every Penny!!!. Playacrawl is a blast!!!!My girlfriend and I made the trip down to scuba dive but we also wanted to have some fun at night. I found Playacrawl on tripadvisor and I reluctantly took a chance with them. This was the best decision we ever made for a night out!!I don't know where to begin or even describe the event so let me say that Miguel and his crew did a very good job in taking care of us... I mean taking really, really good care of us not just in terms of drinks but also in terms of safety while we were partying and getting hammered with drinks.We started in a mellow bar to get us acquainted with the group and the other guest and believe me, the bar might had been mellow but the drinks keeps pouring in. After that, we moved into a mid-level dance club where there was a line to get into the bar and we just walked right in past the lines of people waiting to get in. Again, as advertised, its all you can drink. The third and final destination was a high end dance club where people were just lined up waiting to get into the club and once again, we just walked right in. We didn't even have to wait for more than 30 seconds.It was a fun night and everything that was advertised was more than fulfilled by Miguel and his crew!! They took real good care of us and they showed us how to party in Mexico..... I say take a chance on Playacrawl and you will not regret spending money on them!Next time my girlfriend and I will be back, we will definitely book a night or two with Playacrawl or maybe even try their Cancuncrawl!!Miguel and crew, Thank you very much for a great experience!!!

Would definitely do it again!!!!!. This was our first time on the crawl. My wife and I were in town celebrating our anniversary and wanted to get out one night to check out the nightlife. Boy did they live up to their excellent past reviews. Miguel was our guide and was a very cool guy. We had a group of 6 and couldn't have asked for a better time.........well that is if we all decided to stay out the whole night. We had a couple in the group that didn't want to stay out too late so the evening was cut a tad short. That definitely didn't stop us from the fun. We went to three places and as advertised there was a consistent flow of alcohol. All three places were packed, with our last stop being Mandala was seriously packed. Even after we left Miguel took us to a spot to eat which was also good. Miguel also offered to get my wife and I into Coco Bongos the next night using his discounted rate which was cool. We would have definitely taken him up on his offer if we weren't too hung over from the night before. All in all, we had a blast and would have done it again on the trip if we had extra time. Would definitley recommend the crawl if you want to have a good nite out on the town.

Party in Playa. This was our first visit to the region. Looking for a fun night away from the resort, we found Playacrawl on tripadvisor...great decision. Pepe was our host and lots of fun. It was a muggy night after a brief rainstorm but we ventured to two different clubs because one wasnt open due to the rain. As advertised, bottle service was provided and the shots flowed! :)Our only regret of the evening was our table was at the front entrance. Only in Mexico can you pack 1,000 club goers in a space meant for a few hundred. That said, Pepe and the others from Playacrawl go out of there way to make you feel safe, all while having a great time. We highly recommend you invest $65 and party like a rock star in Playa. Thanks!!!
Best ever. Pepe took great care of us. The best ever, a must do. the clubs and bars were great ! I have been coming here for years and never had an experience like this!

Had a great time!. We had a group of 23 and had a fantastic time! They helped arrange transportation for our group, and ensured we had a GREAT night!! The guides were very attentive to anything we needed and ensured we were all having a blast. I would highly recommend using Playacrawl if you want to get off the resort and have a night out.

Fun & Safe. Girlfriends and I were in Playa del Carmen for Memorial Day Wknd for a bachelorette party. This is a great idea to do if you're not sure where to go for a night out. You meet your guides in downtown at some hostel. The entrance seemed sketchy at first but turned out to be okay. We had two guides who had great energy and rounded up our group of 20 peeps for a night on town. We went to 3 bars, each with a different ambience but they each all played the same music and had the same kind of water-down drinks. Overall a fun time though since we would not have known where to go otherwise. We figured out a few nights later though that each club were all on the same street within two blocks! But I guess when you're drunk and having a good time, they all seem to be far away. :) At each place though the guides made sure we all got drinks and got in thru security ok. Very professional and took care of us. In fact our guide helped negotiate a cheaper rate back to our hotel! Pepe and Christian were our guides and had a great time with them.

Hands down the ultimate party!!!. I really don't know where to begin as there is too much to say. It was truly an amazing experience that I will never forget. We started the night at the meeting spot the Rio Hostel. At first we thought that this was a shady little bar but we we soon pleasantly comforted by our bartender Enrique. Enrique was very friendly and poured us each a complimentary Tequila shot, as we waited for our guide Christian. After about ten minutes a man with a Playcrawl shirt appeared and we asked him if he was Christian. He said no his name was Pepe and that Christian couldn't make it so he would be our guide for the evening. Let me tell you that this is probably the best thing that could have ever happened because I think that we made a friend for life. Pepe was the nicest, kindest person that we had met while in Mexico, and that says a lot as everyone we met was very nice. Pepe brought us to three clubs from the first bar. At each bar we skipped the lines, did not have to pay any additional cover charges, and had unlimited drinks made for us right at our private tables. They truly went out of their way to make us feel special. Pepe took care of everything for us making sure that we were safe and having a good time. At one point in the night my wife's feet were hurting her from her heels so Pepe said hold on I'll be right back. He was gone for about ten minutes and the next thing you know he returned with a brand new pair of sandals that he ran down to the store and paid for out his own pocket. Pepe was so good to us that we had made a special request that he bring us to CoCo Bongo on another night of our trip. He was happy to do this for us even though Playcrawl did not normally bring guests to CoCo Bongo. Again Pepe had set everything up for us and made sure that we were taken care of like movie stars. Pepe treated us not like clients but like family. Hands down the best $65 I have ever spent in my life, and I cant wait to go back next year.

Great hen do!. I booked the Playacrawl for a hen do for my Stepmum-to-be and 6 other girls who had traveled to Mexico for the wedding, and we had an excellent time! We had a variety of ages in the group, and the guys from the Playacrawl team catered for all of us and ensured that we all had a lot of fun and enjoyed the evening. They took us to 3 different bars/clubs around the Playa Del Carmen area, just off the main drag of 5th Avenue, meaning we saw a better side to the area. We had VIP areas, reserved tables and waiter service in each place, and were so well looked after – our drinks were constantly topped up, and never once did anyone feel uncomfortable. They also made sure we all stayed together all night, but didn’t stop us having fun and partying around the clubs!The one piece of advice I’d give for UK travellers giving Playacrawl a go is don’t be put off by the appearance of the first bar – Geisha bar. It’s a roof top bar with a lovely little swimming pool and a great place to first meet your guide, but from the outside you need to go up some pretty sketchy stairs which say it’s leading you up to a hostel. I promise it’s not as bad as it looks (some of the girls in my party were a little unsure at first).If you’re looking for a great night out in Playa Del Carmen, and like the VIP treatment, I’d definitely recommend booking with Playacrawl – great value for money! Thanks to Pepe and Jorge for giving us a great night.

Crazy night out in Playa. I recently got married in the Mayan and my girlfriends and I decided to do the Playacrawl as a bachelorette party a few nights before the wedding. There were 12 of us who went out. My friend arranged everything before hand from home but she said Jorge was great at returning emails and had the payment link set up right away. It's perfect because everyone can use the Paypal link to pay for themselves and no one person is stuck covering the costs for the others. We went out on a Monday night and our transportation was right on time from our resort. We met our guide, Chris, right on 5th avenue. Chris is probably one of the most entertaining, fun, great people I have met. He is so outgoing and he can seriously party! He made us all feel so comfortable right away and had us out on the dance floor first thing. It was a slower night in Playa so we went to two bars but we had the greatest time. The drinks were unlimited and STRONG. We had our own VIP sections and Chris even had some creepy guys removed from the bar who were trying to hang out with us. This is truly the best value for your money. I asked in the bars and one drink is $11 USD and cover is $20. This makes the $65 for VIP, no line, no cover and unlimited alcohol so worth it.Safety is the first priority for this company. Chris made sure we were all together and even showed us to the washrooms. One of the girls in our group wasn't feeling well and since we have a "leave together" rule, around 1:30 we decided we were ready to go. Chris and Jorge texted the driver and he was there within 15 minutes to take us home. Trust me when I say that if you book Playacrawl for a bar night out, you will not be disappointed!

THE CRAWL OF THE YEAR!. Playacrawl was the best decision we did while in Playa Del Carmen. Pepe showed us the best time and took us to the hottest spots in Playa Del Carmen. Pepe was so good when my sisters shoes were hurting her feet he went down the street and purchased her sandals. Thats service! They told us at the beginning that we were not clients but rather family and that couldn't have been more true. We were so happy with how we were treated that we called Pepe and had him take us to Coco Bongo on Thursday night where he again got us v.i.p. treatment. Thank you PLAYACRAWL and more especially Pepe !

Awesome girls night!!!. I went to Mexico with a group of 8 girls for a bachelorette party and we wanted to have a safe way to go out in Playa de Carmen. The Playacrawl was awesome!!! First, the people that they have working the night with you are so much fun! They really take care of you - making sure that you have drinks and are just having a good time. Second, they bars/clubs that they take you to are really fun. This is such a good deal - beside having your drinks covered all night, you just don't have to worry or plan anything. You just party all night! We booked transportation to and from our hotel as well, which just made everything so much easier. At the end of the night our cab was late, so the people working for Playacrawl waited with us and made sure that we were all safely in the cab before leaving. This really was the best way to go out!

The best of the best!. The funnest, safest, easiest, and pleasent way to see Playa del Carmen. We had three hosts for the night and they definately understand different types of tourists and how to cater to their needs. Christian, Pepe, and Jorge did a fantastic job and I cant wait to hang out with them again. They knew exactly what the schedule for the night entailed and had a group of folks ready to get the night going for us. At each location, they took care of us, made sure we were having a blast. Also, this is a great way to meet other travellers from around the world and have a blast. I danced so much!!!!

YOU WILL NOT REGRET PARTYING WITH PLAYACRAWL!!. We partied with PLAYACRAWL on May 19th. From start to finish (that's when things got a bit foggy) we had a great time. It is almost impossible to have a bad time. We had VIP service, reserved tables, and our own waiter at each place we went. As soon as our drinks got under 1/2 full, they were topping it off. Shots were coming out on a regular basis, although no one gave me a hard time when I politely declined the tequila ones..that would have been disastrous. Our guide Pepe was a lot of fun. My only regret was that the night had to end and we didn't have enough time or energy to do another PLAYACRAWL on this trip. We plan on going back next year and without a doubt will party with PLAYACRAWL again!! You guys are the best!! :-)

Guide was having too much fun; drinks had no alcohol. Our party started on the roof of the local youth hostel and our guide, who seemed quite animated and energetic started us with a round of drinks, then shots and a beer bong for a couple of people in the group (a bachelorette party). Next was a corner club that looked more like a restaurant, open on 2 sides to the street with loud music and lights. They did give us a round of drinks but the 9 or 10 rounds of shots they kept bringing were pure sugary liquid and no alcohol. We did not have any "bottle service" that's promised on their website.The second club was larger, and a real club atmosphere with a DJ. When I asked for vodka, they kept pouring me tequila. Again, no "bottle service" until I complained to the guide then a bottle of vodka arrived at the table, but soon it was time to go. The guide was having a really good time dancing around and enjoying himself. One good thing, they did bring our bachelorette a special flaming drink that was quite cool.The third club he took us to was quite packed and three full floors of people, and he didn't bother to make sure we all stayed together. I spent about 45 minutes wiggling through the crowd looking for someone I knew. Many of us had had enough and eventually regrouped out in the street and went on our way. How can a dozen girls spend hours in a club drinking and noone got drunk???

So! Much! Fun!. The best, easiest, safest way to guarantee a great night out. Bottle service at every club, no waiting in lines, no cover charges. Our host Christian was fabulous, and a couple of other guys were helping out as well. They were all so nice and attentive, your glass will never be empty. If you don't have fun, it's your own fault! The best $65 you will spend on vacation.

Best way to spend $65.00 in Playa del Carmen!. Jorge, the boss man, provided outstanding customer service with prompt responses to my emails and going above and beyond by providing nightlife suggestions for the other nights we were in town. I was even more impressed and so appreciative when Jorge happily accommodated our very very last minute/night-of request to push our meet time by 45 minutes due to an unexpected conflict. As for the meet-up spot, it is quite shady but don’t be alarmed as the drop-dead gorgeous Playacrawl guides otherwise known as Professional Partiers are awaiting you with open arms and tequila shots. Upon arrival, we fell in love with our incredibly energetic guide, Christian, who kept the vibe wayyy up and the shots, mixers & bottles flowing from Danzantes to Mandala and lastly to Palazzo. We were also accompanied by Miguel, who is delicious eye-candy and an amazing dance partner. Believe the hype – no lines, no cover, reserved tables, unlimited drinks and bottle service at 3 places for only $65.00 -- unheard of in NYC or anywhere, really. In any case, my girls and I love to dance (especially on tables and chairs), and that’s exactly what we did up until 4am - right alongside our guides. All in all, we had a ridiculous time.As the night went on, our group of twelve women dwindled down as some of us separated to head back to our resort and Christian, our chivalrous leader, ensured our safety by escorting each of our separate groups from the club to the taxi.After Playacrawl spoiled us on our second night with VIP everything, on our third night in Playa Del Carmen, table service was a necessity. We decided to go back to Mandala, our favorite of the three Playacrawl stops. Before heading out, Jorge & I exchanged a couple of emails in which he mentioned that he and Christian would be at Mandala as well. Our tables happened to be right next to one another and well – enough said… another night that went down in history =DSo, if you love to drink, dance and party VIP style, then you NEED to buy these tickets. Thank you, Jorge, Christian & Miguel, for a night we'll never forget! XO - The 12 Girls from NYC

Guaranteed Fun!. We booked Playacrawl for the Thursday night before our Saturday wedding and we/our guests had a BLAST! From initial contact, they were very prompt to respond, emailed a very easy link to forward to guests (this made it convenient for them to book/pay), and they remained professional throughout. We had 25 of our 48 guests go, so we had a big group - but we were picked up on time from the resort, dropped off at the first bar where we were met by a smiling face (guide) who took us to 3 amazing bars/clubs throughout the night! At the first club, they even had the screen monitors say 'Congratulations Jamie & Mark' - nice touch We were in good hands and honestly, it was one of the best nights of the trip! Whether you have a small or large group, you will NOT regret booking Playacrawl for a fun night out!

Fun times. If you're up for a night of drinks and partying and have never been to Playa del Carmen, you should do this. Entrance to three bars, unlimited drinks, and Chris the guide parties like a Rockstar!!

Playa Madness. Me, my sister and our friend loved this crawl, Christian is brilliant, he met us along with another couple Judy and Kurt who were loads of fun as well, in a bar to meet up with everyone before the party started. Christian is so full off energy and really gets you in the mood to party and the bars he took us too were brilliant the music was excellent and the atmosphere was amazing and the drinks just keep on coming :) A special thank you to Christain and Jorge who turned up later on to say hello. Would totally recommend booking this tour as to go into the nightclubs in playa one by one and pay for drinks is very expensive and so this is the best way to do it and we booked it through the internet by paypal so very easy. Thanks again guys for a great night

Fantastic night out. Had a brilliant time out on the town with this guys and girls. they really know how to start a party and keep it going til the end. We met up in a local bar, got to know each other a little and then moved out to the first venue, which was an outside type bar and disco. Drinks flowed easily and made to feel welcome at all of the venues. We also visited two other venues, which lead us up to 3am in the morning. they even arranged to have a taxis waiting to take us back to the hotel. Excellent night out and to get to see some of the night life in the town.

Worth every penny. If you guys planning a hen night or a stag night than this is absolute must thing to do - these guys know what they are doing, taking you to best places in town and charging fair amount. All 10 friends of mine were super happy with the way they handled our stag night leaving only great memories!!!
Loved Playa Del Carmen period. All of it. Sun all of the people, the food the restaraunts all of it.

Would give it 7-stars if I could!. Just do it!!! If you don't have a great time...it's time to check for a pulse. This was our best night in Playa, despite going out two other nights (Cocobongo and Blue Parrott). Chris and Sena were awesome. They have perfected the art of having a great time. Worth a trip to Playa just for this...thanks guys!!!!

AMAZING..BOOKED SOLELY OFF OF REVIEWS HERE ON TRIP ADVISOR. To sum it up..this group is amazing and you should not wait to book until the end of your trip or youll be sorry you didnt go more than once. I booked solely off of reviews here on trip advisor. If you ask the locals or even tourists most will have no idea about this company since most party hopping tours in playa stop operation but these reviews on trip advisor are true to heart just look at the dates.We went out on 3-18-2012 and Cristian and Sien (mispelled probably sorry) were our guides and they were high energy and amazing the whole time. We got amazing bottle service and attention from the waiters. We got anything we wanted in terms of mixers bottles shots. They bring around trays of shots and they are wayy more flavorful than alcoholic but its just showing u that u are getting great service. My friend and I just came from Cancun a week ago and had a VIP service from Afterdark for 7 nights and that didnt light a torch compared to the service we got from PlayaCrawl for 1 night.Now on to the club scene we had people from ages 20 to probably 40 in our group..these clubs here are for any age it absolutely doesnt matter you will all have fun. I am not one to dance and im pretty shy to begin with so let me tell you I was pleasantly surprised to find myself up on little speakers and stages dancing with women the tour guides etc. The guides on this tour WILL make sure you are having a good time and within our group there was not one person without a smile on their face moving to the music within about an hour into the tour. The clubs here charge $40 to $60 for guys (some women get in free) so to pay $65 and get into 3 of the best clubs that night AND get bottle service AND have helpful energetic guides AND not have to pay for drinks is nothing short of AMAZING...everyone around us was paying $10 a drink and the only sad thing I can say is it resulted in a bunch of sober girls around us :( (the ones outside of our group of course)

Best decision I made in Mexico. Of course a little uneasy paying for it online. But these guys are professionals!!!! Amazing time !! VIP in every club. Bottle service and tray after tray of shots. There was 6 of us guys and not one complaint just story after story. Minnesota boys who like to drink give it two thumbs up!!

Playacrawl - Day was an awesome time!!! And Chris ROCKS!!!. My friends and I took the Playacrawl-Day Crawl last Saturday because we were leaving very early the next morning to fly home. We had a blast!!! Chris showed us such a great time... he has so much energy it was hard to keep up! He definitely made the experience that much more enjoyable and I can't wait to go back and take another crawl with him. My only suggestion might be to end the crawl at Senor Frogs instead of starting there because we had so much fun and drank quite a bit there that the details of the other 2 bars were a little hazy. LOL! Thanks Chris and Playacrawl for a great time!!!!

Must do - Chris and Jorge are the best!. Wife and I went on the the crawl a week ago, and we both agreed it was the best night of our stay in playa. Signing up is really easy with payment through PayPal. Great value, a lot of fun, a lot of drinks, but most of all our host, Chris was the difference maker. Full of energy and super attentive to all 14 of us from the beginning up until we left at 4am. We will definitely remember him. He even walked us to the nearest late night burger joint before he heads back to the rest of the party.
Great party time!. This is a must do while in "Playa". The only word of advice is be sure to have enough energy cuz you will need it! Thanks Jorge and Sina....good times!

Great time for all ages!. We are all in our late 30's to mid-40's. You meet at a discrete place and your guide will greet you immediately. It's safe, trust me, the girls were looking at me like I was crazy when we got there but immediately relaxed when we met our guide. HE WAS CRAZY! Christian met us and he has more energy than any human being I've ever met. Perfect guide for this trip. Be ready to drink as little or as much as you want. Christian encouraged, but did not force anybody to do anything they didn't want to. We went to a little bar down in the party zone first and met up with a bachelorette party. Christian moved from group to group making sure everyone was having a good time. We then moved to a great dance club and then to the Blue Parrot to end the night. Christian got us a cab back to our hotel and we left at around 2:30 a.m. I recommend anyone that's never been to Playa that wants to cut loose one night - use these guys. The owner, Jorge, was out with us for awhile as well. He was a great guy too. Good job Playacrawl!

Best night in Playa - have to try!!. I am part of a group of friends that go away every year together and are know as "parents gone wild". We chose to go out with Playacrawl after reading great reviews. We had an absolutely great time!!!! Chris was our guide and definately took care of us. Sena is a guide also that came out with us even though she had the day off. They both made sure that we went to popular clubs and everyone was having a great time, always had a full drink and felt comfortable. These guides can definately move and made sure we were too. You definately need to give this a try, you will not be disappointed!!!

Highlight of our Parents Gone Wild Weekend!!!!. There is a large group of us (30s) that goes away every year to different places. This year we went to Playa and we came across the Playacrawl. It was the best thing we did during our vacation. Jorge was very professional and courteous and got back to me right away. Chris was our guide and he was fabulous, it was Sena's night off and she still came out and joined us. They made sure we had a good time with them and the rest of our group. They did a great job of keeping us all together, getting us into the clubs and seriously - it was VIP type service all night long! We felt extremely safe being with them. The drinks were constantly flowing and they did not scrimp on anything! I just wish Chris and Sena could teach us how to dance and move like they do!!!! I would highly recommend going out on the Playacrawl for the best night on the town!

CRAZY PARTY!!!. I went on a playacrawl for a friends bachelorette party February 2012. It was absolutely crazy! Our guide, Christian, had so much energy it was insane! He definitely showed us a great time. The only downfall, was I don't think we were allowed to order mixed drinks, when they were supposed to be included. We were served shots every few minutes and beer! Which was still fine with me. This pub crawl was a blast, and plenty of us were feeling the affects of it the next day!

Great night out in Playa. I was researching my next trip to Cozumel/Playa and noticed I never gave a review of my Playcrawl. My actual trip was back in August of 2010. A group of friends booked a night out for the Playacrawl and had a great time! It was nice to check out places I probably would not normally have gone and also bypass any lines. I highly recommend it but definitely do it a day or two before your return home. We ended the night at Coco Bongo which is a trip....Good times!

The sugar daddy you never had. Going out with the Playacrawl crew made us feel like high rollers... bottle service, shooters, constantly topped up drinks, and no line-ups at all. Jorge and Sina are hooked up, and make sure that their guests have a great time partying in Playa. Worth the coin for sure. As we learned the hard way.... probably best not to do the playacrawl on your LAST night in town... we had an extremely long travel day the day after (ie. flight to the west coast of Canada) and were not feeling tip top after a great night out - will spare you the details! Do it when you first arrive in Playa so you get to know the great area for bars and clubs.

Playacrawl was awesome. I highly recommend doing this is you want to try something fun in Playa. Jorge was great, he was really easy to get a hold of and he emailed us back right away. Our guide Migel was great. He took us to really cool places and made sure we were having fun. It is literally all you can drink, although remember they don't necessarily have the same drinks in mexico as they do in the US so you might have to explain what you want. The service was great, we didn't have to wait to get into clubs and we got to go to two really popular bars in Playa. Totally worth doing it, especially at the beginning of your trip so you can find some new cool places.

Memorable night and good value for money. You have to do the Playa Crawl. We group of 5 girls changed our evening and even though it wasn’t normal for us to do it on a Friday evening – especially with the BPM festival going on – Jorge arranged it for us. Zena our guide was very attentive and making sure our drinks were topped up. It’s a fantastic way to get into all the bars and nonstop drinks. A memorable night. Payment was easy to do via Paypal and Jorge was very prompt in his email communication.
BONKERS. Coco Bongos nightclub worth a visit great floor show

LEGIT. Good times at a great price!. Muchas gracias Jorge and Sina! I emailed Jorge (partyinfo@playacrawl.com) at 4:30 pm THE DAY OF, and he was able to squeeze me in for THAT NIGHT. He answered my questions quickly through email, sent me the payment link, and then provided me with instructions for where to meetup. I went to the meeting place and was greeted by our guide, Sina, a fun German girl. She got me a beer, introduced me to the rest of the crowd, and let us know we'd be leaving soon. We made our way to the first bar (Danzantes) and the drinks (bottle service, shooters, and shots) just started coming. I was the first one to bust out the dancing and everyone joined in pretty soon, including our guide, Sina, who could dance very well (but not as good as me ;)). Next bar was Xaos, which was a bit smaller, but just as awesome. And last bar, for us, was Mandala, the largest of the 3. There was a line, Sina took us right through the back door!All 3 were great, and Sina and Jorge really took care of everything. If you like to drink and/or dance and want to experience Playa nightlife at a great price and without any hassles, holler at partyinfo@playacrawl.com!

What an amazing experience!!!. We had such a great time with Jorge and Cena! We were treated like VIPs at each club. The service provided was so hospitable! Jorge and Cena made our visit to Mexico very memorable.

A great time!. I've done pub crawls in other vacation destinations (Madrid, Barcelona, Rome) and this is the most organized and friendly one I've been on. The crew went out of their way to include everyone in the fun. The hostess, Sina, is one of the warmest and funnest people you will ever meet. If ever they detected that your drink was running empty, they would immediately fill it up with whatever beverage you choose. There were endles rounds of shots to make sure everyone got their drink on. One major advantage to this pubcrawl is that we had bottle/table service at all the clubs we visited. That meant that if you wanted to take a break from the dance floor, there was always a place you could take a seat to relax.Overall, I would highly recommend this PubCrawl to anyone visiting Playa that is looking for a good party with great people.

We are on the "older" side and we had fun like kids. Before we booked we where having doubts if we would feel out of place (we are in our late 40´s) since we thought it would all just be kids going to the crawl. We where so wrong there where people of all ages and countries, in fact the older ones were the crazier ones haha. This is a really good deal if you want to explore the real nightlife in Playa our previous experience had been Senor Frogs, Carlos and Chalries and Coco Bongo o man we were wrong. Our guide Jorge was excellent made sure we always had a drink in our hand. And I didn’t believe their add about bottle service well friends is true we got bottomless bottle service in two of the three places we visited. A very fun night, felt very safe all night, didn’t have to worry about crooked waiters or dealing with money, no lines, reserved tables , man what else can I say, definitely hand down a 5 star recommendation.

This guys are like your old friends taking you out in town. We booked Playacrawl because of the great reviews and believe me they did not disappoint.The customer service is excellent on the computer very fast and friendly, we arrived at our meeting point on a little roof top bar, quite eclectic full of people from all over the world, we stayed there around 10 minutes until everyone arrive. Our group consisted of 13 people from all ages and places. Sina was our guide; she was the best I mean she goes out of her way to make sure we were having fun and making sure we felt safe and comfortable, from the guy trying to take a picture to charge money to bringing us napkins for our sweat from dancing lol. Later the Playacrawl owner arrived to welcome us on the second club, and made sure everything was going good, he is such a cool guy. Anyways long story short if you want to get a real experience for the nightlife in this town called Playa which has a lot of it lol, Playacrawl and its people is definitely the way. Have fun!!
LOVED IT. Great bar crawl, good choice of bars / clubs, finishing the night at the fantastic coco bongos - great price too, considering your drinks are free all night :)

Our hostess did a great job in motivating our group. We had a different guide than we did on the Playacrawl last year. While Migel did a good job I would have to say that Sina did an excellent job. She was always pulling one of us out to dance and the shots kept on comeing. The only shame was when we got to our final location we were only there for a few minutes when the entire block lost power. So we hung out for a while waiting for it to conme back on and it kept getting hotter and we were getting bored so we ended up leaving early.

Playacrawl was awesome thanks to our guide!!!. We did a playacrawl on Sunday, October 2nd. We met a top the Rio Hostel, which was exciting and scary at the same time, lol. No really, a nice little spot at the rooftop bar. Sina was our guide and was waiting on us. We had paid in advance, and the others who were supposed to come had not, and did not show.  We hit three clubs, and had all we could drink, and the service was great. Sina was a blast to party with, and she took great care of us. The fire show at the Blue Parrot was amazing, and then the final stop was Mandala. This club is right up there with Coco Bongo's for fun. Not the shows that CocoBongo's has, but great music and dancing, etc...... We found a lot of fun that we had never experienced in Playa before thanks to the playacrawl. The price was well worth it, and if you are lucky enough to get Sina for your guide, then I guarantee a great time for all!

Living the real Nightlife in PDC!! A must done by sure. Playa del Carmen it's a great place for meeting nice people, enjoy walking through nice little shops, restaurants and handcrafts but what it rocks in PDC is its nightlife! and the best way of getting the most of it is PLAYACRAWL. You visit 3 different discos in one night with VIP access, don't doing long lines or waiting to get an available place into the sweating crawd! Yo will be a real VIP in the middle of hundreds of vistors with all you can drink even water! hehe (since 10 pm to 3 am) for an incredible affordable price ;-) . What more you could ask for?!!! Btw, Sina... you rock!! My friends and I had a great night and most important having a great host as you in the PDC nightlife... (para todos los latinos es igual! una excelente oportunidad de conocer gente de cualquier lugar del mundo).

Awesome night! Definitely GO!. We booked based on tripadvisor reviews and were not disappointed! We went on a Monday night and arrived to the hostel/bar maybe 30 minutes early and we were greeted by Sena (sp?) who was the best guide! She got us drinks right away and pregamed before the crawl. There were a total of 12 of us (6 in our group, 6 in theirs) and we were off to the first bar around 10pm. We walked to every bar, each one getting better. The first one we went to was open air and awesome-- we were the only people there so it was like a private party. The shots kept coming (very weak!) but the service was great. The beach bar and fire show were awesome (we also played flipped cup!) and danced on the beach! The final bar was posh and we had VIP entry and bottle service. I would recommend sticking with beer because the drinks weren't so strong-- at least with beer you know what you're drinking! Sena was incredible! She treated us like we were old friends! She even helped us get a cab and talk them down in price. THANKS FOR A GREAT NIGHT!

Great staff and great clubs. Been in playa del carmen 6 times and this is the best keep secret you aint going to find tickets in the resort only online but is the best way to go and party with great staff and great clubs can't wait to go back and do it again thanks for great memories .carlo and tiffany miami

the best night in my entire life. Playacrawl is just excelent!!! You get exactly what they offer (no bad surprises, no extra charges), VIP entrances to clubs, unlimited drinks. Sina was our guide that night, and she was so fun!! Miguel came with us latter. They both were great. I will come back to Playa del Carmen and to Playacrawl for sure.

Unforgettable night! This is a can't miss good time!. We were in Mexico celebrating my wedding and decided to go out one last time 2 days before the ceremony. We found the "PlayaCrawl" online and figured it would be a good value which everyone could afford so we put together a group of 18 people. Let me just say that the drinks were flowing all night long. We started out with a couple of the PlayaCrawl staff at our first 2 stops and they were ridiculously attentive. Whatever you needed they would go grab it from the bar or send a waiter over with more shots.Starting out at about 10pm the first 1-2 places were a little slow by some people's standards, but we were still having a blast. By the 3rd place everyone was in full on party mode and we finished it off by going to a club that had a line wrapped around the block.Each place we went to was VIP treatment. We would walk right in and were taken to a roped off VIP area where we could stay and drink or go out and dance. The staff went above and beyond to make the night extra special for me and my fiance. Overall this was a tremendous value. If you go out on your own you will wait in lines and drop $60 bucks for entrance and drinks pretty quick. We had drinks flowing until 4am.I highly recommend the PlayaCrawl to anybody!!!

Definetely a night to remember. I want to start off by saying playa crawl was def worth the money!! They picked us up at the hotel on time drove us to first club where we met sina. She was awesome so sweet!!! We loved the fire show. We then went to mandala which was vip as all the clubs were! I cant enough how much fun we had!! I would say go for it and there is nothing to be worried about.

fantastic time!. we had a very large party for a destination wedding. combined was 24 of us with bachelor and bachelorette party. Jorge was great at getting information and making the process of organizing everything super easy! the staff on the crawl was awesome! miguel our guide was great fun. the bars were fantastic, all the alcohol we wanted was available to us. no waiting in lines to get in and a VIP spot at all the locations!. also awesome is they can give you door to door service. overall great experience and great service from the company! would absolutely do it again!

Management is super to work with!!. Playacrawl was what we had hoped for but the night we when the others failed to show up on time so Miguel offered us refunds or that he would take us to the clubs and let us pick. We decided to go check out the clubs and unfortunately we picked wrong. The Blue Parrot served bottom shelf liquors and the service was lacking, also insight of 15minutes I was offered illegal drugs not once but twice. The management went above and beyond in trying to make things right and when we go back to Playa we will give them another chance. Believe what they tell you they will hold up their end of the deal.

Miguel is the man!. Not much more to add that others havent mentioned before. My buddy and I did the crawl on June 4th. This was my second time doing it and they have made some good strides since last summer. Miguel was our guide and our crawl included 6 others (3 fun couples) and we hit Blue Parrot, Mandala, and Brama, Service was top notch and Miguel was a blast to hang out with. He owns a bar in Playa and seems to know EVERYONE. He definitely helped expand my social circle the night we did the crawl! Ha!Saw Miguel three more times that week around town and each time was like seeing an old friend. He is living the dream! Great guy, great night, and a great crawl. Dont miss it.

Best way to experience Playa's nightlife!. My husband and I along with our friends (2 other couples) got a rare opportunity to steal away from the kids and the daily grind for a 5 night trip to Mexico. For all 6 of us, it was our first time coming to Mexico. We knew we wanted to get out one night and experience Playa del Carmen's nightlife, but to be honest we didn't know where to start, and we were unsure of ourselves being in Mexico. I researched before the trip and stumbled on reviews/website about Playacrawl. I emailed, and Jorge, the sales manager, was very quick in replying and was very helpful with all kinds of info. You are supposed to book through Paypal, but once we were at the resort, our wi-fi wasnt working. Gave a call to Jorge and he told us it was no problem, he would still reserve our spots and we could just pay our guide in cash the night of.Our guide, Miguel, was EXTREMELY helpful!!! He seemed to know everybody everywhere we went. We went to 3 different places (Blue Parrot - also got to see the fire show here, Mandala, Brahma) From all 6 of us, Mandala was our favorite. We had VIP sections every place we went. We knew it was really a good deal when we met some people at the Blue Parrot who told us they paid $40 each just to get in! (Playacrawl is $60 a person and that includes the cover and all you can drink!) We even got bottle service each place we went as well. Miguel was always making sure we had anything we needed - drinks, water, etc. (but he wasn't "in the way" either - had a good balance) I would HIGHLY recommend Playacrawl to anyone who wants to experience the nightlife here, doesn't want to pay an arm and a leg, but wants to feel like a VIP! If we ever come back to Playa, or Cancun, I will definitely do this again.

Awesome Time!!!!. Booked a bachelor party for 13 guys on May 29th. Playacrawl sent a bus to pick us up at our hotel. Our First stop was the Blue Parrot. We had our own sectional and all the booze we could drink. The fire show was right in front of us on the beach. Our second stop was more of a club. There was a line up to get in but we were given VIP treatment and again had our own section. We were also given bottles of good booze and lots of shooters. Our third club was another dance club but very different from the other dance club. We where dancing on tables and having a great time. Miquel was our host from Playacrawl. He made sure all of understood the in's and out's of Playa Del Carmen! One of our boys had a little too much and had to leave after the second club. Miquel made sure he and another one our our boys got back to our hotel safe and sound. Everyone in our group had an amazing time, especially the soon to be married bachelor. This is a awesome idea. It is a great way to not spend hundreds of dollars and to stay safe!! Miquel was amazing and made the experience exceptional

FANTASTIC!!!. Went for a bachelor party during U.S. Memorial Day Weekend. Miguel was our guide and showed us a great time. He was very patient and very helpful. We went to three venues on the 26th beginning at 10pm (a bit early, but nice to work our way into the fun with some drinks and mingling). We visited Blue Parrot for the Fire Show (cool), Mandala (very cool), & Pink Elephant (coolest - may have been the liquor that won us over at that point). We traveled about an hour away from Cancun to Playa del Carmen (about $115USD total for five ppl on a shuttle round trip). Jorge was the contact person (not the guide) who helped arrange the dates and was also very helpful answering questions. I will do this again and recommend to all.
Well worth the money.. Easy BookingGuides fun and respectfulGreat VenuesLots of drinksLots of drinks lolLots of funWell worth the money.Recommend itDid the Playacrawl Cancun too, same recommendation.

Great night, perfect Bachelorette party !. We booked last minute and they made sure they could accommodate us, we all paid online and I liked that each of my guesst could pay their own entrance that way I wasn't responsible for all of the reservations. We got picked up at our resorts lobby ron time, (we actually where a bit late, some girls just take too long getting ready, right Brandy) we arrived at 10PM in our first club Blue Parrot, at that time it was kind of slow but it was a Wednesday and kind of early so we were not surprised there was a fire show on the sand that was pretty cool. Second place we went to was a beach club too cant remember the name, we danced there we liked the dj he was playing more of hip hop and regeaton that we liked, some of the girls even got up on the bar to dance, by our third place Mandala was pretty full and the party was happening, by than we were pretty wasted lol this was the best place of all , very good music better service and we had bottle service in our table so that made even better the open bar. I would definitely recommend this if you are celebrating your Bachelorette party, we had a blast.

Disappointed. We were really excited about doing the Playacrawl based on the wonderful reviews and even for people who had been to Playa for several times before. This was our 3rd time back to Playa. Booking was easy and we met up at the meeting point on Wednesday night, still very excited about our night out. We were told there will be a bigger group then normal, we were fine with it. We went to the clubs zone to meet up with everyone and there was over 30 people more which they had to separate into two groups. There was a Bachelorette and Bachelor party in our group. We told our guide that we've been to Coco Maya and Blue Parrot twice already and was looking forward to visit the new clubs here. He said we will have a chance to go to some of them too when I pointed it out to him.We only got 3 drinks at Coco Maya and 3 at Blue Parrot per person and it was bottom shelf vodka, tequila mixed drinks or shots (no beers). There was a dedicated area to get the drinks and the line was so long due to it being "Ladies night", that means free entry and drinks for ladies in those clubs.We went to Coco Maya, Blue Parrot and one other club up the street that we haven't been too before. We had a VIP section for the Bachelorette & Bachelor parties and the rest of the Playacrawl people. Within 5 minutes about 10 other people from the dance floor came up to join our group, knocked down all the drinks (she was dancing on the couch next to the drinks table) and was getting way too crowded. Of course we didn't get to have our "unlimited drinks" there. We tried to stay as long as we could but only lasted for 30 minutes and called it a night.Overall, Playacrawl would be great for big groups or someone that has never been out to experience the night life in Playa. For $120 USD for two, limited on our drinks and been to 2 out of 3 clubs before, it was not worth the money for us. One of the guide was really wonderful, being attentive to everyone's needs, getting drinks for the large group and checking in to see if we were okay.

Great Night. This was a wonderful time. Not because of the open bar but because we had a chance to hit different clubs but better yet everything was taken care of from beginning to end. They took care of everything and even used a little "muscle" (j/k) when those not in our group came into our area. It was great. they were very helpful and I would use them again in a heart beat.

Night to remember!. Good times! Booking process fast and simple, meeting point on time, all you can drink as advertised, very good price if you plan to have more than a few drinks and go more than one place, the guide made sure we felt safe and had a good time, the groups are small which I prefer when doing crawls, in overall very good if what your looking for is to get to know Playa del Carmen's nightlife. I did the Playacrawl Cancun, had lots of fun there so decided to do the one in Playa del Carmen, had even more fun there, hope you guys do to.

Best Time EVER!. Honestly have to say that it was one of the best nights of my life. I live in Colorado and the nightlife is nothing like playa to begin with. Second, who can beat open bar at every place, and no cover with friendly people and awesome tour guides! Would definitely recommend to anyone who is looking to meet people and have a great and safe time!

Great Experience. I orginaly found out about this bar crawl online. I booked two spots for my sister and I and then two spots for my parents to come along. They have been long time visitors to Playa del Carmen but do not usually travel off the resort. I was orignally worried that my parents would feel out of place in the Playa del Carmen night life. However, if they did they did not show it our host Miguel did a great job making them feel included and talk to them throughout the night so they did not feel out of place. He also kept the party going for the rest of us and always had a table for us at each location. Having the wristbands at each bar was great! The only downside was that the bars we went to did not have a lot of options for drinks Rum, Tequila and Vodka mixed with OJ, Cranberry, or Coke and Beer. However, it was still well worth the money and a very enjoyable experience. I would definetly do it again.

Playacrawl was lots of fun, whether your first time there or 8th. We have been visiting Playa for about 7 years now. We stay in town on most trips & know our way around for the most part and really love the vibe there. We had never really gone to any of the dance clubs before, but have done our fair share of bar-hopping in Playa. This year, we had some friends who were in Playa for the first time, so we decided to do the Playacrawl. We had a great time! Everything was easy, from the booking process until the end of the night. Jorge was our guide for the night and we would definitely hang out with him again. If you are looking for a fun & carefree night out in Playa at a great value, whether it is your first time or 8th time there, check out Playacrawl.

Great time. This was our first trip to Mexico and we had no idea where to go at night in Playa and we probably wouldn't have ventured off the resort if we hadn't decided to do the Playacrawl. My boyfriend and I met Jorge our guide at the rooftop bar around 10pm. He was there waiting for us and got drinks for us right away. He said we were waiting for another couple who had gotten stuck at the airport, but they never ended up making it out in time. So basically, it was like we had our own private guide to take us around for the night. Jorge is great! He answered all our questions and told us a lot about the area. The first bar on the beach is pretty laid back. The fire show was entertaining and we didn't have to wait for drinks. The second club was the most fun. It ended up getting crowded right after we had been there for ten minutes. They really do know the best times to go everywhere. We spent most of the night dancing and drinking here. Jorge was always around if needed him for anything and let us do our own thing too. By the time we reached the third club I had already had plenty to drink. We didn't stay there long, our own decision, as this place was not really our speed. It is best for people who really like dancing and clubs. We were starting to get tired, so Jorge walked us to a taxi, and made sure the fare was correct with the driver. We said our goodbyes and had a safe ride back to our resort. We were sad to leave! Jorge is a cool guy and we would totally hang out with him if he lived near us! If you are questioning whether to do this or not, go for it. The price is great and you don't have to worry about handling money all night. The drinks were not watered down and we were able to get anything we wanted. It is totally safe and we would do it again if we ever go back to Mexico.

Best Girls Night Out Ever!!!!!!!. I booked this review a couple of days before me and my 2 girlfriends left to Playa del Carmen. Transaction was smooth and we got clear directions on where to meet up. We did however had a tricky time locating the meeting spot, we asked people in restaurants if they had heard of the bar where we were meeting at and no said the knew about it.Once we got there I recognized Jorge from all the pictures from TripAdvisor. He greeted us and answered all our questions and offered us drinks. Before we left we had already taken 3 tequila shots! The whole night night was fun, I enjoyed all three locations, each one different, but with great atmosphere. Drinks never stopped, and our group was fun and lifely, met new people. Sadly we only had a weekend trip at Playa, that's why we opted for the Playa Crawl tour. Great experience for a Girls Night Out!!!!!!!!!!! Thanks Jorge!

Best holiday we have ever had. We love you Playa Crawl :). My and my boyfriend where staying in an all inclusive resort for our one week vacation in Playa Del Carmen mexico. As we had never been to Playa Del Carmen before, we thought we better do some research into what was on offer. We wanted to have a great time and party so we decided to look into party crawls. After talking to people that we knew that had come here before, they told us that we should look into Playacrawl as they had had a blast with them while they were on vacation too.We ended up doing the bar crawl on the first night we got there which was Saturday night... all i can say is OMG what a fun night. We first me up with the guys that run the playacrawl at Geisha Bar where they we all super friendly and had an awesome party vibes. we all started drinking and having the best time ever. when ever our drink were almost empty the boys would be brining up more drink with out us even having to ask. We went to a few different bars and night clubs (all of which i can remember the names of from the first night lol) but it was so good. As we were staying in playa for a week we deiced to do the bar crawl again before we left. we ended going on it on the Wednesday and its was even crazier than the Saturday night... If there is anything worth doing in playa at night its Playacrawl for sure... I have never drunk so many drink before or been to that many clubs ever before in my life.Playa i love you, but i think i need a rest from the wild crazy party nights.

Awesome time!!!. We went on this Pub Crawl in Jan 2011. Met our guide at a designated spot and the fun began. He was always in the distance but there if we had any questions or concerns. Don't remember the ride back to the resort, but would recommend this tour.

Great time!!. We just came back from our trip to playa and we did the playacrawl, in resume we had a great time got wasted and made new friends.Our group was pretty small around 8 people but it was perfect we didn’t want a big group, we did it on a Saturday so all places where pretty packed, but we didn’t have to wait in any lines since our guide took us directly in.First Place was Blue Parrot very fun place the night was barely starting so we took it easy there, watched the fire show and that headed to our second place called mandala very nice club very nice music excellent service, drinks kept coming and coming, finally got to out third and last club called brahma, this is the most club ambient of all, there instead of going for our drinks our guide asked for bottles at our tables which was a great idea since it was kind of a hustle getting up top get drinks, although at this time don’t think we needed many more drinks.In all we had a great time, we recommended if you don’t know where to go or you never been out in Playa del Carmen, also the cost is much better if you plan to drink a lot, each drink is around 5 to 7 USD and cover fees around 10 USD so you make the math.Have fun and please say hii to our great guide Miguel he is awesome.

we were expecting more. Just got back from my trip to Playa Del Carmen. We went out on the Playacrawl on a Thursday night. I felt like the whole thing was a little unorganized. We didn't know that were already started with the Crawl. Their was no direction. We stopped at our first place and it wasn't anything special. Huge liter drinks with barely any alcohol. The place was some what of a dump! Second place we stopped at was the blue parrot. Getting there we received the wrong wrist bands. So we went to the bar for free drinks and weren't allowed to because we had the wrong wrist bands. Finally our host was able to get us the right wrist bands. Only to find out the open bar was in a private section of the club far from the rest of our group of ladies who came with us. They werent allowed because they didn't have the open bar wrist bands. Either way if you are a women or even traveling with ladies they dont pay cover or pay for drinks!! (on thursday) The next club we went to was mandal. Mandal was 10x better then the other places we went to. The staff was great and we got a private section on the balcony. This place was a true nightclub. Our crawl ended there. We thought we were heading to another places but that didn't happen. Overall i was expecting more with the clubs and our host. At least it was something to do.

Playacrawl was the best!!. I must say, of all the things we did in and around Playa Del Carmen, the Playacrawl was the best!! Second only to the cave swim we did ;) This trip was to celebrate my friends 40th birthday party and the only request she had was “to have the best birthday ever” – and that was made possible because of Playacrawl and, of course, Miguel and Xavier (our guides for the evening)! She felt like a Princess the whole time with VIP status everywhere we went. The service and attention that we received at all of the clubs was 5 Star and I believe that was all due to the connections your company and staff has. I hadn't been to Playa del Carmen since the 90's and I was shocked at how expensive everything is now (cover charges, drinks, food)...so considering that, the Playacrawl was a very affordable option for a night on the town.  I travel a lot and rely heavily on reviews myself so am sure that my positive experience will be appreciated by those considering the Playacrawl.

A night to remember!! Best barcrawl in the world!!. Just checking in with everyone who is going to do the Playacrawl. My wife and i just came back from our wonderful holiday and we had a great time. I have been on many barcrawls around the world and the Playa one is the best i have been on.We did the Playacrawl last Thursday it was a small group of around 15 people which was perfect for us as we didn't want a big crowd , we got to meet cool people that where doing the crawl too and actually got to talk to most of them.Our guide was excellent very attentive and fun he made sure our night was a fun one, and made us felt secure .We went to 3 places , at Blue parrot we got to see the fire show. There was not a lot of people but I guess we get where there early at 10PM. After and our favorite was the second bar, I think is called Mandala. The drinks are more than enough believe me lol they are telling the truth when they tell you all you can drink all night lol, you can get any cocktail (if you are into cocktails like me).Overall we had a great experience, we went out another night by ourselves and we spend more money and we didn't get nearly as drunk as we did the crawl night also not as much fun as we where concern about entrances, drinks, safety etc, so the crawl its definitely worth the money. Well hope you guys have a lot of fun and hope this helps, cheers.I have been a few times to playa del carmen and it has always been safe, even in the late hours, there is a lot of security everywhere and police. I just don't understand how some security guards from the third club on the barcrawl tried to mug some of the people on the barcrawl? probably these people were using drugs in the toilets or trying to buy some. In Mexico drugs are illegal so if youre up for the challenge go for it, but i wouldnt recommend it. To the person who wrote the bad comment about the Playacrawl i tell you: maybe you would ask your friend or husband to be more honest with you and tell you the whole story behind all this toilet mugging.

Lots of Fun and lots of drinking. We started from a different location but we had lots of fun. The people who were running it were very nice and did a great job of getting all of us from one point to the next. I would do this attraction again. Our only complaint was that there was only a limited time at certain locations. We were wanting to see the fire dancers at the Blue Parott and we had to leave before the show went on. Still it was a very fun time and would recommend it.

DO NOT RECOMMEND. I just came back from Mexico with 10 people celebrating my husbands 30th birthday.We read all reviews on this pub crawl and were looking forward to it seeing as it had such great reviews.The first 2 bars were fun, lots of drinks and great crowds, the last bar however is where we had our problems. At around 2:45 am 15 min before we had to leave, my husband and one other person from our group were mugged in the washroom by Mexican "security guards" who demanded that they pay them $100US or they would call the police. They pulled out little bags of cocaine and said they would tell the police it was theres unless they paid them. These guards followed us from the second bar we went to and our "guide" was speaking to them all night, so I am sure that he had something to do with it as well.......I know this doesn't happen to everyone but it ruined our night and I would use extreme caution when leaving the resort and going out at night, even the orgainized tours are not safe.

Playacrawl is a MUST!. Playacrawl is still relatively new, I believe it began last November and I have do doubt that this will soon be one of the highest rated attractions in Playa Del Carmen. I have been on booze cruises and bar hops in many different places and have to rate this one at the top of the list. For the price and personal attention from the host, Jorge, you are bound to have a fabulous and fun evening. Just remember to bring your camera so you can remember everything the next morning! The tour was $50 per person and well worth the money, we stopped at 6 or 7 bars, I lost count somewhere in the evening. For $50, all of the cover charges were taken care of and it was an open bar at most of the bars. Trust me, you will never be without a drink! A total of 8 people made reservations for the evening but it only ended up being 4 of us and we had a total blast. Jorge was very attentive to anything we needed, yet still gave us our space to venture out and see what we could get into. He was happy to tell us anything we wanted to know about the Mexican culture and was very knowledgeable about the happening places in Playa Del Carmen. Within an hour of the crawl, I felt like he was a long time friend of ours. We miss him and will definitely do the Crawl again if we ever make it back to Playa Del Carmen.

Best Bachelorette Party. We had a group of about 12 girls and we all agreed this was one of the best bachelorette parties we have been on. They picked us up from our hotel and Jorge took us around to about 5 bars/clubs. He always kept tabs on all the girls so we all stayed accounted for and felt 100% safe. We had an amazing time. Well worth the money because we waited in no lines and had free drinks at all the locations. No waiting in long lines at the bar either. The waitstaff would come to us. If we tried to go to all these places on our own and have drinks it would have costs 4 times as much with all the covers. It is a MUST DO in PLaya del Carmen. Have fun!
Excellent time!. Had a great time. Our guide was very professional, we felt completely safe and most importantly had a fantastic time. If you are not familiar with Playa del Carmen, this is a must.

Best bachelorette pub crawl ever. My maid of honor set this up for me and my girls. It was our first time bar hopping in Playa Del Carmen and it was truly amazing. Jorge, our guide, really took care of us. We went from bar to bar where he told us how much we could order and when it was time to go to the next one. He got us in the door without having to wait in line and got us out without having to push through the crowds. Everything was well organized and at the end of the night he made sure that we all got back into a van to go back to our hotel. Unforgettable experience.

A MUST...FIRST TIME, WON'T BE OUR LAST!!!. If you have NOT been to Playa Del Carmen then the Playa Crawl is a MUST!!! I have to say that this was one of the HIGHLIGHTS of our trip. We had never been to Playa Del Carmen and yes, we could find a ton of bars on our own, but the best part was that we found bars we might not have known about and made friends we would not have made.The bars varied from hidden and unique to Vegas Style but smaller scale. This will become one of our regular 'To Do's every time we go from now on. Thanks Jorge!!!! We look forward to seeing you again.

A BLAST!. Playa crawl was awesome....we went to some of the hot spots on Fifth Ave and I think everyone in our group had a blast. Met some awesome people that i plan to keep in touch with. Website may look a little sketch, but is completely legit and for anyone who is worried, fifth ave/the crawl was totally safe. Still can't believe one bar gave us our drinks as a liter!!! Jorge - you are freakin awesome, thanks so much for everything, we had so much fun!!

Looks sketchy but it's great. The website looks sketchy, the online payment looks sketchy, but it's completely legit. We didn't purchase our tickets in advance and we were still able to show up on a Saturday night (7 of us, all in our lower 20s). This is a MUST do for your first or second night. Free drinks for first hour and a half (although they were certainly watered down... take shots along with it), then you go to another bar, a lounge, few clubs, etc. Very worth the $40. You'll be shocked.
hit it you won't regret it! way worth the money!. it seems too good to believe; but it's fabulous! If I could spend most of my party nights having as great a time: I would never go anywhere else.

Unimpressed. Would never return. . We were recommended to check out this beach club along with Kool. After walking 15 minutes from our Airbnb to this beach we were so underwhelmed. The beach is super crowded. The water smells. There is music blasting super loud which isn't always a bad thing but definitely if you're planning to have a relaxing day at the beach.

Party time. Amazing place to hangout with your friends.Has an amazing pool, a little bit cold but with the sunny weather once you go in it feel great.By the pool you'll have access to the toilettes and a great staff service, the price you pay will be for drinks and food, btw the sushi is really good.A DJ will be playing throughout the day.
Excelent . So nice to get around with friends. Excelente food, nice view and awesome pool! Best dj for a cool evening.Must do if in Playa del Carmen.Try the shrimp quesadillas with guacamole!

AMAZING BEACH CLUB. Mamita's is one of the greatest beach clubs in Playa del Carmen,The beach itself is massive, with a pool that has been added on which has given it a 'south beach' feel to it! They have great music, the food is delicious and the wait staff is super attentive! They even have a kids section where families can enjoy a day at the beach in the kiddie pool with their children. I love going to Mamita's cause they always give that extra VIP attention which is always great! I would definitely recommend this beach club to anyone coming through Playa del carmen.

Checking Out Playa del Carmen Beach. We wanted to check out the beaches at Playa del Carmen, so went to Mamita's Beach Club for awhile. It cost a little over $5 USD per person. This allows you to use their facilities. They have a nice beach with umbrellas with beach loungers. Bathrooms, showers, bar, and pool. It's a very nice beach and the water is very calm. They waiter coming around for drinks on the beach plus if you want to daybed on the beach they have them for rent. You can get food at the bar area. Along the beach there are all kinds of rental, jet ski's, sailboats, banana boats, etc.So check it out if your in the area and like the beach.
Mamitas. The Best beach club in playa... Great music, and atmosphere. The wait staff is super attentive. Would go there anytime. It's a lot of fun.

totally recommended. I was in Mamitas with some friends spending our last summer holidays. we really loved the place , they always had good music and the prices in relation with the food and drinks were reasonable. I would totally recommend this place if you want to chill down next to the beach.

Best beach Club in PLaya del Carmen. The place to go.. Great beach club in the center of playa del Carmen. I have seen David Guetta, Earth Wings and fire, etc.. It is a big classic, The beach is also incredible. Great food, great place, great people. I love Mamitas.

The best Beach Club in Playa del Carmen!. Have been going to Playa del Carmen for several years and Mamitas Beach Club never stops to amaze me! It keeps growing and growing and the food there is amazing! Try the Ceviche or the shrimp stuffed avocados! They are to die for! I love that there are a lot of servers that have been there for a few years so it is great to see familiar faces each time we go! The new Pool and Bars are great too!!!
Best beach in Playa!. Always go to Mamita's when my friends come to visit from London. It's by far the best beach in Playa, comfortable beds, good service and the music is great!

Great vacation. Great time in Playa del carmen ans especially at Mamita s beach club!the service, the food and entertainment , everything is great.Thanks.to Federico Mazzoni for the attention to details and who made my time at the beach so much more enjoyable.i ll be back

Great place to spend the day( especially weekends). Mamitas is a great beach with nice amenities. Very nice music,amenities, pool. Showers, restrooms, food , drinks and great attentive service. This place is great for weekend people watching and can't be beat. Staff super friendly and my bill has never been off at all

International Beach Vibe. Service was good, with security and adequate beach service. Restrooms were clean and attended. Drinks were good, but did not order food. Birds are a problem, so beware of leaving any food uncovered, even for a minute. Beach is beautiful, and the music was very nice. We would return!

A good place on weekdays. This one of three Beach Club in Playa del Carmen; the place is perfect to relax and enjoy the clear waters on the weekdays( stay away on the weekend when all the locales take over the place ) Look for Leo,Anthony or Russell they give excellent service

Disappointing experience. Not the relaxing beach I was expecting. Too noisy. Drinks are overpriced. You can get access to the wifi only after purchasing food/drinks and the password only lasts one hour.

Not What It Was. The bathrooms are the nicest part of this beach club. The food is the worst and the drinks are just OK. Prices for water is outrageous . Now you must buy your lounge chair from a guy who sits near the bathroom. You cannot get there before 9AM or the rude Security will tell you to leave.
