What made the Coco Bongo was how utterly jaw-dropping it was and the atmosphere.It's with a heavy heart I give it 4/5, but would I go back. Silly question - of course I would, in a heartbeat.

Fantastic night out. Really enjoyed this - had gold member status and had speedy table service in VIP area - never once had to wait for a drink. The shows are amazing. Not a cheap night out but worth the money.
Best Club In Town.. Within walking distance of the hotel. Bar services is well worth the ticket price. Truly a great party atmosphere.

Great show!. We were told to visit on Monday as weekends are very busy and Monday is quiet ... Well it was hectic! Decided to book gold member which was good choice as we were on the balcony with table, chair, waiter who was brining drinks all the time :) Yes you need to wait an hour for the show however there is music and small show before so no drama and the main show - bloody hell amazing! No place like this in Europe! I would say definitely worth visiting for people 18 to 65!

Great Show but be prepared!. The show is amazing, but if you enjoy your drinks be prepared to wait for them, waiters earn their keep but no attention unless you willing to pay 130.00 for a bottle of Ketel One, but may be worth it if you want the attention and your drinks tended to. Packed house and difficult to get to restrooms! Amazing show though!

Best night out for ages . Didn't really fancy going thought that the price for gold members was too much and that it would be packed full of teenagers. How I was wrong I enjoyed more than my daughters got the gold service and never went with out a drink all night stayed till nearly 4 am brilliant shows brilliant atmosphere and the balloons where great for target practice. Get your self there no matter how old you are . 49 44 21 18 years of age .

Not worth the money at all at this location!. Packed, too many people are let in ! Definitely exceed the capacity allowed for the size of building. Horrid drinks, couldn't see show... Anywhere u try to stand to see the stage the security guard comes and moves you to another location you can't see. Don't waste your evening as money by going there. We left after30 minutes.

Excellent Night Out!. Brilliant night. The whole thing was great start to finish. We paid for the Gold members seating and it was worth it. Our Waiter was on the ball and my glass was never empty. It's a fun time with the floor show the highlight running from 2330 to 0300. Various singing/dancing acts meant there was never a dull moment. Recommend this to all.

Most amazing night in Mexico!!!. I went to coco bongo on a 'trip' though my hotel, we paid to go as a gold member which as totally worth the extra money. We had great seats up next to the stage and at the same level so you didn't miss anything, we had our own waiter all night who brought us drinks constantly without asking. The shows were brilliant especially the acrobatics and the effect the dancers put in is amazing. It is a must do thing in Mexico, If I go back I'll defiantly be going again. Top tip woman go round selling shots but if you ask your waiter and you are a gold member they are included in the price so don't buy any! Also you can have photos taken with The Mask and Beatlejuice but make sure you take some money to buy these as you can not take them on your mobile.

Good night out. I went to Coco Bongos with my husband on our honeymoon as we had been told it was an amazing night and there was a lot of hype about it. We booked through our travel agent so got VIP/Gold Member access and transfers to and from the hotel. I'd advise on doing this as there's less craning your neck to see the stage and you get seats rather than standing - the show lasted from about 11pm until 3am so it's worth having the seats. You also get waiter service with VIP access, our waiter was lovely and we didn't have to ask for drinks at any point he just kept bringing new ones when we were almost done. We tipped when we arrived and as we left so have some money for this.The show itself was good, the acrobatics were great, the miming was a bit cheesy at times as the people didn't know the words they were miming along to but all in all it was good fun and we both enjoyed it. The brief moments I spent on the dance floor were fun but a little claustrophobic so I preferred to dance in the VIP bit.The one thing we did find a bit cringy was the constant zooming in on boobs/bums on the big screen in between acts in the show. It was funny for maybe the first hour but after that it was a bit OTT.Our transfer home got us at 3.30am but if you haven't got transfers booked it's very easy to get a taxi as they are all waiting outside. We felt safe outside the club. We were told at the hotel standard taxi from Playa del carmen to our hotel in riviera maya was about 300 pesos but the guy there said 400/500 and not to pay more than 500 - so have extra money with you in case.Overall, I wouldn't say it was *quite* as amazing as all the hype but it was certainly a good and funny night out, worth doing.

The best night out ever!. If your on holiday in Mexico you must visit this club, it was the best night out we have ever had. Drinks are great! we had a VIP ticket which included drink service to our table which was great as the bar is jam packed! The entertainment is out of this world. We purchased our ticket through our hotel, I found it very helpful as the price included the transfers (by coach) to and from the Club.

The best club!. I was not expecting... this club to be the best club. It was the best club and best show hands down!! I would go back to Coco Bongo. I highly recommend to go VIP or Bottle service for table and seats. You will have a great time. The entertainment was off the charts!!

Must do . Great show, great night. There is so much going on it making the time fly by, very entertaining. We went for the gold member ticket we had great seats with a super view of the action our waiter kept us topped up all night. Our party was aged from 18 to 56 and we all had a fantastic time so don't think it's just for the young. Bit on the expensive side if you're not a drinker but a brilliant night all the same.

Fantastic night out!. We throughly enjoyed the night the shows were great but in particular the acrobatics were absolutely brilliant.... Very skilled performers! We were pleased we purchased the gold vip package which was worth the money. Much more spacious with designated seats and a fantastic view. Drinks were all included and were kept well topped up all night. All round a good night out definitely worth a visit.

Different. I didn't know what to expect when I arrived, it looked like a modern day gladiator arena, but when the show started I could not stop looking all round at the audience and performers. The staff worked hard all night long to keep us hydrated with drink and were always smiling. The 4 hours passed by very quickly due to the quality of the acts. An experience I won't forget in a hurry.

Coco Bongo Night. Coco Bongo was very entertaining and a must visit for people 18 and older. My favorite part was when they kept spraying cold air and confetti through the club. This made the temperature in the club very comfortable. This club is full on non-stop activities and fun!

Off the wall, insane fun. Wow, not quite sure what to say. Amazing, crazy, fantastic, just completely off the scale..... If you are looking for a good time in PDC I can't imagine there is anyway you won't have great fun at Coco Bongo. Having not been to a "nightclub" for many years we weren't sure about it when our builder in the UK mentioned Coco Bongo but then we met Anna at our hotel (Secrets Maroma) who was selling tickets. She explained to us that CB is more show than a noisy nightclub and convinced us that it would be the best night of our holiday and we should go for the gold package with seats and a table upstairs. Not a cheap choice with 7 of us (ages from 21 to 55) but just the best decision on all counts........ Anna met us for the private hotel transfer (30 mins from Maroma) and escorted us to the queue and then upstairs where she helped us get just a fantastic table facing the stage. If you staying in PDC and buy tickets directly if you can go for the gold package, get there early (10pm for the 1130pm show start) & get yourself a good seat and then JOIN IN!!!!!If in any doubt - JUST GO!!! We all had the best best time - plan a quiet day the next morning as the show doesn't finish until 3am but it's so so worth it. 21 & 25 year old student nieces and nephew think it was the best night out they've ever had and us "grown up's" aren't that far behind. Thanks for convincing us Anna. Brilliant brilliant night. Final suggestion, tip the barman / waiter when you arrive and then again half way through and the drinks will just keep coming. Have I said what a fabulous night it was??

Don't do Playa del Carmen go to cancun. Much smaller than Cancun. Horrible service in Playa del Carmen. Bought tickets from CoCo Bongo tour booth and was misinformation. Missed 1 of the 3 clubs because pick up was not written inorrectly no compensation. Very disappointed with service from Javier and Marrissa. If you never been to one of their locations the show would please a novice.

Best disco ever. This disco/theather is unbelievable. Best disco I have ever been to. I can fully recommend to pay the 70$ entry fee. You have all you can drink. Don't miss to tip the server, then he comes quite often to you. With all the shows it was an unbelievable night. Even if you don't drink alcohol!

A really fun night!!. We had a blast at Coco Bongo. There is no other night club that will compare to this one. It's so much fun. There are live performances, dancers, and really good music! The night we were there, they played a lot of old jams! They play many different genres. Really fun! Waiters and hosts are also really really nice. Loved it! Highly recommend it !

Top entertainment!. Go for Gold! Vip is a must. Best seats available on level with stage. Superb acts and non stop entertainment. A mix of musical meets disco! The servers make sure you are not eithout a drink the whole time. Courteous and very efficient. Even the ladies in the loo, wiped seat for you and handed you paper towels without the pressure of making you feel you had to tip them. A definate must do if you like a lively evening. Beware though it will not be an early night. Got back at 5 ish!
Insane!. This place is a visual feast! Make sure to book vip as it is a long night (9.30 to 3.30) the entertainment is unreal and I would definitely go back!
A blast for all ages!!. We went to Coco Bongo with a big group (55 people) age 18 - 65. Everyone had a great time, even the most skeptical! The atmosphere and the shows are amazing!!

Best night out - Go for Gold!. What a night! Not the cheapest but awesome! We bought Gold tickets which gave us better seats and inclusive drinks.Coco Bongo is more show than nightclub but they blend the amazing acts in with some good music to bop to. The show is outstanding and the Gold level seats gave an outstanding view even from the sides. The general admission ticket puts you on the dance floor and you would struggle to see up (20ft) to the main stage although some of the show happens down there.The inclusive drinks flowed via waiter service and were premium beers/spirits....sore head this morning! All in all a well worthwhile event.
Total madness- not to be missed. One of the craziest places I've been to. Night club come show extraordinaire. Featured in the film The Mask. Hilarious fun.

Wildest Place Ever. This Place has to be the most fun nightclub in the world. We have been 2 times, the first time we were in VIP with an excursion from our resort. It was great. The 2nd time we went on floor level, WOW, this was even more nuts. My wife got on the bar and danced, i drank a ton watching the show. It had to be the most fun ive ever had in my life.

Complete madness!. Fantastic night! So much going on! We went VIP well worth the money! Enjoyed the show these guys have so much energy! Loved the music and dj after show! Will definitely be visiting again!

Fire Hazard RIP OFF!!!. FEE $70 USD for open bar extremely crowded you can never make it to the bar. Filled over the capacity it can hold, its a fire hazard dangerous conditions basically a death trap. I regret attending such a horrible experience NEVER AGAIN!!! They also loss power due to the tropical storm stood online for almost 2 hrs, they continued having brown outages. I'm currently trying to get a refund the excursion company is giving me a difficult time and refusing to do so. I'm going to continue my battle hopefully someone can help me a come to terms with a compensation for my waste of time and exposing my friends and myself to such horrendous conditions.

If you want to experience a fantastically incredible night..... Wow what can we say, we were advised to go here by my son, so we did but we did buy the VIP tickets well worth every single penny the show started at 10:30pm yep very late but I tell you what it was incredible stunts were done in the air on the stage, the drinks simply flowed all night and they were the real thing no local watered down beverages here, trust me my head told me so the next day :) we finally left at 3:30am but the show still continued - you cannot go to Mexico and not visit Coco Bongo.... :)
Best Club. I can only say WOW, if you go to Playa Del Carmen you should go here. Best club I have ever been to. We couldn't stop taking about it the following day.

Cocoa Bongo Playa Del Carmen was Terrible. Cocoa Bongo was TERRIBLE! It was dangerously over crowded, too crowded to dance. The wait staff was rude and pushy. We decided to escape when someone was urinated on right on the main dance floor! I was totally appalled! That incident was the final straw! When we tried to leave early, there was an entire team there that tried to force us back in. We were refused a refund. It was colossal waste of money and time.

Amazing place. We went to see if all the hype was real and it is.we only had 3 hours in here on our excursion but what a 3 hours, the atmosphere is just electric the whole place is just having the best party you have ever been to. The shows and performers are really good next time we go we will have the VIP night as we wanted to stay until the end we had waiter service for drinks but they are very busy so it's not about the drinking but the experience

Must do! Great night. Amazing night out with my partner and friends we met on our trip across central america. Service was great and the shows were even better!Where else can you get a midget dressed as The Mask fly across a room then free pour tequila into your mouth until you can't swallow anymore! 10stars well worth the money!

Best night out of my life! . A million times better than I ever imagined it could be truly the best night out of my life! You have to visit here! We did the gold package (VIP) and am glad we did. If your 18 and love clubbing you will be fine in normal. Me and my boyfriend are late 20's and not huge party animals, but VIP was brilliant. We had seats and a table and our waiter was fab, we were never without a drink. Show was outstanding, I have never seen anything like it, and what fun!! Coach pick up was 3:40am, we were back in the hotel for 5. Fabulous night, I will defo come back!!!

Worst night in Playa. It was the most ridiculous low budget rip off piece of crap I've seen... They try and rip you off at any chance they get and the first hour is full of big screen boob shots of the audience. Unless you get gold vip there isn't any point going... even then it's a terrible rip off of songs and musical numbers that aren't even sung (I assume not paid for with licensing). There are a few acrobats but nothing that can't be seen by a local arts festival back home... It's a mess of drunk tourists that should be avoided..massive tourist trap!!!

Fab show. When we booked to go to Mexico this summer, we were told by friends that we had to go to coco bongos, it's quite expensive, we were offered 3 different packages, the cheapest was about £67 per person, there was no perks to this ticket, picked up from hotel n brought home, standing room in club, free drink, long queues outside !! Gold package was about £135 per person, that included transport there n back, fast pass into club, seats with table free drink n ur own waiter !!! We decided to think about it before buying tickets as there was 4 of us !!!! Then we were offered a in between package think they called it platinum?, £83 per person, this included transport, a faster entry into club, seating n a bottle of grey goose vodka(our choice of bottle) so we booked to go !! Picked up from hotel at 9.45 n home at 3.30am !!! Queued for a little but not too long, thank god as there was lots of people waiting to get in, we were taken in, handed random shots n showed to our seats, there was 3 levels . . . . First impression was where the hell is everyone gonna go Our seats were steps, with a tiny cushion that wud fit one person, I sat on the step, my pal on the seat n our hubbys stood behind , the place filled up quickly, our waiter was fab for about the first hour then he didn't seem to bother, our hubbys complained to one of the bouncer type guys regarding wot they first Thot was a drink poured over them only to turn round to see a female havin a pee into her glass but obviously missing, disgusting , she obviously didn't want to lose her space while standing if she went to the toilets, the girls manning the toilets were fab , the bouncer said he would go n have a word but that obv didn't happen !!!! Apart from that negativity THE SHOW THEY PUT ON WAS FAB , well done !!! We left around 2.30 as we had, had enough alcohol by then, we got a taxi to take us bk to our hotel !!!! Would we go again if we were back in Mexico , yes we would but would defo buy the GOLD ticket , more expensive but by far better seating n service

Great experience - big crowds. Great shows and experience- visually and audio. Very fast paced environment with non stop action. Good drinks and the servers do a great job floating around getting refills. The place gets packed quickly and very crowded. No dance floor to speak of- place is smaller than expected. But a fun experience and well worth the wait and crowds. On a special note- if you can find an open seat grab it. They do offer seats for a price, but seating is not reserved unless paid for. We found a couple seats and sat there all night.

Amazing Show!. I've been to Coco Bongo in Playa del Carmen 3 times in my life and this has to be one of the best places for a night out in Playa del Carmen and in Cancun. The show is amazing me and my friends had an amazing time! Definitely worth the money :)

Had a blast!. We got the VIP so we had a great seating and our waiter was awesome! Didn't have a empty glass all night!... The shows were great as well along with the music... Lots of beautiful people there as well!

Fantastic show and excellent customer service.. My boyfriend and I bought VIP tickets online for the Friday night show. Unfortunately my boyfriend was sick on the Friday and we couldn't go. I emailed the ticket office asking if it would be possible to swap to the Saturday night. We were emailed back straight away and also we were able to get VIP tickets for the Saturday night instead. This was above and beyond what I expected of the night! Excellent customer service. The VIP tickets are well worth it. We arrived and got to skip the queues and were escorted to our seats which had a brilliant view of the show. The show itself was fantastic. It was one of the highlights of our stay in Playa el Carmen especially when combined with the excellent customer service!

Fantastic Crazy Madness. The craziest, greatest night out we've ever had. We paid for gold member ticket which includes drinks ( till 3.30am ). Our waiter was fantastic we never once had an empty glass. The show from start to finish was amazing. Booty cam is hilarious. A fantastic night out.
Not!. $80 cover charge to drink Barton's vodka??? I think not!!! I did not go in. Charge me $80 and let me choose my drink. Barton's cost $10 for a gallon! That's absurd

Amazibg. Great and varied fun and thrilling entertaining night!!We went gold member and would not have done it any other way! So glad we didDrinks kept coming and they were not stingey!Great night! Would do it again if our bodies would allow us!!!!

Night out on honeymoon . What can I say, I have never seen a place like this- AMAZING. Me and my husband are not into night clubbing but we had heard so much about this place- it was fantastic. Neither of us have seen anything like it, a nightclub vision with a extra spin on it. It will suit all ages from 18+. Music- modern and old, a show, performances, acting and so so much more.  Words can't describe this crazy place- go and see it and you will be amazed
Birthday celebration . Always awesome!!! This place is like Vegas on steroids. Nonstop drinks music and entertainment. Well worth the money.

Great entertainment. Had a great night at Coco bongos the entertainment is 2nd to none. Only a few little negatives we paid for diamond package and got a table for 4 people but it was hardly that!! A tiny little table just up steps off the floor!! Would of paid more if I knew that there was 2 levels above us and people stood spill King drinks on you from above!! It was very jam packed but that wasn't even an excuse for a person up above us blatantly pissing into a glass. Be warned!!

What a night!!. You've seen promo videos, you've heard the hipe, your read the reviews. Well they aren't half a good as this place actually is!!!Me and my girlfriend recently visited Mexico and has already heard about coco bongo and wanted to visit it. Also in the hotel before the evening entertainment there was a short promo video. All of these things led us to believe it was going to be good and we were still amazed. We paid around £70 each with our holiday rep which gave us VIP. For this we got a shorter que, our own table on the balcony with our own waiter and unlimited free drinks after 10:30. Door open to VIP at 10, we started queuing at 9:35 and were very close to the front so we were among the first in with the best seats. The main show didn't start until 11:40ish but that 1:40 flew by. The show. Wow! Too many different shows to mention but our favourites included the Michele Jackson, tron, cirque du soleil type with multiple acrobatics, Gun n roses, Star Wars with Jedis & Darth Vader flying though the air. Each show is around 15 minutes long so the variety is amazing. Between each show is around a 15 minutes where the music is turned up and air cannons, ticker tap cannons come alive, at one point thousands of balloons were dropping from the sealing, it's just mental!As a VIP you are still able to go down on to the floor but having your own table was much better as you are there for a long time and having our own waiter was brilliant! He kept us supplied with branded drinks with reasonable measures. Once I tipped him a 100 peso if our drinks were less than a third full we'd have fresh drinks, another 100 peso and he'd bring the branded bottle to me and fill the glass as I wanted, then top up with coke so the extra few pounds goes a long way. Also when we left we felt like our waiter was genuinely grateful and appreciated the little money we gave him, but at no time did we feel obliged or obligated to. Me and my girlfriend aren't the clubby type but we loved Coco Bongo and have recommended this place to everybody!

Fun except for the gratuitous misogyny. It's all a bit crazy at Coco Bongo. The theatrics are good, the gymnastics amazing and the music is fantastic. But the theatrical performances are very kitsch and the comedic numbers involving a Beetlejuice and The Mask parody don't work. The drinks are free and watered down (I was not drunk despite continuous refills of 'tequila' sunrise). Also beware: the drink you first order is the drink you'll be served all night. We paid extra for the Gold Member service: not sure if this was good value for money. Maybe next time we would buy a bottle on the dance floor which gets you a side table instead. Also the show is far too long at close to 5 hours. But really the biggest turn off (speaking as a man here) is the gratuitous shots on a big screen up women's skirts, down their tops, and round their behinds. The women didn't seem to mind, and I got the joke but it wore thin after the first 20 times.
Great!. Loved the shows and the way they keep people entertained all night! This is a must bifocal you're in the area.

WOW!!!. Four of us ladies went on a tuesday night, it cost us 10$ paid at our hotel for transportation and then 60$ at coco bongos for admission. this incudes open bar..you can pay dollars, peso's, or credit card. we arrived at about 945pm long lines but we got in just fine. They did proof so beware if underage.they have all different packages you can get, tables and seating, dont know how much that costs..but the place is not large and there is a stage right in the middle of the floor, there are tons of employees around . Had no idea what to expect but OMG it was fantastic. It was not like any club i've been too. you dance alittle and watch the show, which is wonderful and exciting.we were luck enough to get pulled to go up onto the semi second level. some gentlemen that had table reserved welcomed us to their area. if we didnt have that space to stand and dance.... i dont know how happy i would be ... the lower floor level is packed. i don't know how those people got any drinks all night??? wear comfortable shoes. you will be standing all night lots of the ladies wore flat sandles.It's defiantly a must do LOVED IT!!!!

best club in the world. if you want to be amazed for 5 hours, this is the place for you..absolutely everything from the security, the show and of course the liquor is the best., and when you leave drunk you must go to the place across the street for the best tacos in town..I guarantee it 100%....

Love It!. I've been clubbing quite a lot in London and other countries around the globe but Coco Bongo has to be by far the best night I have ever been on. Anyone who visits Mexico needs to go to a Coco Bongo! The show is for anyone of any age, everyone can enjoy! I would highly recommend the VIP option as the service is so much better for just that little bit of extra money!
Adults only! They check ID's. Amazing all-inclusive experience! I call it a can't miss! Get in line early - be prepared to dance a little, drink a bunch more, enjoy everything!

25th wedding anniversary . Decided to go to Porto del carmen to see the show at coco bongo and we weren't disappointed.We decided to go vip package which included transfer there and back and entrance to show and all inclusive drinks package which aee all named brands.It cost about £200.00 and was worth every penny, this is one of the best shows ive ever seen and it has everything.I would recommend this show it finishes about 3.30 in the morning The waiter eduardo looked after us all night, didn't even have to ask for drinks he just kept bringing them.If you want to see a fanrastic show of music lights and trapeze artists gi and see this show.5 stars.
Great Fun. Great Fun Very Entertaining Although Gold Member Didn't Really Seem That Special As You Are Very Crammed In.

Holiday excursion . A totally mad but great exciting night to make your holiday totally memorable and lots of surprises along the way you will be talking about it for weeks after go along and make your break in the Caribbean complete

Best show in the Mayan Riviera. If you are interested to enjoy not only a night club but a place with a great show, then you should visit CocoBongoThere are impersonators like Bruno Mars and great performances like "Chicago" the movie.

Worst experience ever. If you haven't been to a cocobongo before, its ok. First off, we paid $100 plus for a couple. An actual bus picked us up at 9:30pm since it was sooo many people going. Arrived at the bus station in town, yes the bus station and walked a few blocks to the club. OMG, the line was ridiculously long. Mind you, if you don't have a vip, upgrade, or anything, be prepared to wait in line for more than an hour. I waited 90 minutes. Upon getting in, you're greeted with a drink. Probably the only drink you will get all night. Mexico apparently doesn't believe in capacity limits because that place was so jam packed. If you don't mind elbowing people or getting elbowed then its ok. We tried to walk through the bar down the main platform but oh no, there was no room. Guards try to light the way but there is literally no way to get through without pushing people. There are tables, sit down areas, but if you didn't pay $300 plus for vip or bottle service, you don't get to sit. Not only that, after so often they blow confetti every once in a while, and the smallest men come and try to sweep it up. It was the worst place ever. The show however is good. That is the one and only thing I enjoyed. Everyone can see it since it is a big screen and a higher dance floor. If i could take it back, I would save my money. This was not at all for me or my husband.
WOW. What a great night. This show was incredible. The music, the performers, the drinks overall an unbelievable night

Second Visit - Not Again. Went with a wedding group of around 20 on a Thursday night. Compared to my last visit, this one was totally disappointing. As we had pre-booked a group, we were told an area would be reserved for our group. What we weren't gold was that this was in the nose bled area way at the top, in the back row at the very end. This made it totally impossible to see anything of the show, even when you stood on he seat. The video screens were only partially visible, so not much help there.Luckily we were right next to the bathroom so at least we didn't have to push through the crowd to get one. Bad news is that this also meant we were one of the last to get anything to drink. Think I was able to snag around 4-5 beers tops for an "open bar" ticket, which made the ratio of cost to drinks very high.Other reviewers comments on the shot girls are spot on: pushy, annoying, and irritated when you ask why you need to pay $5 for something that should be included in an open bar ticket.What I could see of the show was great, although it was 90% the same as the first visit six years ago. The opening, Phantom of the Opera, is fantastic: music pumped, great dancers, and seeing them fly through the air on cloth ropes is a highlight. Being where we were, one highlight was getting to see the stage set up for the numbers, definitely not something everyone gets to see and quite fascinating.Pros:- All inclusive drinks, if you're near the bar- The show is well worth the price of admission, if you come early to get a good spot- Security doesn't tolerate trouble, they are there to ensure your safetyCons:- The place is oversold, always; you can't even walk at times. Can be claustrophobic at times with a lot of people pressing into you to get a better view- Wait staff are great, but the customer to staff ratio is really high meaning you'll wait for drinks- Shot girls are really annoying, paying for something that should be part of your ticketSo, should you visit? Yes, at least once. If you get there early to get close to one of the bars where you have a great view of the stage you will really enjoy it. Otherwise, the experience may be different. Are the gold tickets worth it? Can't say for sure as both times was on a regular ticket.

Night to Remember . Show was amazing the acts are really good and the atmosphere is electric ... Only downside is it's really busy no matter what day of the week you go . Would recommend this trip to younger generation but we thoroughly enjoyed it and were 50 yrs young

Not worth it.... For regular price tickets you have to stand for 4-5 hours (if you make it through) on alcohol soaked benches. Ladies who go dance up top get air blasted up to blow up their skirts. Drinks are "free" with entry, but take forever and are just terrible. Its just a cabaret show, NOT A NIGHTCLUB, as they claim it to be. Waste of money is the bottom line. Bars around town are way more fun and cheaper.

Awesome night club, great shows!. This is definitely the most popular nightclub in Playa del Carmen. The music is great and they have multiple shows going on throughout the night. The shows are amazing and it's a great party atmosphere all in all. You'll have to wait in line for a while, and it's going to be crowded and tight to move around but it's definitely worth it!

WILD. if you are looking for a wild unforgetable night, cocobongo is the place for you. It is fun and entertainment is incredible. Alcohol is not very good, which gets you drunk in 2 seconds. I went like 5 times during my trip. I LOVED IT.

Brilliant but can see why there are some bad reviews. We booked gold member tickets through Thomson and although transport was included we were advised to get a taxi in and queue early to get better seats which we did and we had very good seats with a table so we're not disappointed. They were quite expensive at $130 per person but you get free drinks all night and transport there and back so worth the money.Once sat down the show starts after about an hour and a half so it's more of a club for the first part. Once show starts there are some really quite good acts with silk ropes and lots of acrobatics but there are a few 'gap fillers' which are just people dressed up as pop stars dancing to a music video which got a bit samey but like I said they were really just gap fillers and time to let the main act people change into their different outfits.Drinks were flowing all night from the waiter, we had a guy named William who was very good at bringing us drinks before ours were empty so we never had to ask. There are girls who come round offering shots but we didn't have any due to them being $5 a shot. The shot girls are quite insistent and do keep asking again and again but we politely said no each time.Toilets in this place were very clean, on my first visit the toilet assistant wiped the seat and everything but I refused to let her do it again as I don't believe people should be made to do that for others and I was a bit uncomfortable with it. She was very lovely and made sure you were happy and having a good time.Only downside to the evening really is that the Camera man has an obsession of sexually objectifying females so if you are not ok with having your breasts and bum zoomed in on for everyone else's entertainment you will probably be pretty unhappy for the most part. Men ending up grabbing their partners and sticking their fingers up at the camera man in the end. I felt this just went a little too far, funny for the first few times but after 4 hours of constantly picking on the same people it was too much. There were some who played up to the camera and maybe they should just stick to zooming in on them?? We left early in the end as my chest had been on show more times than I care to remember and I had been asked to go dance on stage one too many times. I had been polite throughout in saying no but they just kept asking again and again and I felt a bit uncomfortable. However if you like being the centre of attention then go wearing something revealing and you'll be dancing on stage before you know it with a camera displaying everything. I can imagine if you are out with the girls to have fun then this would be perfect but if you're going as a couple and you just want to have a good night the attention can be too much. Based on the show, the night out and the service I would give this place a 5 and I would recommend going as it is a good experience but we would not return ourselves.

GREAT FUN.... Coco Bongo is a great night club/show filled with GREAT entertainers, good fun and lots of booze. This is not a typical night club, it is more of a show that mixes in dancing etc between acts. The atmosphere is crazy fun...BUT be prepared to be squished and "touched" all night. In this place fun is KING but there is NO such thing as personal space LOL...go...you will LOVE it!!!

5th time in only 3 trips that good. AMAZING!!Went twice in 2014, twice in 2015 and once this trip, 2016We always go Gold Member so there was only one night available during our trip this year. A have to see place.
Dance the night away. Went via thomsons brilliant night did the bar crawl first and then coco bongos would have loved to do again but didnt have time

So much fun!. So much fun! An all night party, rest up before you come and make sure you get the upgraded gold package so you have a seat/space otherwise you will be standing all night in very crowded/cramped spaces. The show is absolutely amazing and it goes on ALL night long. If you are looking for a good night out with friends, come here!

Good atmosphere. 2nd time at CoCo Bongos - Cancun 2 yrs ago and now this one. The shows have not changed to much but still a 'buzzin' night out
Brilliant atmosphere.
Bar . Great place to have fun. you will enjoy it, closing time 5 am make sure you have a ride back to you hotel.

Fun. Went on a Sunday night. Place was so packed I could hardly move. Seemed to be packed beyond a safe capacity. Otherwise it was fun. Drinks and the performances were good. I was surprised at how quickly drinks were served.
March 2015. We had amazing night here , recommend it definitely , we did thomas cook bar night ending up here , if you go to mexico you have to go , we are gonna go back to here again .

Take 'The Bongo Tour'. We took The Bongo Tour. Which go you access to two other bars and no line and private area at Coco Bongo.
The Coco Bongo club, was absolutely amazing. It was like nothing I had ever seen before.

Nightmare. Worst experience of my life and booking via the pool guys at the princess riviera a bad mistake
Rip off and tables if you can call them out rubbish ., watching poor miming all night however we left very early

Great night out! . We had such a great night at coco bongo! We would 100% recommend buying the Gold ticket! Best seats and unlimited drinks bought to you all night! Tip your waiter at beginning of night! Goes a long way! Snippets of west end shows, films and tribute acts transformed on stage, perfect for all ages, there was 9 of us aged from 18-67! All of us thoroughly enjoyed the night! Show started at 11.30 and finished at 3.30am!! It then turns into a nightclub with a dJ!TIP: If you are on the top level it can get a little chilly from the blast of aircon so maybe take something to keep you a bit warmer!

AMAZING. This is the most amazing and fun club experience we have ever done. Down side is the lines are long and the inside is packed elbow to elbow. Now having said that we did find out for a few more dollars go vip. You get to skip the line and you get a table. It is an amazing time and still didn't feel tired. Well until the next day ha ha. GO DO IT.
the best & outrages show ever. We paid as Gold members, shown to our table, treated so well, drinks served all the time until 3am.I will not ruin the show for you, but you must see it

Greatest Club in the World!!!. This is the best club I have ever been in my life. I have never seen anything like it. It's action non stop.. You feel like a kid in here watching the show. With the batman and robin skit and the dancing midget it's great. They kept giving us drinks all night with the open bar deal. It was very crowded, but not hot at all. They would spray this cool mist to cool down the place from time to time. There is no smoking in the club which is good. You have to go before 10 pm or you will not get a good spot on the weekends. I didn't try the VIP deal and was perfectly fine on the floor. Everyone should try this club at least once in your lifetime. There is nothing out there like this. The owners have figured out how to create the most perfect club in the world. What else can I say that has not already been said! You just have to go and see for yourself!

Non-stop drinks and entertainment. This place is a major production. Never a dull moment. If you don't like being wedged in by a bar, you might want to consider the gold seating. This place was a blast. My only knock is against the shot girls. The charge 5 bucks for a small shot and constantly come back around begging you to buy another. Every one I spoke with was aggravated with the girls being too pushy. Other than that, it was a great experience.
Madness. No words can really describe this place nor can they prepare you for the experience you will have!!!

Coco bongo . Oh my days - the best night we had all holiday - go VIP gold and have a table - book with coco bongo reps only , they have access to the best locations in the club - such a good night and drinks included with the cost and waiters constantly coming over - private toilets too - excellent staff and very safe

Amazing. This is a must for anybody over 18. It's not cheap but it's worth it. We went Gold Member package, this included our coach travel to & from, entry and drinks, you also get a seat. As a gold member you virtually go straight in (without queueing which can be a long time). You have waiter service all night, as our glasses got to the last 1/3 there was another drink to replace it. The night is for all ages. DON'T MISS THIS

You HAVE to go. This place is sensational. Sure it's not cheap on face value, but pay for a goldmember ticket, it's worth every penny. You will get your money's worth, and then some! This place can only be described as a crazy mix of club vs West end show... but it delivers it flawlessly. Great fun, great drinks and just total mayhem! LOVE IT!!!!

Brilliant night out! . Our night at Coco Bongo was definitely the best night of our holiday. We paid extra for gold member tickets which allowed us to sit above the crowds and have our drinks brought directly to our table. I would definitely recommend paying extra as it gives you a much better view of the show and means you don't have to miss a single second of it getting drinks at the bar.

Crazy coco bongo 🎉🎉. Everyone needs to experience coco bongo at least once in their life! Me & my boyfriend had an absolutely fabulous time!!! VIP is definitely worth paying for, You get a better view of the show and seats to sit down where as if you pay normal price your on the dance floor...we Had unlimited free drinks and our waiter was excellent!! He kept coming round every 5 minutes to check if we were ok and to see if we needed anything. All in all brilliant night, good music and fantastic shows If you go make sure you take your camera!!!
Fab. Really enjoyed coco bongos it's a must if you are in Mexico great show and disco must do gold member for the views

Enter at your own risk! Horrible! Fire hazard!Can't see due to too many people packed in!. First went through Apple, did not get what we paid for. So paid more for offered upgrade, again did not get what was promised. Was promised open bar, there wasn't. Was promised seats and table, there was not. Overal review-Great fire hazard as multi-levels with only one way to exit. Smoking on small balcony that is not an exit, but it one story up and very narrow. The cold air/oxygen that was blown in felt good considering so many bodies packed in but so much confetti clogged the already packed floors. The stages probably had good show but with so many people pushing there was no clear was to see it. I want to stress again if there were a fire people would die. Too many bodies with too little space and exits.

Crazy! Go once to say you have been . The show is great! They give you a shot and a drink as soon as you walk in the door. It's so crowded and crazy! Pay for a table if it's important to you that you see the show. The best entertainment is outside after the club is over! Young kids who don't know their limits will be stumbling out. Hilarious!!!
WOW!. Do not miss! Gold VIP well worth the money. Fantastic night out. Part show part nightclub with party atmosphere all night.

Worst experience. This place was entertaining but overall a waste of money. It was too crowded to even get past the bar. The rest of the 20 minutes we were there were spent moving from spot to spot because we kept getting pushed and shoved. The 'security' guards were absolutely no help. We tried to get a table because we saw there were plenty available and were told they were reserved for 'members'. I went, I saw.. And I'll never go back.

Don't put your life in their hands. I will never go near that place again .If it was in England it would be closed down on safety. So over crowded got hurt the staff didn't care less The only one that did was one of the bouncer he let us out .It is a death trap waiting to happen. If a fire broke out there would be lots of casualties because there are hardly any exits

Show stopper of a night out. The only way to go is VIP, worth every penny. We booked this night out with our hotel and our pick up was on time. The entry was quick and efficient and you are taken to your VIP area. We couldnt of got a better area as it was next to the stage. Our Pre ordered drinks arrived within minute's. The server and support staff were very attentive through out the whole evening. The music and show's were fantastic and a must to visit. The venue had a great party atmosphere. For someone thats works in the nightclub industry i cant recommend this night out high enough.

We went on the Bongo Tour. Very cool place and the shows were amazing. We went on the bongo tour so we went to two other places first, then when we got to Coco Bongo we were taken right up to the third level. I personally would not have done it any other way because I don't like big crowds but from the top level it wasn't bad at all. The service was very good.

Worst night out. If you go here then I highly recommend you book with your rep, I've been to coco bongos in cancun 4 years ago and had an amazing time, the place is huge. We tried coco bongos in playa del carmen, booked with the coco bongos ticket sales guy round the pool. Told us the weekend is better. What he didn't tell us is unless you book a table you won't be able to move. We got injured, pushed around by staff, was not allowed to stand anywhere. We had to leave after 50 mins of being in there. They had double the capacity so if there was a fire you would get crushed. The place is tiny. We spent 4 hours in a pharmacy. They helped my aunts swelling go down on her feet. Coco bongos promised us they would deal with this. All we wanted was a refund as the night ended up costing us more in taxis. We was at ocean maya royale and had a week left and still we have had no result. It's now been 3 weeks since we went out, back in England and broken promises that coco bongo would still deal with us when we left. We have been ignored. All they care about is your money, it's a health hazard and I will be taking this further as I visit Mexico nearly every year.
Mexico Holiday. It was an experience, show was good, more for the younger generation but heh, when in Mexico! Felt a bit claustrophobic in the club itself.

Fantastic . Absolutely amazing definitely lived up to its name. Go VIP as it's the best sevice you can get. Well worth the money please tip your waiter as they work so hard to please you. Even the lovely women In the ladies toilets are amazing. They even wipe the seat before you go in love them.

Thomson Bar Crawl - Goldmember . Coco Bongo is a must see if ever travelling to Mexico. We booked the bar crawl with Thomson where there were approximately 30-40 of us and we went to 3 of the bars before heading to Coco Bongo. All our drinks were included and we paid approx $80 per person.This included the Goldmember package where you view the shows at Coco Bongo from the balcony. It is standing, no seats but you have staff coming around asking for your drinks. And it wasn't over crowded on the balcony.The show is incredible and so atmospheric. They have tribute acts such as Queen, Elvis, Madonna and Cirque du Soleil style performances. We only spent 2-3 hours here as part of the bar crawl, however the show does last much longer than this. I think 2-3 hours was more than enough time opposed to watching the full show which you can also book and it is more expensive. But either way I do recommended the goldmember to watch from the balcony as it did look very crowded and hectic on the ground floor. And also we had a fantastic view.

The Best Club!. This was my first time, but I was talked into it by someone who had gone many times before. He explained it like a Night club and show.. Which I exactly what it is! I was entertained from the beginning to the end. Bottle service is a must for a seat, and get there early!

Best night!!!! . We paid for the VIP package which was $130 each including transport. You were given your own table on the balcony with brilliant views however the atmosphere downstairs looked a lot better!! The place was busy but not over crowded and it wasn't hot! (Thank god!!)The show and entertainment was amazing. This is definitely a must if your going to Mexico!! So so good!!! Worth every penny.

Ok but overpriced!. First thing to mention is that Coco Bongo lost our reservation which reflects heavily in my review and rating. We arrived early so we could get prime seating in the VIP area but they could not find our booking so asked us to wait. By the time they told us they had no booking but can fit us in everyone had passed on got the best seats. We ended up in a corner where all the dancers did costume changes so unable to have a boogie without getting in their way. Drinks were constant but boy was we cold.....everyone else was sweating but our position restricted us. The show.......well it was ok....I have certainly seen better dancers and personally I would have preferred to listen to something other than Rap or Modern Pop....maybe a bit of Club Classic Music as it is a Club after all. The show is good and I would highly recommend it for the experience as they do put on a great routine and the Silks are very good along with the Trapeze Dancers. I just wish our booking would not have been messed up and I would have scored a 5 despite the show being pretty average. Worth £110....not when you have paid £30 to get in some of the best clubs in the world....but Mexico is extortionate for Excursions and Trips.

Overrated show!. If you like all inclusive hotels shows, getting drunk in an overcrowded place, you will have a blast. One thing you won't see there is locals, they really don't like this place and I can see why. This venue is pushing tickets at the airport, in the streets and even on the beach.

Wow wow wow. This club/house of craziness lives up to the hype.The energy in the venue is unstoppable and a good time will be had by all people!I recommend buying the tickets from a vendor before the night and paying extra to skip the queue. The lines are massive and $10/head to skip the queue is worth every cent!

Great if your drinking. I went to coco bongo last night, and am I paying for it now!!!. The night was very good, at the beginning our waiter came over and introduced himself and kept our drinks coming all night without having to ask. There were people of all ages (18+) there. But being late twenties and not a clubber any more I did feel there were plenty of cringey moments like girls pulling down there tops and getting their bums out when on camera. But I guess that can't be helped when alcohol is flowing. The show it self is very impressive. But if your not drinking and dancing I would say it might be a bit disappointing and there was a lot of filler of general clubbing with not much else going on in regards to a "show". I paid to be in the VIP area.. I wasn't hot and it wasn't overcrowded. But I wanted to dance and found it very hard to, looking down at the dance floor I think the guys down there seemed to have a better time. So depending on whether your a people watcher, want a bit of space or a dancer I reckon VIP is not necessarily the better option. We stayed to about 345 when the DJ came on. It by no means dragged and I did really enjoy myself.

Great night. A great night of music and shows. I had the Gold tickets and did the trip through Thomson. Skipped the queue and showed to our table. The drinks flowed all night without having to ask. Coach pick up right on time, no waiting around. A night with balloons, confetti bombs, Madonna, Michael Jackson, Queen and Phantom of the Opera to name but a few.

fantastic!. This has got to be one of the best places I have ever been. We decided to go on the pub craw with Thomson's so visited a few pubs before coco bongos. When we got there we were told it may feel quite claustrophobic for some people & if this was the case to keep towards the top of the venue, and for others who weren't affected by this to venture towards the bottom. The place is quite small but is built upwards so goes up different levels, and is very busy so for those who don't like confined spaces it may not be for you. The party I was with decided to head towards the main stage where you are surrounded by different acts, beetle juice and the mask running about taking pictures and girls offering tequila shots for $10. We were in for 3 hours, which I felt was enough time to enjoy it and gain an amazing experience, would definitely go back if I ever visit Mexico again.
Amazing show!. Book it now. Whether you're stood on the floor or upgrade to a seat it's totally worth it. $70 all you can drink and 6 hours of entertainment. Absolutely fantastic evening.

What a night!!!!. This is a night to remember.....if you can stay sober enough to remember. We went GOLD tickets, bought them on Coco Bongo's own website and they arranged for bus pick-up from our hotel. Once there, with Gold, you are ushered through, no real queuing. You get handed a drink on the way through the door, then another as you reach the steps. Once in your "VIP" section, your waiter serves you drinks all night, sometimes you don't even get to finish one and you are brought a fresh one without asking. The show is great and well put together. Avoid the "shots" girls! $5 for a shot then you get dry-humped!!! No joking! Some of the younger lads were loving it, but she was politely told where to go by us!! End of the night and the bus carried us back to our hotel. I was nervous about the transportation, but all went great. If you are in the area and want a great night out, go with your mind open and an appetite for a drink or too, lol!!

Worth it!. A great experience. We purchased our ticket right outside the show two nights before as we were exploring downtown. It came out to $65 for admission per person for open bar and to "skip the line" the night of. This is a night full of shows, dancing, good music, great crowd, and drinks drinks drinks! Cons: -they way over pack the place.

Best night of my life . Booked vip at this night which is a must as u get free drinks all night and a choice of upgrade to grey goose vodka , service was brilliant and the entertainment was out of this world , this nite is defo a trip you need to go on

Best Night Ever!!!!. Standing in line to get in I almost went home, I was so tired from the time difference... Then the doors opened! Bam I was awake. So much going on! Staff are brilliant and hilarious, entertainment is top! I can say without any doubt it was one of the best nights of my life! I walked out of there at around 3am their time which is around 9 am our time....... I barely even manage to stay up past 11 usually so to last until that time it must have been good! They even had us up on the bar! Brilliant fun!

Taz. Well what can i say but this place rocks we went vip with tompson which i highly recommend We went on a saturdsy night and it was fantastic the show was second to none and the atmosphere was electric great value for money
Fantastic!!!!. Great night out- get the gold tickets - best seats, free bar and well worth it. The club opens at 10pm and the show starts at 11.30pm. It's a must see!!!

"Brilliant". My wife and I went after a Tui bar crawl, 'what a night', just be careful we went VIP up on the top level which drinks were included, which was great BUT watch out a girl comes round with shoots and after you had it then tells you that you have to pay (not expensive) but not the point.Show is great, gets very busy.ENJOY!
Great atmosphere . Great setup and fantastic performances, recommend you visit this place if staying in playa del carmen great night out!

WHAT A NIGHT. We booked through one of the Coco Bongos Representatives who was working at our hotel (Riu Playacar) He advised us of the cost and which would be the best currency to pay in so as not to have us pay more. We only bought the standard $65 tickets but the experience was unbelievable. The trip included air conditioned bus transfers there and back. When we go into Coco Bongos we were greeted with drinks as well as a waited (We tipped him around 100 pesos) and we were never without a drink for the full night and we didn't have to move, the best drink service I have ever experienced. And as for the show no review can describe how good it was, having experienced the Las Vegas nightlife I can safely say it is right up there with the best! Cant wait to go again!

Loved it!!. We were on a pre booked trip via Thomson. It's a late start so have an afternoon nap first!!I'd recommend getting the Gold members tickets (saves the queue and guarantees you a seat with waiter service inside).The venue isn't huge but that adds to the atmosphere. It gets VERY busy and there can be some issues with speediness of service initially...tipping frequently helps!!The show itself is brilliant, I'd recommend everyone to go once...I can't fault the performers really (some seemed a little less enthusiastic than others) they put on an action packed show with lots of variety. I'm not sure I'd go again but that's nothing to do with the quality of the night, I'm just getting abit past the 5am to bed thing!!

Sexist and embarrassing place. We were embarrassed for the girls being shown in the big screen. The camera would pick the prettier girls and zoom in their breasts, hips and legs. They only invite girls to go up on "stage" to dance, and they insist a lot with the pretty girls to go there. Some times it was written "booty cam" in the screen and they should zoom in the girls on stage behinds from the bottom and at the same time a strong air blow would try to move the girl skirt up. I wasn't expecting that. The impression we got is the general nightclub logic that the clients are the men and the women are the product of the party. In the entrance, on the line on the street, the woman dancers were making sexy moves trying to attract costumers. Before the show starts these dancers entertain the guests with very sexy dances. There are men dancers too, but they're much fewer, they get on the "stage" later, and they far more discrete. There were girls selling a special paid drink for 5 dollars, which doesn't make a lot of sense in an open bar party. Every 5 minutes you would see one of them, so I felt like having to thank and deny all the sellers in 5th avenue. One of this girl touched my girlfriend breast trying to attract our attention, which we found very weird.

Best club/show I have ever been to. We booked through our hotel for cocobongos experience with a bottle service and table. We were glad we chose this one as it gets very busy in the club and sitting down was a luxury! It was quite cramped and busy in there and almost impossible to go to the toilet through the crowds! But the show itself was brilliant, never seen anything like it, it's 11.30 till about 3.30 and we stayed and enjoyed all of it, they do all different paradys and then at the end there's a dj! The best bit is when they blow air at you and confetti everywhere and balloons flying about! It's just such a great atmosphere I definitely recommend. We're in our 20s but there were people of all ages up to 70s so it really is good for everyone.

What an amazing night.. My wife and I are stopping in the Riu Clubhotel Tequila and thought about doing the trip to Coco Bongo with Thomsons. They offer a bar crawl ending up at Bongos but you are only in there for an hour and half. We booked through Edgar and Hiram who were selling tickets in the hotel and as a group of eight, we had a great discount for the gold vip section with an excellent view of the stage. Dropped off at 22.30 and picked up at 3.20 it was a great night with most of the drink included. Book with these guys rather than the Reps.

Great night out. We went as part of an organised night with Thomas Cook. The show was great and the waiters weren't shy with the measures. Absolutely loved it. We will be back next time we go to Mexico!

Gran Porto Royal. The people at coco bongo at the Gran Porto Royal Hotel where amazing they made me laugh and know how to have fun. Luis was great and was funny. The gym instructor was great too. I would totally recommend to come to coco bongo. I had an amazing time

Fab. We booked this trip through our rep at the hotel. It was by far the best club i have ever been to. The enertainment was out of this world and the waiters could not do enough for you, we tipped our waiter 10 us dollars and he was fab all night :) the shot girls that come around are great too, you dont have to buy shots of them but it is a good laugh. Although the place was rammed there is not a bad spot in there. Its a defo must go if you are visiting mexico. An experience you will never forget.

Coco bongo. It is worth the money, for one very fun night. You leave the hotel on a bus with others people from same hotel, once at coco bongo, they greet you with a shot. It's an open area where you are standing the whole time there's no chairs. You have open bar and they have shows like vegas style in all very fun worth going .

Not for the faint of heart !!!. If you want to have a great and I mean great time in a safe loud party and dance your heart out kinda place? Well then coco bongos is for you !!! Want with my wife and another couple and had a great time the show will blow your mind !!! And it is worth paying the extra and going vip you get a butler a table and the best view in the house !!! They well ask you to go on stage and dance !! You don't have to but we did !!! It is a late night we got back to the hotel around 4:00am !!! And just so everyone gets an idea my wife and I are 35!!! Great for all ages 19 and up !!!

Amazing!. Initially the price put me off but we booked it non the less. Gold membership was worth every penny! We arrived just after 9.30pm, we were front of the queue & let in at 10pm, got the best seats & drank far too much as it was free! It's a must for anyone traveling near!

Personally very average. The gold member package is misleading to say the least. You do not get a table as we know in the UK and USA you get a cheap 2 leveled padded bench where 5 people has to squeeze in between each other on two levels and considering its 125 us dollars each a d get "premium drinks" but you have to pay extra for red bull champagne and any shots at a rate of 5 dollars is beyond a joke. As a show it was good if your into cheesey music. Good for all the family I guess but alot of money for getting poor service in return. Would rather spend money on cirque de soile as that is something of a proper show

nice surprise. I booked this place for a night out to celebrate my wife's 50th birthday(I am not a lover of disco/show bars).But what a wonderful surprise, the staff where great and although the place was very busy they made a special thing for my wife. A lot of the staff stood around ,let of party poppers ,streamers and sung happy birthday.The bar service was the best I have had in a long time, the second your drink was nearly empty it was replaced with good quality drink.We had the best time and it will be a memory my wife will not forget for a long time.

Girlies Holiday . At first I was a bit sceptical about going hear but after speaking with another travelled from my hotel I was a bit more intrigued to find out what it's like. I must say its nothing like I thought. The atmosphere was lively the drinks were following the acts were definitely one to watch . If you go to Mexico and haven't been here then you have seen nothing yet !!

Love coco bongo!. This was my fourth visit to coco bongo....(other three times were in playa del Carmen) all were an amazing night out as usual!I Was not impressed with the sales tactics of the rep who sold us these cancun coco tickets....he downright lied about its location being walking distance. (Sunset marina to coco bongo Is not a 5 min walk as he promised). That Rep sold us this while we were vacationing at haciendas tres Rios. Took our oldest son this time and had a Blast. My only complaint is there were no shows to take out others underage children too....they were dissapointed and would have been a perfect family show if it wasn't cancelled due to busy season. (Xmas holiday time) Hopefully will have a show we can take them to our next visit.Last time at coco in playa we had the most amazing rep Alex. He helped us plan the most amazing bachelor parties for friends and was a fine rep of coco bongo, he was the man and made it all happen. We had the BEST treatment and time there with all credit to him.

Best night out in the world!!!. The best night out you will ever have nothing compares to Coco Bongos. Don`t get me wrong it can be expensive but its worth every penny, we went gold VIP (the only way to go) and had our own section level with the stage, seats and all inclusive drinks with a waiter service which was unbelievable. The show itself is mesmerizing with the acrobats and dancing there`s even some comedy in there as well amazing experience all round.

Nothing Special. We visited Coco Bongos on the 30th June after hearing great reviews and several of our friends had informed us that it was a must. It was a good evening out of the hotel however it was definitely overpriced for what it is. Some of the shows are really good such as the aerial acrobatics whereas some of the acts were miming along to some songs (very badly) I'm glad I experienced it but wouldn't be tempted to do it again.

A must do in Mexico. We did this as a last minute trip, and it was well worth it. Must give a massive thank you to Ariel at the GBP Coba for organising for us, we booked on the Thursday afternoon and went Thursday evening. Show itself was fantastic, plenty of variety, same with the music. Party ran until 4am. We had a great spot, up on the balcony directly in front of the stage. Great value for money, transport and drinks all included for the evening, and we only paid £45 each.

Nice Evening. It was a good show but i felt a little tacky/ seedy! In between the shows a camera would focus on young girls crotches who were dancing... the girls they focused on looked hardly old enough to be in there. I felt it was a little bit expensive if you pay for gold - $130 per person!One of those things, been there, seen it but wouldn't go again.

So so fun! . We went here for an excursion visit on the back of many recommendations and the title they use is so spot on, it really does rival Las Vegas night clubs and it's so relaxed and full of fun!
Amazing. Coco bongos is a must if you go to playa del carmen. The Service was fantastic and show was amazing. One of my best nights ever

Awesome 2nd time. A must see for sure!! We partied till 4am and had a blast! No need to get the VIP tickets as we got open bar and just tipped the waiter very good and also another guy who brought us upstairs to our own spot and tipped him to keep it from getting too crowded. Highly recommend!!

Overpriced and rude staff!!. I went here last night and left very disappointed. Paid a lot of money for a gold member ticket only to have the waiter give our seat away when we went for a cigarette. This resulted in me having an argument with the waiter as I just thought this was absolutely disgusting. The show was great but the music was terrible and it was far too busy for my liking.Don't be fooled in thinking the gold member is better as its not, in fact I think I would have had a better experience in the normal part.So my verdict....... an overpriced tourist trap!!!!

whatever your age (over 18) you have to go here. You can not go to Mexico and not go here, what a fantastic night, I was worried about the late night as I struggle to stay awake past 10 but the time just flew! So don't let that put you off one bit. I would recommend the gold member pass as you get a seat but if your young then you probably wouldn't need this as the atmosphere on the floor was amazing, the drinks just kept flowing and the show and do were brilliant.
Wow wow wow!!. So worth the money! Great atmosphere, show, drinks, and people! The employees that work there are so attentive and fun!

Unreal.. An absolutely fantastic night out/experience when visiting Mexico.
The entertainment is out of this world and the atmosphere is phenomenal.
Coco Bongo PLaya Del Carmen is Amazing. We loved Coco Bongo, so much we ended up going 2x. The shows are amazing. Great party atmosphere. Super fun with lots of drinking.

Not worth the money!!. Having read reviews good and bad i decided to go ahead with an open mind and try it. We paid £112.00 pp for VIP which included a bottle of vodka, waiter service and unlimited drinks.When we arrived the four of us were taken to our seat which was a step up from the main floor. We had a tiny table and us two females we sat on a bench and the men we to sit directly behind us higher up on the ledge with their feet at either side of us. I'm not exaggerating when I say we had 1 x square meter of space for us all to share. Each table beside us was the same. No room to dance or move for that matter. When we finished the vodka, trying to get a drink was almost impossible. It appeared that other non Europeans at eitherside of us received better service and were always given drinks. We managed to get two throughout the night. We gave our waiter a tip at the beginning of the night too! Going to the bar was not an option due to the floor being packed with people shoulder to shoulder.I went to use the toilets at the other side of the main floor approx 25 metres. It took 25 minutes to get there and back. Not because the toilets were busy, we got straight in. It was because there were so many people on the main floor there was no room to move. I am not exaggerating when i say we were crammed in like sardines!!! Anything his place has to offer is completely ruined by how many people are inside. It appeared to be about how much money they can make rather than offering a good service. The show was people miming, no actual live singing.God forbid there was an emergency and the place needed to be evacuated. People would be trampled. I'd read the bad reviews and thought people were moaning about nothing, i can confirm they were not. We left at 01.00hrs and missed a lot of the show because we couldn't stand being in such a small space anymore. People will want to try it, of course because there is such a huge hype. My only suggetion would be to go Gold Member. That way you're on a balcony away from the carnage!!

Absolutely bloody brilliant. I booked this event with my hotel before I flew to Mexico as I had had so many people telling me I had to go, my goodness they were so right! I have never danced, sang or drank so much tequila. I can not explain how much fun this night was, the shows themselves would rival any west end performance and then the breaks for dancing were a welcome release for all that built up energy. I highly recommend if you book standard tickets as I did as VIP was full, to upgrade and buy a bottle when you arrive as this not only gives you a premium bottle of spirit & mixers but you get a table and seating which you will definitely need I paid about £123.00 for this which is a bargain compared to the uk. Whatever you decided to do on your holiday to Mexico I can not recommend this place enough. for those who like a fun, exciting lively atmosphere with shot & dancing.... Oh and absolutely stunning woman this is definitely the place for you

Do not miss out. We bought the gold vip ticket with Thomson. Getting in was great skipped the line, got escorted to our seats. This was the downside we had to sit with myself on a top ledge and my girlfriend between my legs on a ledge just below. They did this with all the couples that came in with us which made it very cramped.Once the show started though people started to move and stood up and it was a fantastic night. Any night club that stops the music for a Batman vs Bane fight is the best night club in the World.The place is a lot smaller than I thought it would be you don't get a lot of room to dance in. Our waiter was fantastic as soon as my drink was empty a new one was in my hand, he kept bringing shots all night as well.Defiantly not a show to miss!

Brilliant night. Absolutely loved Coco Bongo's, we had been recommended to go by a few people so it was on our list of to do's for the holiday! We booked as soon as we could with our rep for the gold members package. If you are going I definitely recommend going as a gold member, you skip the queue and get shown to your seats and get drinks bought to you all night whatever you want you will get it! Cannot recommend enough! The show is fab, such good music and entertainment all night. We loved it that much we are going to Cancun this year and have already said we definitely need to visit the one in Cancun! We stayed in riviera maya when we visited the one at plays del Carmen, it's a must!

Still not disapointed. 3rd time we have visited never fails to disapoint ,brilliant shows great music superb atmosphere.they have introduced a bus service to get back to your hotel included in the price.not a cheap night by any means but well worth a visit .

Wild, cramped, but great fun!. My wife and I just did the general admission with the open bar, I reckon the drinks were very watered down though. However, you don't really care about the drinks because the show is fantastic! Really good acrobatics, that you get to see right up close.

One Wild Night. Me and my partner where already in mexico when someone suggested we go there. We contacted our rep and luckily enough there had been a cancellation in two days time. It was well worth going!! We were taken straight in and given some punch at the door, a shot of something before security and a shot after security!!! The security itself was thorough but not intrusive. We where sat on stools that where not the most comfy but we had a great view of everything from the gold member section.A word of advice is to tip your server after the first round and every 3 or so rounds after. I did 20 pesos at the beginning and then after every 3 rounds. Totalled about 120 pesos ( under £5) and the glasses where never empty.Where we where sat there was only 1 female toilet ( with 1 stall from what my finacé says) and only 2 people where allowed in the mens at one time. That was the only downside!!!!The performances where incredible and the experience was well worth it!!!

Best night out ever. Had absolutely no idea what to expect, but from start to finish it was one of the best experiences I have ever had. From 70's to 80's up to date, musicals, films, rock music, absolutely outstanding.
Thanks to Ricardo and Bernardo from grand riviera princess for booking for us and making sure we had a fab night out

Fun place! . The place was crowded but it was a lot of fun. The bartenders were moving fast, I didn't have to wait long for my drinks. :) It's a safe place to party with friends and dance. I can't wait to go back.

I loved it but not for anyone who doesn't like big crowds or small spaces.. Us girls loved the show and stayed to the very end. Loved the transfer people waiting for us as it is a late night. Think we got back at 3:30AM.

Completely unexpected. I was told by everyone who has been to Mexico that I need to go the Coco Bongo...I literally I had no idea what to expect. We were waiting around at the hotel and we were all burnt considering bailing. THANK GOD we rethought that! Coco Bongo was the best night of the whole trip. $60 for the night, this included transport from the hotel and open bar. There is the option to pay extra for VIP which is just seats and a table. We ended up in a VIP area free of charge thanks to Migel one of the waiters. The show was incredible and if we hadn't of run out of money and time we would have definitely gone again. The dancers are amazing and the shows were just wow. The atmosphere is overwhelming and will guarantee to cheer you up!This place is a MUST if you go to Mexico!

Tara Michelle Evans . I can honestly say I thought coco bongo was amazing suitable of any age obviously old enough to party I did what they call the bar crawl I went to three bars before coco bongo I would recommend to anyone to go best night I've ever had will be returning on my next visit to Mexico .

Unforgetable Experience. THIS ISN"T YOUR TYPICAL NIGHTCLUB!!! Purchased VIP tix in advance. Everyone is greeted with a shot of Tequila. VIP seating is at the top and immediately you are introduced to the wait staff that will be serving you all night. They had music, dancers on stage and on the bar, music videos, acrobatic routines from Spider-Man and the Green Lantern, Batman makes an appearance in addition to other musicians (impersonators). There are balloons, bubbles, confetti, great entertainment, and the beverages are free flowing. Be prepared to participate (voluntary).It has the vibe of Light @ Mandalay Bay and the feel of TAO at The Venetian and the Beacher's Madhouse at The MGM Grand in Vegas. In speaking with locals, this one is the better of the two in the region. Do not miss this experience!!!

what can i say. i know Im pretty easily impressed and my holidays are all brilliant because I appreciate the break , but this place tops any night out I have ever had .first tip do the gold member tickets if you like lots of beer and the best seats in the house then this is the only way. second tip wear something light its warm in there and maybe not your best Hugo boss top because its tight and there's a lot going on. You will probably have a couple of cocktail marks on you tops. but if you like having super cocktails and branded drinks JD etc. and having the best most entertaining night you ever had then your in the right place. when you walk in there is a clock ticking down when that clock hit 0 its ShowTime and what a show. I wont spoil it other than if you like to see batman chasing Bain across the room on zip wires and throw Spiderman and beetle juice in to the mix with a hint of Chicago ,Elvis, Bruno mars and Madonna and don't forget Gaga as well as a load of music from 70s.80s,90s then your in the right place. taxis right outside straight back to hotel no problems . been falling down drunk both times I have been and seen no problems what so ever. one more tip even with golden tickets get there early to get the best seat although all gold tickets seats are good and when your sweltering in the cue there is a 7-11 across the road go and get dos cerveza por favour and get ready for an mazing night .enjoy.
