Super fun!. We bought tickets at our hotel (Gran Porto) about 4 hours before actually going to Coco Bongo. We met with other people in the lobby who were also going and met with one of the workers who walked is over to the club. He was super friendly and had a lot of energy and got everyone hyped up while walking over. (Our hotel was a couple blocks away) Once we got to the club, he waited with us while we waited in line. While everyone waited in line for the doors to open a group of dancers came out with music and got everyone dancing. Once we walked into the club we got a shot of tequila and a mixed drink before we got to the main dance area. We bought general admission tickets and that included open bar which had mixed drinks, beers, and tequila. The shows were great and varied from the Beatles, Beetlejuice, Madonna, and many more. The music also was great because there was a good mix of older and newer music. I would go back again if I visit.

Best night!!. I was sceptical about booking this as it is a lot of money but I am so glad I did!! This has to be the best night we've ever had! The entertainment and atmosphere is out of this world.. Would defiantly recommend this trip to anyone visiting Mexico!

Wow. Amazing nite,senses overload,one of the best experiences ever. We had gold tickets and that was perfect for us as we had a seat all nite that was just ours,waiter service was fine and good air con.

Total Waste of Money. This is one of the worst places I have ever been. We paid a fortune for the gold ticket and were left feeling so disappointed. We had the smallest table imaginable for 4 people, I couldn't see anything because of people sitting in front of me. A couple who sat behind us left after 30 minutes because they couldn't see anything. If there had been a fire we would have had no chance of getting out as everyone was so jammed in. Please don't pay to go here it is dangerous and a waste of time and money.

Not what we expected.... After paying a fairly high price through our travel agent for this trip, and reading reviews such as "better than Vegas" we expected a show like nothing we'd seen before.What we got was not that...After boarding our coach which arrived 30 minutes late to the hotel lobby, we left for Playa del Carmen.After arriving in the club and being searched both on our persons and in our bags, we entered a cramped club which seemed to be more interested in "booty cam" and shots than in putting on a great performance.Our gold member tickets entitled us to a guaranteed seat and waiter service, and while I can't knock the waiter, the table was behind another table at the back of a balcony where we could barely see the stage.After half an hour of miming and poor dancing, we decided enough was enough.The entertainment in the hotel (Bahia Principe) was far better quality and didn't require a $450mx taxi back!I would genuinely advise you to save your money and stay in your hotel!
One day experience . Be ready for a Vegas show but nothing good for the drinks (actually very doubt if they were made with alcohol or something else)

Expect the unexpected!!. Wow where do I start!? Amazing!!! This place has to seriously be the most crazy yet fantastic club/show I have ever experienced!! Our party was made of 4 people- 2 couples and we went VIP and so glad we did!! Paid just over $1900 pesos with a direct coco bongo rep called Ricardo at our hotel which included transport there and back (8:40pm pick up 3:40am drop off), fast pass so we didn't queue (the queues are massive so that alone was worth it, those on our coach who got standard all upgraded to fast pass when they saw the size of it!), a table right by the stage, open bar with a waiter who was so on it we were never empty handed, a bottle of spirit- we chose vodka! And also a coco bongos tshirt The show was so diverse, I don't want to spoil so won't include specifics but there was something for everyone! The staff were so friendly and would definitely return!
Unmissable. ....... Probably the best night out I've ever had. Waiter service. .. drinks never run out. The shows are amazing. . You cannot visit the area and not go. ..

Mental night out . We went with a gold package to get a vip spot and would absolutely recommend this. :)The entire experience was simply amazing. Theres a huge variety throughout the night and little comical filler bits aswell. If you are in the area would absolutely recommend dedicating one of your nights to get down to coco bongos!!!

A BLAST. Went out with Louis and had the best night of my life. Music was good drinks were good and the price was even better! If you want to go out to a club skip the bar hopping scene and just go to Coco Bongo!

Amazing . A go to when visiting Mexico! This was our first time and loved it, pricey for the gold member but worth it! It was around £90 each that included drinks all night and you were sat in the best seats in the place. Although down on the dance floor looked fun too and I'm sure it was much cheaper! Would definitely go again!

Awesome time. We had a blast, smaller than cancun but we'll worth the show n drinks, hope you're not clastifobic. Paying extra for a table, nope, preferred to be right near stage, more action n close to all. Yup love it would return again.

Do not waste your money.. We purchased regular priced tickets at 70.00 per person. Oh and might I mention we could have upgraded to VIP for 80.00 per person more at the door. Went with a group of 8 people from 18 to 49 in age. The younger ones were just barely ok with the experience and all of the over 40 hated it. We were herded on to an upper balcony like cattle and packed in let me tell you....packed in like sardines. Even our 6 foot plus twenty something young man said he could barely see any of the show. Us that were just over 5 feet caught maybe 10 minutes out of the 3 hours we were there. We received one drink and one shot when we came in the door. If you wanted anything else of the supposed unlimited alcohol u had to just swipe it off a waiters tray when he was coming through. We arrived at 9:30 and did not actually get into the building until around 10:30. We were all ready to leave when 12:30 arrived but we toughed it out for a little longer. Our paid transportation was not due to arrive until 3:30 so we all ended up paying for a cab on the way home. Another 80.00 spent between us. This is a total waste of time and money and God forbid a fire might break out it the place...all would parish for sure!!!! Terrible, Awful experience. Do Not I repeat DO NOT waste your hard earned money!!!!!!!

its mad. Great show but it is mad, we went VIP and glad we did as its mad on the dance floor.
Just go with it lol

Must do experience - but overpriced - Gold Member. We were told by literally every person we spoke to about going to Mexico - 'you must go to Coco Bongos' so we did. The transport there and back was provided and you get all inclusive drinks all night - we were in the Gold member part so we had a waiter that served our table with 4 other people who came from the same hotel. We were never waiting for a drink - he was on it! We were on a table at the side of the stage so we had brilliant views of the show but when the performers were on the stage in the middle of the dancefloor we couldn't see. The performers were brilliant - so so talented and there was a mixture of everything! Flying artists, martial arts, dancing of all varieties - I don't want to spoil it by revealing too much but it was BRILLIANT! The atmosphere was insane!I wouldn't recommend a standard ticket as the downstairs was rammed. I have never been in a club with so many people it took us 15 mins to squeeze through the crowds to our seats and the club is SMALL - much smaller than I anticipated - they squeeze every last person in.We paid over £100 for tickets - which I never would normally for a club - I wouldn't even spend that on a West End show so I do think it was overpriced. We aren't massive drinkers so for us it was expensive but if you drink crazily excessively you would eventually get your moneys worth. It's full every night though we struggled to get tickets so they are doing something right! I would recommend this experience it was a brilliant night - but treat it as a holiday one off.Show starts around 11pm and finishes 3.30am

TC Project. Booked the TC project through our Thomas Cook reps at our hotel down near Tulum. Half hour coach trip followed by 2 all inclusive bars. Service at both of these were very good. Coco bongo was insane. I can only describe it as being like the clock striking midnight on New Year's Eve on repeat for 4 hours. The show parts were crazy and well produced. The party intervals were also great fun! Well worth a visit and it is nothing like you have ever experienced before!

Over rated. Had v I p. Not really able to see much in upper balcony. Very packed and more like a theatre show than a nightclub. Supposed to be free drinks but after 1 bottle and mixers, had to pay for drinks

Incredible show marred by overcrowding & toilet issues. Coco Bongo was the last destination in a Thompson's bar crawl myself & my boyfriend attended in June 2016. We did not queue for long when we arrived, 15-20 mins max - I expected longer considering the size of the club. As part of the Thompson's bar crawl package deal we had access to the VIP area above the main area & directly opposite the stage. We were taken great care of by staff, a waiter called Juan came over & introduced himself to us straight away & we didn't go 5 minutes without a drink in our hands. We were in Coco Bongo from around 11pm-1:30 (a downfall to the Thompson's package was that we had to leave by 1:30) the shows during this time seemed to be every 15 minutes or so & were outstanding. The biggest downfall to our Coco Bongo experience was the toilets, I'm unsure of the capacity of the VIP area but there seemed to be 100+ people - there were only 2 toilet cubicles that we could access in the VIP area for both male & females. This caused a major issue as the queue for the toilets was huge & at one point I was waiting for around 20 minutes meaning I missed a big chunk of the entertainment. Aside from this we had a fantastic night & would definitely come back - we would maybe just drink less before we arrived so that we wouldn't have to wait in toilet queues!!!

Awesome.... We visited Congo Bongo for the first time now that our son is 18. We bought a VIP pass at the Riu Yucatan from Hiram an official Congo Bongo sales man and we got exactly what he offered or even more. He personally picked us up and walked us straight to our table. He's awesome and a real nice guy really dedicated to his job. There was a line but never stopped moving only took us minutes to by pass the massive crowd waiting to get in on a separate line. The show was incredible do as the music. It was packed completely but the people were really cool. Lots of security inside the club keeps things smooth. We bought an bottle pass but were also bought open bar. For our surprise we didn't even had to go to it we had a guy assigned to our section and he really took care of us all night. We walked two blocks back to our nice shuttle that took us to our back to our hotel safely. Recommended! If you visit playa carmen this club is the main even at night hands down...

Very Random but definitely worth a visit! . Not what we expected at all but it's such a fun night! The most cleanest nightclub ever and staff were very welcoming and couldn't do enough for you. I would recommend going VIP so you have a seat and can watch the show, as the waiters will bring drinks to you.100% go if you get the chance as there's no place like it!

Best night EVER. Such a good night out! Worth every penny! The atmosphere is nothing like I have experienced before. So entertaining and you cannot help but get up and dance and cheer along! The gold member is 100% worth doing. We ripped our waiter at the beginning of the night and my glass was never empty!You have to go here if you visit Mexico it is just amazing!

Very overpriced but good show. We paid extra to be a gold member for the show through our tour operator and was told that we would see the whole show from our sit down position however we were sat in the middle tier at the back so could see limited amount of what was going on without standing up for most of it. Only advantage was that we jumped the queue and didn't have to wait hours to get in. Younger generation seem to think that this was a bit of a booze cruise and thoroughly enjoyed the all inclusive option. In our opinion was less of a show that a musical with 3/4 of the show being music and a meat market of young girls being perved on

Amazing!. Such a good night.. we were on the balcony above the floor we had our own space and it was perfect, wouldn't have liked to be on the ground and it was very crowded and people pushed and shoved but the best night out me and my husband have had!

Regular ticket Review. Reading a lot of reviews for VIP experience – this review is for the regular €65 ticket. Some top tips : 1 . You will have a better time on the floor, every one else is just looking at you having a fun time and look bored and in comparison2. Book online yourself – Skip the queue completely! We skipped 200 + people just by having regular tickets online. 3. when you go in the waiters will be waiting for you, get a corner of a table and give a nice tip to the waiter.  Our dude kept us topped up with drinks all night ( Isn’t this what the VIPS spend the extra money on!!?) ! 4. Get a position close to the bar and bathroom , Bathrooms are empty for the most part down there too. 5. Have fun!6. Try the taco place outside the exit.

Unbelievable Experience!!!!!!. This is the best night ever!!!!!! It is so worth the money. If you can, splash out for the Gold Member package, otherwise you'll be down in the pit, which could be good fun too.Definitely worth the trip!!!!

Disappointing. I have been to three coco bongos now and I have to say this is the worst I have been to. Normally I love coco bongo and the atmosphere is amazing and the shows dazzling. Tonight's was just a huge let down. We had paid for gold so that we would have the table and a good view. Instead we were taken to a table near the bar without stools and had to endure everyone bumping in to us as we were near the bathroom also. We didn't have a good view of the show and the bar area was noisy so didn't get the same atmosphere.The shows weren't as good as ones seen previously at the cancun and Dominican Republic ones. Even the music was a bit crap and most people over the age of twenty would have a hard time enjoying it. A friend who hadn't been before commented that he hadn't realised it was an 18-30 club. Anyone who has been before will know that coco bongo is usually fun for all ages and usually it is the older ones that enjoy it the most. I am not yet 30 and still found this an awful night. It was so hot in there and everyone was packed in like sardines. The place was far too overcrowded and like someone else said on another review it is a disaster waiting to happen. I know most probably won't care about this review but I recommend you go to the cancun one as it is a hundred times better.

Best show and Nightclub ever . My partner and I visited Coco Bongo last Friday. ..oh my life. We had an amazing time. The time just flew by owing to the amount of entertainment throughout the night. I have a couple of gripes though too...we paid a lot of money for a table, bottle of gin, waiter service and an open bar. ..I did feel this was a rip off in all fairness. Our waiter was also serving other tables; when he did manage to get to us he couldn't hear our orders owing to the language and noise barriers so we ended up just drinking our bottle of gin with the tonic water he kept bringing us. Some people hadn't booked a table and kept trying to use ours which peeved me a little. ..enough for me to remind them it was our table. Other than that. ..we thoroughly enjoyed our night and wouldn't hesitate to go back. ..but with a different bar option.

Just amazing!! . I can't recommend this enough! I was a bit worried about being crammed in and it being a very late night but we booked the VIP gold member. We had a stool and plenty of space without feeling crammed in. I'm 44 and didn't think I would make the late night but at 3am I didn't want it to end!! If you're in Mexico, don't miss it!

Not to be missed!. Me and my friend came here while on holiday, I'd say to anyone get the gold member if you go, it makes a massive difference, as soon as your drink is finished the waiters have already brought you another one. It's not like any other club I've been to before, the shows are brilliant!

Miss this if your over 20. Over priced, as a gold member it was miss sold we were told we would have a table with waiter service food and drink included in fact we was on a ledge with 6 people at a table that was half a meter across and people Jamed in so tight no one could move, never saw any food and there was no way the waiter could have got to us anyway by the time the count down was at 30 minutes to the start no more drinks again the waiter couldn't get anywere near us, we saw first few acts which were ok, if there had been in sort of emergency we would never have got out this place it is a disaster waiting to happen, we booked this through tomsons at our hotel and will be letting them know that we expect better from them than to sell and recommend such a poor and dangerous place, we will never again trust tomsons, we ended up filling cheated and taken for a ride by this company and after 18 years of booking our hoilday with them it's about time we went with someone else

SO much fun!. My husband and I spent the extra cash and got VIP, but definitely over paid through our hotel. I would try to haggle through one of the street vendors if you could. VIP is worth it, we had our own seats and table, plenty of room, our drinks were always full and brought to us, while we watched the show and looked onto the many people squished on the floor, squeezing past each other. I imagine it would be difficult to get a drink, which, would be hard to take advantage of the free drinks in that case. The show goes quite late, we left early, but still had an amazing time. The show rivals Cirque du Soleil and all the best night clubs I have ever been to. It's a must see when you are in Mexico!

Great night!!. We had a great time at coco bongo and you certainly get your money's worth (we paid 60USD each)! Be warned it starts at 11pm and finishes at 3:30am but it's worth it! The music is great, the show is fantastic (and goes for 4 hours!) and it's open bar. The vibe is fantastic - everyone is there for a good time and the performers really get you pumped for the night ahead!

Entertaining. This nightclub featured a show as well as great music. The drinks were par and the service was par as well. The backstage passes, however, are just a scam to get young girls up on stage. I was given one and told that I better stay up there and did not feel as though the male staff was respectful.

Pushy staff, shot girls that are clearly drunk and liars. I recently went to coco bongo playa del carmen on a friday night. I have been there before. The show was the same as it was 6 months ago but the actors did slightly less acrobatics. The show itself is good. Usually when i go to coco bongo i get bottle service and an exclusive section. This does not stop the pushy female staff from harassing you to buy shots. They are so pushy that you have to be down right rude for them to understand you do not want to buy a shot. So this last time i went to coco bongo i was getting harassed like usual to buy shots. The only difference this time was that i went with one friend and did not get bottle service, so as i told the shot girl for the 3rd time that i did not want shots and i continued to walk away. She went and told security that i pushed her... so they proceeded to kick me out and not listen to me. As soon as i was outside my bracelet was ripped off and the manager who just sold me my entrance pretended he did not remember me. I do not know their names but i remember faces and this type of service from cocobongo was completely unacceptable. Go once see the show but expect to be harassed and treated poorly if you are not in the vip area. The show is packed 7 nights a week so its no surprise that they do not care about the little custmers.

Fantastic Evening....... Bought our tickets from the official sellers( Argenys & Kevin) at our hotel Riu Yucatan. They explained exactly everything that we would get and answered all our questions. The price of our ticket included queue jump, being met outside the club, taken to our seated area where we also had plenty of room to get up and dance. Introduced to our waiter who kept replenishing our drinks and ice bucket. He also made sure no one else used our area. Free bottle of rum on the table. The show itself was brilliant with all the club staff joining in, fantastic music, talented staff a great night out.

Bongo Tour was not worth it for us. This trip is more for 18 to 28 year old range. The senior frogs stop was highlight of night and about the only place I would return. Besides the constant badgering of people trying to sell you drugs the salsa place was boring. Then Coco Bongo is packed. You were sold they have couches and everybody can see but when you get in you cant see anything. The show I could not tell you how it went. A bunch of kids hooking up and too crowded to move. So would not recommend going back.

Fantastic place and fair review below . This place is amazing however if your not a fan of loud music, people drinking and a large crowd then it won't be ! The music is great and the production was even better amazing light show with millions of confetti / co2 drops for me someone that loves loud music and shows and clubs it's the all in one package and they do it bloody well. All inclusive drinks were great too

Fantastic . Visited for my birthday, bought gold member tickets, so this included drinks. International brands included, had our own seating area and didn't have to queue to get in or queue to get a drink. As soon as we had two sips left in our glasses the waiters brought us over more! I've been to Vegas and the show in on par with some of the shows in Vegas!

Overrated.. Overpriced!. We visited this nightclub 2 days ago and after all the positive talk about this place it was such an anticlimax when getting there. Yes there is Dancers and Shows which are "Okay" however we paid for the gold membership which was such a dull experience. We got seated on stools with a balcany ledge as our table. The waiter was as efficient he could be which was probably the only positive i could take away from paying the extra to go gold. Other gold members who actually got a table where squeezed in on a ledge to enable the club to cram as many people in there. No room to dance you would have to go down to the floor which i definitely would have preferred i the first place because they were having a lot more fun! So its probably better to not go gold to actually enjoy the club more but as a whole dont listen to all the hype.
Excellent drinks service with the VIP package.. Excellent night out although it will cost around $150....Excellent shows, very professional, a well organised night out.

JUST VISIT - THE MOST AMAZING PLACE I HAVE EVER BEEN TO. Was entertained from start to finish, a totally awesome place that gave you something to look at every second. We paid to go VIP where we had waiter service with drinks included and as the place was heaving this was definitely the right thing to do. The waiter kept your drinks going without asking and couldn't have been more attentive.The show was just out of this world, so much to look at and not something I can describe here so if you can only go on one trip, make Coco Bongo your choice, you will not be disappointed

What a let down. We booked with Thomas cook what a disaster 38 of us booked and paid for a private balcony space with drinks included and transport we were supposed to be picked up at 9-30 no bus came we. Telephoned the rep who said there was no booking for us everyone was disappointed went to see rep next day and a rep from coco bongo was there and said sorry for mix up but we booked again promising us a balcony private area and drinks we arrived waited an hour to get in all excited and were took to a balcony where there were bout 100 people in the area what was supposed to be private you were standing side by side couldn't even see the screens never mind the acts the waiter was bringing trays of drinks and people were just grabbing anything they could it was an accident waiting to happen too many people in a small space you couldn't breathe 17 of us came out after 20 minutes what a waste of money do not I repeat not go Thomas cook need to look at this trip and not sell it its very dangerous

Legendary!. I had heard so much about the famous Coco Bongos before we went, so we knew it would be good but wasn't really quite sure what to expect. We purchased the VIP tickets - well worth it! You get the balcony seats meaning you avoid the very busy dance floor. Also your own personal waiter happily serving you free drink all night... What more could you ask for?! The show itself was so good! So much better than what I thought it was going to be. But be prepared to be extremely hungover the next day! ;-)

The best place for a lot of fun !!!!. Just go...and enjoy. Unique disco show, a lot of good time, fun...If you are staying in Riviera maya , playa del Carmen o cancun, ITS ONE OF THE BEST PLACES to have this expirience.

Fun but so crowded! . Went here to celebrate my 30th bday and it was a fun show but very very very crowded! You want to come early cause it gets crowded fast and you want to find a good spot to watch the show.

INCREDIBLE. Went here last night with my boyfriend to finish off our holiday and we were not disappointed. The show was fantastic and the atmosphere was incredible. People of all ages are accommodated for and everyone having a good time. We paid the extra for the Gold Membership which was defiantly worth every penny. We were allowed early entry and given a great seat with a table and amazing view as well as a private waiter who was very friendly. Service was a little slow but this was probably due to the overly crowded bar but we did not have to wait at it which was a bonus. Only downfall was the bathrooms. There is an attendant to keep it clean which is great but only 1 ladies toilet for the whole vip area so approx 70 people which was not ideal at all. However this was definitely a minor issue and we had a fabulous night and will definitely be returning next time I am in Mexico!!

Fun time!!. At the beginning my friends and I spent an hour in the line, we start to being a little uncomfortable, but once we got inside the disco we forgot all the time. The music and the show were amazing. We had a lot of fun and we gladly repeated if we have the chance in the future.

Interesting . I went to coco bongo after so many people told me to go and it was a must but actually I didn't enjoy it as much as I thought, it was a bit rush rush push push going in and although our waiters couldn't do more for us the constant drinks took its toll a bit we ended up giving them back, it was quite expensive and unfortunately it was very much aimed at men. Wouldn't go again and wouldn't recommend it I'm afraid which is disappointing !

Crazy Coco Bongo's. I highly recommend getting the gold member package it is well worth it, a brilliant night out, decent drinks, the waiter serves you all night long, obviously a tip is appreciated as they work their socks off.Tip: Arrive around 9:20/30 for the best seats If you are buy the gold member package. You get the best views and the waiter tends to hang around this area

A crazy place. Coco bongo is a crazy place with so much going on.If you are into your night life, i would definitely recommend visiting - we organised our trip with our travel guide and got a great deal on the price including drinks.

Night out . All I can say is go ....amazing lots of tribute acts ...lots of drink ...dancing the lot very very entertaining ..I have some amazing photos ..just loved this and will be taking my family next yr x

Amazing night!!. We visited at the start of June. We had transport there and back included. We had a private table that included open bar, one bottle and our own waiter. Regarding our waiter "Carlos" was brilliant!! Such a laugh, joined in dancing, even got up on the bar at one point! The show you can't really explain, just trust the reviews, it is one crazy brilliant night and if I was ever back in Playa deal Carmen I would be straight back here!

Coco Bongo, Playa Del Carmen.. On June 1, 2016 4couples were vacationing at the "Sian Ka'an" resort in Mexico. We purchased 4 VIP tickets to go to Coco Bongo since the prior Saturday from Stefanie (The German girl at the lobby). She called and spoke to someone at Coco bongo and informed them or the purchased tickets, and even provided us with 2 additional tickets for special prizes at the event. We waited at the Coba Resort and the bus picked us up. 40 minutes later we arrive only to find out that are names were not even on their list. The people at Coco Bongo informed us that the tickets that was sold to us was not VIP tickets, and only regular tickets. We did not bring with us any money because everything was paid for. After some talking to Andrews or Erick from Coco Bongo and a supervisor taxi driver they agreed to take us aback to the hotel, wait for us to get some cash from our room and pay the taxi driver. The bottom line is we never go in Coco Bongo event or Night Club and they only were trying to see if someone cancelled their reservations to let us in as a regular paid tickets. Coco Bongo might seem to be lots of fun once inside however I would not recommend this place to any one due to the following reasons:1- Whoever was to add us to the VIP list did not.2 -We wasted time just being outside waiting just to be stranded.3- there representation is very poor.4- Not willing to help at all.5- They are happy taking your money however, no contingency plan at all when they screw-up.

AWESOME. This is a must and I'd go back in a click of a finger. We paid for the Goldmember ticket which is well worth it with our own table and a waiter who went back and fourth to the bar all night. Just brilliant!!
Crazy nightclub . If you are in playa Del Carmen then going to coco bongo is highly recommended for people who don't mind a big crowd. We had a lot of fun there.

Organized chaos! Do not attempt sober!. Super confusing on getting in and where to stand, packed and chaotic, however, once your settled and drinking, it's crazy good times. Show was entertaining enough, the confetti and balloons was over the top, music was on point!

One of the best nights ever. Great night out.... £90 for gold member vip but worth every penny.
Waiter service was spot on after we had tipped him. Drinks never ran empty.
Shows were out of this world top notch entertainment.
Atmosphere was something else you need to experience it for yourselves. Highly recommend

Be prepared . This is without the best place in the world to visit. I was amazed at it all. It fun fun fun. The acts are amazing and there is so much going on. We partied like rock starts and felt like it was New Years Eve. A place you don't want to miss out on. A must on your list of places to see.
WHAT A NIGHT!!. So much fun, great entertainment and having paid for the VIP we never had an empty glass!The performers were brilliant, funny, sexy! The wife and I thoroughly enjoyed our evening.

Fun experience. . We almost didn't see it. The line up was huge. However, against our judgement we decided to wait it out. I'm glad we did. When we first entered the bar area, again, we were going to leave. It was so packed and I don't do well stuck in the middle of a crowd. We looked for the exit and walked towards it. Just as we got to where the exit would be, we realized it was free of people. So that was where we stayed for the evening. Even danced away by the end of the night. We were so glad we did not end up leaving. We enjoyed the shows. They were a lot of fun. Even if cheesy a bit! Was still very entertaining. The first time a worker asked us what we'd like to drink, we made sure to tip him well. For the rest of the evening he made sure we had drinks in hand just as we were finishing the last mouthful of the previous one. It really was a great experience. I'm not sure I would go again, only because I'm getting too old for that stuff. lol No regrets though experiencing it. Just the opposite. Felt alive and young at heart again! Oh to be twenty again.......
Just go. Just go and have a night out drinking and dancing....perfect night for all ages. Great entertainment and service.

Mad, Zanney, Not to be missed. A group of 7 of us attended Coco Bongo on the 8th June, we all went VIP, which I thoroughly recommend. We checked in and were given our bands, entered the club and were given a free drink, that was in fact drinkable. We were escorted through the busy club, and up the stairs to our seats. The show started and our barman appeared, Angel, and by God was he. He kept our glasses full all night. The show was absolutely spectacular. Paper cannons and balloons filled the room often throughout the show, with people flying through the air, artists performing of ribbons, the Mask, Beetlejuice, the list goes on. In our group the age range was from 20-68 and we all loved it, there was something for everyone.If you do one thing in Mexico make sure it's Coco Bongo

What A Show!!!. This show is so unique and entertaining, you simply would not find this kind of variety in entertainment anywhere else!! The atmosphere is electric and each show is so professionally conducted that you could easily forget that the actors aren't the real people! Amazing from start to finish!!!

Coco bongo . It's a great show with a lot to see and a lot of variety of music
definitely the place to go if you have only one outing to make.

Just go! . Went here alone and it was a blast. The staff are so happy and helpful, the servers are amazing, great atmosphere. The only downside was at check in the lady was very disorganised and as there tablet didn't work she took people's credit card and ID and took a photo on her phone. Besides that great, would go again. The time just melts away.

Best club in Playa del Carmen! . Make sure you get your tickets from Luis (works at the Gran Porto Resort) he is a great guy! He will get you to the front of the line, good tickets and ensure your experience is awesome :)
Danced all night long. Great night out. Not to be missed especially if you like pop music and balloons!!! Lots of entertainment and songs across the ages

Mind blowing . CoCo Bongo was the highlight of my holiday when I went to Mexico, absolutely mind blowing! I booked throigh the bongo tour and got the two clubs prior to CoCo Bongo. The place is bouncing, the acts and the music is phonomenal. The production of the show is absolutely amazing as well. The place is very crowded so you've got to have an open mind but if you get a decent spot it's brilliant. I tipped a waiter 100 pesos and my glass was not empty all night. Absolutely amazing place to visit and I will be certainly be back!

2nd Trip Bliss. Went back here with family and friend during a recent trip to Playa Del Carmen, having been before this had a lot to live up to and once again was amazing, sadly although we paid for VIP gold we got asked by staff on several occasions to move and try to double up on seats - i refused point blank as no other groups were having to do this but still it is not what up need on a night out. The show was out of this world as i expected!
Can't beat it! . AMAZING! have been here 3 times over the years and it's so much fun every time! Also literally the cleanest bathrooms of any nightclub in the entire world!

BOOM BOOM. What a fantastic show. A little unsettling for a first timer because of the way you are corralled through the entrance into the main area but oh my what a show they put on. Spring for VIP or bottle service and it makes the experience much easier since it keeps you out of the mob of people on the floor and provides a much better viewing experience.
Lively night out. An experience not to miss. Good show, good service, loud and great fun. Be prepared for a late night!Would recommend the VIP ticket.
Highlight of our Holiday.. I loved this place, had everything from Queen to Moulin Rouge. Something for everyone and a fab night out!

Great fun!. Had a fantastic night here, worth every penny. We paid for the gold member package. At first we seemed to be crammed in to a corner of the room. Once the show starts you suddenly love the tight atmosphere yet feel like you have all the room in the world to dance, I can't quite explain it but thats how it is haha.The show was excellent, from the iconic tributes to the movie references, every single segment was outstanding.I would like to make a special mention to Adrian, our waiter for the night. Not only did he do his job of bringing us drinks (which were never empty!), he joined in the fun with us, taking photos of us and with us, and just made our night that little bit more special. Thank you Adrian, I hope you go far in the industry :)

Ok. Thought this was going to be the best night of our holiday the way it had been 'hyped up'. But felt a bit dissapointed. We booked through Thomas Cook vip gold member £100 each. This got us a seat with a table and drinks. We waited in the queue for 10 minutes then got shown to our seats. Staff helpful and friendly. We had waiter service all night. Toilets downstairs and it was so busy trying to get through the crowds as there are supposedly 1,000 there each night. The show its was good but not spectacular in my opinion although others will probably say different. It had mostly female in their bikinis dancing on stage some male dancers too. Acrobats and tribute acts miming to songs. Music was also good. A couple of scenes from musicals like cabaret and chicago. The 'mask' comes round and you can get your photo taken$20 roughly £14. It comes in a nice wooden frame with coco bongos logo it's a nice keepsake. I'm not sure what I was expecting but for the money it cost I was looking for a spectacular show and I saw a good show and had a good night.

Best night club night of my life. When i first got in i was not entirely sure i would come to enjoy the night!!! But... As we were coming in we were given a drink at entrance, few steps ahead and free tequila shots.... I was still not keen on this night!!! For me a club where i just watch is not a club . But i was happy i stayed because this was by far the best night club night ever. It was a fantastic setting and the show was amazing, i was gobsmacked !!! And we got plenty time to dance too. The service was beyond anything i expected.my friend had a reserved space for us with alcohol included and we had our own waiter to prepare the drinks for us all night!!! When those were finished i went over to the bar and was clearly overcharged for two drinks, the waiter when he saw me questioned me about it and when i told him how much i paid he took upon himself to go over with me and speak to the person that served me, who straight away apologise. He charged me 500 pesos for two little vodkas. I did not get my money back but got two massive cups worth the money i paid and still got some back,which i gave the waiter for looking after me. Shame i did not take his name as he was amazing and went above and beyond when he did not had too.So this was my only negative and my advise is to get advise on prices before.Apart from that this was an amazing night.it was my friends hen do and they made sure she had an amazing night and even made her part of the show,just outstanding!!!

Great show. Entertainment,lighting, explosions, dancing and drinking, its just non stop fun in Coco Bongos, fun for all ages (we are 58 and had a great time). We had the "silver" package as a deal with a reps bar crawl so we were not on the main auditorium but nevertheless had a great time, loved it.

Night to remember!. If theres one thing you should do .. its Coco Bongo! I'm not much of a clubber and neither is my 55 partially disabled Mum but my younger brother and his girlfriend are and literally before we left we all pretty much didnt want to go through lack of sleep and over heating! Us Brits are used to only rain! ;) But we are all so glad we did, never experienced a night like it and can not thank the staff enough. When booking this through our hotel and the rep named Gloria, I explained that Mum was partially disabled so would need a table .. she sorted absolutly everything! We became VIP's for the night and was fantastic, free bar, bottle of vodka with mixers and waiter service aswell as transport there and back! Gloria had sorted that one of the staff members look after us till we get to the table but when its such a mad rush getting in to a club I didnt have high hopes of this but thought would be fine and understood as its very busy but I couldnt have been more wrong .. one of the workers Carlos walked us through security explaining the whole time what was going on and got us straight to our table and settled with our lovely waiter Angel ! Be warned, it is like any nightclub and does get busy and over crowded but thats life ! The only really annoying thing bout being a Gold member is that the rest of the club seem to think its okay to try and get in to your area .. guys pay more if you want more !!! Dont try to take the seats of a disabled person or their table .. its rude!Thank your staff for such a great and entertaining night .. defo do not miss out on this fantastic show and night with all different era's of music .. you'd be foolish!

Definitely a Experience . I am not one for clubbing though i went regardless.And i was not disappointed.The show is fantastic and a real experience like no place you have ever been.Only one down side and that is it is over crowded. I would suggest buying Gold tickets as we could barely move on the floor.But definitely a experience like no other

Great night, great stuff. We were in VIP area, and no crowd around us at all. Show starts at 11pm and non stop till 3AM when we left. Music, entertainment, service was amazing! Alcohol in drinks was not so much and they did not have Corona, but anyway mood was at MAX level. I would recommend to everybody who is looking for fun!

Bad Gold Member experience . My boyfriend and I got the gold member tickets and everything was going great, amazing show and good service until I had a very unpleasant experience. I was going from the restroom back to my seat through a narrow hallway and when I turned around to let a waiter pass, he touched my behind in a very improper manner. I was appalled and couldn't see which waiter it was. This ruined our night and I couldn't enjoy the show after that, we left early very disappointed.

Night Out During Our Holiday. Very good night out, it is a must if you can get tickets. Show does not start until 11.30pm and finishes around 3.30am. The place is always packed, with something going on for the whole time. The hours just few by.

Awful experience . Was recommended Coco bongos by alot of people who had been there before but being 6 months pregnant I was quite hesitant. But the hen party wanted to do the bar crawl at 2 other places then to end at Coco bongos. Arriving at the club and being told we have v.i.p and a booth I felt more comfortable knowing I wouldn't be in the crowd for too long. However walking through the crowd I was pushed, shoved and totally crushed getting into the "VIP" it was a sigh of relief getting into somewhere where it wasn't so crowded. Although this didn't last long it soon got so crowded you couldn't move and we did not get any VIP treatment including no table! After around 45 mins I couldn't cope and was finding it hard not to have an anxiety attack with the amount of people and sheer panic for my safety. I asked the Coco bongos rep if I could please leave through the exit to which he was insistant I stayed and got to the front which I argued that I was so uncomfortable and needed to go to which he got nasty said he had tried and walked away leaving me to find my own way out. I went to a security member who insisted I had to walk back through the crowd to get out to which I explained I was 6 months pregnant and needed to get out the safest way. After waiting around 20 minutes by the exit I got escorted out the fire exit after many arguments with security. I think coco bongos should rethink their capacity in the club Aswell as false advertising of VIP! And more importantly not only for pregnant women but anyone who finds it to much or overwhelming to be allowed to leave in the quickest and safest manor and not to be knocked back by security.
Excellent. Great nights entertainment, none stop from 11.00pm till we left at 3.00am, all inclusive but could not taste any alcohol in our drinks. Absolutely manic and a great experience.

Bong-tastic. Me and my husband visited this night club and it is something absolutely bizarre but brilliant at the same time. I would recommend getting the gold member tickets. We purchased through Thomson with gold tickets. You don't have to queue and you are seated as soon as you go in. There is 3 floors and we were on the middle floor. Our waiter was brilliant and very fast. We didn't wait long for drinks. The acts what came on were fascinating. Floor 1 is just a massive dance floor and by do these guys know how to party. Brilliant night
Best club in Mexico!. This place is so much fun no matter how many times you visit. It is like a Vegas show experience. The entertainment is worth the money. It is great from young and older adults.

Amazing 2nd visit. Best night ever!!!!!! Can not recommend enough, words really can't describe what a brilliant night out this is. Ensure you pay for a gold member as you will be on a balcony (level with the stage) and you get a waiter who are amazing at bringing you drinks. Make sure you use their WiFi so you can facetime your friends to make them jelous!!
Best club ever!. Visiting coco bongos was the most amazing night club/show I've ever been to! It's hard to describe how good it is, you have to experience it for yourself!

What an incredible party!!. I was skeptical at first to go into town for this show late at night, and with it being 6 hours long, but it ended up being one of THE best parts of my trip. Bernardo approached us at the beach of our resort and gave us the rundown. He was not pushy at all, but more informative. I highly recommend getting the private table and your own bottle of alcohol. It's a 6 hour show/party, so it's very nice to have your own place to sit down. Plus, every table had a great view! For $110 per person, our own table, and a huge bottle of Gentlemen Jack, it was worth every penny! I look forward to visiting Coco Bongo every time I visit Playa Del Carmen now!!

Death trap waiting to happen. This review is specific to the Playa del Carmen location. Also, this review is not a criticism of the performers, who seemed to be very good. But for those not sure what they are paying for, the other reviews are correct. The shows are essentially performers and dancers lip syncing to music, dressed in the same costumes as the performers they are copying, with accompanying video in the background of the actual movie or music video they are lip syncing to. Still with me? In between you had some performers hang from the rafters a la Cirque du Soleli.You are also paying for a long line up in front of Coco Bongo to get in (about an hour for me). Seems like intentional so you consider paying an extra $10 per head to "bypass" the line. If you want a seat or table, then pay the VIP premium. Want bottle service, more money. On the night I went, I guess I was also paying to be packed in with fellow humans like sardines for the entire 3 or so hours when you finally get inside, as clearly the business model is to try and oversell the joint. By any US or Canadian standard, the capacity should be about half of the 1,000, 1,200, 1,500 or whatever number you are told can fit into the PDC location. But once you get inside, you will find out quickly. If there was an emergency or fire in the building, it will make international news...for the wrong reason.Went with a group of people and we stayed for about 40 minutes and got out of Dodge. The "open bar" wristband was a joke, I don't see how anyone could have moved around to get to the bar more than a couple of times...maybe. So can't confirm if the drinks were watered down or syrupy....at the end never made it to the bar in the first place.I see that the very positive reviews come from those who paid for VIP or more. You probably also got inside early and didn't have to wait in the line, even paying $70 USD up front. I can see you probably had a different experience because you actually got to sit in a chair, perhaps with a table, perhaps at one of the higher balcony levels where you had a decent view. But I was unfortunate to be stuck on the floor with the others who thought $70 bought more than 10 square inches to stand in a fire trap.Spend your money with a reputable tour operator on an excursion...hopefully someone that values your safety and gives you value for your hard earned money.But if you decide to go to Coco Bongo, at least be armed with some knowledge so you can ask proper questions to your seller at your resort....even if they will still say anything to make the sale.

Brilliant . As everyone has said, this is a must! Absolutely brilliant night out. We had the VIP service (second from best) walked straight in, free shot, waiter was spot on. Within our package, we had a 1ltr bottle of Bacardi and loads of coke for a mixer.The show was amazing. So much going on. Don't know where to start with this review. it's Definitely worth it!

Must-see!. I highly recommend going to Coco Bongo! My husband and I came here in May (we're late twenties) after being told about it by friends. We booked 2x gold member tickets and after reading some reviews we were slightly worried it wouldn't be for us - how wrong we were! The atmosphere is electric and, yes, the shows are cheesy but that's what you expect! I'd definitely recommend VIP unless you want to be standing all night and it does get quite cramped on the dance floor. In VIP you get a stool (not everyone gets a table), and served at your seat. We tipped $5 when we arrived and got constant drinks all night. When we arrived we didn't like the seats they gave us so we asked to move which they were fine with. There was only 1 toilet in the area we were sat in, and it was cleaned after each person came out which was quite time consuming but a good service. This is such a good night, and don't worry being too tired from jet lag, Coco Bongo will definitely keep you awake!
Disco fun. This is a hip place for dancing, disco techno electro! Flashy and popular :-) come in groups, you'll be likely out by dawn!

Must be getting old!!!!!!. Music and show were average. Don't be talked into paying extra for vip seating area!!! Without checking exactly what this means and where you will be placed I say placed cos it's definitely not seating as you know it!

Absolutely Bonkers. Recently visited here on my first trip to Mexico as I had hear a lot about it. Wow, it was a fun evening. It is one of those places that you really have to see to believe. Everything is over the top and tacky, but that's what we expected. Free booze and entertainment all evening included in the entrance price. Around $60 per person. A must do if in the area. Although, be warned you may have a very heavy head the morning after.

It was okay. Bought the VIP pass which was good for nothing more then skipping line. The shows are very entertaining, however, way too many people and as the night gets going, drunken people start pushing, stepping and at times elbowing you. I must say it wasn't as enjoyable as I imagined and paying the extra $50 for VIP was a complete waste. In my opinion, it's a 1 time deal just to say you done it. No dress code but I recommend shoes so as to not hurt when getting stepped on.

So much fun. We were recommended by friends to do the gold member trip here and they were so right.We took a taxi so we arrived just before the doors opened to ensure we got good seats. We were handed a drink on entry followed by 2 tequilas and then during regular intervals we got the drinks of our choice. The shows were amazing! I did not expect to enjoy it as much as I did. We left about 3:30am and were pretty tipsy to say the least so I feel we definitely got our monies worth.

Amazing Shows - Worth Doing VIP Tickets. My boyfriend and I booked VIP tickets through our hotel and had a fab time. The drinks are great and entertainment really good too! Ladies, if you wear heels and are VIP be careful as the stairs are a little steep. But a really fab evening.

Amazing . Have meant to write a review for months now. All I can say is I loved every second and didn't want to go home. Great value for money if you can drink. Which our party of 16 could. Will 100% return. Would recommend for anyone going to Mexico
Off the charts . This place was amazing! We had good service and the entertainment was really neat to watch. They did a great job.

Best night ever. What an experience . Had the gold member package. Absolutely brilliant best night for me and my wife ever. Had such fun and one of the highlights of the holiday. Recommend to everyone and anyone . Will post pics later.

Bad language barrier leads to being ripped off $250USD. Now I'm sure Cocobongo is all the rave when you actually get inside, but here's the thing.... they don't give refunds or allow date changes... even if they are the ones who screwed up! I booked our VIP package with them 3 or 4 weeks ago online. The lady had very broken english. When I went to go to the club last night (my last night of our trip) they refused me entry because they had booked me for the day prior. They refused to refund my ticket or change it for the day I had asked for... a Wednesday. Not only that ,but the person assiting me spoke basically no English so it was next to impossible to get anything done about it anyways. Yes I get we were in Mexico, but this is a top tourist spot. So here I am on my way back to the States and I am going to have to fight the charge on my credit card to get my money back. Moral of the story is while they put on a great show they have absolutely ZERO customer service....

Time of our lives!!. Coco bongo is the CRAZIEST bar you will ever go to! I reccommend checking it out at least once! My boyfriend and I went once and now make it a priority to go every time we are in Mexico. At our resort now jade you can purchase coco bongo packages which pays for shuttle and entrance fee! If youre spending the $100 per person to go u may as well ask the cocoB rep when u arrive where you can pay extra to skip the line of around 300 people. It's only an additional $10 ish! You're greeted upon entrance with shots of tequila and a crazy atmosphere. Once you get inside fully there are 3 levels to the bar. We paid the cheapest price and found after going many times, it is by far the best spot. Though if you buy a bottle, it reserves you a table do u don't have to carry ur drink around all night. And if u do buy a bottle and don't finish it, u can bring it back with u! The entertainment is out of this world! Streamers, must, smokes, balloons, always something flying from the ceiling! Shows are lipsincers anywhere from Bruno Mars to Elvis to Christina aguilera to shania twain and everything in between. People of all age groups would enjoy the range of music/entertainment. Tho it's a long night, shuttle drops u off between 9-10 and doesn't pick u up til 3 ish. So be prepared! If u wear heels ull die the next day but everyone dresses to the nines, so dress up! Most acts try to get everyone on stage especially the ladies, if you get chosen to climb the tower above all and dance, FYI best not be wearing a skirt/dress at some point of being up there a big gust of air shoots out and I have witnessed many an embarrassed girls bum! But if you're down to party and want to witness the most amazing night u will ever have, coco bongo is the place!!!!!!!!I'll be back for sure!

Thomson gold package with premium drinks / definitely not. We paid $130 dollars each for the gold tickets to coco bongo through our Thomsons rep ( could have bought cheaper from the resort agent which also included a meal ) We were dropped off 200 metres from the venue and were not told where we would be picked up at 3:30. Our bags were searched which was good however the VIP gold tickets were and absolute rip off we were shoe horned into a plastic covered bench and I had to sit in between my husbands legs on a bench beneath him. The premium drinks were appalling nothing like any vodka I have tasted in fact it burned my throat and gave me heartburn, the waiters were rude if you did not tip on every drink, the saving grace to this place is the show itself it was very impressive, but as always the greed of the owners gets the better of them. If they had served you one bottle of premium spirits in an ice bucket with some mixers this would have made the experience so much better.

Party all night!. Coco Bongo is not for the faint of heart, but it is SO MUCH FUN! I am 40 and my husband is 55 and we've been 3 times. Yes, we're older than the average person at Coco Bongo but we don't let that get in the way. We hardly ever let our hair down, but we certainly do here! $70 includes transportation from the resort and all drinks. This time we went on Wed (Ladies night, so tickets were $60). There are 3 levels. If you want to observe more than play, go to the top level. You get an amazing view of the dancers and show that way. If you want to be part of the energy, go to the main floor. There is nothing like the feeling of the cold oxygen blasting down on you or the confetti floating from the sky. If you're a female (and yes, even if you're 40), go up on the stage and dance! I don't drink a lot at Coco Bongo because I just want to dance and play and not feel sick, but if you want to drink, they will serve you until you can't stand up. Oh, one more thing, I've always been impressed by how clean the bathrooms are. It's a bar. People are drunk and throwing up, both of which usually mean disgusting bathroom. I wouldn't sit on the seat, but I didn't gag either.

Amazing! One of a kind experience!. Coco Bongo is not something you would do every weekend. But it's something you should experience at least once! If you hate crowds though you should probably stay away.. We booked Coco Bongo as one of our excursions from our resort and paid about $70 which included our transportation as well as open bar once you arrive. When we got there the lineup was massive. There was a woman selling "skip the line passes" for $10 so we all paid that and were let in right away. Worth it! It is so crowded in there and it can be hard to move through the crowds. If you're used to clubbing though you won't find it bad. We didn't pay for VIP because we wanted to be down on the floor in the middle of it all. I'm glad this is how we went about it but if you want to be able to sit down and not be so much in the crowd then definitely get the VIP tickets. Not sure how VIP service works for drinks but on the floor you can go to the bar yourself and get drinks. Alternatively, your best bet is to do what we did which was give one of the bartenders a huge tip as soon as you get there and he will make sure you have a drink in your hand all night long. Literally, we would only be half way through our drink and he would be there with another full tray for us. Amazing service! Another fun part of being down on the floor is being able to get up and dance on the bar. So much fun! Ladies, I would recommend not wearing heels for your own comfort! The music there is awesome and the "shows" going on overhead are amazingggg! I can't get over the amount of work that must go into putting it all together. I believe there are actually 3 Coco Bongos (2 in Mexico and 1 in Dominican). I've heard they are all pretty much the same though so if you get the chance to go to either of them you should take it! I would definitely go again if I get the chance!
A must. We go every time we are in the area. We did the bongo tour once, which I wasn't crazy about (got to Coco Bongo too late), but still had a great time.

Amazing, Amazing, Amazing!!!!. We booked a gold package for our visit and we were not disappointed. The nightclub is the best I have been to and I have been to a lot including Vegas ones. The show is brilliant from flying acrobats to tribute acts. The night went so quick and before we knew it we had to leave.The only downside is that there was one toilet where we were and as such this caused a problem with queues. There was also an attendant there all the time which means you basically have to tip to use the bathroom which I found odd!Having said that I would def go again when visiting Mexico.

Simply Amazing !!. One of the best club & show experiences ever! Would recommend VIP tickets as better view and less crowded. This place really gets you in the party mood. Getting inside takes a while and gets busy if you have to queue. The waiter in VIP looks after you ($20 tip always helps). I can't wait to go back!!

So So. Was with my Girlfriend there and the Animation Guys of our Hotel.They reserved us a table right on the Stage. The Show is amazing and the music okay.A little bit of all.The only thing is that the Disco was so full of People. I couldnt move myself.The Drinks are for free cause is included in the Price. My Vodka was like Wather.The second as well.I would recomend to go on a table in the first or second floor.Better to dance and more fun.
Amazing show. We had a absolutely an awesome time in Coco Bongo thanks to Luis Cabrera our entertainment guy 100% awesome top service he offered.

Small, loud and not for anyone over 25. The show was good but didn't seem to last long. The seats were stools overlooking the stage which were uncomfortable and crammed in, so not much room. The tickets are pricey for what you get and the music is very much for teenagers - most people over 25 left well before the close.
Scary. Simply put, this place is an accident waiting to happen. Overcrowded, not enough exits, upsell upsell upsell, think frat party on steroids
Amazing. Had an amazing time! Entertainment and dancers were unbelievable! Was fun for adults of all ages. Would definitely go back.

Amazing. This night was fantastic, very entertaining and fun. We got the VIP tickets, got there early and bagged the best view. This meant we had to wait till the count down of 11.30pm so a word of warning - do not drink too much or you may leave early like I did (well til 2.00am!). I was gutted as it meant I missed even more of the show. If you love films, musicals and music you are in for a treat!
Great Time. This is the go to party. Had a blast. The drinks are really good. It's Better to get the gold member or the VIP package. Since its a bit crowded.

Amazing! Again. This is the second time ive been, it was amazing again!This time we did the coco bongo tour which was really good as you got taken to a salsa bar and Senor Frogs first before Coco Bongo. If you buy as a package all drinks are included! Could go again and again

Wild night. Amazing! But I would recommend paying that bit extra for a floor seat. Our view was a little restricted as we were on a balcony towards the back, but you can't fault the show or atmosphere!

Awesome party in Playa del Carmen. This show is a blast. Drinks were good and came quickly, shows were a blast to watch, and they were more than happy to get everyone drunk. Recommended for a night out in playa.

Madness!!! Lol. Loved it. Was a great night out! Would definitely recommend a night out here! First you get dancing on a stage on the lower floor, then the show starts. Dancers dress up on stage dancing to various famous shows like Chicago, lady marmalade, phantom of the opera, Michael Jackson etc... In between the shows they put music on and make you dance, release balloons and glitter paper, then they do like gymnastic style shows from the ceilings, truly amazing. If you go VIP you can have seats and free drinks. It's worth it for the free drinks and not queueing at the bar but the seats are a waste of time because you dance, dance, dance!

RIp off. Bought a package for a bachelor/bachelorette party for a large group. Upon arrival they said the men would have to pay an extra fee to get in - which was not what I had booked and was going to be charged for. Then once it was agreed that this was unacceptable to us, they said we could leave and our credit card would not be charged, that same night my credit card was then charged over $500 US dollars for services we never received. I was emailed and offered a credit with club once this occurred, which after seeing I would never see my money again I agreed to. When I went o use this credit 3 months later, they never replied to my emails. HORRIBLE EXPERIENCE!! DO NOT EVER BOOK ANYTHING AT THIS VENUE!

Loved it. Fantastic night. Everyone should go once Pay extra for seating as standard tickets looked very closterophobic. All inclusive on drinks and it's waiter service. The shoe is superb something for everyone
A most most . The show was flawless... Enjoyed every moment of it. It could get crowded but once u get a vip service you should be good. Just perfect

Dance dance and shows . If you'd like to have a new, completely new experience between club and shows this is the best place to go in Playa.It gets very very busy and packed during weekends I recommend Monday's if you don't like the crowd that much. Madonna shows, Michael Jackson's songs, acrobatics shows and a lot a lot of fun... Be part of it once in life. It's a place to g with friends, not romantic couples night, ask for VIP area of you want to stay away from the Ickes area or try to get a good deal for a bottle service and a table. It's not cheap but if worth the experience.

Good times. I had a good time there. Shout out to Jorge who came back to Sandos Eco after 7pm to get us tickets. He was also there with the bus to pick us up which was nice. They said they would pick us up at 3am and I thought yeah...I will prob catch a taxi back sooner. But I was wrong!! It was really entertaining and before I knew it it was 3am lol. Kudos to the security there. There was an argument going on and the quickly took care of it.

1 star is being generous!!!!. I absolutely HATED this place and would never step one foot back in. We booked this with the Thomson reps, so first of all let me get in that what happened WAS NOT THEIR FAULT and they do a great job at what they do! We got in coco bongos and was on the top level of the club. As soon as we walked in it took my breath away with how over crowded it was. If a fire broke out... We'd of all burnt to death!! There were thousands of people in there when I'd say it would probably hold 1000 people. Wall to wall crammed in like cattle. I honestly couldn't breathe! Within 5mins of getting in here, my partner needed the loo. Whilst he was in the loo, the "security" kicked the door in and demanded his wallet. As my partner kicked up a fuss and said no, they frogmarched him out and threw him out. If i hadn't of been standing by the toilets waiting for him to return, then i wouldn't of known he got thrown out. I asked one of the guys to let me out so i could find my partner, and he couldn't understand me so he wouldn't let me out. It took me 20mins to fight my own way out! I eventually found my partner outside and down the bottom of the road. All the "security" men who worked there had demanded his wallet, and kicked him out as he refused to give it to them. My partner is a big built man and gave them what they desereved.. hence why they left him alone at the bottom of the road. They threatened to call the police on him too... in which he replied.. "carry on". Nothing else came of this as my partner stuck up for himself. I dont think the guys were expecting that and like i said... they just let him be. Spoilt our night totally!! And wasted alot of money as were only in there for 5mins. The show was very cheesey, the 1 drink i had was watered down to the max! All in all... a load of rubbish, run by mexican bullies! Heard lots of stories about this place including spiked drinks and getting robbed. If you want to still try for yourselves like we did... then still be very careful and have your witts about you!

this place was amazing. this is 1 place u have to visit don't want to say to much don't want to spoil it for you entertainment was brilliant from the 60s music touch to the film touch u need to go here and your never to old

Great evening of entertainment! . We booked the Gold Member ticket via Thomson and were not disappointed. A throughly entertaining night out, we visited with our 22 & 21 yr olds and their friends and everyone had a fabulous time. I must admit my husband and I didn't think we'd last the whole night (10pm to 3.40am) but you just don't notice the time as your kept throughly entertained all night and provided with good waiter service from the bellboys. Would definitely recommend!

Fab All rounder, crazy night at coco bongo!. Visited as a couple on 12/05/16 booked through our rep as a gold member (worth the extra money to get a bit of space, queue jump and waiter service.Mix of west end show snippets, tribute acts and cirque du soleil inspired circus type acts.Cheesy at times but great fun with international club music thrown in! Great atmosphere and loads to see with aircon.All in all a great night - worth the money!

Cirus de Ole. amazing.visual overload.a must see. so when you are outside it doesn't seem like much, just another club but i assure you once you get inside its a jaw drop. They have live trapeze performerser about while you get to dance on 3 levels of club!
A fun night!. Coco Bongo is a blast! The show is phenomenal. If you are on the main level try to stand back so that you can see the stage.

If you do anything while away. Do this! . This is the best night you'll have. What a show, there really isn't anything like Coco Bongo! Be sure to dress lightly as it does get crowed and hot. Other than that... ENJOY!

Best club in the world. this is an amazing broadway show type i. the middle of the most fun and exciting dance club in the world. Definitely not to miss, believe me there is no other place like this. My advice is to pay the gold ticket if you can afford it , that way you assure the best view of the show and also a more comfortable experience, the regular ticket gets so crowed you can not move a step. there is also another option ( my favorite) which is to pay for the cover and a bottle of two of any liquor , that way you get a table aside the main dance floor, just make sure to be early so you can get to pick your table otherwise they will set you in a non view table.

Super packed ... probably worth paying for Gold/VIP service. First off, the show was pretty great (hey Vegas, why haven't you copied this already?!?). Very entertaining and well done. The problem was just the number of people crammed in (and we went on a Tues, couldn't imagine it on a Sat during Peak season!). If you really want to go, I'd suggest springing for the VIP tickets which give you a better view and dedicated space and service. Well worth the investment!

Must see show!!!. Coco Bongo was exciting and completely insane!! My friend and I had the best night out. The show was fantastic. Yes, a bit cheesy at times but everyone loves cheese. Worth paying extra to get a gold member band. You get a seat, much better view of the stage and a waiter so you don't have to go up to the bar. Oh and we didn't have to wait in the main queue either. We kept tipping our waiter...so we were looked after incredibly well. It was absolutely packed so would definitely say get there early and wear flat shoes as it is a long night with plenty of stairs. Well worth the price. Hope to go back again next year.

Get ready for confetti. Overall an awesome experience. They put on a great show and work hard. We booked with our resort which gave us a good deal and worth the money. The only problem was that we were right on the floor. You cannot move. The confetti came down every minute or 2 and with that came the staff to clean it up. Safe, but very annoying. Then came the shot girls selling liquor which was not included with your free drinks all night-another damper on things. Try to get up on a balcony or just not on the floor and you'll have the night of your life

Just do it.. Without giving too much away.. essentially this is one big show/nightclub - it's good fun and try not to take yourself or anything else too seriously. There are lots of people in the club. I did the VIP package which gives you a seat/table for the night and table service with branded drinks (unlimited) - also gives you skip the queue etc.Worth slipping the waiter some dollars when you sit down and this definitely worked in helped getting us served quicker etc. The club at times is cheesy and perhaps a little "low brow" but you're on your holidays! as a one off just do it to say you've done it and it is fun. Alcohol always helps.
Amazing . Must go! We went with Thomson as part as a bar crawl! Can be very crowded! Wear flats if you want to dance the night away!Amazing show:)

A MUST DO EXPERIENCE..... Got there at 21.00 and left at 03.00...... Best night out ever.Show was fantastic, drinks included and really enjoyed it. We went as a party of 10 and would without any doubt recommend it and visit again.Worth paying a little extra for the VIP upgrade as drinks are inclusive and we sat up on the top tier and could see everything. Great show, well done to all the performers,very professional throughout. 10/10

Health and safety are non existent. . Heard so much about this place and expected great things but it totally freaked us out! We were hearded in like cattle all the way to the top floor and stood shoulder to shoulder in the searing heat. Only 2 toilets were available that the men and women had to share after a huge wait and when we finally decided to leave it took us 20 mins to force our way down the stairs and through the crowds. I just hope with all my heart there is never a fire here because it could be catastrophic.

AMAZING. Ive been to Coco Bongo several times, but only in Playa del Carmen. And I think it was amazing! The atmosphere is so good and the shows are nicely performed! I would recommend Coco Bongo to everyone that goes to Playa del Carmen!

Amazing! . Bought the gold-member package and Well worth the money. The view of the stage was excellent, your own table and unlimited drinks! One thing I would say is it's a little cramped around the smaller tables. Although the show made it all worth while! Such a fun night out!

Great place to have fun. Totally different than Coco Bongo Cancun, I am not talking about the quality performance or quality place, the vibe and the kind of people is amazing, this is more as the European and South American party, as a trademark you know than always has the best of the best, but.... but... Please someone should do something with the waiters, they always ask for at least $500 MXN for a table, the most of the people knows about the tip is not included, but please don't put a price for it

worth it. A holiday to mexico would not be complete without a night at this awesome place.
A good tip is pay extra for VIP,you get waiter service and seats and table.
Hope this helps enjoy.

Best party spot in Cancun. The vibe and music was awesome, we stop by 2 days of our trip and everyday was different, new crowd,dame good experience. We have to wait a little bit on the line, but as soon you are in,is awesome.

brierley oldies strut there stuff..... rock & roll show,brilliant..best to be on second floor,with own waiter & free drinks all night. show from 10 pm till 3 am then disco.not bad for 60 something age olds...

Great Night Out. If you want a high energy fun filled night with varied entertainment and great music then I would highly recommend a night out at Coco Bongos.We booked a VIP package through our hotel and enjoyed a vantage point level with the main stage. The package included unlimited drinks, which with the encouragement of a reasonable tip our personal bar waiter kept us well replenished with drinks at our seats through out the night.We found the VIP area comfortably full with room to dance on the spot if you wished. The entertainment was varied with trapeze style acrobatics; comedy sketches; tributes to Queen, Michael Jackson, Madonna, Beyoncé, Bruno Mars plus a pulsating Brazilian style carnival section.My wife and I are in our 50s (the audience included all ages) but young at heart, so late nights do not phase us...the show started about 11:30pm and we left about 3am, but the time raced by. We travelled with others from our hotel...one guy in his 60s at the start of the night was questioning his decision to attend, but shouted in my ear during the show that it was 'brilliant', and was raving about it back at the hotel...well and truly converted, and I guess the best advert for what a great night we had.

Vegas style show in Mexico. From the moment you arrive the drinks start coming. Drinks and b line waiting to be seated, rounds of drinks once your seated, and then drinks all night with never a wait. Oh yeah, there's a crazy fun show going on too
Way too packed. Bought VIP package so we could sit but they practically have you sitting on top of people. Slow waiter service. Seemed more for a younger crowd.

Wild night out in PDC. we hadn't planned on going to Coco Bongo, but decided to check it out after hearing so much about it. We purchased tickets from a vendor on 5th Ave with access to the front of the admission line. The club has 3 levels. I'd recommend being near the back and/or on an upper level to have a better view of the show. The show doesn't actually start until about 11:30 or 12:00, but there are dancers and drinking as early as 10:30. The drinks are all-you-can-drink style. It. Is very crowded, but that's part of the fun. The shows happen on the main stage about every 10-15 minutes and are themed (Beatles, Madonna, etc.). There are also acrobatics and lots and lots of confetti! It is truly an experience that shouldn't be missed!
Great time! . I went with my dad and three friends and had a great time! The shows were amazing and it is such a lively place. Great for ages 18-80!!

Good but avoid Tui bar crawl first . We booked this via out Tui rep and went on a bar crawl before. Visiting all the bars before hand. When I next go would just go in directly to coco bongo. The shows are really good, and the atmosphere is great with the size of the venue.
Amazing!!!. This place was wild!! The show was incredible and we were treated like VIPs all night. If your looking for the best party place in town, this is it!!
