The guy who was on our coach to the club passed, so we made him aware that we were not happy and wanted to move. He said don't worry I will sort it. We did not see him for 25 minutes, nor for the rest of the night. We made aware to the security member that we were asking for the rep which was no help. During this time, the waiter who served us was great and could not do any better! Shame he wasn't serving us for the rest of the night as he worked so hard. About 40 minutes later, we moved to another section, again with 2 tables to the opposite side of the club more in the corner. The view was a lot better which we appreciated them eventually moving us! However, from then on was a nightmare. The waiter was awful. We tipped him the first few times, then he forgot about us from 12am onwards. We had 2 people next to us, on one table (bearing in mind 4 of us were stuck on one table) which were uncontrollably drunk. I am all up for a good drink and enjoying Coco Bongos, the show is amazing and nothing like you've seen before, but they were ridiculous. Falling over all the time, pushing into us constantly, falling into us when they went past. Then they tried to get more people from the below section to their area, which was out of order. Their waiter came over to us asking the four of us to move. We wasn't doing anything wrong? His attitude was disgusting. From spending over $700 I do not expect that. We then had a security woman with attitude approach us, asking for our ticket? Why? We made her aware obviously we give this ticket in when we received our wristbands. She then disappeared. We found this odd. We then asked our waiter after about an hour of receiving no drinks if we could have some. He said he had people tip him so he had to go to them first, even though we did! Not brilliant service. The show itself was great, my only criticism being their wasn't half as many acts to the previous shows we'd seen. Also their were no new acts, and also the Bruno Mars act was superb but we didn't see this here. The acrobats are ridiculously good and are a credit to the show. I just wish they would re-vamp it a little, but nevertheless, the show is unreal and a must see!The experience here was awful, when spending so much between the 6 of us for a night out I don't expect to receive the service we did throughout the night at all. I would thoroughly recommend Cancun and Punta Cana 100% more as our experiences there were faultless and amazing! Just such a shame this one couldn't be the same!

No One Word Will Explain Coco Bongo. I am rarely at a loss for words. I will share this. You have to see it to believe it. You have to see it to feel it. You have to see it to hear it.Non stop party, music, bar dancing, pyrotechnic, booty shaking, acrobatic, lip syncing, whistle blowing, shot taking, people watching, smile making, all night long party house.If you don't like music, dancing and having a blast...Don't goWe were lucky and talked to Fernanda when we called in for tickets and she was spectacular. Set up with bottle service a reserved table and express entrance...no waiting in line.You have to experience the show to believe it.

Extremely crowded and overpriced. We purchased open bar and transport for $65 USD each. We then spent $10 USD to skip the line out front (they drop you off half an hour before the doors even open!) The alcohol was cheap, and they crowd as many people in there as possible. Don't expect to see much of the show unless you pay extra for VIP $200USD each! We did enjoy the aerial acrobatics parts of the show (we could see it!) and dancing. Don't bring any sort of bag or purse, as you will have NO personal space - the busboys have their trays clipped to their belts for this reason!

Great night out. Me and my boyfriend visited here during our holiday, we did the VIP gold package with first choice at a cost of around £80 but it was worth it as we had good seats for the show and drinks all night long. The shows were amazing, much better than I expected and it just has a fun vibe. My only criticism is that we were told it's unlimited 'premium' drinks however there was no premium vodka and the vodka they do have is disgusting, it had a soapy taste to it.. but I don't really drink anything else so just had to put up with it or drink water (not much fun in a club).

so good we did it twice. My wife and I have been to Mexico twice and this is the only the only place we visited on both occasions. I recommend buying tickets in advance ( we bought from our hotel reps which are not really any more expensive than buying from the venue ) otherwise you will have to queue twice, once for the ticket then again to get in. If you buy from your rep then you can get straight in. The reps will sell u either ticket only or VIP, I have done both and would recommend the VIP for first timers as this gets u a spot on a balcony which offers the best views as all of the entertainment pretty much takes place at a high level due to the stage being some 30 feet above the floor, there are also entertainers that 'fly' around on ropes suspended from the ceiling. You also get a dedicated waiter service and all drinks are included in your entry price. the only issue I found with VIP was you felt secluded from the crowd and you haven't any space to dance, the crowd on the floor looked to be having more fun but they cant see everything hence why I recommend VIP for first timers. On our second visit we went ticket only and enjoyed it even more but this is because we already knew what was going on above us so didn't feel as though we were missing out which we would have been had this been our first time. Although with entry only tickets you don't get a dedicated waiter service, all drinks are still included but you have to go to the bar first HOWEVER I found that if you give the waiters/bottle collectors/bar staff a tip early on then you get served very quickly, we even had one of the staff bring drinks over to us without asking as soon as he noticed we had empty bottles ( just give a peso tip every time he does this and it'll make life so much easier )......The dancers/performers were of the highest quality. It is so fun fun and the atmosphere is buzzing. Only thing of note is that the show doesn't start until late ( about midnight ) so be prepared for a very late night, I wouldn't recommend booking this trip if you have an early start the next day ie an early excursion or an early flight, definitely schedule a relaxing day at the beach or by the pool for the following day....youll need to get over the hangovers!

The show must go on. Who wants to have a great night this is the club you must go!! Music is great, and the shows are awsome. One of the best place in the world to party. The performers there are so good. More then 20 shows in one night. Drinks all around you included in the price of the entrance ticket. Really a good time.

Great party!!. Such an entertaining and fun place!! Upgrade to the seated VIP with expedited entry. Definitely worth the extra dollars. Also, there is a GREAT taco place right across the street! Go into COCOBONGOS get your bracelet and then go grab some great authentic Mexican food across the street. Idk the name but it has all outdoor seating.

Really fun and different night out!. You have to visit Coco Bongos if you go to Mexico. It's a good night out with good show and lots of drinks. We got the all inclusive package so the drinks were flowing and the entertainment was fab
So much fun! . We went for my stagette and we had an amazing time! They take you up on stage to dance and the server is always close by to bring you more drinks!

awesome party. Went to Coco Bongo for the third time this February . We had a great time always something new to see . Had a great server always coming around to replenish our drinks . Our only complaint is that this time they allowed dancing on f the bar when some of the shows were going on we couldn't see a thing . other than that we would definitely go back next time in Playa del Carmen .

Think Cirque du Soleil meets night club.. Looking for a High Energy night club/show, this is the place to go. Great club music, dancers, light show and overall fun experience. If you have the extra money, pay for private table. The "general admission" area is very crowded and hard to maneuver. If you see a waiter offer a tip when they bring you your first drink and they'll be sure to get back to you often.

Soo much fun!!!. Amazing vibe and shows! A bit pricey but must be done at least once in playa! I was a bit hesitant going on expecting not to recieve the service i paid for but they have blew my mind! It was big and the shows did not stop!

Unforgettable night out!. Coco Bongo's is a must go to night out, an unforgettable high energy evening. It's not a cheap ticket, but money well spent. The price includes entry and all drinks inclusive. Make sure if you can to purchase tickets on the first floor, stops you hurting your neck by looking up at the show. I've seen Vegas shows and this beats them hands down, the pace and energy are staggering, great night / great show.

Incredible night out!. £85 GBP each through Thomson for excursion - this gave you Gold level access which was transfers to and from hotel, drinks covered all night and a stall up on the first level away from the crowds. Waiter comes to you replenishing drinks all night. We were picked up at 9:15, dropped off at about 10:15, show started at 11/11:30 and finished at 2:30 but a DJ then comes on. Bus collected us at 3:30. People of all ages were there and it was a perfect mix of underground nightclub meets broadway show and it worked! Incredible evening loved all of it! I would say wear light lose clothes. Girls maybe a lose dress and pumps / low heels and guys t shirt and knee length shorts. You would be mad not to go! A great night out! xx
Great night out watching shows and dancing. We paid as a gold member so we had a table and a waiter, better than fighting your way to the bar. The shows were brilliant with a disco in between acts.

Amazing place to get fun!. My friends and I, we went to have fun last saturday. It is not the first time for me, but let me tell you that Coco bongo is not the same, I didn't go for a year, and now, in this occasion it was much better, variety of the shows, the opening, the drinks, the service, the music, everything is going better.I always loved Coco Bongo, but this time was outstanding.If you have the chance to go, book it! worth it!Welcome to the Caribbean ! <3

Great show...but a massive scam. Amazing show but a massive scam...paid for VIP seating which was great to watch the show and the service of serving you drink is out of control, but they get you smashed and through you out...beware if you "PARTY" wink wink too hard they will throw you out...this happen to me and they pinched my wallet and only after 2 hours trying to get it back i had no choice but to start a fight with the security, the police to sort it out my wallet was magical was found by security on the ground. I don't blame the company but watch out for the staff.But it was a great show...watch how much you drink and you'll have a great night.

Night out at Coco Bongos. We had an amazing night out at Coco Bongos, it really helped having bought the gold member tickets as this avoids crowds, includes unlimited drinks as drinks can be quite expensive, we were waited on and all of the staff were brilliant.The show performance was brilliant, we even took part in dancing on the main stage with the performers.It was certainly a night to remember

Dance time was great!. I had so much fun at this place went with hubby, 2 nieces and my brother in law and sister in law. Lots of dancing, one of the nieces was called to dance up at front, very cool, Fred was the one that booked this trip, dropped us off got us in right away, sat us down at a table, the show was AMAZING! went on for 6 hours, drank lots. A great time was had by all.

recorded applause, bad drinks, old music, high price. This is just an overpriced - not worth it - party for tourists. 1) fake fake fake: You here thundering (recorded) applause all the time, but there are just a few people inside! The girl in front said 700 tickets were sold but the truth is there were at most 200 people in the club. AT MOST. Maybe you do not notice that, if you are drunk enough :D ... which is hard, because 2) drinks are disgusting. They do not use real juice for cocktails but sirup. We tasted a lot of drinks but could not even finish one. too sour, too sweet and always: a chemical artifical taste mixed with cheap alcohol... open bar is a waste at coco bongo. 3) The music was old and the sound not good. Mambo no.5, etc... They did not play even one current mainstream radio song. The 50+ guests might have liked it, we 26+ did not. 4) The show was ok, but can not compete with high artistic niveau.

General Admission is a joke. My husband and I spent $70 each on tickets for Coco Bongo in Playa Del Carmen through a travel person at our hotel. Our friends had all said that Coco Bongo is amazing and we had to go. We were very excited and got all dressed up and ready to spend the night partying. Our driver was very prompt and the ride into town was fine. Once we got there they told us we could wait in the mile long line or pay an additional $10 each to skip the line and go in the entrance with people that purchased VIP tickets so we did this. As we were walking through the hallways into the club they gave us cocktails and tequila shots which were fun. Once we got to the front though we showed our general wristbands and were told to just stand to the side. That ended up being where we stayed for about an hour before we left. It was so overcrowded and we couldn't move at all. There is only one bathroom and once you are in the mix with all the people you can't actually get to it. The servers had to get through to all of the guests and had to shove their way through each time, I felt bad for them as most people wouldn't move an inch (but of course they want a drink). They have some girls from the crowd go dance on the stage before the show but when the show started these girls seemed to think they were the stars of the show for the rest of the night and kept climbing back up there so that the people on the floor couldn't see past them. After being pushed and squeezed and having to pee for an hour we decided the show wasn't that amazing to stay for and we went for some nachos and burritos close by and then started to walk fifth ave. At the end of fifth ave we found an amazing spot called the Blue Parrot. It was $10 a person to get in (included drinks for ladies but not men), and it was right on the beach. They had a fire show and later a break dancing show. There was more than enough room to dance and have a good time and it had two different DJ's and rooms and some chairs in the sand to just relax. Our friends have raved about their times at Coco Bongo but I guess they all did the bottle service packages. So unless you are a big group prepared to shell out for bottle service, I would say Coco Bongo is not worth it.

Amazing show. Coco bongos is an adults only night club.The entertainment starts at 11pm and continues non stop till 5am. We purchased gold member passes for 60 dollars which includes a balcony view of the stage and free drinks all night with waiter servive and your own bar. The show is very entertaining and well worth the entrance fee

Best place on earth!. I promise you will not be dissapointment. Get the VIP entrances for private seating and sit back, drink and enjoy the show. Nightlife will never be the same after you experience this venue.

Brilliant. This was a fantastic night, I really enjoyed it.
We did the normal ticket entry, we brought them from a rep in our hotel.
It was a great night and I would highly recommend it!

Amazing. Don't get scared when you think you will be on th entrance to what you will find to be an absolutly an amazing theatrical mesmurising gobsmacking fun filled star studded show. Would recomend the vip level 2/3 to right of main stage and ask for carlos enjoy.....

Amazing. One of the best nights, never experienced anything like it.
Great for all ages, saw a wide range of ages!

Best time . I loved this place. By far the highlight of my trip. Picture Vegas impersonators and cirque de sulie had a child. For $65 you get transportation to and from, open bar, seating, music and show. The hotels usually hand staff from coco bongo in site selling tickets. Plan to leave there at 3 in the morning.

HIGH ENERGY AND GREAT ENTERTAINMENT!. Get your tickets pool side at your resort for the better experience (open bar). This event was exciting and full of energy. The drinks were good and the show was great. The bar service has a very difficult job and they do it well. I never had to wait long for a drink. The club was safe and there are police everywhere. Make sure you tip well. The staff at this club work very hard.

What an amazing show & Party. We had such a great time. We opted to pay for the gold member. You get seats and a private bathroom as well as server. The show was worth every penny spent. This place is a great choice for any age. Highly reccomend a night out here. Would go back for sure.

Watching UFC. We were trying to find the UFC fight to watch and they had it on. The place is super small but right in the heart of all the action. The people watching at night is crazy. We lucked out and got a table. It was very loud in there. The margarita's were terrible. They put some kind of carbonated stuff in them... Not a true margarita we are used too. The other fancy drinks were good but the crown/Coke my hubby ordered next was very weak... You are going for the atmosphere and people watching. They usually have good sports going on the big screen.
Watered down drinks, crowded and fun if you're 16 years old. Don't waste your time or money. Place was packed with little room to sit. The show was OK but definitely the place is way overrated.

great night out. Amazing show, great acts there was always something happening in front of you or above. Im 50 and my parents were 70 and we all enjoyed it, even my mum was dancing to the 60's stuff, was a bit dissapointed with our seating arrangement but we soon wiggled about and didnt notice in the end, having your own waiter (Carlos) was brilliant, didnt have to move an inch. Thankyou to Eric from Gran Porto Real for getting us the tickets and escorting us all the way there. Great night had by all.

Heather M. Too crowded. No place.really to stand without being asked to allow staff through every couple of minutes. This whole concept is beautifully thought out but a larger location in Playa del Carmen would be better. I could only wonder what would happen if a fire or some sort of emergency had happened

Great experience, entertainment at its best. Wow where do I start? It was all going on here. We travelled with a group from our resort starting at Señor Frogs, then a salsa bar then on to Coco Bongo. The Club was heaving, holding around 3,000 people. We booked for Friday evening having been reliably informed that this is the best night to go. We were not disappointed. The floor show is non stop with entertainers hanging from the ceiling, burlesque dancers performing Moulin Rouge type acts, Star Wars renditions, balloons cascading from the ceiling and much more. I have never been anywhere like that before and have travelled quite extensively. I loved it. I'm told that this is the brain child of Jim Carrey and when in Coco Bongo there is a person dressed like him with a green mask on who walks around getting his photo taken with guests. Well done Jim!
Great Time!. Coco Bongo was beyond my expectation! Non stop entertainment, awesome shows. We had the VIP tickets so we were seated at a table (instead of standing)

A vacation high point. Our group of 8 had the VIP package, which was great. The only (small) issue, is we had someone with limited mobility in our group. The stairs were hard for her to negotiate, but once we were seated, all was good. The show was amazing, the drinks were flowing, the bathroom was close. My advice, if you plan to go is spring for the VIP tickets. I don't know if I could have stood on my feet for 5 hours. Overall, a great time.

Wow!!!!!. I can't believe how many wonderful acts were performed. From Phantom of the Opera to Meatloaf to Michael Jackson to Bruno Mars to Pitbull to Chicago to Grease to Star Wars to Tron to Beatle Juice to Jennifer Lopez to Christina Agulara plus the acrobats and music videos.......... All on top of the fizzy apple vodka and tequila shots and many other mixed drinks!!!! Best time of my life!

Pretty Poor. Surprised by the positive reviews on here as it's pretty disappointing, I'm sure it's great if you're under the age of 21 and never been to a proper nightclub before or the theatre. Firstly its $60 for the cheapest tickets which is standing but free drinks and cocktails all night. They fail to tell you that there are only three cocktails to choose from and they a pre-made with cordial juice rather than real juice. I had to stop drinking them as they were too sweet and syrupy from the cordial. The next price tickets are $110 for a table which you can stand at or at best have a step to sit on by the table. The next bracket of ticket is a table at $130. The place is very busy, to the point where I think they would be shut down in the UK/US for over filling the venue and it being a health and safety risk. The service is the only good thing, the waiter was always over getting us drinks.The club puts on shows all night, probably around 7/8 of them. They are all pretty lame, I think they have 2 proper dancers and the rest they must have picked up off of the street. They try to distract you from how poor they are with all the visual effects from the video screen and by firing out confetti/balloons from canons. Don't get me wrong, the acts are entertaining enough but don't expect anything amazing like others say they are. There were two acts which were half decent at best. There is no way this is worth the entry price for the drinks that you get and as I say, the people who say this is amazing must be under the age of 21 or not seen anything else or been to any proper nightclubs before. I'd save the $120 (you'll obviously be going with someone) and spend it on an excursion or some nice meals.
Nightlife . Great experience a must do if you visit this area just ensure you book rather than just show up as the queues can be huge

Amazing night experience. Amazing experience filled with quality music, pyrotechnics, stage performances and open bar! It is recommended to get there early as queue can be long and once inside you will need to quickly find a place to stand (for 4 hours!). Drinks are bought to you so no need to queue for drinks and toilets are attended by an assistant which helps!

Jam packed fun. I went to this place unsure of what to expect since has been 15 years since I've been to a nightclub and it was crazy! From when the doors opened at 10pm, we were walked in and handed drinks and a shot of tequila before being squeezed into our seats (we paid for table service). Until about 11:30pm, it is just music you can dance to, but then the show begins and it never stops. It is loud, crazy and has a ton going on. The staff is great about getting you drinks and trying to keep the place clean. But make no mistake, it is jam packed in there and the alcohol is freely pouring so by the end of the night, things can be a little rowdy. However, for something different and for a memorable night, this was a lot of fun!

Love it or hate it. Not my type of thing but my partner wanted to go to this so we did and it was packed out. Cant remember the price but it wasnt cheap. My partner enjoyed the show and everyone else seemed to be too.

Brilliant night out...dodgy drinks. Coco Bongo is a brilliant night out, show is fantastic but both my daughters went & only drank about 4 cocktails & both of them were too ill to get up the following day & extremely sick.. So my advise is to go cause I think it's worth seeing but don't drink much as we've found out since that a lot of people who have been have ended up very ill the following day, I only drank about half of 2 cocktails & they are extremely strong.

FUN FUN FUN. We had so much fun at Coco Bongo. Great music, Great Performances, Great Drinks everything was just what I expected. Restrooms where super clean all night and for me that is a SUPER plus.We bought the all you can drink package which included a table and for us it was perfect but If you dont drink that much just go with the regular entrance. Also if you dont mind standing or if you are the kind of person that dances all night save your money for drinks or something else and just pay the regular entrance fee. Next time when I visit I will buy the regular entrance.

Great party. Went to Coco Bongos in Playa Del Carmen last night. Wow what a party. Got the rock star package with bottle service. Great seats and the show was as usual amazing. New acts like Star Wars was great. They really pack em in there so if yo want some space a table and seats go for the rock star or gold package, it's worth it VIP all the way.

A Fun time at Coco Bongo. This is a fun night and although a very late one, the energy and entertainment keeps the adrenaline going. The show starts at 11:30 and you definitely want to get there early. The line up was already in play at 10:00 PM. We bought the VIP / Gold Member passes which are about double the cost but include the ability to bypass the line (still a short wait) and also get into the second or third level at a small table or table / railing with seats. Unlimited premium drinks are available for these tickets and you get a dedicated wait staff who were very focused and attentive. Huber, our server, is great!Even with the VIP passes I suggest you go early (10PM) so you can get a better choice for seating.

best show and disco ever!. it´s truly a full package party! the show is incredible! the space it´s kinda like a theater but you can enjoy the show from everywhere. the waiters and waitresses really try their best to make you feel confortable and they give you the best service so you can keep the party on

The best night ever!!. The show was unlike anything I had ever seen in my life. There was Beetlejuice flying across the room, dancers and singers on the stage. Then Elvis came out and put on an amazing show. Pirates of the Caribbean done a really good performance with amazing costumes, and they had some pirates hanging from the ceiling doing all sorts of acrobatic things. They celebrated the Rio 2016 Olympics with a carnival themed show, where everyone got given balloons and there was so much confetti and singing, it was amazing. Sadly when the night came to an end, and before we all hobbled back to the coach, My husband and I went to the Coco Bongos gift shop and brought a t-shirt each which were pretty cheap as it was definitely one of the best nights of our lives and honeymoon.
Great night. Good value but go to the floor and and not gold member , buy your tickets from hotel or on the street not from your compsny

Amazing. If there's one place to go for a night of entertainment, this is it. Absolutely amazing place. Fantastic shows all night. Go for vip gold member if you prefer to have a good seat with a waiter and all your drinks included. It's not cheap but it's honestly worth every peso.

A blast at coco bonga!!!! Thanks to Tomas:). My fiance and I stayed at the secrets Capri resort in Riviera Maya playa del carmen in mexico for my 40th birthday. As we were enjoying our vacation one day into it, Tomas (Andrew) coco bongo's entertainment recruiter approached us and asked if we wanted to go to coco bongo. It's a night club with Vegas like entertainment and celebrity look a like performances. It was $140 for two tickets. We was to leave the resort at 9:30pm and leave the club at 3:30am. When we brought the tickets we didn't realized it was 6 hours of partying. I thought omg what was I thinking. I have a history of Lupus which is a disease that causes fatigue, joint pain etc. I thought to myself it's no way I'm going to make it through the night and I went to the concierge to cancel, but it was too late to get my money back. So I said we just have to make the best of it. Well a couple of hours after trying to cancel, Tomas came over to us and said he heard we was trying to cancel. I explain to him why I was trying to cancel as previously stated due to my lupus. Tomas told me he understood and that he was going to see what he could do for me, because I would be standing all night. However they do have tables you could purchase with a host to bring your drinks to you. I wasn't willing to spend anymore money considering I was trying to cancel. Tomas assured me we would have a good time. When we got to the club, Tomas didn't just drop us off, he was very attentive to us and made sure we were safe and taken care of. Once we were in line, Tomas went to get us checked in and when he came back he told me that he explained my situation and they gave him permission to give me and my fiance a table to sit at with no problem. I can't express enough how much that meant to me. I was extremely pleased with Tomas and coco bongo's humanity and understanding of my disability. Tomas is an excellent person and employee and I would suggest if you party at coco bonga (which you should) RESERVE YOUR TICKETS WITH TOMAS. I'm ecstatic to say that I wasn't able to get a refund for my tickets, because we had a blast!!!!! I really enjoyed myself. I felt like I was 20 again and I couldn't believe how much fun I was having and I barely sat down. We were having such a blast that 3:30 seem to come soooo fast. I will definitely go back when I go to Mexico. I love ♡ Tomas and so did my fiance. Check out our picture we took together the next day back at the resort. I had to have one with him. Such a great asset to coco bonga!!!!! ☆☆☆☆☆☆☆ Thanks from Markiel in Philadelphia:)

Unbelievable. If you are looking for theatre, dance, music, a fantastic show and great fun; go here! You won't believe what is happening to you. Its one of those places you have to visit once in your life. Whether you're young or not that young anymore, it doesn't matter!A few suggestions; buy your ticket the night you visit the Coco Bongo and skip the long waiting line. So don't buy tickets on the street days in advance. If you just want to watch, you can get a table on the 1st or 2nd floor. We didn't have a table and were right in the middle of everything on the ground floor.If you want to save some money, go to the bar yourselve to get your drinks. If you ask the waiters, you'll have to tip them all the time. And watch out for all the shots, they are 5$ each...Enjoy!!

What a night. We were a bit unsure if we would last till the end as we are no longer teenagers, expected to be in a cab around 1, i had to be dragged out at 4 am , the place is amazing and what a show and the music and atmosphere is unreal, 6 of us wend and we all had an amazing time, never with an empty glass, if your in the area you need to visit,
Amazing. The best show in Mexico , worth is to see. Make sure have a nap in the afternoon , this show starts at midnight and goes for 3 full hours . We never got back to the hotel till 4:30 am

Just amazing . What a show never seen anything like it . . It's crazy and a must see!! Recommend to pay the extra for table service perfect for the show and they won't see you without a drink even how busy it is our waiter was always around

Life changing experience . We bought tickets through our resort and were guided to coco bongo with Francisco and of course our driver Jose cuervo lol such a great time. From our ride there to the actual bar. Francisco didn't just drop us off he took us right into the bar and found us a spot and made sure we were good. A real stand up guy. The show itself was literally a life changing experience! Just an amazing experience that literally puts Vegas to shame. My only advice would be to not drink before you go because making your way to the bathroom is tough because of how packed this amazing party is. Best and most memorable birthday of my entire life. Than you coco bongo for changing my life! P.s.-sorry for farting in the van francisco!
awesome. Me and my friend had a blast at this club. The shows are beyond expectation . WE recommedn to book a table .
Awesome!. This club is awesome. Non stop shows and videos. We were on the 3rd floor and could see everything. Make sure to go here.

Great show but overcrowded and unsafe!!. We went here through Thomson who lied to us about having a seating VIP so don't book through them, they are shocking. We were on the main floor and yes in all fairness the show was great especially Freddie Mercury but it was so crowded and we kept being ushered one way and then the other by the security - when we had nowhere to move to!! This place is a serious safety worry and is packed with people. They just want to get as many people in as possible. For 120$ each it was a complete rip off. If there were ever a fire there, the outcome would be catastrophic!! They need to address this before something serious happens here.

Go! Great night out.. Booked a VIP ticket via the tour guide in our resort paying $150 each. Taxi collected us and dropped us off on the street outside of the club. Was really pleased we paid the extra for the VIP tickets as we were seated upstairs on a balcony, close to the bathrooms and bar with a great view of the stage and dance floor below. It really doesn't take long at all for the staff here to soon have the entire audience on their feet dancing. The atmosphere throughout the entire night was electric. The show was phenomenal, sort of Cirque du Soleil meets Moulin Rouge with a super star of a midget and lots of surprises thrown in along the way. The waiters in the VIP area kept the drinks flowing without us having to ask and the night flew by quickly and before we knew it was 4 am and we were on our way back to our hotel with sore feet from dancing but happy to say the least!Very mixed audience ranging from young adults to older clientele all having a great night out. Well worth a visit. You'll not be disappointed.

A wicked night 🎤🎧. Coco Bongo will be a night I'll never forget. I'm a mature female and I've never been to a night club let alone stay until 3:30am. My friend and I went Gold members which is a must as you get great viewing of all the club and you're looking down instead of craning your neck to look up. On the floor it was packed solid and a couple who came on our mini bus left early because the female was short and was being elbowed and knocked all the time and she struggled to see over the crowd. Gold gives you priority entry , your own table and waiter. He was great and I can remember part of his name being Juan. We had disorrono all evening and when I knew I'd had enough he was great and just gave me water. He took us through the crowds to direct is to the toilets also. These little touches were lovely. The acts are so professional and funny too. The music is from all genres. 70s and up to dateGo and experience the night when you go to Mexico as this is the only country you will ever get to experience anything like this. We paid around £45 pp with Thomson and I cannot fault them but at our hotel Ocean Maya Royale we had Ariel promoting Coco Bongo and he was so nice that we got a T Shirt and bag from him. So I believe the tickets would be a little cheaper and we would have got the same experienceJust a note that you are not allowed to take any tablets, selfie sticks etc into the club. Your bag is searched thoroughly and I had to leave my tablets and selfie stick and collect it at the end of the evening. This would have been helpful if Thomson had explained this when we purchased the tickets as it was time consuming filling out forms and the stress of whether I'd ever see them again, which luckily wasn't the case for me. Well done Coco Bongo. Can't wait to go again next year and see a different show.

Must see show/party in Playacar!. Coco Bongo is a great place to party on and dance until your feet say ENOUGH!The absolute highlight of this place is the incredible show that occurs fro 11 until 2 am!Up to 40 acrobats, dancers and actors live performing like artists such as Madonna, J-Lo and Michael Jackson. recereation of awesome movies such as Pirates of the Caribbean, cicago, Moulin Rouge... all mixed up with dancing music intervals.Great ambient... I didn't stop dancing nor my friends all night long! You have to see it to understand what Coco Bongo is! Plus we were an awesome group of friends that made te party even better!We got a server all night with drinks and water coming along all night! The girls selling shots are hilarious. Even if you don't buy any shot, they are super cool to talk to :D We hada great time!
Coco Bongo. Awesome night club. . .to s of different shows and performers to keep you entertained. Staff was very good about keeping everyone under control and ensuring you always had a drink.

What an experience!!!. We stayed in riviera maya and paid through thomson for the 'VIP' section which was $130 each, the coach picked us up straight outside in the evening. There are beers etc on the coach that you can pay for.The queues outside were small and we were whisked straight upstairs onto a balcony - I think it's impossible to have a bad view it's like a theatre style. We had our own mini table and the waiter would walk birng you drinks all night. They're all premium spirits from Jack Daniels to Smirnoff vodka! I think you can get premium beers too. The show is absolutely amazing and I would certainly go there again!!! You'd be mad not to go - after the show in turns into a little more of a club for a few hours until around 3am I think!

What a night!! . This was literally the best night we have ever had. We decided to go for the gold member so we got the vip treatment by having our own table and our own waiter who gave us our drinks all night which was great as it was extremely busy so meant we could stay together and not worry about keep going to the bar. The seats we had were great viewing on the whole venue and the stage. The music was a great mix to everyone's liking and the club was buzzing before the show had even started. The show was fab and nothing like I had ever seen before. It was a great mix of everything including Phantom of the Opera to Elvis to Bruno Mars and Star Wars. We didn't want the night to end as were enjoying ourselves so much. It is most def worth a visit and the hangover and lack of sleep the day after is bearable after such an amazing night.It's a shame the clubs are only in Mexico as we want to go again but I would def go back to Mexico again to go back to Coco Bongo.A night we will never forget!

Fabulous . We paid for VIP service and couldn't fault it the drinks kept coming all night the show was excellent although to start with it was a bit seedy with the cameras constantly being pointed up girls skirts & showed on big screens but they seemed to take it in good part! We were picked up & dropped off from our hotel door it couldn't have been easier.

5 stars is just not enough. Coco Bongo is the best place in town to go to if you want to go to a night club. In fact, I believe its the best club in the world.The versatility of the show is just amazing. Great music, great acts and not to forget all the paper shreds and balloons falling out of the air.Personally, I like a spot on the floor instead of a reserved table, as you're in the middle of all the action. If you do too, don't reserve your tickets, but just go there on the night, speak to the official sales people just outside the club and buy your tickets there. You pay the same price and you can skip the line waiting outside.Go there and enjoy! You'll definitely have a great time!

A night to remember . If you go to Playa Car you HAVE to go to coco bongos. We payed for our tickets through our thomson rep we had VIP tickets and our drinks were free for the night! We had amazing seats so the show from start to finish was entertaining. Worth every penny!

coco bongo night cub. one of the best night clubs I've ever seen,who ever goes to cancun should go there,its super safe and has friendly staffs.i paid $190 for free entry for 2 night clubs and also unlimited drink in coco bongo. Not only club also life show and perfect sound system.

Amazing night . My boyfriend booked this before we got to Mexico and I'm glad he did. We went on a Saturday and when we had our meeting with the Tour Operator she said they book up fast.We had a coach take us there from our hotel and back again around 2-3 am so we didn't have the worry of getting back. We had an amazing night. Even enjoyed some street food on the way back to the coach.

Fun!!. Don't shy away from this attraction! Young and old come for the show. It is loud and runs late into the night but the show is so worth it! The costumes, the actors, the streamers, people flying around overhead! A must see. If you are feeling a little shy or too old for this, just pay for the VIP ticket! It gets you in the door quickly, good seats and great waiters! Get ready for the time of your life! Another wise tip...do NOT plan anything for the morning after.

Great Time. Very good show, drinks were good and service was fast. Only complaint is that its standing room only and getting to the bathrooms is very difficult because its so packed. Would be five stars if not for that

Awesome Experience!. We had a blast! The bus picked us up from our hotel and later dropped off after the show ended. We purchased the VIP package; all you can drink, had great seats and great service. Entertainment was great and loved the music! An experience we will never forget!

We Love This Place. Love the music, entertainment and people watching! We arranged to be in the balcony area with our group. We had VIP service arranged by the coordintor of our group through Apple tours. This is more expensive, but we like the extra service and escorts in and out of the club. Great place to go with friends.

Best night out ever . Didn't know what to expect but it had to be the best night out ever! Went for bottled service, had great seats and great service. Would recommend to get a taxi there as coco bongo bus arrives when everyone has already been in the queue for a while. Best party I've ever been too.
Awesome night. Have to go its an amazing experience, not one ice experienced befire . see it for yourself to believe it!!

Best time I've ever had. I could go on forever about why you need to go to Coco Bongo.. JUST DO IT! Seriously amazing! I wish we would have went every single night (although I don't think it is humanly possible to drink that much)

A lot of fun (beware the cost though!). We did 'Bottle Service' from our resort, and when you run out of the bottle you bought, it is completely insanely expensive to get more - don't do it, just enjoy the show!

Over rated. If you feel like spending 60 dollars to get into a place that is extremely over packed and stuffy then this is the place. I personally think its too much hype over Nothing and its way over priced. The people that work there are very pushy and seemed to have an vibe about them as if they are doing you a favor by letting you pay an arm an a leg to get into a cirque de soleil like show.
Must go and experience: CocoBongo Cancun. If you enjoy music, dancing and watching dancers and performers: GO, you will not be disappointed. Guaranteed a good night....

Off The Chain!!. While lazing by our pool a young man came by promoting this club. He offered transport from our hotel, entry and open bar. It was enough money but 'when in Rome"! What a blast!!! Tequila was flowing the minute we entered the club which opened up into a multi-level, multi-staged arena. Tunes were blasting, girls were dancing, dry-ice was pumping. Non-stop action. Although the place was packed it was well controlled and the crowd was up scale and all ages. Too much fun!!

Great night. It was an eye opener not what I expected at all .......thought it was a show on stage but the acts come out on guide lines . Fantastic night out was vip gold so drinks get brought to you all night no standing at the bar ...and no bill at the end of the night .......the air conditioning was on in the club so didn't get hot once .....it truly was a great show.

Good show but very very very cramped. We have just returned from 2 weeks in Mexico and while here we were "persuaded " to go buy a salesman. We arrived at 11pm and paid a vip price. The show started at 11.30 and finished at 3.30 am. The actual show only lasted about 30 mins and we were told there was 26 acts but in reality there was about 12 or 13 and the rest of the time it was music which was mainly Mexican pop acts so we didn't know the songs.We have to say the main problem was space. We have never been so crammed in in our life. We were told there were plenty of toilets and the truth is there is only 1 and you have to fight through the crowds on the floor and that took half an hour to get there and back again. We were sold that no one would be in font of us , more lies. While the 2 min shows of each act were good we will never go again. All we will say is that anyone wanting to go there should know that even if you pay for vip tickets you will still be extremely cramped so be warned.

Must do. Great show even for non-drinkers/non-party animals. Had a brilliant night- stayed till 4am- no trouble. Staff are great and people are great. Open bar all night and brilliant entertainment lasting most of the night

Amazing!!. Okay so we are a young couple and went with another couple we met in our resort but this place is for anyone!! It was so much fun! Mini shows, dancers, music, balloons and confetti constantly falling from the ceiling! Go go go! If travelling with tui get the gold member package for all inc drinks and a table :)
PLACE TO BE. Best party atmosphere in all cancun. Only downfall is its 3 times more expensive then the other clubs but by far the best. Must go if in the area.
Great Night. We went as goldmembers and had a table. We were served drinks all evening and didn't leave until 3.30am. Great show!

AMAZIN. Went here once during my 2 week stay. Although I was with my family I had an amazing time! There's so much to see and even though it is really busy, there is still room to move. The people who work there encourage you to dance and I ended up being on the table with my sister multiple times! The shows they put on are outstanding and I would never ever fault it. We bought tickets through our rep at the hotel (Occidental Grand Xcaret) which included a coach there and back, entry, drinks ALL night. AMAZING!
Nice place. Must see for anyone visiting cancun. the performances are awesome and the perfect ambience for a party night with friends

Amazing. Maybe the best night out iv ever had. All other acts were incredible. Such a variety and all so unique. Waiters were brilliant and never waiting around for a drink. Would recommend going goldmember as you get a table and drinks included all night. Loved it!!!

Out of the world. I'm not sure what I was expecting when I turned up here but it was crazy. the seating I am guessing is for VIP as we just had 'drinks included' tickets so had to stand. (I'd recommend paying the extra for VIP, think you may get bottle service too plus import drinks).The show was great, and the atmosphere is just mad, everyone is just loving life there! We managed to get very drunk on the bottom shelf spirits so the pours must have been good! would recommend, if you don't want to drink it's probably even more fun, as you are able to actually remember the whole show!

Coco bongo a good night out. We went there at the end of our holiday we were going to get gold tickets online but waited until we got there so the vip was sold out but we were able to get a table with bottle service which was very good as we had a good view of the stage but were able to get all the atmosphere too. It was a very good end to our holiday and I would go there again.
Feel free to party . Amazing place, great music, awesome service. Make me feel young again a place for all ages just go willing to have the best time of your life
Best time ever. There's nothing like CoCo Bongo. If you're able to go I highly recommend it. I've recommended this to three different people and everyone has come back with the same feelings

Coco bongo 2016. Wicked night!!
Big shout out to the salesman Rafael, top bloke and couldnt do enough for you before and whilst your into the club.
Walked us straight in, showed us where everything was and made sure there wasnt any confusion with drinks etc..
Great show, good company and brilliamt service.
RECOMMEMD IT!!!

Amazing. This is one of the most amazing entertaining evenings I've ever experienced. My family, including our children ages 18-28 and their partners plus three adults in their 50's went to Coco Bongo and we all had a blast. I could not believe the professionalism of the shows and how they entertained the entire audience no matter what the age. I would recommend the VIP where you can sit rather than stand all evening.

Great night out not but the best value.. We booked our tickets through our travel agent virgin, they only offer the gold balcony seats which cost us over $100 each. For that price you get a guaranteed seat on upper level and unlimited drinks. We arrived at q0pm and were the first ones in there, we were greeted with tequila on arrival. During the pre-show period there is a camera that scans the audience and it shows up on the big screen. Be warned any women with cleavage will be zoomed in on. The show is very high energy with lots of special effects and we very much enjoyed it. Show includes impressive performances from all the big pop icons and comic book heroes. There was a good selection of drinks including cocktails being served throughout. The show goes on until about 2am but it stays open as a night club for longer. Although the show is great be prepared to drink a lot to get your full money’s worth.

It was amazing . We just simply loved the vibe and the show!!! It was colorful.. never been to a club like this. I was amazed!! You will have to see this place!! I'm giving 4 stars bcuz it was very crowded, which is expected.
Night before my wedding . Super fun club but a table is a must. The music was great, drinks were relatively strong, and washrooms were decently clean.

Amazing!!!. Loved the entertainment, and the staff was very attentive, thank you "William" for the service at the table, never let our drink die. Us Canadians really enjoyed our selves. We were very worried that we would not be able to stay up that late but we made it till five in the morning not a place you can fall asleep or be bored up we will definitely be back

Fantastic Night Out!. Loved the Coco Bongo experience, great entertainment! The only downside was how packed it gets, people breathing on your neck etc freaks me out but the show itself was fantastic. Well worth the money and would go back again!
amazing. the most amazing club ive ever been to, i could of gone every night, this was out of this world the shows were fantastic, out tickets from the hotel included drinks and transport!! fantastic

Awful . My friend and I went to Mexico for a couple of weeks. While we were sunbathing on the beach a guy came to us and told about Coco bongo.We decided to go purchasing a ticket for 2.All we were told it was that it would have been a lot of fun.The bus came to pick us up at our hotel at 9.40. In 30 minutes we arrived to the disco. They made us waiting for other 45 min before we could go in while some other people did. Once we went inside they put us on row with other people looking at half naked girls dancing. We tried to sit down right where we were standing but the staff told us we needed to stand up. How can they pretend people standing on a place all night without moving? ! About 11 pm we decided to leave and took a taxi back to the hotel. Also on the way out the door man wanted to know why we where living and where we were staying? Isn't that a bit too much?!Never ever again.

Absolutely amazing. Spend the extra to book VIP with bottle service from resort, money well spent. Took a bus in as a large group then taxi back in smaller groups. Show is fantastic, although waiting in line for an hour to get in or not being able to get to the bar because of the crowd would have been discouraging.

Great night club. So, we were in a Hotel in Riviera Maya and decided to hot Coco Bongo. We are in our 40s and decided to buy the VIP pass to be upstairs in a table, rather than downstairs standing. I must say this was a great night! Coco Bongo is like a Disco, but also with some Vegas-Like shows. Some of them like cirque du soleil. The theme was Star Wars and they had shows where some guys were fighting star-wars like with the laser sables. Music was very good, and the overall experience was great. This place is a Must See if you come to Playa. If you would like to be sitting, but the VIP pass. It is worth it and you also get better drinks.

Amazing!!!. I love love love this place! Every time I come to Mexico I go to coco bongo! It gets a bit crowded but totally worth the show that's going on around you! Can't wait to come again! Been completely excited and satisfied with this place 6 times now! :):)

Spectacular!!. Be prepared to dance the night away. I went to Coco Bongo's in Cancun several years before definitely prefer this one. Playa del Carmen is a nicer area but the whole environment seemed better. We paid for drinks in our package so no need to worry. As we booked through the hotel something we were not made aware of- the pre booked transport will not pick you up before the night is over at 4am something to do with contracts. Other than this had a brilliant night.

Best night out! . I would recommend this experience to anyone! It was fun packed and exciting, something you would never be able to explain! We did the vip package which meant we didnt have to cue, we also had room to move and dance and a waiter that bought drinks to our table when our ones looked empty! This was brilliant and its very busy in there! Fantastic!!!!

if you go to cancun you must go to coco bongos. the greatest show i have ever seen it was nothing like i expected we chose the gold band which cost us $130 with all drink included the show started at 11,30 but we were allowed in at 10.00 as we were gold band we were on the middle tier where we could see everything quite clearly.the waiter kept our glasses filled .Would i go back definatley the price ror normal admission is $55 but whatever you do go to coco bongos youll love it

Great fun!. Amazing shows, a total must-see and do if you are in the mood for nightlife! Worth getting the "Gold Member" to have a table and a waiter instead of being downstairs in the crowd. We booked through our resort so we had transportation. We did not get picked up until 3am, but we loved every minute of it and did not even notice the time! So so fun!!!

Better than Coco Bongo Cancun. The shows were great , much organization and very attentive bartenders/ waiters. The people performing put more enthusiasm into the show at this coco bongo. The wait wasn't too long to get in even if the line looks big . VIP access is preferable since the place does get veryyyyyyy full. The bathrooms are clean at this location and there are so many stalls you never have to wait ! :)

A must do for most ages. I brought my friend here while on vacation this past December. They were not really feeling up to going out in town but after visiting the Coco Bongo in Cancun on a previous trip I knew they would enjoy it. It is such a fun night! It's a cabaret and club all in one. I think it is enjoyable for all different ages. I would however recommend getting your ticket in a package or pub crawl to get better seats and quicker access. We did general admission this time around and waited forever and then we were squished in like sardines:( but if you tip your server well from the open bar the first round they will keep you hydrated all night and well into the morning :)

What a joke. We were approached by a rep JJ while we were hanging out at the pool at our resort- I don't know how or why (or IF) this is allowed. We were told about a New Year's Eve party, which we were told "isn't far, it's in Playa". We were assured the party was "exclusive" and would be "under-sold". My husband wanted to go because it was Star Wars-themed so we purchased two $150 tickets. We inquired whether we could purchase a table or if it was general admission- we were told tables were already sold out. We were told a driver would pick us up and take us to the club. The driver kept us waiting almost an hour- we finally got to Coco Bongo at 930pm and we didn't actually make it in the door until 1030pm. When they said "It isn't far", what they meant was "It's a 45 minute drive from your hotel". We got in the club, which was dark, crowded, had rickety steep staircases up to the general admission areas where people who hadn't purchased tables were supposed to go. We saw plenty of open tables and asked about what we had to do to get one. We were first told we needed only to purchase bottle service, so we promptly spent $200 on a bottle of their cheapest champagne (probably $20 at the store). Then the manager approached us and said we hadn't spent enough and we were welcome to enjoy our bottle, but if we wanted a table it would be $600. At this point we decided to cut our losses and go. We couldn't see any of the performances, we could barely see each other. If this was "undersold" I don't want to see what a full house looks like because as it was, you couldn't move. I said to my husband "This is the kind of place you see on the news when a fire breaks out and no one can leave and everybody dies." Awful. We left at 11pm and took a taxi back to our resort, making it to our hotel just in time for midnight on New Year's.
Lots of fun. I never seen a party like this crazy fun and super busy. Great combination of a show, dance and stadium. Check it out.

Very entertaining!!. I was in the area for work, and took some partners out. It was a great time, once we got it. Thats the tricky part, getting in. We paid a fee to get there and back, with a ticket... the line was so long, it was decided to get VIP, then that was all of a sudden not available.. long story short, we ended up buying the Gold Member package. It was well worth it. We were eye level with the stage, and had so much more space to move around and dance, compared to folks below who were crammed in like sardines. The bartender was very quick with the drinks. FUN time :)

Best Club ever!. We went with the group from the Hard Rock Riviera Maya and had the time of our lives. Our Coco Bongo representative was at the pool every day to help us. We even charged the tickets to our room!! The bus picked us up after dinner and the show at the hotel and off we went. Our guide took such good care of us, we felt like VIP's. We were worried that the return bus came at 3:20 am and that was a little late even for H-town partiers like us, but the club was amazing, the shows were beyond the imagination and drinks were flowing all night. Between the fire breathers and the little Beetlejuice people flying around from the ceiling, we were having such a blast, we missed the bus back! Best night in Mexico. Can't wait to go back. Forget the rest, Coco Bongo is the best!

Like vegas. Awesome show and choreography, a little too full of people kt is worth paying the extra to be VIP. We thought it was expensive but in the end you get awesome service, alcohol service to a little private table... Go for it, plan on a late night, enjoy the show, wear comfy shoes, bring a camera and $US or pesos doesnt matter . But go VIP!

NYE event ridiculously OVERSOLD - long wait in line and packed in like sardines!. WE purchased six tickets at $150 a pop from Lucio Muoz for the 2015 Star Wars themed NYE event. Lucio promised the show would be amazing, something to remember. I asked if they were overselling the event or was there a limit. He assured me there was a limit and at the time we purchased the event was 87% sold. We arrived at 9pm to find a super long line, we had to wait an hour to get in the club. Once in the club we were packed in like sardines and it was super difficult to get a "free" drink. The service staff make it known that if you want a drink you better "take care of" them...basically give them a lot of money. The show was good and we had a good time once some of the other patrons decided it was too packed to stay. Despite the challenges, we were determined to have fun since we paid $900 to be there! We also tried to get a VIP table...at first they wanted 2K USD and I negotiated to 1.15K USD but thankfully both our credit cards we tried to use thought the charge was fraudulent...the only problem was that my husband and I missed the NY trying to pay for the table. Beware...

The best night out of my life !!! . One word for this club is AMAZING !!! We loved every min of it from start to finish the show between is so good it is a crazy night didn't know where to look half the time but when we do go back to Mexico we will most defiantly be going back to coco bongo thank you for one of the best nights out EVER !!!!

Great experience!!!. Great show and a must see for everyone going to Mexico!!! Best option is to go for the fully inclusive drinks. They tried to charge over £100 for a bottle of vodka for the table. Too expensive for me to justify.
a night that re-defines CRAZY!. This is no cocktail party, its a club. You dance, you enjoy the shows and the drinks...and you don't leave till the show ends!
Brilliant night out!!. Don't miss this one its a great night, entertainment is 1st class, we bought gold member VIP which was handy for bar and loo is close by, no queuing.

Visit. I visited here on 2nd January with my 19 year old daughter. We both loved the show element of the evening, especially the aerial work. However we both found the place overcrowded. I also think it is quite degrading how the cameras are on certain parts of women's bodies and projected on to the large screens for entertainment value, not good at all, it lets the whole evening down ! Would I visit again - never !!

what a night. coco bongo is a fantastic night club, open from 2200 till 04.30. this clubs is the best club in have ever been in, you go into the building and as you enter you see a stage in the middle of a big open room and then to one side a large stage all other sides have balconys and bars on them which look towards the stage, this club shows 27 different shows in the night with star wars being the last and main show but in-between these shows you have trapezes acts going on, this all happens on the centre stage nxt to the dance floor, drinks are free and flowing at all times and the excitement is just so amazing its unreal
fabulous! great fun!. Such a great night, fantastic show, get the expensive tickets for good views it's well worth the extra!

Good show, too busy . The show is always impressive, however it was dragged out too long near the end and there was (and always is) waaaaay too many people for it to be fun. We'll pass on it any time we visit Mexico in the future.
Great fun! . Free drinks and amazing performance Worthy of money if you like to enjoy music! I paid 50% less because I lived there. It was full of people every night.

Great night out. We went on Sat 2nd Jan and had a great night. I'd recommend going VIP as this gets you a better view, a seat & a bartender. Also it's good to tip them, you get better service & we had free shots. You also jump the queue to get in.The show itself was entertaining, with a wide range of acts, Madonna, Michael Jackson, Westend shows, The Mask, Tron, the list goes on. Plus lots of surprises! It's a definite if you like Star Wars!It was a little on the purvey side, basically if you wear a low cut top you'll be on the big screen for sure! We had to leave at 3am to catch our coach, but I'm sure the party continued on. Shame we missed the finale!Also we debated whether to go to Cancun or Playa, Playa being the smaller of the two, but cheaper from our hotel. We were delighted with the experience at Playa, so glad we didn't shell out for Cancun.

So much Fun!!. Went there during Christmas Week. Our kids convinced us go and it was amazing. It's the hottest club in Playa Del Carmen .They do live shows based on famous people like Madonna , Michael Jackson etc. Giant live video feeds with music and dancing by live performers. We had a blast , you have to check it out!

Fun but expensive. Cocobongo is super fun and exiting. The shows are awesome and the overall experience is a 5-star but the cost is too high. If you want to get a table or chair seating it costs an arm and a leg plus half your good eye! Lol If you pay the all inclusive entry fee your in the crowd standing all night with no place to sit or place your drink...I did not enjoy that :/

OMG....the craziest night to fill the memory banks of best-ever party. My wife and I were skeptical of paying $65 USD each for a night at Coco Bongo's in Playa del Carmen. What could a small resort town possibly offer as far as an explosive fun-filled experience?My wife, the consummate negotiator, was able to convince the ticket agents at the resort that a) she wanted a special ladies-night price of $55 and that she would need to take a taxi home, before the bus leaves Coco Bongo's with everyone from the resort sometime after 3:00 AM,...the agent came down to a firm $50 USD per ticket....maybe that is standard...who knows?...but my wife was happy with her "deal".The bus left with about 15 others from the resort on a Wednesday night (Dec 16th) around 10:15 PM...everyone expected it might be a subdued/sparse mid-week crowd at Bongos. But no....it was crazy...really crazy...we had a host take us to a section of the floor where we could hang as a group...all drinks were on the house...(i.e. included for the $50). Everyone felt safe and very comfortable/secure with the surroundings.The music was great...the dance floor was non-stop action and throughout the night there were entertainers dropping from the ceiling, dancing on the huge bar, balloons, streamers and confetti was falling from the rafters all night...it was as if it was New year's Eve for 5 hours straight....my wife was even encouraged to dance with other revelers on the bar...needless to say there was no early taxi ride...we were the last to get on the bus and arrived back at our resort after 4:00 AM...wishing we could have stayed longer...If you get a chance to go...do not miss it...you will have a memory for a lifetime...

Just a little piece of advice.. I have been to Coco Bongo twice the first time I was on the floor which were $60 tickets. That was very cool experience , but also very crowded .If that makes you un easy been in a crowded situation pay the extra money and go to the Gold Member section which I paid just over $100 for these tickets .The gold member section is looking down over the crowd. We did gold member this time , unfortunately I did not have as fun up top as I did below. I felt like I was watching the fun happening below us. All it all it was a great show.

Not to be missed. Just an amazing experience, though queuing up outside you wonder what you've let yourself in for!
We bought 'VIP' tickets, which gives faster bar access and seats (I seem to remember)
Though not the place if you are one of the PC / Health and Safety brigade!

We were undersold, for sure!. My fiance and I visited Coco Bongo along with two other couples. When we purchased our tickets we weren't 100% sure what we were getting ourselves into and didn't think we'd stay for more than an hour. Once we got there, we were blown away. The show was unparalleled, music was amazing and the crowd participation was on point. I highly recommend going for the table option as the floor looked to get crowded. For those of you that are not "club people," neither are we and it was hands down our favorite part of the trip.
Awesome!. What a show and what service! The music was an incredible mix. Cirque de Soleil meets dance club, but still has nice higher seating for the older crowd. I will be back. Thank you!

Great Christmas Eve. Such a great night with great shows! I was pulled up to the stage to dance with a bunch of other girls, and then again by myself. If this happens to you, hold your skirt down when you spin around! Perfectly timed, they sent a blast of air up and I flashed the club. Of course I wouldn't ever see anyone there again, and it's a hilarious memory. They have entertainment on the street while waiting to get in. If you would like a table to sit down at then I would recommend paying for bottle service. Don't bring any drugs (advil, Tylenol), they will check your bag. Overall, most fun I've ever had!

Go late and buy ticket at reduced prices. We were advised by our host to just turn up and buy tickets on the night. We arrived after dinner at about 11.00pm and there were people trying to sell tickets for VIP or table service... We didn't jump at the price so very quickly they reduced the price by 10, 20 then 30$. After a few minutes they offered us a ticket for just 30$ which included entry and a two drinks... The coco drink is massive and that was all we needed all night. DO not pay full price. Much better to be on the dancefloor. The people on the tables looked squashed and ended up coming down anyway.The show was good. They mimed the singing but the dance and especially the acrobatics were excellent.
WOWWWWW!!!!. The show is amazing and the ambiance is very very good, you should take VIP to be on top and enjoy the show. it costs a bit more money but its worth it.

So-So place, lots of extra charges that they try to upsell.. I'm not normally a club guy so take this in mind. They sell you tickets everywhere, and not say VIP and all drinks, but it's not. This is just to stand in line for standing room and a few drinks are included. They upsell you seating tables for bottle service, then shooter girls come and charge per shots. Very tight space to stand around, show is so-so and most of the music is a quarter to half the song length. Show was okay, more just costumes and dancers to the music.
Perfect . Only for the crowds it was perfect the atmosphere was amazing the actors was perfect. Can't wait to go again

Great show but a bit cramped for my liking. We went to Coco Bongos on Monday 7th December. We booked VIP tickets though Thomson. We didn't have to queue & were taken upstairs to an area that had seating & overlooked the stage. We had waiter service so we didn't have to queue at the bar. The show was brilliant, but waiting for the show to start was like watching someone else's party. We stayed till 4am, I think it's open till about 6am but we were ready to leave when the show ended. Maybe it's because we're in our 50's but although I'm pleased we saw the show I wasn't really impressed with the venue & didn't think it was worth the money (£177 for both of us) even with the so called VIP tickets. Not sorry we went but wouldn't rush to go again.
Amazing Shows and atmosphere!. I had the best time at Co Co Bongos.All the shows are amazing and very very entertaining, I would definitely go again, a great night to remember.

Great Night Out. Went to Coco Bongo expecting a Las Vegas type show - it isn't that! It's a nightclub with 5 minute bursts of dancers, dressing up like Guns & Roses and Michael Jackson etc and miming to their songs. Strangely it really doesn't matter - the atmosphere is amazing. Tip your waiter at the beginning and you will never have an empty glass. We had a fantastic night and would definitely recommend this to anyone.

Crowded, Crazy, Dangerous. My fiance and I had read reviews about Coco Bongo, many saying that it is fun for all ages. I would agree in that it is fun for all ages IF you like clubs and extreme partying. We are both in our 20s and we did not enjoy Coco Bongo at all. First of all if you want to be able to actually sit and watch the show you need to spend about $150 per person. We could not afford that and paid $50 per person, the minimum. We were expecting to be able to at least sit even though we didn't get a table but no you have to stand. We got there early and waited for 40 minutes, we had a pretty decent spot but we lost it as soon as we went to the bathroom. The place is small and cramped and gets filled up quick. It's definitely a fire hazard. You have to squeeze through people (who are drunk, bumping, grinding, making out) just to get to the bathroom. Security and waiters are rude and pushy, if you try to sit down they make you get up. You get shoved around if you are in their way to getting people drinks. The shows themselves were just ok. The dancers are pretty talented but they do not sing and rely heavily on movie footage. There is about 10 minutes of show time with 20 minutes of club music and cameras zooming in on random women, zooming in on their crotches, butts and breasts. It made both of us feel very uncomfortable. They would pick women from the crowd to dance on the bar but only those wearing dresses so they could shoot air up their skirts. Overall If you are not into clubs which for the most part that is all Coco Bongo is, I would save your money for an excursion.
Absolutely fantastic . Fab night out in fact best I've ever had. Do vip it's well worth the money can't get enough to drink and atmosphere was best I've ever experienced in a club

Don't Miss It.. We were a little apprehensive being a couple 60 and 58 but it is great for everyone. The atmosphere is brilliant as are the shows the dancers and the drinks. We had the gold package and although it's a little expensive at about £85 each we had great seats and the inclusive drinks just never stopped coming, we both drank Hennessey all night. The time just flies by when your in here as there is never a pause even if it's just watching the girls dancing on the bar.

We had such a blast!. We did bottle service at Coco Bongo's so that we could have a table. It was well worth it, even though the table was super small. It at least gave us a dedicated area to hang out at and dance. The service was great! We always had fresh ice and everything that we needed. The performances were great, as was the music! What a party!!!

So much Fun!. You can NOT get anything like this in the States. We got tickets off the guy walking the beach and negotiated a discounted price since 10 of us were going and it was well worth the price! Words can't even describe the experience you will have when you go. Our group had a couple 50+ people and they were able to hang until 3am with us. Time goes by so quickly because they have so much going on with the shows, the music and entertainment. The price we paid included all our drinks and a waiter/waitress was assigned to certain tables and they were on top of it. They always brought 2 drinks each time before you even finished your last one. It is so safe as well. You have 2 points of security to go through. I would recommend this to EVERYONE in the area!

Wow. I'm 54 years old and usually in bed by 10pm but my daughter lives in Playa Del Carmen and wanted to take me to Coco Bongo when I visited her.It's crazy but great fun, thankfully she had booked the gold experience so we had our own table on the second floor with waiter service and premium drinks.I was worried that I would fall asleep, no chance of that, it's full on non stop action.I saw lots of happy people, all having fun and no trouble what so ever.Go, there's nothing like it in Britain.Eventually got to bed at 04.30.

Complete Chaos.... ...in a good way! Experience Vegas, college, springbreak, Mardi gras, new years, and spiderman... all in one night. Shows every 5-10 min. Confetti and balloons everywhere. Loud and drunk. Lots of dancing. More chaos. As long as you know what you're getting into, it's a great time! Bring a camera because you probably won't remember getting home. Or breakfast the next day.

Brilliant!. Loved it! Great shows! Had a great time ☺We booked through Daniel at the Sandos Playacar...we had transport there and back, entrance into the club no queuing, had seats and a table with a bottle of Absolute Vodka and jugs of mixers..It cost around £65-£70 each but was a great night and would go again.
A very entertaining night-out. This is a surreal experience! It's much more than a disco, it's much more than na entertaining show... It's all of both mixed together in na incredible and amusing way!

Must Have Experience!. Absolutely must have experience. Amazing show. From 11 PM till 3 AM I recommend for older people like we to take VIP tickets in order to have sits and do not stay in crowd. VIP tickets with transfer cost us 150 $US each. VIP sits on second floor. Most of regular tickets holders stay on the floor. I think from the floor show view is not good.
Always an amazing time!. Make sure to get VIP or else you'll be cramped and standing all night. Definitely worth VIP open bar!!!

Great Show!. The show is awesome! Make sure to wear your dancing shoes (stay away from the heels) I promise you will be dancing and possible doing so up on a high bar if you choose, so be prepared! Lots of fun! Bar is crowded so be aware of that. I'd advise you to have a drink or two before going.

Omg ridiculous amazing experience. I went last night. I debated for a long time whether I would spend 65$ on ticket. Totally worth every penny. This is not a typical dance club at all. This is pure wild entertainment. My only regret is not getting it on video to show my friends ack home. Words cannot describe this place - just go and enjoy. Im really not a party guy or much of a drinker. But trust me, doesn't matter. Probably the most entertaining night of my life. Tips for 1st timers: -If at a resort, buy ticket with Coco bongo sales reps. It includes transportation, drinks. Ask about getting to front of the line for 10$ extra. - go early enough to get a spot that is not on the floor. The floor is jammed an chaotic. You can go down there to dance whenever you want, but at least you will have a spot to stand comfortably to enjoy the shows. Youll see what I mean once you are there.- bring a camera!!!! I decided to leave my cell in my room.

Brilliant night. Fabulous night at coco bongos. Brilliant music to have a dance and sing a long to. So much fun. Little bit of advice if you go, get the gold vip ticket and tip your waiter when you get there and they will look after you all night with drinks and you don't ever have to wait. Brilliant

A pleasant surprise . We were pretty excited to have a great night in this iconic club. We purchase our tickets along the strip better known as the Quinta Avenida, In Playa del carmen,MX which were $50 per person. When we first entered the club we were a little surprised to see that the place was so empty...We had to walk through this long hall way and when you made the first right...... BOOM! There were a ton of people, lights, smoke and of course entertainment. It was the most amazing experience. The drinks were unlimited and free.
