Well first off let me just start off by saying that from what I remember I had a fantastic time... because I only survived until about 2am, thank god for my girlfriend. We bought a ticket package from our resort to Coco Bongos. It was quite cheap if I remember correctly - around 60USD for No line no cover all you can drink. Well anyway I guess there was a more expensive package because when we got to the club (the lineup was insane couldn't see the end), we went up to the bouncer but turns out we had bought the package where you had to wait in the mile long lineup because it was not a VIP wristband.Anyways, luckily for us we met some people on our bus ride to the club who did have the VIP wrist band and somehow I convinced the bouncer to let us in with our newly founded friends. We predrank at the resort (big mistake) not realizing about the open bar at the club so when we got in we were not expecting to drink as much as we did. Anyways the club is great, the shows are amazing and very well done. Music directly correlates to the shows they have on. The good and bad thing about this club is that as soon as the servers who walk around see that your drink is empty they make sure your cup is filled again or that you have a shot in your hand. By around 1:30am I was beyond drunk and by 2am we had to leave the club. I did not pace myself as I was no expecting to be handed so many drinks. Luckily my gf was not as drunk as me and we got back to the resort safe. The shows go on until around 5-6am is what I heard and I wish I could've stayed for that but oh well there is always next time!! I had a blast though!! Met some people there from my hometown!

Once again WOW. Seventh time here and once again brilliant.We chose goldmember again and were not dissappointed. Good seats, great view, great waiter ( literally never went without a drink)The bus was supposed at 3 40 in the morning but when we all outside the bus there was no sign of the driver until another driver came and banged on the window to wake him up. No one knew he was having a major siesta on his bus.

Truly Amazing!!. We booked this through our Thomson rep at our hotel. We don't usually do this kind of thing but the rep convinced us with his description of it. Our taxi from our hotel was at 9.45pm, whilst waiting for it to arrive I stated to my wife that I couldn't see us lasting until our pick up at 0330am. How wrong was I! Security to get in was reasonably tight, there was also a Police checkpoint outside! We had booked a v.i.p. ticket, all our drinks were included, we were shown to a upper balcony level that had seats and overlooked the dance floor and bar! I am not going to say much about the show as I don't want to give too much away! But I have to say the whole night was truly amazing, it covered every era of music so appealed to everyone, with a touch of cirque du solely and big shows! I really can't say enough about it, my wife was even dancing on the bar at one stage along with loads of others. A not to be missed night out, well worth the money!

Rough Start but int he end Worth it all!!! Great time. Went here for my wifes birthday last week. Definelty splurge for the VIP Gold Member package if you dont you could be standing on a line with 1200 other people waiting to get in unless you grease the bouncer at which point you might as well pay the 150 USD for the VIP Package. Its worth it, FIrst off you SKIP THE LINE int he begining but before we get to that lets talk about some of the hicups.We paiud extra for transportation form my hotel. While the bus ride was enjoyable. The bus DOES NOT take you to COCO BOngo they tell you they do but trust me they dont. They take you to a bus temrinal down the road form it, at which point they ask that you please walk fast and bvy walk fast they mean run because the area is bad. If I were you I would just take a cab direcktly here to the front because once I got off the bus I could tell if we staryed formt eh pack we would be picke doff byt he locals. SO we stayed witht he pac, I had my wives flats so she could wear her heels inside. make sure ladies brign flats for this dangerous sprint to make it to the club untouched. Anyway once you actually make it there and your name is on the list for VIP you go in, but here is hte next problem., I dont know what it is about mexico but they want copies of driver slicense and Credit card you used to pay for the gold palkcage before going in then they make you right on a piece of apaper and sign it that you authorize them to charge you for VIP package. THis entire process took well over 30 mintues since I had a gorup with me its annoying what if we didnt have hte ctedsit cards or the numbers di not match due to fraud and we change dour cards, sicne I bought the VIP package 6 months ago for that date that was a real poissibility, they said if the numbers do not match youa re not going in. This is maddness and its crtazy and they really need to rethingk that poliocy cause HAd I not had my card with me ther eis no way I paid 150 a person tog et in and your telling me im not. They should tell you ahead of time you WILL need your credit card. Anyway once your passed all that drama comes the next phase, if you have a big group it will coimplicate things, if its small then you should be fine, but basicallyt once I finally made it throught he crowd and up tot he VIP area allt ehs pots were basically gone, when I did granb a spot ont eh side I was told I could only have 2 tbales, seirousl 2 tables for 13 people, I was forced the grease the waiter into letting get two more tables and althoguht it took some "incentives" he agreed to let me have the tables. once everyone finally got in and we were seated. we got our first round of drinks and the show started.Once you are all settled in and you get your drinks and the show starts the FUN begins and let me tell you despite everything I went through to get in there this place was well worth it. IM sure there is some sort of fie code stuffing 1200-1400 people in that small place, it snot big by any means videos make it look big but its not. I still had an awesome time, and in the end my wives birthday was celebrated and our waiter Took care of us and made sure that my wife felt special on her birthday by having the place the entire who stooped to sing her happy birthday!!!. In my book once he did that he earned those tips lol. so Lesson learned take care of the barmen and waiters and they will take care of you. All in all great place and I would definitely go again.

Best party in Mexico. Amazing place; a show, club, circus and party all rolled into one. We went with Thompson with a bar crawl before heading to coco bongo. Playa del Carmen is super safe on your night out so no need to worry there, the locals will look out for you just as much as your guide.Tip your waiter, the place is mad busy so a decent tip will make sure you are never without a drink. If your in that part of Mexico it is a must see!
This was a awesome blast!!!!!. Drinks and dancing all night!!! Awesome show from many eras of music!! Will definitely go again and recommend it!!

Wow wow wow . If visiting Mexico this is a must amazing experience, go for the gold tickets get your own table plus you have a great view of the stage also one big thing have never felt so safe in a club security staff etc were amazing the shows were amazing think we danced around our table for 5 hrs amazing place

coco bongo crazy!!. Fab night!. very cramped though.. I would recommend you get a table! when you arrive it feels like you are going through a inner tube, then it opens up to a massive club!. all drinks are included but unless you have a table you will be lucky to regularly see a waiter.

Amazing . Had a really good time here, so much fun, I would say if your not bothered about dancing and just want to enjoy the show then to have a balcony seat as it was very crowded and although we had our own table(group of us) right near the front eventually people pushed the way in front of us and started to use our table, which is not a problem until the start moaning at you to move up a bit!Other than the above would defiantly recommend going here I think it's good for all ages as the shows are amazing but there's a bit of dancing on the car in between to entertain younger ones Would defiantly go back.
Too much fun. Great time, great service! Just be ready to have fun...you will be standing up the whole time, so go with conf shoes. Line takes long, but worth it!!!

Awesome night - One we will remember for years to come.. If you like to have a fun night out with good music and entertainment, then Coco Bongo is the place to visit when you're in Mexico.We were gold members and had excellent seats just above the main stage. Our waiter, whom we tipped 100 peso's was also very good. He was always on the ball and served us new drinks just as the old drinks ran dry. He even serviced my partner numerous fancy cocktails even though we were told the bartenders don't have the time to make them. Overall, a brilliantly entertaining night and we didn't get back to our resort until 4am.

Great Production !!. Great Production, place is very nice inside the whole set up for the show. Did not like that they pack you in like herds. To many people you don't have space to get up and dance in between the performaces.

2nd visit and still as good. Booked gold member this time great seats with a good view of everything thats going off very well looked afterby our busboy Williams,he even waited with my wife ( without being asked) whilst i went to the toilet , a great fun night and definatlety worth a visit .

WOW!!!!!!!. My boyfriend and I booked a trip here via Nexus tours before we arrived in Mexico. We booked Gold Member package and I'm so glad we did. When we were dropped off at Coco Bongos, we joined a separate queue for gold members and was let in just before 10pm (as it was raining). We were took to our table on the second floor and our waiter came over and took our drinks order. For the rest of the night I never had an empty glass, on a few occasions he'd brought me a new drink without me realising. Onto the show... There are no words. It was fantastic. There was so much going on, so slick and amazing quality. It was one of the best nights of my life. You must visit coco bongos if you're visiting Mexico!! Incredible!!!
We loved it!. We had a fab night at Coco Bongo!! Our waiter kept our drinks topped up all night and we loved the show! We would definitely recommend!

Birthday trip. This was an excellent show but I think it is more for the younger people very loud we bought the v.i.p. Tickets and were very glad we did at least you get a seat upstairs if not there are so many people down stairs and standing room only very late night trip you get back to hotel around 4-4.30am that's from 10pm the previous night but worth going to see the show very very loud

Great night out to swing!!!. We hired the same taxi driver for the Coba Ruins and cenotes to playa de Carmen for another day. He actually took us to the Coco Bongo booking booth. VIP tickets were all sold out when we got there at 2pm Thursday. Sebastian, Coco Bongo staff offered us a lower price ticket which we still get priority entry, 1 bottle of liquor and open bar drinks (400 peso cheaper than VIP seats).we got a better view as well. We headed out shopping on Fifth Ave and nearby areas. We headed back to Coco Bongo at 10 pm. (Of course leaving our shopping conquests with our hired taxi driver. Bag checks are conducted before you get in, good job!!!You get 3 shots drinks on your way in. All ready to swing the moment in there. Show starts at 11.30 pm . Lots of cams on audience and you can see everyone is enjoying the night. Great shows and awesome lightings! Tips: make sure you head for restroom before the party start. You going to have a tough time making your way to there from the dance floor. And make sure you have enough small change for the servers.

Amazing night. We booked with Virgin and managed to get seats with an endless supply of drinks.On entrance we were given Vodka and Cranberry (at least I think) then 3 shots of tequila. The show doesn't start until 11.30pm but we got there early to watch some dancing on the bars and get some good seats.Kiss cam was funny whilst we waited. Without, giving too much away these guys put on a show you wont forget.Would go again.

BEST CLUB EVER!. I am an European living in the US, and have been to some of the the best bars in the word. That said, Coco Bongo is AWESOME. It's fun, you need to go for it. A couple of things:1. They try to sell you a ticket for 70USD that covers drinks up to 3,30am, and tell you thats the only ticket available. But that's not right. You can also buy one ticket for 30USD that doesnt include drinks. Nonetheless, if you drink more than 3 drinks per night, which you will, then it is worth to get the 70USD one. 2. Their drinks are watered down. So please remind the bartender to add a bit of more poison and less lemonade :-)But this is AWESOME. Go please.

Mixed feelings but overall fun night. Paid for Gold club entry. Eventually ok but at first placed behind a tree trunk so couldn't see. I say placed as you are bundled in and strategically manoeuvred into where they want you to sit as obviously want to maximise amount of people can get in and boy do they pack em in! Have to say when requested we were moved to much better place and did end up having fun night. Would have complained bitterly re premium price entry if had been left where put! You need to be aware that even when sat with a table this is shared by many and you are tiered so cannot see everywhere including down to ground floor easily but you are on same level as stage. If went again would want to go by cab so could leave when wanted as 2am would have been end of night for us but had to await our transport back to hotel with very very merry friends from across the pond. Got in 5.15 am so far too late for us. This wasn't anything to do with the club but the choice we made of getting there. The guys in club I have to say are very courteous though and respectful of our middle age group! I did think the club caters for all ages really well with the music and shows. I think the claims of " better than any Vegas show" is arguable but I guess they mean for a club? This does not compare to the Vegas shows we have seen as this is dancing and performing the tribute way! It is a visual and auditory treat - a bit corny in places but entertaining mostly. A little repetitive however with the special effects and snippets of cirque de soleil type acrobatics. Talented none the less. Be aware of the ladies going round with shots - make sure you realise this is an expensive piece of what some would describe as "titilation" fun! They do make it clear though with neck boards advertising the price and are not pushy with it. Very safety conscious environment and efficiently deal with drinks spillages and are non judgemental re this. Wouldn't like to experience when at full capacity though and wouldn't like to have been on ground floor for sure so despite the overpricing in our opinion of this venue ( but we don't drink loads) it is a one off experience that am glad have seen and done and would recommend if doing and you are of a fifty something age group definitely do the gold member entry.
Great. Don't miss Cocobongo when you are in Playa del Carmen! Best Disco/Show!Free drinks the whole night and a excellent show with best artist!

fantastic night out. This is best described as a cabaret show/nightclub hybrid.
It was excellent, highly entertaining and a great vibe.
We went as "gold members" so had free drinks until 3am.
I recommend however to get "pit" tickets, as that is where the party is.
if you prefer to be a bit laid back, the upper level tables are for you

SUCH FUN!!. My friend and i had the best night here ever. it was not what we expected at all and ended up being so fun. we went on a Friday night and it was very busy. Definitely pre-book the tickets the lines get long. it was an amazing show!!!!!

Amazing night out. Book as soon as you can as tickets sell fast. Pay the extra and get gold VIP ticket as guaranteed a seat and waiter service. Vary lively busy club, Mixture of night club and show Bit daunting when first arrive due to numbers of people entering the club. Show starts around 11pm and ends around 3am.Show is amazing from singers to flying acrobats, Based around well known shows / films. Confetti canon set off all night, balloons, neon sticks. Chance to get up on stage and dance, kiss cam and hot cam periodically. So much to see you don't know where to look first. Review does not do it justice as unable to describe the experience, A must do. One amazing great party night for any adult any age.
Still fantastic!. Third visit but this place is amazing and an excursion you won't forget. There is not another club in the world like it, it's fab!
A MUST!!!!. Paid $65 for open bar, cover charge, and transportation there and back!!! Can't beat that! It was crowed but the experience was AWESOME!!!! Will definitely go back!!!

Amazing. I can't say enough good things about this place. It is amazing. You must go here at least once when you are in Cancun. It went from dancing to entertainers all night. I have never been to any club like it. Go with your hotel and get the VIP treatment, it is worth every dime.
Fantastic show. This is well worth a visit , fantastic shows the original party place. The staff are fantastic and guaranteed to have a great time till early morning.

COCOBONGO. Amazing entertainment but overpriced and disappointing if you payed for gold band. The acts awe inspiring, the staff were more than helpful and couldn't do enough, the venue was what lets the whole experience down.If you have ever seen then circ du soliel then it is a small scale version where you are right in the centre of the action. The only problem is its that busy you get moved, shoved, knocked and banged into. And to get a good view of everything is almost impossible.It is none the less an incredible night, we were very disappointed at first because we got the que jump package to avoid queuing at the door and get straight in but when we got in it was impossible to get a good view of anything. We were contemplating going because we couldn't believe what we had payed for, but we are so glad we stayed amazing just doesn't come close.Well worth booking in advance and ignore the street vendors go straight to the club and chat to the seller on the corner of the club.

If your in Mexico give it a try. Was in Mexico for 3 weeks but waited near 10 days into the holiday to book tickets and found out it was all sold out till 2 days after we had arrived home in the UK, Lucky enough a couple pulled out and we payed them for their tickets, Decent night out but all the cameras in their in between shows just seem to concentrate on all the younger holidaymakers drunk down on the dance floor, Defo go for VIP tickets so your level with the stage, Mon-Thurs its around £80 a ticket with your ale and Fri-Sat is just over £100 a ticket but I presume its the same show so to save £50 a couple go midweek, Would go again when next in Mexico because I presume they would change the showMake sure you have a Siesta the day your going because it will be near 5am you get back if staying on Rivera Maya

One of the best night. This one-off night was value for money and a must when visiting Mexico.We got vip tickets which meant we were on the balcony and a bar maid come with drink non stop.They was all age group with us 26 to 64 and they was something for all great night

Fab night. This place was unreal - we had an excellent night.We had the Gold VIP tickets so were stood right at the top and had our drinks included all night.All of the performances were excellent and you could have a dance in between and throughout. It's non-stop entertainment which I loved.If you're staying in the area, it is a MUST!

Did not want it to end. It was mysterious adrenalin rush the place to be and have a night not to forget, the acts, the , the bar maids non stop drinks,the atmosphere , the stage show (Beetle Guise) super brilliant got back to hotel 04:00 hrs still buzzing gotta say a big thanks to our Thomson rep Mark he was spot on cheers Bud. Met lots of great people as well Canadians, Americans, best thing was got back to hotel and still got p for Breakfast even though it was 11:00hrs. Our visit to Coco Bongos was the end of a pub crawl arranged by Thomson, would we do it again Hell yeh stay out longer the next time

Best night..glad I went.... This is a must if visiting Mexico. We paid for the VIP ticket which meant we sat on the balcony and had a fantastic view of the stage. Drinks included in the price of the ticket. The show was amazing and the atmosphere was fantastic. Highly recommended for a fun night out.

Definitely for the younger traveller. Brought Gold member VIP tickets from Thompson Rep and wish we hadn't bothered. Supposed to have the best seats but they were not we were upstairs right at the back squashed like sardines. All inclusive premium drinks that's questionable. You have a waiter who my husband went to tip after the first round and he was rude enough to turn his nose up at the two dollar tip, we took plenty of tip money but was told you need to pay 40 dollars upfront to your waiter to get good service. I tip for good service but I wasn't doing that. Only stayed hour and half that was enough.

So over rated . I'm shocked at the reviews this place gets. It's no where near Vegas standards, as it claims. The 3 1/2 hour show, starting at 1130, has about 45 minutes of actual performance. The performances aren't great, nothing I've haven't seen before. The 'hot' girls in the audience seem to be the show, with the camera zooming in on them, and some being put on stage. We got bottle service, which stops you having to go to the bar, on advice, and although expensive this seemed like the best option. It's something I would never go and see again, but unfortunately it's something that the tourists have to do!
Oh what a night. Didn't open till 2230 thought I would be asleep by midnight , how wrong I was it was a excellent night out and full of surprises with the show

Best Night Out in Mexico!!. Do not miss out on this attraction! Pay for the Gold Member ticket - much better and well worth the money. You get your own table, waiter service, all inclusive drinks and speedy entry. A much better way to experience this amazing place

amazing did not dissapoint. everything you read about the effort and entertainment of the whole evening is very true ,very skilled actors dancers and the best vibe brought on by the atmosphere and music ..you will not be dissapointed but i would recommend if you want a stress free evening go vip ..

Highlight without a doubt.. Very dubious about going to Coco Bongo being 56 years young lol. But I was pleasantly surprised. We were seated on the balcony, would not recommend going on the dance floor as it is packed and you can barely move. We had a package which meant we were able to jump the queue, had our own waiter so never had to struggle to the bar for drinks. The show itself was great, fast pasted and really professional. My husband really enjoyed playing up to the cameras that flash around the crowd right throughout the evening. It was a fab night and we would highly recommend a visit, it really was the highlight of the holiday.

Amazing. On arrival the dancers which were on stage were the shots girls and I was worried they were going to set the standard for the night. However this was not the case and once the show started I was awestruck by the acts. Spiderman was fantastic. The other acts on the wires and the curtains were amazing. The Freddie Mercury tribute was great and Michael Jackson was good.The tables in the vip are very cosy. With my partner sitting on a higher bench directly behind me having to straddle me from behind. Not quite vip in my book. The waiters tried to stay in top of orders but it was mega busy.It is definitely a must see and do.

Wild Times. Interesting place. Lots of entertainment by both the customers and the employees. If you are looking for a very different and crazy time this is for you. We did the all inclusive ticket. We probably shouldn't have bothered as we only had one drink each. If you like to consume a lot of alcohol this would be for you. The negatives, not enough bathrooms, too many people crowded into a small space and lots of drunk people. The positive, very exciting acts, lots of action all of the time, well organized and great service.

Fantastic night out. Coco bongs is worth going to whether you drink tequila or not. The disco is done by shows and trapeze from 12am to 3am.the club is very well ventilated plus there are burst of cool air and small ice drops. Cocobonga is real value for money. This was my first trip to Mexicoand I stayed in playa de Carmen. However I do intend on returning to Mexico but to stay in Cancun and visit Cocobonga there. We had a blast there.

Coco Bongo - a Genuinely Delightful Experience!. You have to go into it with an open mind, and don't think of going to a regular club as this is a totally different experience. The place was crowded, but the show was simply amazing. There is so much energy in the acts and it keeps your attention from start to finish. The best way to go is to purchase your tickets from the resort, this covers the bus ride there and back (although you can take a taxi back for US$25), admission, and all your drinks are covered for the night. We had a valet assigned to us, took us to our area and his service was just phenomenal. Every time my drink got to being almost finished, he was right there, taking the almost empty glass from my hand and replacing it with another ice cold beverage! I have never seen such service before, and that lasted all night! If you've watched Jim Carey's "The Mask", you will appreciate the whole concept. If you haven't, watch the movie before you go, and you will realize what makes this place so special!

CocoBongo was amazing!!. Very fun! high energy! The show was beyond what we could have expected. So worth the price of admission. The only issues were the long wait outside to get in and The waiters ask for tips and that is off putting but outside of the minor details we had an AMAZING time!

VIP Gold is the way to go!. Coco Bongo is far more than a dance club. The principle feature of the evening is a spectacular show that takes plac from 11:15- 2:15 a.m. With the VIP Gold entrance you are whisked away from the long line and taken to the upper levels. The show takes place on the upper level, so the higher up you go, the better the view. We were fortunate to receive a very small table for 2 , and there are few. With this ViP Gold you have a waiter with private service, who will even walk you through the crowds, to use the ladies' room.
fun time. WHAT a night epic memories for ever ,This place is a must take $$ to tip your glass will never be dry!!!!
rubbish. place is very crowded. You are packed like sardines. getting a drink is impossible. personally I would not go there is plenty of other clubs there just as good

What an experiebce. Been there with my cousin. Fabulous place. What a party!!! The shows are amazing. The only thing is that it is a little overcrowded so you have to find a nice place to be or pay the VIP section. Its a must when you are in Cancun.

Amazing!. One thing that myself and partner definitely wanted to do while over in Mexico was COCO BONGO! I had heard such amazing things about the place. We had the best night, we paid for a gold membership for the evening through our Thompson rep, the waiter was very helpful, we tipped him at the beginning of the night and he kept us well supplied with Alcohol throughout the night, as soon as I was near the bottom of my Gin and Lemonade there he was to replace it with a few shots for us both too ( lethal combination). The show was fantastic too, and when we visit Mexico again I will definitely visit coco bongo again! well worth the money! we spent the following day in bed though as we couldn't face the sun! ( totally self inflicted though :))

Amazing!!!!. What a show!!!! Fantastic from start to finish,I went with my wife and parents both in their 60's and they enjoyed it just as much ,it's not cheap but go for the gold VIP package,the drinks kept coming all night and we had perfect view directly opposite from the stage . If you come to Mexico you'd be mad to miss it,i would definitely go again when in Mexico!!!!

This night was Epic, Etched in my memories forever!!!. Beside the price of ticket being expensive, It is definitely worth it. Make sure you are with your fiends to experience this amazing club and all u can drink,...
the shows were lively, full of excitement and well choreographed. Would love to see a club like this in Canada!!
Good show. You have to go vip here table and seats and a perfect view. Be careful of the free shot on entry avoid that one.

What a Night, i'll never forget. We really need one of these in the UK, it would be packed every night.
Had a brill night, absolutely amazing!! Get yourself there you will not be disappointed.
Stick with the Gold package through your rep, transport, drinks and waiter service, tip the waiter and he will bring you a constant flow all night!

Why hasn't the UK got one of these!. The night we had in Coco Bongos playa del carmen was UNBELIEVABLE! The atmosphere was amazing, the shows where spectacular and we felt very safe! We booked the excursion through our travel agent Thompson and boy did the deliver. We got picked up and taken home on the same coach, with the same driver. We got told member entry which slowed us to jump the queue, which were extremely busy.and this included our drinks all night. You would be a fool to miss this great night out. If you traveling that far the Mexico from the is then go! It's a club for all ages eighteen upwards. Our waiter Fernando was fantastic, very attentive and very pleasant. Thank you coco bongos we had an unforgettable night!

A must see show. DONT MISS IT.. AMAZING!!!! This club was the best I have ever been to. Was well worth buying a VIP Gold entrance. The time went so quickly because the show was so brilliant. Left at 4 in the morning.

Poor taste. This was sold as a show. be warned this is a nightclub with stage entertainment. There will be 'booty cams' women in the audience perved over on the big screen. if you go to dance on the podium like many younge girls will be warned they will blow air up your shirt to revel your underware to the club on tv. parts were really good and I would recommend gold tickets so you get free drinks and a table since it gets very cosy. I found it very distasteful in some parts laughing at midget performers, stereotyping, and extremely objectifying if women. I love clubbing but this show crossed so many lines that made me feel sorry for the performers and loose faith in humanity. who knew a club could be so cruel. I would not go back.

Wow . A must see if you are visiting Playa Del Carmen. Fantastic show. Go VIP that way you'll have a seat and a waiter who ensures your glass is never empty. Music caters for all ages and the show is really good.

Coco Bongo. We were sold a night at Coco Bongo's by a representative at our hotel. We advised him that we would be going but did not know the exact night so he told us that he would make out the ticket as open if we bought it off him there and then he also advise we would have an Express Pass to avoid queuing. We were collected by the transport at our hotel as agreed with the Coco Bongo reps checking the ticket on 2 occasions. When arriving at Coco Bongo we were told to get in line I showed the reps the ticket with Express Pass clearly wrote but was told I would need to pay an extra $10 to get the Express Pass. I was not happy so decided to just wait! When nearing the front another Coco Bongo rep approached to swap the ticket for our wrist bands we were advised that we would need to pay an extra $10 as we were only charged standard weekday rate and as it was Saturday it was extra! On the plus side once inside it was an amazing show/night just a shame about the lies told by the Coco Bongo reps to get us there.

Worst place to go out in Playa del Carmen. My friends and I had a terrible experience at this place. The service was awful and the staff was so rude. It was a bachelorette party of 11 and the we payed our tickets online a month prior. They were suppose to pick us up at the hotel and the chofer never came. Also when we got there they couldn't find our reservation.

A Must! (see tips below). Coco Bongo is amazing! But if you want your night to be perfect, you need to follow these advice.Tips: 1. Go on Monday, Tuesday or Thursday. Unless it is lady's night on Wednesday (crowded!) or the weekend (more crowded because of the Mexicans, also more expensive $$$)2. Go with the animation staff of your resort.The transportation is included and safe. You will have a reserved spot only for the people from your hotel with a designated waiter. (We paid 55US in September 2015). We also arrived at 10:30 PM, which is 1 hour before the beginning of the show. Music is playing and the open bar has started!3. Tip your waiter.You want to enjoy the open bar, you need to tip your waiter. But not any waiter, the one that will introduce himself as your waiter. When he will bring your first drink, give him about 5$US per person, 10$ for the couple. He will bring you drinks all night long without you needing to ask! At the end of the night, if you enjoyed even more the service, feel free to give him a little bit more!4. The after show (after 2:30 AM) --> Tips for party people!Sometimes, it is a little crowded so you may not enjoy the open bar as much as you wanted (except if you have a designated waiter). But after the last performance at 2:30 AM, most of the people leave. But after 2:30, the Coco Bongo turns into a big nightclub! Everybody loves the show! That's for sure! But what I remember the most is the after show! It is still open bar until 3:30 AM, there aren't lineups at the bars anymore and the waiters are still serving. You have space to dance, and only party people are staying! That is the perfect time for singles to hook up!

Great, but not great!. We paid $200 us ,bc we were told we would get a private vip table, with comforts etc.. got in there only to be squeezed onto a 24" round table with someone else, who also thought they had a private table. Personal space - none! We had to ask for a refund in order to get service, where they moved us to a less crowded area with a 12" railing as table. But the show was enjoyable! Would recommend just buying regular tickets.

Crazy night in the best club ever!!!. Best Nightclub ever!!!!In England nothing like this exists!!! If you go to Mexico you have to go!!!!Its crazy, fun, manic, insane!!!! Shows are brilliant, staff are great, drinks are flowing all night.Shot girls can be a bit rude with selling shots... and the 1 toilet for the women is shocking tbh but it wouldn't stop me going again. Best night out I've had

Ho what a night'. First time to Coco Bongo night club. if you go to Mexico it's a must just for the experience.There are a variety of acts including Beetle juice, Chicago, Beyoncé, acrobats super hero's flying around. Dancing floor. The atmosphere is fantastic.The show starts at 11:30 but you need to be there really before 10:00 pm to get a good space as it gets packed out fast. We went V.I.P to get a good place and that was still packed out, however you get a waiter for your drinks. The show finishes about 03:30, but you can stay for the disco until 05:00 am.

What a night at Coco Bongo!. THE place to be in Cancun, Coco Bongo is a show bar with everything to suit every taste! Brilliant little shows and great music give you a fab night out! Go for the goldmember package and you wont be disappointed!

Great Time.. Yes Yes Yes!! . Me and my husband had an awesome time here and mingled with lots of friendly people. The staff were very good and respectful. We paid regular open bar admission and did not wait in line. That line was ridiculously long. The Cancun coco bongo is horrible!! This coco bongo is sooooo much better!! We had standard standing tickets and we were very satisfied! From me dancing on the bar top to having front row view of the shows. The people with tables in VIP looked bored. You can't mingle much because they don't allow much people in those sections. So you party with who you came with. If you only want to watch the show or watch other people have fun then I recommend it. But the lower level is for dancing, dancing and more dancing!! The bottle service is a waste of time. Only do it to impress someone. There are servers everywhere.. We had one friendly server check on us every now and then just tip them well so they'll come back. I stood the whole time I didn't mind. Just wear comfortable shoes! No one stepped on me or shoved much. Me and my husband had enough dancing room.

Time to " PARTY ". Fantastic evening, and an amazing atmosphere, was pretty dear for the event, but worth it if your a good drinker ! they come all the time before you even dink it, so your never without a drink. Great to " PARTY "

Best club I've been to . I'm a young girl and I've had my fair share of partying but I can honestly say that coco bongo was amazing. The live shows and the overall energy just can't be duplicated anywhere else. It does seem a little overpriced when you are booking it however it is definitely worth all of the money that you spend. The staff and security definitely ensure that you are having an amazing time. They pull you up and make you dance on the bar tables and they also let you dance on stage. I definitely recommend this establishment to anyone who's looking to have an awesome time partying in Playa Del Carmen! I will definitely be going back to CoCo Bongo

Over priced. I found the coco bongo good, but NOT worth £100 per person! You were told you would get a private table etc etc.. you got a stool on a shared bench.. the drinks were unlimited, and were nice.. but no nicer than the all inclusive drinks at the hotel. The show was amazing, with people flying around on jump ropes and dancing and acting.. We only stayed until about 1.30am because of how drunk we were, and there was a rowdy bunch of lads around us who were starting to get on the verge of rude and slightly aggressive, the one man had apparently got married the day before and regretted it, so it seemed him and all his friends were getting completely smashed and trying to pull every female in sight! Personally, I think they should have been booted out, but the security didnt seem that keen on asking people to leave. Overall, Coco Bongos was alright, but tickets were worth about £40 each not £100..

The party never ends. This is quite an entertaining place. Last year we did the general admission and had a great time. Stepped it up to the VIp and well even had a better time. not as crowded and could dance and enjoy the show. It is a fun n ight but be prepare dto be out late. You will not get back to your room until about 4 am if you stay for the whole thing. you should at least go once if you have it in you. You will have a great time but with expectations of it being very crowded and a big party.

ANYONE IN COCO BONGO MONDAY THIS WEEK. HI we were in mexico this last 2 weeks just got home today, we went to coco bongos Monday evening the 14th sept what a fantastic evening we had.We booked through lomas travel at our hotel and went as VIP member which enabled us to have a reserved table with premium drinks served all night it was a unforgettable evening dancing and drinking we enjoyed it so much we forgot to video the night so if anyone was there that evening please get in touch if you have video of the show many thanks cindy

Amazing . Well I went in very open minded after being told lots of mixed reviews, an I can just say wow I had such an amazing night the show was fab the atmosphere was great an the bar was great, we went as gold members so got in pretty quick. An we got very good seats but I think this was by very good chance as it was very over sold, the selection of drinks was great had something for everyone. The big let down for me was the shot girls as they was bothering you every 2 minutes an I mean every 2 minutes. The show was unbelievable was so good, waiting on staff was great to. It in all was such a good fun night. An the show went on all night to. Just a great place will definitely go again.

Fab but a looong night and full of kids!. Fiance and I had to visit coco bongo when on holiday in Cancun in May this year. Its something you have to do at least once and overall it was an amazing night.We booked the gold package through out hotel which included a table allinclusive drinks and transport to and from the club.Arrived 9pm ish to balloons being handed out and free shots..were taken to our tablr which was actually a bar with stools overlooking the main stage. Had a waitoe on hand to take our drinks order which was fab - more tips better service!had about a 45min wait till the main show started.. it was amazing and is a must see but is a looong night.. I dont think we got picked up till 3am.. at 27 & 35 we are probably like an old married couple now but we were ready to go bk to the hotel at 1am lol!It is a must see though si definitely go and definitely pat vip otherwise you are stood up on a crowded dance floor for 6 hours with crazy drunk kids lol and the queues for the bar were crazy long.Fab eve wouldn't go again but did enjoy it!

Mehh. We were a group of over 50 ppl and we had bought our tickets from an official CocoBongo employee. the deal was 65$ per person and they had guaranteed us chairs and tables. Finally we had to wait over an hour in a line up while other groups were let in, they made a fuss about one extra person even though we were ready to pay for her, had to pay the staff for every chair they brought and acting as if they were making us a great favor, place was way over packed, to the point that some were concerned for their safety. As far as the show itself though, it was great and they have very talented performers, thank god for that cause thats the only thing they got right at that place.
Cocobongo is amazing!. This was one of the best shows I have ever seen! So much fun, amazing energy, great people. Me and my husband danced the night away! Such a great experience!

BRILLIANT . Be sure to visit coco bongos playa del carmen !! All age groups inside , its not just for 18-30s as people may think !! The shows they put on and the way they party was one of the best memories of my holiday . Wish I could upload some videos to show you just how great this place is! NOT TO BE MISSED !!!

Awesome. this is simply the best night I have ever had and it will not be beaten. From the beginning to the end we didn't stop dancing and singing. I was tipsy by the time I got to our chair from the three free shots they give you as you are shown your seat.We booked through our Thompson rep but he told us to go earlier than their puck up and we would get better seats. We did we where dead opposite the stage and no one in front of us.We went gold VIP and as soon as our drinks were empty the next one was there. We all loved everything about our night in coco bongo and when we left there were loads of taxis ready to take us back to the hotel and we didn't even realise it was after 4am as we were buzzing.

Wow wow wow. Wow!!!! We went for a night here as a party of 12 we had pre booked our tables with bottles on everything was amazing George who we booked with was spot on! The only issue we had was the rude waiter trying to get us to buy or drinks even thou we had paid for an open bar then the shocking response we got for handing his 200 pesos as a tip as he expected more gave us it back told us it was a rubbish tip!! Safe to say he never got another. The place its self and shows were amazing he didn't ruin our night!

A Must See!. This place was Awesome and you must experience it with your own eyes. This entertaining, high energy club has something for everyone, but be sure to take a nap before you head out because the party "don't stop"! We had a ball at this exclusive, all you can drink club. The music and entertainment was something to see and experience. Be sure to wear comfortable shoes because you will be standing the whole time unless you pay extra for VIP which I recommend. Enjoy and live life!!
Coco Bongo's is bonkers!!. What an experience, something you certainly wouldn't experience in the UK. Expensive but worth it. So different, full of life, just an excellent night out (and morning).
Amazing . This is a place is a must. Wow!! It was absolutely amazing the shows were out of this world. I would definitely go there again.

Great night out, a must see. We booked the bongo tour,which consists of transport into playa del carmen,then onto señor frogs,salsanera,then to coco bongo its self all of which was inclusive of the $85 dollars,brilliant performers and atmosphere all night,would definitely recommend

Great night out. Loved the night at coco bongo! We got the gold member ticket which I would 100% recommend as we got straight into the club and the queue outside looked massive! We got waiter service inside from a very friendly waiter who kept bringing us drinks. The show is very good and quite funny in some parts. A word of advice ladies, if you want to dance on the stage do not go on the front podium if you have a skirt on. You have been warned!!!

Crazy!!. Great night out- wild place! The acrobats and dancers are fantastic and the VIP option essential if you want to sit but still have room to dance. People of all ages having a great night.Pace yourself with the drink (my husband didn't!!) as the staff are keen to keep you topped up!its a long night but a fun night and we were totally danced out by 4 am!!
Fantastic. Brillant evening best show I've seen for a long long time. Drinks come fast and furious always something happening

Unsafe environment . Spent a total of 1 hr until a random glass/bottle came flying at my head during the confetti drop. The glass broke on my head . Lost my balance for a second and was bleeding through my forehead. Was taken to a "Dr" who seemed to be just a first aid certified lady. She just cleaned it with some Betadine and that was that. She didn't speak English as well since everything I asked she just said yes. Was too dizzy to stay and it felt unsafe anyway. Ended up paying a cab to take us back to the resort. Head a headache through the night . Also very crowded and minimal places to stand. Won't be returning .

Lot's of fun! . We went to Coco Bongo on Thursday night and really enjoyed ourselves!! It was arranged via our hotel, and we brought the regular ticket albeit bein g told by people who had been before that it can get quite busy down the bottom.The tickets are a little expensive, however you are getting transport there and back, entrance and alcohol is included. So you can't complain too much! Many peoples reviews on here are a little misleading. I'm sure people think it's a sit down show and disappointed to find they have to dance because its a nightclub and show! :)The shows are anything from Freddie mercury, moulin rouge and so on! Then a dance inbetween.If you're up for a boogie and to see some fantastic fun shows then this will be right up your street. When we were in there we much preferred being standing down below. We could dance and interact with the show, and to be honest the tables look pretty cramped themselves!! They didn't hold back with the vodkas in our drinks either!! They were pretty strong & there's so much tequila! Things to note (because our hotel rep didn't give us this advice!):I wore flip flops, but u might want to wear converse or shoes of some sort if you are worried about your feet getting stepped on.The que to get in is MASSIVE!! so take some dollars/Mexican peso with u to pay for fast track to get in! It's so much quicker! It was 20 dollars each for us.Take your ID just encase.Enjoy!!

RIP OFF. I went here and it was not that great, if I pay over £50 for a ticket I expect comfort, try getting a drink or even a tableVery overcrowded, got about 5 drinks spilt on me and the partner.After about 1 hr we had had enough of the pushing a shoving,.Maybe OK if your in your 20's, Get to one of the live shows/parties on the beach much better

Hands down the funnest experience you can have in Mexico!. Took my Girlfriend here on our last night in Playa and It was truly the highlight of our trip. We reserved a table on one of the mezzanines for $220 with a smashing view directly opposite the stage, which if u can afford is the best way to experience the show. Wednesday night is "ladies night" so the line was down the street and around the corner, but we walked straight in via the VIP line. I had been to Coco Bongo in Cancun years earlier, but was impressed by how much more refined the shows had become, without loosing their fun, rawness. An absolute must while in Playa.

Loco Coco Bongo!. What an unexpectedly crazy night! We certainly don't have anything comparable in the UK.From 11:00pm to around 3:30pm, you essentially have a cabaret club night of many mini popular culture themes interspersed with decent and generic popular musicOur 60 USD each (paid at our hotel) got us travel to and from the club, entry and all of our drinks for the night - shots are extra. It was a long queue to get in, once we did, we received drinks and shots along the way - a sign of things to come.The club itself is more of an arena - 3 sides and 3 levels and a ground floor onlooking at a main stage - this is where my only real negative of the night is - we were well positioned facing the stage high up but behind a few people in a major gangway to the toilets and the bar - this was our place for the night - we couldn't always see and regularly had to make space for people and waiters passing by. Coco Bongo isn't a club in the traditional sense - you can dance and everything but for most people, their spot for the night IS where they are all night. My one recommendation without knowing how much it is would be to try and get a table. Other than that, we didn't even need to go to the bar - a waiter passed by with incredible frequency to bring us well remembered drinks all night long.The show had tributes to Michael Jackson, Madonna, Bruno Mars and the films Spider-Man and Tron!! That's just to illustrate how random it all was! It was dancers in full costume, spectacular acrobats and random comedy moments - all just needs to be seen to believed!Amazing night - just needed some a better position and it would be perfect!

Night to remember!. Went to Mexico for Labor Day weekend and to celebrate my husband birthday. Had an amazing time in Mexico. We went to Coco Bongo and had a blast. If this place was in America definetely a hazard. There is like 3k people, all ages (adult).Open Bar is a plus, shows are amazing. Bad thing is people are rude and like to push. One bathroom and it's very loud. Also, strings of paper everywhere, be careful cause you might slide and fall. Besides that, once in a lifetime experience. Going to CB in Punta Cana. Will keep you posted. Xoxo,A

A good experience . This was a really good night out. I got a gold member ticket with my husband. This meant we got to skip the queues and have a place to sit on the first floor. HAving a certain spot was good but it was very cramped. If I moved my legs I was kicking the person below me in the back of the head. I had pictured a table but it was actually just bar stools along a balcony. The build upTo 'the show' is a bit boring- not much going on. But once 'the show' started the night starts to go really quickly. I think saying it is a show is confusing as I was expecting one long performance. What you actually get is lots of mini performances between about 11.30 and 2.30 am. There is really good music on in between and fun stuff happens like balloons are released for everyone to dance with. The gold member section is a bit hard to dance in due to lack of room.If you really want to party and dance I would say to go for regular entry. Overall it was a really good fun night out. Very different to a normal club due to the performances.

Club, Show, Open Bar, FUN!!!. Its a thriving party all night with music pumping, drinks flowing and people dancing. The show is fantastic with ticker tape smoke machines and strobe lights. The a/c is pumping all night. Only bad is the amount of people they cram into this place. It is tight and the only way to actually get a seat is to buy a bottle. Otherwise be prepared to stand the whole night. We had transportation to and from the resort so we got there around 10:30pm and at 3:30am we hopped on our bus and left. I suggest taking some cash because for $10 each extra they will allow you to skip the line. I didn't bring enough pesos to do so myself to the club.
Dance and enjoy the show. What a night. This is Begas style ahow with open bar service to your table or wherever you stand. Awesome !!

Ultra Fun Night. I love this place. Might be touristic but its amazing show. We were out of our expectations. It was really something out of our mind. We had reserved the VIP upstairs and there was an open bar. The show was so professional. Always again! The music phantasmic

Overrated. I would like to start by saying that the performers did a fantastic job and so did the service staff. My issues lay with the the cramped quarters and no seating (we paid with a group to have a table and seating which we ended up not getting). We were placed on a step shoulder to shoulder with as many of us as they could fit, and then had people lined up in similar fashion in front and behind. Had we received the seating we anticipated, the evening would have been much more enjoyable.The performers worked tirelessly as well as the service staff, I really can't say enough about them.I MIGHT go back under different circumstances. If you don't mind being packed into a sweaty room with MANY young drunk people, by all means go. Otherwise, I recommend looking elsewhere for a night out.

Great idea, but ruined. My girlfriend and I had been looking forward to visiting Coco Bongo for years, so were really looking forward to going. Unfortunately however I need to agree with some of the negative reviews below. The idea is great, as a massive fan of the Mask movie growing up, I was looking forward to seeing what the Coco Bongo was like in real life. The tie in of nightclub and live performances/gymnasts is a great idea. I certainly can't fault the sound system/music or the performers (gymnasts)....unfortunately some of the 'mime' acts e.g. 'Lou Bega' in particular couldn't even mime the correct words. I know it's probably due to language barrier i.e. English is probably the performers second language, but it was massively off-putting and just made it feel tacky. The real issues actually started with the person that sold us the tickets at our resort. We travelled from the Valentin Imperial Maya resort with another couple, and paid for 'VIP' area. The person who sold us the tickets (be careful with these guys), assured us it would be VIP area, away from the crowd, private transfer for only our hotel (it wasn't...they tried to be fly on the way home and take other hotels too) etc etc But really when we got there, the 'VIP' seats were really a tiny round table, crammed together with about 8 others, judging by the available space about 4 too many, 2 stairs up from the general floor. The person who sold us the tickets was at least a bit honest in admitting it's all based on what drink you buy where you get to sit. I was honestly shocked how bad the staff were, and this is the biggest issue and what ruins the club. Our waiter was hysterically bad. He was completely disinterested, and obviously dreamed of being one of the performers, as he constantly just watched the acts, danced along, actually appeared on stage at some points with some of the other waiters, and creepily just inappropriately stared and took pictures of any attractive girl nearby. He brought our bottle over to the table and opened it, then completely ignored us to focus on his above goals. The other staff rudely stormed about, managers ignored anyone that complained about the over-crowding. The only staff I felt bad for were the poor guys that had to sweep up after every confetti bomb. There was barely any room for the 4 of us to sit/stand/breathe never mind these poor guys trying to clean around us. On a slightly positive note as mentioned above, the music was great, gymnasts were great, but it just seemed like every couple of minutes they let off a confetti bomb to distract you from the over-crowding and terrible staff. The treatment of girls was also laughable. Throughout the initial build up, the main screens would show random 'spotlights' of girls. Attractive girls were given 'backstage passes' which allowed them the privilege of potentially appearing on the stage - this involved being told to dance and then an air blast would try to blow their skirt up, if they didn't dance well enough they were pulled offstage. The majority of girls involved were obviously up for it, so fair enough. They would vacantly just dance away, try to take 'selfies' of themselves etc so I suppose you can't really blame the club as they were on board with it, it just felt tacky and laughable to me. So yeah, sadly not good memories. I love clubbing, I love music and I love watching performers, but sadly what is a great idea has been ruined by what appears to be scummy management, over-crowding and terrible staff.Wouldn't actually recommend going unless you can just get wasted and ignore the above, or there is a massive group of you to distract/get a good spot. Also, be careful around the outside area at night, doesn't seem the safest.It doesn't put Vegas nightlife to shame, it really doesn't.

WOW !!!! AMAZING !!!!. Unbelieveble, nothing compares to this. If you love nightlife this is for you!!! I don't know if it puts Vegas nightlife to shame but it sure does put everything i know to shame... A must visit in Playa !!!!

Tourist Trap. A rip off. Designed to fleece tourists. Overcrowded to a dangerous level, and wildly overpriced entry charges. You want a table? That is 100 USD extra.. you want chairs with that table? That will be 200 bucks... Unbelievable.
Wow. What a great night, really enjoyable, very busy but we sensibly went in as a gold member which meant we had a seat and all inclusive drinks. Well worth a visit

More club than show. We visited here whilst on our honeymoon as a "must do!" We paid for the gold member through our rep at the hotel - good job!! The floor was PACKED! We thought that it would be more of a show with some kind of clubbing but it was the other way round really. We sat on the first balcony at the front so had a really good view. The shows were genuinely AMAZING!! But in all the 6 hours we was there wasn't much show! Drinks were on tap. I avoided the alcohol as they were so so strong and saw to many people leaving in a complete mess very early on! When you pay that kind of money to go to a club you wanna remember it at least!! Gold members - only one toilet for women and one for men for the whole balcony! There was a women in there keeping it clean and fresh and there was never a que! The severs were on form. The security was tight. The dancers never stopped! All in all it's worth the experience! We should have got the transport back at 3:30 but. We just got a taxi at 3:10 couldn't be bothered to wait and we was so tired! There was people here from 18 - 70! Every enjoyed it! Would recommend just to see the shows! but be aware it's a club with a few shows!

A fun & expensive night on the town, or so we thought..... I went to Cocobongo about 15 years ago in Cancun and it was a night my friends and I will never forget. Ever since then we've wondered if it was the same, I finally tried it with a date. We paid 145$ per person to get a bar stool on the second level and unlimited premium drinks. There was no host to liven up the area like last time. My date and I had approximately 5 drinks( kettle one vodka) and soda. We arrived at 10:30 and I have no recollection of anything after the last pic on my cell phone at 1:34 am. My date was lucid enough to get us to the hotel for 25$ which was only 4 blocks away. We spent the next 21 hours sick as dogs not able to function. We 100 % believe that we were either not drinking Kettle one, but a cheap vodka in the kettle one bottle or we had something slipped in our drink. The shows here are great, but we didn't really even get to dance. I will never go again nor will I recommend to anyone else. The playa pub crawl is almost 1/2 the price and much more fun. Think twice before you let your teenage kid go

Nothing like it. Coco Bongo is an experience like nothing else in Playa. It's kind of expensive but we always have a great time. Recommend paying extra for the gold pass I think they call it. Better booze and more importantly you don't have to wade through the crowd on the floor to use the facilities.

Amazing Night. Thought this was a bit on the pricey side with Thomson's for a trip, but was worth every penny. We had great seats and a fantastic waiter, glass was never empty the show was outstanding and atmosphere buzzing.

Mole&Co. fantastic!Great show, great night not to be missed Thank you Nelson for arranging this for our group age between 21 & 60 years, a good time was had by all,VIP upgrade for $45 gave you good waiter service with free flowing drinks. Watch out for the shot girls, these shots are not free. Seating is ok if you get stools but not so good around the tables. Men sit on the back of the bench seat with the girls sitting on the seat between their legs. Girls, don't wear white as others have walked along the seats before you.Good entertainment from 11pm until 3am with loads of good music & dancing in between,Great night!!!

Coco Bongo - a night to remember!. Great experience at Coco Bongo, booked through Thomson rep, in which they only offer the 'Gold' tickets. Very pricey but worth it - we got the best seats in the house (ask to be seated next to the balcony), were as the people with general admission were crammed in like sardines below. This also included our own water who kept our drinks full (all incl) and joined in the fun. A must do, but a late one - next day was a write off!

GO IF YOU CAN. This is one of a lifetime thing. If you are in Mexico, you should go. It's not just a party place. They do so much more. One of the most entertaining nights ever. We had the golden VIP ticket with free drinks, upper seating and even it was quite expensive I think it was worth it.

Unreal Experience!!!. Coco Bongo was AMAZING. We bought a ticket for ladies night this past week and won the other ticket through our resort. We had transportation to and from the club and it went smoothly. Tickets were $65 and $50 on ladies night. The shows were out standing. The place is packed so be prepared. But it is well worth the money and it is open bar once you have your ticket. I would 100% recommend experiencing Coco Bongo at least once.

Fun night out! Just be ready for a late one!!. This is my second time to Coco Bongo. First time was in Cancun with a girlfriend and this time in Playa was with my Husband. I had to bring him to this!We stayed at a nearby resort and booked the package with them. We went straight for the Gold Member package. With this we had a table on the second level with continuous drink service. Knowing from my past experience, I knew that I didn't want to be down with the general crowd and fight my way in to the bar. So this was perfect.Our waiter brought us drink after drink after drink... we didn't need to ask. He would actually take my glass away most times with half the drink left and gave me a new one! We left him a nice tip- very attentive.We sat next to some older couples that came from our resort also. They were having a great time up until about 1am and then I think they were ready to go. Another couple left after about 20 minutes... thinking they didn't like it! I would describe this place as a nightclub with bit of Las Vegas style shows. Do not go into this thinking that it is purely a show. There are lots of young drunk kids and loud 'top 40's' music. Of course there is a lot of other stuff, oldies music mixed in... but its primarily geared towards the young. The shows ended at about 3:30am... so just be ready for a very late night.It hurt me to see the older couple leave after after 20 minutes knowing how much money they spent!! So please don't go into this thinking its going to be anything different from what I described!!

Disco and show night. This place is amazing with a mix of music and shows every night until 3:30 am. The place get pack and the line is over 200 ppl so get there early. The shows are amazing with music breaks every 15 minutes.
To old for this young night life-. For the younger crowd - great show but makes for a very long night... a one of a kind experience !!!!!!

Great night . Really enjoyed coco bingo, booked the trip through our Thomas Cook rep and there was no problem. Definitely go VIP as you get seats and a better view of the stage and amazing service, fresh drinks were being brought constantly. The show included a huge range of tribute acts and all were amazing. Definitely worth going to if you are in playa.

Coco bongo experience. Went to Coco Bongo in Playa Del Carmen on 21st August 2015. The show was spectacular and well worth the price. From entry to exit the night was all energy and the open bar helped refresh especially the Tequila. Would recommend any one to visit and experience the show.

Great experience!. Fun experience! Great combo of good music and a good show. I even got to dance on the bar! My only complaint was the length. The bus dropped us off at 9:30... And it doesn't seem come back til 3:30 am! We were pooped and so ready for our bed!

Coco Bongo. Me & the Mrs are Normally in bed by 11pm. when we booked and was told it finishes at 3:30 which was going to be a challenge for me! But what a crazy night!! Had no problems staying awake lol brilliant entertainment and staff! If I'm ever in Mexico again we will be coming back but will try the Cancun one as it is supposed to be a lot bigger!

Crazy night out with our family. We have a 20 year old son and an 18 year old daughter so we decided to "woop" it up one night. This was a great place to watch a show and just enjoy the crazy New Years like atmosphere. We did get a private table with bottle service which was the way to go as it was very crowed with standing room only. Our daughter does not drink and our server was very good and took care of her. It was a really fun night !

A night to remember.. An unbelievable night with a micture of excellent shows and party time. It was an incredible atmosphere made better with balloons being shot out into the crowd. You would have to see it to believe it. We did the gold member and while it was a bit pricey it was well worth the money. The service was incredible. We didn't wait for a drink once. Also, the view was great from where we were and it looked a bit crowded standing up below.

Just OK. Since the last time I visited a few years ago the prices seem to have been hiked up and the show although still good seems to be to being replaced by more of a disco. If I wanted a disco I'd go to the Blue Parrot down the road, less than half the price and better music.

Best last night in Playa Del Carmen!. This was my second time, I would highly recommend getting at table or private booth and not being in the "general public" area. It was our last night in town and it was the best way to end the trip. I was invited on stage and it made my night!

Absolutely brilliant. writing on behalf of my husband and daughter (i couldn't go as my son is under 18) the trip was booked through Thomson at our hotel Azul Sensatori so we were in the Thomson VIP area, as there was over 10 of us Coco bongo arranged free pick up and drop off, we were collected at 21:30, the show started around 10:30. It was was one the best shows we have ever seen and we have been to the USA and seen some great shows. The talent and pace of the show were just fantastic and just when we thought it couldn't get any better another great act came on. Its a must if you are in Mexico.
Best night club ever. They are right, it blows away night life in vegas. It is worth the money for the open bar. It gets very packed but it is so much fun. Everyone should go.

Best show on earth. There is a reason they call it the best show on earth. Great club atmosphere that keeps you entertained all night long. The servers are out of this world. They keep bringing you drinks wherever you are standing as getting to the bar is tough due to it being a full house every night. It is a great show. Will go back next time in Playa.

Never been anywhere like it!. This place is crazy! It's so good-like a theatre and a club wrapped into one, for all ages (over 18 obviously) because the music covers all genres and ages. There is so much talent in this show!

The best night ever!. This is a MUST do if you are in Mexico! It really was the most incredible night! This isn't a 'night club' as I was expecting, it's an indescribable, once in a life time show! Suitable for all age groups, young or old! Me and my boyfriend booked this direct through a coco bongo rep at our hotel - I strongly recommend going vip as it is absolutely worth every penny! All drinks included, your own personal waiter who tops up your drink before it's even empty and looks after you the whole night. Great seats, fantastic view, and you even get the chance to go up on stage and dance with the acts! No queuing, no getting squashed! Not sure the experience would've been half as good if we'd have gone non vip. The night goes on until about 4/5 in the morning - didn't think I would make it the whole night but the night is so mesmerising and entertaining that it keeps your engagement until the very last minute! Our waiter Uber was amazing, looked after us so well and made the experience all the more memorable. Even if you don't think this is your cup of tea, You'd be crazy to miss out!
Amazing night!. Absolutely amazing night! Best club/show we have ever been to! We booked the VIP balcony space at the club, and drinks were served throughout the night!
Excellent night out. Had a fantastic night, did go VIP mainly to have a seat but to be honest never sat all night, you needed to stand to get the best out of the show.

Must for visitors!. This place tries extremely hard to put a Broadway style show that is interactive in a nightclub setting that is fun. If you don't like crowds either reserve a table buying a bottle or avoid. It gets packed! Still worth it!

You're never too old. Wow what a place, what a time a must to experience! We visited coco bongo on the back of a recommendation and it was worth every penny and being extremely tired the next day! The music was great even for an 80s throwback like me! The shows were amazing and the atmosphere was one not to be missed! Service brilliant and no hassle!!! Go for it don't let anyone tell you your too old! Our 18 and 20 year olds are very jealous of mum and dad

DONT GO on a weekend for a better experience.. If you want to be able to see the shows, and not be over crowded, i recommend not going on a Saturday night. And, if you choose to go on a Saturday night, be sure to have enough cash on hand to skip the line. For an extra $10 each, you can skip the line, and that might allow you better standing room to enjoy the shows.

Amazing night out. Great atmosphere great show and too much drink! Waiters just keep bringing it you lose count. Definitely recommend gold member access otherwise you'll b squashed onto the dance floor with nit a great view.

What a night!. This place is on another planet (in a good way)We paid extra for VIP and it was worth it! You get to sit on the balcony and see all of the show with no obstructions. You also get waited on and they will feed you drinks all night whilst you watch the show at no extra cost if you go VIP. The show itself is great and I ended up on stage at the end with a couple of other girls as they came and brought us up which was really funny.We had a blast! Would definitely recommend!

Night out to celebrant birthdays. We were out for two birthdays we got a taxi from our hotel its best to order tickets from you're hotel we managed to get the night out drinks paid for for the night and a area to sit was an amazing performance and brilliant night out could never beat it would go again xx

GET READY TO DANCE AND ENJOY THE SHOWS. A great place to go for amazing entertainment. From dancing to unbelievable shows it was truly a great night. It does get packed and be ready to be on your feet and it is definitely worth it. Saw shows from pirates of the carribean, pitiful, jennifer lopez, madonna, micheal jackson, elvis, and much much more. If you are near this location you need to go. Don't forget to tip the servers that bring your drinks because then you will never have to look for them and they will supply you with impeccable service! Get Ready to Dance!!!

An Unforgettable Night. We booked a VIP table and it was well worth the money. We also had bottle service and an open bar. This was one of the most exciting and unique clubs I have ever been to. People of all ages will enjoy it as the music spans generations. I would not miss this place. Our family stayed until 4am and loved every minute!!

Disappointed. I have been to Coco Bongo in Cancun and this was very different from it, in a bad way. It is much smaller but more crowded. If you don't have a table you will be stuck getting pushed by everyone. The entertainment and the show was incredible but we couldn't enjoy it because of how packed it was. We also got there early because we were told to and we waited about 30 minutes until we got in. Basically, only go if you have a table because if not you will not have fun.
Best trip of holiday well worth going. Great atmosphere. Show was briiliant. Staff worked very hard...I would love to work here. Party central but health and safety doesn't exist!!!

Great night. We booked this through our thomson rep and had the goldmember ticket. It was definitely worth it as we didn't spend ages outside in the queue and had fantastic seats opposite the stage and our own waiter who was brilliant and kept up a constant supply of drinks without us even asking. The show itself was amazing, really energetic and professional, an entertaining night, warm up while waiting is also fun with the kiss cam!!!

Amazing Club. Coco Bongo was highly recommended by my good friend. It is worth the money paid, my Husband and i payed $65/ person. it is all you can drink and includes your entrance. Our waiter fernando was awesome! he kept checking in on us and after awhile we didn't have to ask for any drinks, he knew what we were drinking. They have an amazing show throughout the night and that's really what separates this place grin the rest! I will definitely be returning and bringing my party people with me!

So much fun!. Long line-ups but you can pay an extra $10 to skip ahead. It was worth it. They provide you with drinks and a tequila shot upon entering and then it's open bar from there. Great shows and music.

Entrance should be better organized. Nice show, however entrance is quite disorganized, it seems like the management have no regards for its clients. You have to wait for 45 minutes in a line, in the heat. There were ladies on the line who wanted to go to the restroom and they had to buy a drink at a nearby bar because they were not allowed to come in. If you did not want to make the line, then pay $10 a person, why they don't tell you this before? and wait until you get there, get desperate and pay another $10???
best time of my life. the proper party place. not only drinking but there is a proper show in costumes with dancers that keeps you entertained the whole night

Awesome shows, crazy and fun atmosphere. If you're looking for a place that offers vegas style shows, good music, and a club atmosphere that rivals anything you can imagine, go here. I recommend the gold package...allows you to immediately cut the 1 hour plus wait in line, guaranteed seats, and best seats in the house and any alcohol on the menu unlimited.

great night out !!!. We went to coco bongo in may 2015, had a great night, we arrived at 10pm as if you arrive any later can we hard to get a good seat if vip!! At first the staff could not find us on the list and we we asked to stand to one side but this soon got sorted and get went inside it was smaller then we thought but had a great night, the show was amazing well worth the money!!we book in uk through Thomson!! the whole atmosphere is amazing like nothing i have ever seen before, i would recommend this place to others!the only negative was myself and my partner were seated next to loos in vip and one guy was very drunk came running up to loo at end of the night and vomited all over my back and gf i was not very happy we had to leave early but this was no fault of coco bongos!! amazing night!!

Great Entertainment. The Coco Bongo experience was very good with only one major let down our server (Miguel) was terrible at ensuring we had drinks. Which has me reducing my rating to average.My wife and I had VIP gold tickets and really enjoyed the show and atmosphere. I'm not sure if our server was overtasked in his area of responsibility or just lacked the attention and focus that I expected after forking over $300 USD for two tickets.
Excellent entertainment and great night. The whole atmosphere was out of this world and thank you Antonio for helping me get through the crowds.

CoCo Bongo!!!!. My husband I were looking for a place to go dancing while on our vacation in Playa Del Carmen. We asked around and everyone directed us to the same place....CoCo Bongo!!!!!We didn't know what to expect, but we were more that pleasantly surprised. We sat a level above the "Standing room only" and a level below the "VIP area". Our seats had a table and a server (very convenient considering how busy and full the club became). The area we were in was roped off so no one who did not pay to sit there could not enter- this was perfect because we were able to sit, drink and dance without feeling cramped or too tight.The Show was Over The TOP!! We have been to many shows in Las Vegas and this was right up there with them. A Complete Surprise, We were only expecting to dance all night!! The show was spectacular, we recommend it to everyone!
Amazing night . Had the most amazing night here, booked theVIP and we were looked after all night thanks fernando!!The shows where spectacular and music good too. Worth a visit
What an experience. Such good fun! Make sure you experience Coco Bongos at least once in your life. Great show, great night and good value for money.

Fab night! A must do!. Great night! Great acts! great music! What more can you ask for! It is very busy, very tight inside but thats what makes the atmosphere.
