We had a reserved table which helped as we then had our our waiter and area to stand and dance and watch the shows. Otherwise you are in the pit and it can be heaving!Had a fab time.

Unique experience just be sure you are clear on what you are getting. I went with my husband at the start of August. Booked with Thompson and got the gold Vip tickets. Definitely worth it as you skip the queuing outside which can be quite long and get a table and seat. Everyone else is stood up downstairs and it is a bit of a mad crush. Our table was great and our waiter bringing us drinks all night was lovely. Try to get a table near the front of the balcony so that you can see everything as the show takes place on the main stage which you are level with as a VIP. Everyone else is below. But there are also bits with people mid air and dancing on the bar which you miss if like us you are near the back of the VIP. The drinks were good and free flowing with VIP. The show elements were really fab with bits from batman, Michael Jackson, phantom of the Opera, spider man, tron, maddona, Elvis... The list goes on! The night is half show half club and is a good laugh. There are some entertaining acts. In between the short acts it reverts to a club which to make the most of in all honesty you need to be a partier and a drinker. We went on a Thursday was full of a younger crowd drinking hard and partying hard. Just be aware if bringing younger teenagers in a family group that there were cameramen filming dancing etc and a lot of the thrust of that was zooming in on women and blowing air up people's skirts. The transport back to the hotel was hell for us as we were on the group coach back to the hotel and were with a particularly lairy loud very drunk group of people. This however I am aware is what you would expect coming from a club night, but just be aware this is essentially what you are booking as we felt we were being sold it by Thomson more as a show. Overall it is a good experience and certainly unique in what you see and you be hard pushed to find its rival certainly in the UK! I went with my husband at the start of August. Booked with Thompson and got the gold Vip tickets. Definitely worth it as you skip the queuing outside which can be quite long and get a table and seat. Everyone else is stood up downstairs and it is a bit of a mad crush. Our table was great and our waiter bringing us drinks all night was lovely. Try to get a table near the front of the balcony so that you can see everything as the show takes place on the main stage which you are level with as a VIP. Everyone else is below. But there are also bits with people mid air and dancing on the bar which you miss if like us you are near the back of the VIP. The drinks were good and free flowin

Wonderful night at coco Bongo. Visited this cabaret style night club July of this year and what a fantastic night it was. The club was very busy, however we paid extra for VIP tickets which gave us seats on the higher level, with our own bar tender constantly bringing drinks to our table. We had a fabulous time, watching the dancers, tribute acts and acrobats and if you like dance & music from several different eras I would highly recommend visiting this club.
Loved it !. What an experience ! You've got to see this ! It is plain crazy and funny ! Loved every minute of it.
Amazing night. Most amazing night of my life , I wish I could party there every week !!!!!!It's an amazing club and show in one I highly recommend this place to everyone .

PARTY PARTY PARTY!!!. Always a BLAST!!!!!!!!!!! We took our 18 yr old and 25 yr old and her hubby and everyone had sooooo much fun!! Never a dull moment here!!! My daughter and I danced on the bar all night lol !!

party spot. i was a little upset to see how long the line was. The tour planner told us the line would be long but did not explain how long. So we paid the extra to go right in. It is very crowded and the drinks are weak. But the music is good and the people are friendly. The entertainment was everything. This is what keeps people coming back.

Amazing. It was a bit of a confusing start to the evening due to Thompson not giving us the correct information.We had the gold VIP member option. This gives you an express entrance and a selected seating area, where a busboy brings all your drinks to you so you don't miss any of the entertainment. Service was excellent.This is the most mad, crazy place I have every been to. It has to be seen to be believed!!!!! The show is set on various levels from acrobats up in the air to dancer on the ground. Balloons and tic a tape flying through the air. Great music, fabulous entertainment well worth a visit for a fun night out. The only problem is the time goes too quickly. CAN'T WAIT TO GO BACK AGAIN.

Goes on for hours... seems like minutes. Coco Bongo is less a night club than a circus that serves drinks. The show(s) are fantastic. One of the most entertaining evenings I have ever spent. I have to admit that I was a bit nervous going in, but the staff there are 100% in control and the apparent mayhem is actually quite safe.

amazing!!. this is a must do if you love night clubbing, shows and alcohol.the show was fantastic and the waiters kept the drinks flowing all night.you can have your picture taken with the mask and spidermando the vip if you can has these are better seats.

nice place to party time. this is the place where you get realy happy its fantasctic the shows they are profecional,performance music everything its good the only one thing is to small but in general goooood

Entertainment Entertainment Entertainment. First time at Coco nit sure what to expect and I loved it! The club knows how to have a great time, keep the audience entertained and involved. Tickets purchased at the pool area at my resort $65 not sure if this is $$$ but what an experience all I can say Check it if you not
Very good show. A relly nice show, non stop music, dances, colors... lot of fun.Kind of expensive but great night guaranteed.

Crazy incredible night . A friend recommended we go and we take the gold option . We arrived and got seated bang opposite the stage with a stool and a drinks ledge . Our server just kept going with the drinks we were never without . The whole night was insane it really was like Rio,St Patrick day and new year all in one.Its a real experience not to be missed.

Great night out!. We were recommended coco bongo as a must do activity during our stay. We went on Thursday night which seemed to be quite a busy night in playa. We bought tickets on arrival from one of the reps in bright yellow we asked if he could get us in any quicker as it was after 10:30 and the line was huge!! He told us if we bought from him paying $65 US he could take us through to a quicker line on the left, we did this and were immediately escorted by the rep straight to the front of the line and inside. We were given tequila shots on arrival and thoroughly checked by security.Our tickets were standing only which I have to say I much preferred! We went up to the seated areas and it was very boring and lacking in atmosphere there, on the floor where everyone is dancing is the best! I was given a VIP backstage pass and asked to dance up on the main bar as well super fun!The performance was amazing!! Entertainment that went all night and very skilled performers doing a variety of different acts loved every minute! The down side to standing room Only is you have to get your own drinks, we tipped our waiter and he brought us anything we wanted all night including doubles. (If you're dancing on the bar the staff will also give you anything you want while you're up there :))This has been a huge highlight I definitely recommend to anyone staying in playa to go! It is a big night of dancing and place is very busy so be ready to get cosy with your fellow dancers!

BEST nightclub ever!. Went on a Friday night with a group of 12 people from the resort & had the most amazing time ever. Shows were exciting & even danced on the bar! Strongly advise spending the extra money on the VIP, but you'll have a great time dancing, singing along, and drinking!

Now that's a party!. Wow what a way to spend your birthday... We paid for VIP which is a must as you miss the massive air outside and get your own table with a server who gets you unlimited drinks all night and premium drinks aswell.We had been told to tip the waiter or waitress as you get better service and every third drink we have 5 dollar! He loved it we loved it and he basically parted with us all night! He got us drink after drink and he came to sing happy birthday! Basically we were very drunk but it seemed like he was by Us All night and not serving anyone else which we had noticed other people's annoyance but it's Mexico and they will work for tips ad we only gave the lad $15 and he treated us like kings on my birthday.The show is amazing batman spiderman, Queen The Mask there is so much and the music is brilliant and the whole place is just buzzing.The next morning wasn't as fun!

Party and Fun. People had told us about this place and i did not know what to expect. Put it this way Cabaret with Nightclub. All round entertainment from the moment you walk in till the moment you leave. Would recommend a first tier table and table service package as it gets packed. Everybody came out of there raving about how good it was

Awful!. You couldn't breath or move total waste of 65.00 a person to get in. Don't waste your money. The bus made me so sick getting there took over hour and then parked 5 blocks away and you had to walk threw not nice area to get there. Then stand in line for over an hour to be placed in a club that you were like sardines !!!! Defiantly horrible time left in 30 min had to get can back to hotel.

Party Party Party!!!!. Absolutely crazy disco full of dancers, weird people and fun!!!! We went there on Tuesday and it was kind of busy so I don´t want to imagine what it looks like when it´s weekend! The show was phenomenal, dancers great, waiter who was taking care of us OK /we paid for Gold Member and it was fine as we were located on the first floor with our own mini table and stools/. I think it is a little bit overpriced but it was some experience and you never know if you have a chance to go there again. We had a brilliant time and we really enjoyed the evening!

Fantastic!. After lots of people telling us we should definitely go to Coco Bongo, we did. Can totally see why so many people encouraged us to go! Got picked up from our hotel at 10pm and once dropped off, the driver walked us to the door and made sure we got in ok. We paid for gold and very glad we did. We were given a cocktail and shot of tequila before being taken to our table (if you don't go gold, you will have to stand the whole time). The place was mega busy, the atmosphere was amazing. Drinks were brought to us all night by our waiter. The entertainment was absolutely amazing, the time completely flew past and when it came to 3.15 and we had to go for our bus, we wanted to stay. We are not big night clubbers but both me and my husband absolutely loved our night, definitely the best part of our honeymoon!
XCARET!!!! FANTASTIC. xcaret make the tour is to know a lot about Mexican culture, and his show is spectacular. not to be missed are 2 exact hours you will enjoy every minute.

Coco Bongo. Must Go! make sure and take a nap before, you'll need it! party doesnt start until 11:30pm and ends around 3:30, open bar, yes OPEN BAR! VERY CROWDED but if you pay a bouncer, you can get a seat up higher away from the standing crowd! the shuttle picks us up and drops us right back off! awesome experience!

Get nightlife spot! You will not regret it!. This club was like nothing I have ever experienced! I highly recommend getting a VIP seat or getting a spot on the floor in next to the square bar. I am not a club goer and was a little skeptical about going, but some friends recommended we try it out. It will be one of the best memories from my honeymoon. I'm sure the drinks were low level liquors, but the service was great. The staff were very friendly and the restrooms were so much cleaner that I had hoped.

Amazing Entertainment - Pay for Gold!!!. Not going to lie we can't remember much from this night lol!!! Drinks were flowing but we got straight in with GOLD MEMBER pass - and fab seats on first floor! (Wouldnt have liked to be on a normal ticket as downstairs looked insane) Security was tight and entertainment is great!

Coco Bongo 2015. Craziest, most incredible experience I've had in awhile. Not a sketchy trip at all. Security is tight and I felt safe. The show was unbelievable and I would have paid double the price I did if I knew that it was going to be as amazing as it was. But be ready to stand the entire time shoulder to shoulder with people trying to dance. I think it adds to the craziness of the environment.

Fab Fun Night. As most people say - you HAVE to go to Coco Bongos. So we did. Yes its a bit expensive but the shows were excellent - we booked the Gold VIP ticket and we were on the first floor with a great view and our server was excellent, never had an empty drink. The only draw back to the VIP is that you are not on the main floor (won't spoil the reason why) you are right in it however it got very cramped down there and I saw lots of people getting drinks spilt on them so I was glad we choose the VIP. We got there at about 10.30pm and left at 4.30am.

Shady and a FIRE HAZARD . The booking process was extremely unpleasant. We originally booked a VIP table and were told we would be getting 2 bottles of liquor with juices and seating for everyone in the party. We had the name of the person who sold us the package. However, when we arrived we were told by a different employee that the cost had changed and we would be in the VIP section BUT WITH ONLY 3 chairs We asked that he call the person we talked to and he did and the person confirmed the price and package. The conversation was in Spanish and when he hung up he told us that the offer was not valid. We then told him we understood Spanish. After going back and forth, we ended up with seating for everyone but not in VIP SECTION. once we were inside it is a fire trap. Exit signs are not marked. It took us two attempts to go to the bathroom as they pack so many people so that you cannot even move. Not worth the risk
Very fun!. So much fun. Went with a few guys. Get table service, as it gets very crowded. Was worth the extra money.

Not bad but not amazing!. When we booked to go to Mexico, everyone I spoke to who had been said you must go to Coco Bongos its amazing! So we booked the Gold Member package with Thomsons (around £100pp). That includes the coach there and back, free drinks (they said branded but they weren't), queue jump and entry into the VIP area.On arrival at Coco Bongos we had to queue - it seems everyone for the gold member arrives at the same time so we had to queue anyway! You then walk through some long corridors where they give you shots of tequila, a watered down cocktail. We then arrived at a bar, no one seemed to be telling us where to go, all we could see was a huge crowd. A man who worked there then spotted we had goldmember wrist bands on so told us to follow him to the VIP bit, it was so busy we nearly lost each other. We then arrived in 'VIP' - we had 3 tables for 8 of us, it was really cramped, the next party were basically sat on our table too as they had 10 people around 2 tables! The waiter asked us what we wanted to drink straight away and said they only do local brand alcohol (not what Thomsons told us), the drink did come really quick and our waiter was great at bringing you another when we saw your glass was empty!The show started after everyone was in the VIP section, it started off great with some good shows and sketches but by about 1am it was poor, a woman badly miming to Madonna was the final straw and we left around 2pm.Without sounding boring, as I love a good drink and night out clubbing. It really is just a vamped up nightclub and I think it's better to go drunk and just get drunk!

A fantastic night. An amazing night out, we were entertained from beginning to end. The show was non stop, well put together and performed and worth every penny. I recommend you go VIP, give your barman a large tip at the start of the evening and you will never have an empty drink all night. A brilliant night out, but VIP it and save the hassle of the queue in and the queue at the bar!

Dance Club / Show Room / Theater - ALL IN ONE!. A must do experience in Playa del Carmen. Part dance club and part theater. Starts late (around 11:30pm and ends at 3:30am). 25 various shows take place while you are gyrating to the amazing sound system!

Too crowed !!!. The place is beautiful. Nice shows and barterder very helpful but too many people together for a small place. We went on Monday supposedly a slow day and they had more than a thousand of people inside. For me, this place is not safe. I ended waiting for y group outside. Barely can walk inside. A saw a few exits. No way I will go back and expose my life. There are other places to enjoy your vacation. One time and that enough for me.

Night out!!. It was my first time going to coco bongo's and i was very impressed , i booked a vip package through bd travel from our hotel and it was a great move because we got into the nightclub far quicker and we had our own table plus a waiter bringing us what ever drink we wanted , when the show started it was excellent from the all the dancers to the lights and sound plus the massive screen it's well set up , when i return to Mexico I will be defenitley going again.

Over priced tacky repetitive cheesy seedy rip off. The title say it all really. Not worth the £80 each. Maybe if you're absolutely out of your face it would be ok but no chance of that happening here, lucky to get 6 watered down drinks all night. But the 'shows' if you can call them that were rubbish, lots of bad miming and poor dance moves. Watching a dwarf pretend to drop a large tray of full drinks numerous times was not my idea of money well spent. Watching girls skirts get blown up over and over again also not my idea of fun. Drinks service somewhat lacking. Large intervals playing old music to make up for the lack of show and girls dancing on bars and paper confetti shot from canons about 20 times in total. Also watched a shot girl begging a bloke to drink her shot that she was holding up to his mouth, even though he said no she perserveered and he eventually drank it. Seemed very dodgy like she wanted to get him so intoxicated and take advantage. This is what you should be prepared for and if it doesn't sound up your alley don't go you won't regret it. Also only one male and one female toilet in vip, totally impractical go stand in the queue 20 mins before you think you might actually need to go.

AMAZING ... VIP is worth it. We went here on Friday and had the VIP gold package. The club and show was very good with varied music and acts. The downstairs area does get very busy, so we were glad to be upstairs with a table and a waiter, who never let our glasses be empty. There were a huge age range of people there and all seemed to be having a brilliant time. Definitely worth a visit, there is nothing like it in the UK!!

Worth a visit . Worth a visit I you are in the area.Great show and AI drink.We purchased a gold pass which was not worth the extra. They where clearly over selling it as there was probably only seating for around 30 people in the gold area but more than 30 people in there so not everyone got a seat including myself.

The only stop for your night out - It is a blast!. This is one of the most fun nights out I have ever had! I highly recommend this for anyone that wants to drink, dance, sing along, and enjoy a fabulous show. They really do a great job, and it is not nearly as expensive as something you would find somewhere like Las Vegas. I recommend this location more than the Cancun location, because while it is fun and full of interesting people, it is not totally and completely packed to the point where you can't even move.

GREAT NIGHT OUT! IT PAYS TO GO VIP!. The show is organised very well. The lights, fans that blow unsuspecting visitors' skirts up (that was hilarious!) and the choreography make the show one of a kind. The DJ spins some impressive mixes during the interval and the countdown clock before performance starts keeps everyone engaged. I believe the VIP ticket is completely worth it. You will have a seat and your own waiter/waitress, security stand close by and you have VIP access to the bathroom (very important during a night of drinking haha!). Overall, we had fun and would visit again. Just one thing, I would recommend buying the ticket from Coco Bongo directly. The tickets are quite pricey so it is better to be safe than sorry!

Totally bonkers!. Totally bonkers but the best night out you will ever have! I have never experienced nightlife like it but I wish there were somewhere like this in the UK as you will never believe it until you see it. We booked ours through thompson so had the gold members package which is a must!! You get a much better view of the stage and unlimited drinks all night, our waiter David was so helpful (we couldn't not give him a tip) and very attentive all night. If you can, try and get a seat on the balcony rather than a table as you will get blocked by the people infront. The acts are amazingggggg, everything from Elvis to batman to moulin rouge to Louis bega! A must do attraction!!!

Awesome . 3dr time here and lived up to expectations. Worth every penny but do upgrade to the gold member you won't regret it. Bizarrely our server this time was Williams who served us on our last trip - amazing and very attentive, thank you.

crazy night. i was not too kean on the idea but my lady persuaded me. this place is absolutely bonkers. never seen anywhere like it. the only downside was the service was not really up to standard think i recieved 3 drinks and was there around 6 hours. maybe you should tip more than i did. go you will not regret

Watch for the bait and switch. Not worth the money. . Watch for the bait and switch. Not worth the money. A few caveats: If you enjoy being swindled by a guy who is not all that good at lying, and if you are prepared to be baited into a deposit then later realize that what you've been promised is not what you'll be getting, then by all means stop reading and go spend your hard earned cash at Coco Bongo. They'll say anything to sell a ticket. During my visit, 1 salesman fully acknowledged that the person we booked with "calls everything VIP" even when he is knowingly selling non-VIP areas. "Bottle service" and "VIP" does not guarantee you a place to sit. With a group of seven, we were initially offered only 4 seats. The seating areas are cramped and there is absolutely no guarantee that someone will not climb over you to leave their seat. Also, if you consider battling your way to the bathroom (or the exit) through an absolute crush of people a "sport", then Coco Bongo will suit you well. The place is a First-class fire hazard. Is it worth it? No. The show itself is a schizophrenic mix of theatrical karaoke, cirque du soleil, music videos, and gratuitous shaming of drunk female patrons (if you're looking for spring break, well...) all of this is punctuated by an overuse of confetti canons, and blasts of air from all angles (including up some people's skirts). The confetti, the air, and the exposing of g-stringed bottoms all gets pretty old pretty quickly. Three important elements of the night saved the experience for me: (1) I was with a group of friends and friends can have fun anywhere, right? (2) It was clear that the performers work very hard to deliver the show, and (3) the music was good enough. This is definitely a "one and done" kind of place. The management decisions at this place struck me as predatory on the street sales side and irresponsible on the inside. The place sells itself as a disco and show. If you're interested in dancing... Go elsewhere. You may be able to manage a modest hop up and down but they pack people in so tight some people were stuck in the hallway they entered through (not my idea of a good time). With so many options in the area, giving this place a miss would be a no-brainier. Wish I would have read the other reviews before going!
Fantastic night. Could not recommend this place enough!! This is a must see! Fantastic show, friendly staff. Drinks were lovely, regularly topped up.

AMAZING. This is one of the best nights out I've ever had, the atmosphere is insane! We were on the thomson balcony so got unlimited free drinks, not watered down at all. The acts are all fantastic and put in so much effort. The waiters are very attentive regardless of whether or not you tip them. The toilets are also super clean for a nightclub!

Too Crowded. Great shows, great music. But way too crowded. We were promised that we will have our own waiter, but we barely saw him. Plus the place had to many people and i one time i stop to think were i would go if something happened like a earthquake or anything like it ( probably they got there emergency plans) Great shows all night long, loved the batman and Tron.

So much fun. I had so much fun here. Some of the shows are so cheesy but I can't even put into word the fun we had. The atmosphere is great. Myself and my partner are regulars at creamfields, dance music is our normal scene and we loved it. You can let your hair down and just enjoy the fun of it. We did the bar crawl through our travel agent but I would probably do the gold member if I were to do it again as we didn't want to leave so soon. Have fun!!

A Must see show!. Coco Bongo was so fun. We got tickets at our resort for $90 each and walked there. It was worth the entertainment! A variety of look-a-like celebrity and music appearances - Michael Jackson, Madonna, Lady Gaga... A mini Beetlejuice! LOLWe danced the night away on the bar! You will sweat like crazy so wear as little as possible. Girls with whistles come around and do funny little things to you! Don't miss this show.
Highly recommend the show/nightclub!. Not what I expected, BUT totally in a good way! This place was so much fun! I highly recommend this place to anyone over age.

Coco Bongo - A must see but going to the right people with the right options ensures the best possible night. Me and my partner went twice whilst on holiday, on Thursday 2nd July and Tuesday 9th July. Both times were a really good night but read the following to ensure you get the best possible night.Firstly, don't book with Thomson reps or whatever airline reps are offering. They only offer gold member tickets, roughly $130-$150 a ticket. This option offers a free bar but no que jump and every night is a huge que that you could be in for hours. Me and my partner both times went with the official coco bongo reps (in ocean Maya Royale hotel, Daniel and Ariel, both such lovely guys and deserve to make money as they work all day in the heat and Thomson reps take their business with less knowledge and less options) bought a bottle of vodka which between us was roughly $190. For that bit extra you walk straight to the front of the que, get your own table (gold member tickets you have to stand with no seating available whatsoever) and constant service from staff. The Thursday we went with friends who had also bought bottles of vodka, we were at the top level which was high but you could still see all the show. The Tuesday we were on the middle section with a table, which is probably the best as you can see everything more clearly. It proved that we made the right decision buying a bottle, as upon arrival we went straight in, but people from our same hotel who came on the same night who bought gold member tickets were queuing for almost an hour, who then had to stand for the duration in a part where they couldn't see the all parts of the show properly. Don't go on a Friday or a Saturday if you want some space. Every night is crazy busy but we were told that these nights are even busier. Friday and Saturday is also more expensive. Some people moan about how busy it gets but it's a tourist attraction and the most famous club in Mexico, what do you expect??! It's a good laugh, fun shows and a must see in Mexico, but I advise always get a bottle as the service is much better. The shows are vibrant, fun and entertaining, from dancing to stage fighting, to gymnastics and acrobatics to tribute shows. If you're in Mexico, you defo have to see this!!!

Entertainment 5*. Had a fantastic night here with my boyfriend, sister and aunts and uncle. Entertainment was non stop and the waiter was pouring drinks all night. Gave him a nice tip at the end and he was very grateful! 5* service and well worth the money!

Great Night Out. This was a fantastic night out. Would recommend to anyone. Clubbing is not really our scene but between the spectacle of the show, the music and and fantastic staff this was well worth staying up for. Would highly recommend to go if you can.

The show sucked big time . Horrible experience , total waste of money , awful tasting cheap booze , tiny cramped room , the worst was the show - they never finished a whole song after a while it got really annoying . Don't waste your money

Words can't do it justice. We went to Mexico on Honeymoon and others that have been there said this is a 'must see' place, and they weren't wrong!We were on a pub crawl arranged by Thomson travel agents but it's pretty easy to get tickets from official street sellers, hotels etc.Our group was up high on one of the balconies and we had an excellent view of the show from up top. We could see all the tables down below (assuming they were the gold member seats) but it was hard to tell because it was so packed.The show is absolutely crazy, with lots of tribute acts (some are dated now, such as Queen) but it doesn't really matter as some things are timeless classics and everybody knows the words / songs.There were balloons everywhere, ticker tape, crazy dancers, people hanging from the ceiling, dancing on tables, all sorts! It really was an amazing sight and well worth going there, if only to say you've been and you can't believe it!

Brilliant atmosphere. So am going to start with the bad points to get them out the way. Firstly as a honeymoon couple we had been told about this club by many friends and told to go but to book vip seats so we did.We booked through our hotel and specifically asked for the vip seated booth so drinks would get brought to us and we could sit down as we were there from 9pm to 3am.So transfers were fine took us to the que were to meet back up and what time but the coco bongo rep who came with us then pointed out we had been given tickets and paid $180 to stand all night but get unlimited drinks. When we tried to argue that we asked for vip he stated its not what we had paid for and all the vip booths have now been taken we also would then have to queue up which would have been for well over an hr we decided to pay the extra $20 to skip the queue with another honeymoon couple we met on the transfer down. We were told to stand on a step when we got in there as we would have a great view of the show at one point i tried to sit down for a few minutes while waiting for the show to start and was made to stand back up it was soooo cramped in there that you were shoulder to shoulder and couldnt move all night trying to get to the toilet was impossible.The show itself was amazing it didnt start while 11pm but it was brilliant and deffinatley worth going to see.We found it difficult to get drinks from the waiters unless u were vip i had to ask 3 times for a bottle of water.The atmosphere is amazing and u need to watch the videos on youtube because it is a fantastic show but just a shame about how cramped you are and the mix up which was the fault of the hotel ultimatley. Hense only 4 stars and not 5... Deffinatley worth going to see once you have had a few drinks it really doesnt matter and its just a great atmosphere down in the thick of the show...
Great night out. Got the Gold member and had a table right next to the stage with free drinks all night constantly. Would go back again.

Left waiting outside . Bought gold tickets from reps at resort we were staying in along with tickets for another excursion.The price for the gold tickets was $270 for two people for Saturday night show.Upon arriving at the entrance to Coco Bongos Cancun we were made wait 25 minutes outside because the admission staff thought there was a discrepancy in how much we paid for tickets (they thought we should have paid $30 more).When they eventually worked it out that the discrepancy was due to a discount that applied if you purchased two or more excursions they let us in.Feeling slightly infuriated we were then led up to the gold section where we were given seats with a big pole in front of us obstructing our view.While the show was good i definitely would NOT recommend spending the extra money for the gold tickets as there was very little extra value in them compared with the normal priced tickets.
Vegas style. This place is a mix of a Vegas show and Club. Is loud and lines are long but once you get it is worth it. Only issue it was that it was to crowded. But is fun.

Party Up People!. There are a few different options and prices for coming here, our experience was on a Thursday night, standard ticket which included return transport and open bar tickets, which we booked through Thomas Cook guide in the hotel. $65 each and we waited a max of half an hour in the queue arriving at 10.30pm. Extra gets you a table, waiter service and a decent view of the main stage, and you get to skip the queue. Although we got waiter service on the main floor a few times no problem. Upon entering, you are handed a drink, then further on you get a tequila shot and then you hit the main hall. It was very similar to a movie scene where everyone is crammed into a fighting ring, the majority of the floor has tables dotted around and these are standard, there are tables higher up and better views but that doesn't take away from the atmosphere. My partner and I found a good spot close to the front bar and a view of the stage, there is lots going on all through the night and all ages and creeds make a great party atmosphere. Great dancers/actors keep you hooked and the themes and costumes are top notch, my fave was the Tron theme as I love the movies, but dont want to spoil anything else for anyone :pIf you want a good night and great atmosphere, meeting lots of cool people then this is definitely worth a visit. It didn't feel any less fun on a standard ticket but on busier nights like Fridays and Saturdays, if you don't want the hassle of waiting about it would probably be worth the extra to get a good seat/table. "Let me hear you scream!!"

Great entertainment, wdnt go back . After much hype during our stay in Mexico, we were looking forward to the trip to coco bongo. We wasn't getting much hep from the people who went already so we went with no idea of what was it about .  We got the "vip" seats which entitles you to a table and all you can drink . But for over three hours in a tight TIGHT space they want you to stand the whole night. If you bought a bottle, then you were entitled to a chair . Which was ridiculous . I believe they poured you up with alcohol just so you wdnt realize the nonsense that they were doing . The show itself was very good. They acted out scenes from movies and incorporated them into the show. They personated different artist while playing some updated jams. All I can say : if you go ! Bring comfortable shoes , expect to bump to everyone and drink lots so you don't realize how uncomfortable you really are . Then you will have fun
14th July 2015. Absolutely brilliant night the shows are amazing worth paying for Vip as its extra special well worth the visit brilliant experience
...wow!.... How to put that into words? The Coco Bongo is just wow. Not just dancing, but also a show, and a great one at that! I will definitely go back!

What a night!!!. We visited on the recommendation of friends. Oh what a night of entertainment we had. The combination of music and live acts was amazing. From the time we arrived until we left we were treated to what I can only describe as the best fun I've ever had in a club. We paid extra and had the VIP experience. It was worth every penny. The drinks kept on flowing all night and you had your own waiter. So all you had to do was sit back and enjoy the experience. The aerial acts were fantastic. As for the live tribute acts, they were excellent. My favourite was Michael Jackson, the way he moved and the likeness were uncanny. I'm not a Queen fan but that came a very close runner up to Michael Jackson. To not visit this club would be a crying shame. You will never experience a club like this at home. Would I go again, without a doubt if I get the chance. This is one place that you want to visit in Mexico.
Meh....so, so.. Loud, late and too long. If I were 20 years younger maybe. Live acts were enjoyable but the disco got really tedious after 2 am,

Good experience, unsure if I'd go again. Great time!! The entertainment was fabulous and a great laugh. It is however extremely packed, like over capacity packed. Making it a little claustrophobic. Hard to get drinks. Overall good experience, but unsure if I'd go again.
coco bongo. brilliant brilliant night must get the vip when buying tickets as it gets very crowded a must do whilst in Mexico

Congo Ripoff. We paid $270 for VIP ticks months before our trip. So of course we were really looking forward. Upon arrival they would not let us in because we did not have the exact card we purchased the tickets with. We showed our confirmation and IDs and they made us wait for a hour then turned us away keeping our money. I suggest staying away!!' We filed a case with our bank and our hotel.

Awesome Night Life!. This place is like Las Vegas on steroids! Book this through your travel group at your hotel. I highly recommend going as a group, I've done both ways, w/ a group from your hotel is hands down the best! You'll never stand in line or wait for a drink, and you'll always feel 100% safe, going as a group!!! This place is a MUST see!!! So fun!

Cracking night as Gold member.. . Shows and atmosphere was incredible. A real one of a kind worth every penny doing gold member. Great seats and waiter was amazing bringing multiple drinks and shots! Left a bit wobbly legged but one of the best nights of my two week stay.
Fun . Amazing night with many surprises, show, atmosphere, good music, cold stormm from ceiling :-D it was overcrowded, but still good experience. If you in Cancun, you have to go there

What an AMAZING night!!!!!!!!. We booked the show through Thomson but found that we could buy the tickets much cheaper directly with the club!!Wow! What a night to remember, this really was the highlight of our holiday and worth every penny.The show is a crazy mix of all kinds of performances from music to dance, acrobats and all sorts of other amazing performances.I would strongly recommend anyone to go and see the show, its certainly an amazing experience.We got there early and had a fantastic view from the balcony, though we opted to stand as that gave us a fantastic view of the stage and the dance floor area.

best night ever. this is an absolute MUST I would advise that you speak to cocobongo reps directly (find Emmanuel) and get a table as you have the best seats in the house, and table service! the show is amazing, its actually indescribable you just HAVE to go! incredible!

Mrs gardner. Well what can I say !!! Amazing night out , we were told it was a great night out but seeing is believing , what a show , true entertainment , an absolute must if you go to cancun , brilliant night out.
So good. Everyone that goes to Mexico has to go to coco bongos it is truly spectacular if you remember it all free drink all night keeps flowing

Get gold or no good. Made me pay for two bottles to cover for six people. Was promised 1 table and enough room to celebrate my wife's b day but they let too many people in. We were shoulder to shoulder and they even asked us to move to accomodate more people. We left early before show started, the one in Cancun was much better.
WOW. An experience in itself this place is amazing ,totally awesome shows ,acrobats flying above you dancers galor a must see show that will not fail to dissapoint

Fantastic night out. This is a great night out and we would recommend it to anyone. Our waiter Victor was great and even managed to get me on stage to dance with the cast. Drinks were great. We went as gold members but went with friends who just had standard tickets so we ended up getting an amazing table right next to the stage. Cannot recommend enough and would return.

Show for families and kids!. I ve been once, getting in for free late night! So there were spiderman and michael jackson bouncing around.. And above our heads a Rope show going on.. My taste of music says disasterr ... Prices really expensive, 70 mx a shot...It s not a place for music lovers! Always depend what you are looking for in a club! Once could be fun...

Unreal. We went here on a Friday night during our stay at the El Dorado Seaside Suites and I have to say me and my wife apsolutely loved this place and we would recommened this to anyone who loves a good party plus live acts, drinks and music, incredible, unreal and amazing.YOU HAVE TO GO TO THIS PLACE :-)

amazing. what an amazing night , there is so much going on you need eyes in the back of your head , from dancers on the stage an bar trapese artist flying overhead . The music has something to please everyone from the Beatles to Guns & Roses ,Elvis and Micheal Jackson , then theres the spiderman fight scene and a batman one also . The waiter always have a smile on there face even though the placed is packed you dont wait long to get your drink refilled . Will definately be going again because i know i didnt see everything.

didn't live up to the hype!. Show on the whole was quite good but too many people squashed in. Even paying to be seated did not guarantee a view my advice would be go midweek it may not be so busy. We seemed to spend ages outside waiting to get in

A Must!!. The best $50 I have ever spent!! At first we were hesitant of if this club was worth $50 to get it but I am so glad that we did it!! There were constant shows, acrobats flying above your head, dancing, show girls, etc.! My two friends and I were even encouraged to get up and dance on the bar! So much fun and I would highly recommend it!

An awesome nights entertainment!. Great show! Make sure you pay for the gold ticket though as the ground level and top level get very busy and crowded.If you like showbiz dancing with well choreographed routines then you will love this place.The gold ticket will ensure that you are never out of drink for the whole time that you are there. No sooner had I put down my empty bottle of beer, there was a new one substituted in its place within seconds. The service is excellent in the club. Tipping goes a long way too.The only thing to be aware of is that it will be a very late night for you. We were picked up at our hotel (Bahia Principe Akumal) at 21:30 and we didn't get back until 04:45!
Lively. If you love night clubbing, then this is for you. You have to go here when visiting mexico. Paid for vip and drinks were included. The show itself was brilliant

Awesome Show. Would highly recommend doing any of the coco bongos in cancun or playa del carmen as I've done both, we did VIP gold in playa del carmen and i would highly suggest you also do this as you have your stool with table and free drinks are constantly topped up by your own waiter, the shows never disappoint and they are always involving the crowd of people.

Good Night Out. We decided to come to Coco Bongos as it seemed that you couldn't come to Mexico without going to Coco Bongo. We paid $130 (£90) through the hotel rep for the Gold Member ticket. It meant no queuing and your own chair and table on a higher level with table service.As soon as you enter you are given a drink & a shot.Your waiter will bring drinks to you then the whole night. The drinks I would say are watered down as they didn't taste strong at all.The show itself was good but I was disappointed in a way as the acts were miming where I had the opinion it was live acts. Never mind still a good night but think £90 was a lot of money to pay to watch a couple of minutes miming every so often. Our hotel entertainment was very similar so wanted to see something different so was disappointed.

Fantastic night. Treated to the evening by my daughter had a great time would definitely recommend to all ages. We had the gold tickets but the majority of fun was on the dance floor if you have the stamina as closes 4am. Excellent show a must for anyone visiting cancun

Great night out!. Would recommend going to coco bongos to anyone. Was a great night out. Would suggest to buy a regular ticket as you are on the floor amongst the show and we had a waiter service all night. Drinks were all inclusive when we go there also. We looked up at the VIP section and it didn't look like that great of a time. So I would suggest the $65 ticket!!

If you do one thing on your Mexican holiday, do this!. Went to coco bongo last night with my boyfriend. We are both in our 30's and were a bit concerned about the 330am pick up and it being a mad drunken party! Well the time just flew. It was the best show/party, night of entertainment I've ever seen. We had so much fun! We bought the gold member ticket and we were pleased we did. We had amazing seats right opposite the stage and we never had an empty glass. It does get quite crowed in the cheaper ticket area with limited seats! Coco bongo is not to be missed.

Fun night on the 65 USD open bar ticket . We are a couple in our 30s and chose the cheaper 65 USD open bar ticket and bought from a rep Jonathan who came to the hotel. We lined up at 10pm and met him there to pay and collect tickets. At 10.30pm they opened the doors and the queue moved fairly quickly. We were closer to the front as we got there earlier. Lots of people behind us! On the way in we had a drink and shot, queued again for bag search etc. VIP ticket holders went in faster but we didn't have to wait there very long, was all fine. Inside we asked where the best spot was. we went to the left of the stage and up to level 2 same level as stage and right opposite it. It was a great position . We could rest our drinks on the small bar infront . Nothing blocking our view. We danced there all night and our waiter Fernando brought us drinks all night long. He was great. We tipped him 300 pesos. If you choose open bar, make sure you arrive early. Some people with open bar tickets had to stand on the stairs or behind others because they got there too late to get a good spot.The main level looked fun but way, way more people. VIP tickets were expensive and we didn't want to be sitting down all night anyway. It is a very mixed crowd of all ages and most people stand and dance. At about 2 am people started to clear out a little and we had even more space. Show was entertaining. We had fun dancing and drinking to all the hits. Acrobatics were impressive. All in all a great night out dancing for us :)

Great show!. Not just a nightclub, but a full blown show! Everyone from Beyonce to Spiderman. Sing along to your favorite songs and dance the night away. Way more than we expected. Intricate details. The shows were spectacular, like a Vegas Show! Highly recommended, such a fun night! Time flies while you are having fun!

Last stop on a bar crawl and most definitely not least. We had tried to get gold tickets through our rep (First Choice) but only the following week was available which didn't help us as we were only there for a week. But he suggested the bar crawl instead which ended up in Coco Bongo anyway. I wasn't sure as I liked the fact that with the gold tickets you got drinks brought to you - but as it turned out our group was escorted right to this private area where unlimited drinks were brought to you anyway, and the server came back regularly. Probably too regularly given the thick head I had the following morning! The shows were great too, keeping the entertainment pretty much non stop. It's true that the view was a little restricted if you weren't at the front but it didn't really matter seeing a lot of the entertainers are suspended from the ceiling anyway! There's toilets right there in the private area but a little cramped to say the least and a bit of a queue for the ladies, according to my better half. Overall though we loved it and this is definitely a must-see at least once when you visit Playa, for sure.

Good time at coco bongo. We booked at our hotel and had a fantastic, well organised night out. We booked the VIP package which meant that we got a bar stool on the upper level and all inclusive drinks. The service was good, you get named brand drinks if you ask for them.
Amazing. Coco Bongo is really nice. Shows are amazing ! The ambience is great. The price includes alchool. I liked this activity and I'll return when I'll come back to playa del carmen

What a night!!. Me and my boyfriend had heard about this place before we went to Mexico and were so excited to visit. Well, we were not disappointed. We opted for the gold member package which included all our drinks! We were seated around the edge of the club and had a fantastic view. The show itself was amazing and the music in between the acts was great! We had a fantastic time and would definitely go back!

Out of this world!. wow! This was without doubt the best night out I have ever had! It is so different to anything I have seen before! We went on a trip with our tour operator but paid extra to stay until the end as we didn't want to miss out on any of the shows.

Was worth going but not amazing . The place was over sold and due to this it was very hot and everyone touching everyone. We laid for vip booths.... this was 4 stools behind a row of people ... so not a good view of the stage at all and we were the first to arrive.But the shows were amazing just wish we knew were the booths were now ... wasn't worth the extra money and the free drinks included all night were non existent. ... bar staff vocusing more on paying customers and ignoring you.
Seriously!. Beyond packed and an amazing show! Exactly what you want in a night club! There was never a shortage of drinks . I was only upset because the evening seemed to fly by!

Incredible and so fun!!!. Coco bongo is nothing like you have ever experienced before. Genuinely cannot describe what it is like as it is just so unusual but yet amazing! The show is great and a lot of hard work as gone into it.
Fun fun fun. I have a good time in this wonderful place , the show is really professional like Vegas , the music uffff good good music and the drinks
Don't miss out on this. Amazing! Great entertainment, great drinks - especially for a group of twentysomething girls. We got VIP access right away.

Best evening ever !!. One of the best evenings ever with friends while staying in Mexico .. booked thru a Coco Bongo representative advertising on our beach.. He made sure we arrived safely to & from our resort to Coco Bongo's .. Entertainment was excellent ..would definitely return & recommend to all..

Fun fun fun. I loved Coco Bongo. It was a really cool show. Only issue I had was it was beyond packed. And you can only really see the show if you are higher up. Our waiter Franklin was awesome. Always kept our drinks full.

Coco Bongo lives up to it's hype. Aproximately 35 of the younger (20-30) folks with our wedding group went to Coco Bongo and reported back that it was an amazingly great time. Constant entertainment and activity overhead and on stage. A touch of "cirque de soliel"

Very Good. Coco Bongo was very good drinks flowed well the shows were good but the atmosphere was excellent, we would not return here because we have done that, I don't think it is worth all the money you pay to get in as a gold member. We paid £78 each from a UK based company which is cheap, you will have a good time there.

Amazing Night. Oh my god you have to visit this place. Get a VIP ticket and get a taxis earlier than the transport we went at 945 and got great seats. Be prepared to drink a lot and be amazed with the show. The atmosphere they create is fantastic, balloons being shot out from above confetti, tribute acts, so much more.
Like dancing, drinking, meeting new friends... go there!. Incredible place to dance, to drink, to see a show, to meet new friends; to try new beverages. Have fun in a very save place!

Wow what a show!!!!. This show is amazing!! I had heard about it and watched you tube clips but all I can say is it's better than I expected!!! We went gold member vip you get a seat level with the stage so great view and waiter service all night ....lets just say your glass is never empty! Fantastic party atmosphere and some of the acts are breathtaking a real mixture of cirque du soleil and all your favourite pop/rock stars with the mask, beetle juice and Spider-Man thrown in. This place is a must over 18 only but no age limit after that everyone has a fantastic time.

Amazing show and entertainment-must go at least once!. Fantastic show of different music,acrobats,entertainment and crazy stunts from people flying around on zip wires. Drinks flowing all evening,you may be lucky and get a free tequila, or you may end up on the railings, dancing to the music,while the cast and team get ready for next excillarating action show. 1030 to 0300. in the morning-relaxing day at the pool next day!

Fantastic show!. My college age kids and my husband and I went to Coco Bongo during our spring vacation this year. The show was fantastic! We paid the extra money to skip the line, which was definitely worth it and sat in reserved seating at a table. I don't think I would do that again. It was also crowded and we never sat down anyway. Our server was great and always made sure our drinks were filled.

A good time.. The club itself was good. A little too busy. Just get there early wait in line and do not pay extra for VIP or bottle because you end up with the same as regular guests.It was a good time. Very entertaining!

Good fun, but very crowded. I heard so much about Coco Bongos before I visited and to be honest, it didn't disappoint in terms of how impressive it was. It was like nowhere I've ever been before and I spent the majority of my time there with my mouth wide open, staring wide-eyed at all the acrobats and dancers all around me. It was a planned excursion with my hotel so everything was organised for me which was great. It made the whole experience a lot easier and I didn't have to worry about money or arranging transport back to my hotel. It was non-stop entertainment and I was never off the bar, dancing my night away. I enjoyed being in the main "pit" however as the night went on, it seemed to get a lot more crowded and there was a lot of pushing and shoving. It was a bit of a mission getting to the bathroom and you had to try and squeeze your way past a lot of people which became very uncomfortable. By the end of the night I was ready to leave since it was becoming unbearably busy and I felt I was getting squashed. That said, it was a fantastic experience and I'm pleased I went and saw what all the fuss was about for myself!

Dissappointing. Sorry to all those who think its amazing, but we may have been given a poor spot. I would recommend paying the extra for a little more space, unless like us you want to stand like a tin of sardines. The heat and humidity is overwhelming. Think my clubbing days are over! :(
Amazing experience. Excellent experience - pay extra to be a gold member and get your own guarenteed table for the night with All inlcusive drinks

Superb Night!!!. We had heard many good things about Coco Bongo and were told that if you go to Mexico you need to visit the place. So after the first week of our holiday we decided to book the Coco Bongo night through our Virgin rep at the hotel. We opted for the VIP package that cost us 150 USD each. This includes the taxi there and back, express entry into the club, your own table on the first floor with waiter service and drinks all night. The taxi arrived on time and we took the 30 minute drive to playa del carmen. On arrival the taxi driver explained that he would pick us up at the same point at 3am. It was quite confusing on arrival as some of the people in our cab had booked through different operators, so not everybody had the same vouchers. We showed our voucher to one of the Coco Bongo staff and were told shown to the VIP queue, which was alot shorter than the general ticket queue. Once inside we were given some sort of alcohol juice drink which tasted ok. Everybody was searched once inside and things like tablets and selfie sticks had to be given into a cloakroom where you got a ticket to pick them up at the end of the night. You walk past a little stall selling bits and bobs which are highly overpriced but there was no hard sell. After this we were escorted to our table. Ours was situated at the top of the first flight of stairs, elevated behind the row of people who were sitting at more like a balcony bar. Its quite tight in there, especially with the waiters walking through with trays of drinks but they didnt spill a drop from what i saw. Our waiter was excellent, constantly coming over as our drinks got near empty, as with most of our time in Mexico, we could not fault the service here. The main area/dancefloor is quite small with a large square bar in the middle, it got quite crowded down there as the night went on but everybody seemed to be having a good time and we saw no trouble. We arrived at around 10pm which was about an hour before the main show. A countdown timer is shown on the big screens of how long you have until it starts, until then the dj played some good music and we were really in the mood. I wont give too much away about the show but we found it really entertaining. There are different tributes to certain acts and certain shows are replicated with dancers and acrobats. It does get quite frenetic with streamers, confetti, lasers and smoke everywhere but we loved it. The thing we liked most was the fact there was no live singing, so you didnt have a rubbish singer ruining elvis or mj's songs. Only thing we found to be a little annoying was that the toilets were tiny, one toilet for women and 2 urinals for men, which with a club of that size is ridiculous. We had an amazing time though and would definately go again.Things To Remember:When we originally booked we thought we were booking the Coco Bongo in Cancun, which is meant to be alot bigger and better. We just took it for granted this was where we were going, so if you specifically want to go to Cancun make sure to ask when booking.Id say this place is aimed at the younger generation. If you are an older party animal then it will be great for you but if you're looking for a quiet cabaret show this is definately not it.Hope this helps :)

Fun - ok. We bought our tickets thought Coco Bongo hotel rep. As always we asked 1000 questions before buying the tickets and getting the VIP for 120 dlls. We were told 2 tables, 2 bottles, sitting area, transportation was included in the VIP. Everything was going well until we got inside the club and the waiter tried putting us on a table that was in the middle of dancing floor with no chairs. This was my 3rd time at this place and knew how crowded it could get, I made them give us a table somewhere else. Instead of 2, we got one table. The area we were sitting were meant as stairs and not sits. After taking to the waiter several times, the light on the stairs were turned off and people stopped moving us around. The club was fun but too many shows and does not give you a lot of time dancing.

Fanstatic .. My wife and myself went . Starts around 11 .Paid for Gold member so we were sat down plentiful amounts of drink even before one finished one another arrives .A mixture of dancing girls and boys and cabaret .Really good .Finished around 3 ish , not really sure . Would definetly go again .
Great show!. Went last year and had to come back, great entertainment, great service and free drinks all night with a great entertaining show!

Fantastic . Amazing we did the gold VIP, all the drinks was included in this and there topped up constantly, our waiter was amazing, VIP also get you the best seats, the performances was flawless they was amazing it started from 11pm and we left at 3am as we did it thee our hotel, the atmosphere was amazing this is a must go place I will 100% be returning if I go back to Mexico

Minus 5 Stars - Read this before Going!!!!. Coco Bongo was sold to us as a late night show and dance that was all inclusive. We were told we would have a place when we got there and everyone could sit or stand to watch the show. We paid 130 us dollars to gain entry into the event. For starters, the driver for the bus that picked us up didn't speak a lick of English. When we arrived he dropped us off in a bus station parking lot and held up a sign that said the number 4 and 3:20 am. He didn't tell us where to go or where coco bongo was even at. We figured it out after walking through some sketchy Mexican streets.Once we arrived at the event the line was well over 1.5 - 2 hours long. Some lady from the club said for 20 us dollars they would let us skip the line. We went ahead and did it fearing we wouldn't even get in otherwise or have a place to sit for the show. After we got through security and some bad drinks they served us on entrance we walked into the main room.The main room was unbelievably tiny. It was jammed pack when we arrived and people were already standing side by side. We tried to go up the stairs and they stopped us and said we couldn't. The club tried to scam us by telling us it would cost 80 us dollars to stand up in a hallway on the bottom floor (you wouldn't have even been able to see the main stage from this spot.) Then he wanted 165 us dollars for us to go to the 3rd floor and stand next to a rail for 3 hours. We obviously refused and just stood there knowing the amount of people coming in they would have to give us a spot to stand somewhere as they couldn't all fit on the bottom level. Surely enough after 30 minutes they allowed us to walk to the top level for FREE. The same person who tried to scam us 30 minutes earlier. When we finally got to the top we couldn't even stand next to the rail and had to be on the row behind. We couldn't even see the floor stage from where we were at and people were blocking the view from the girls so they couldn't even enjoy the show.Then comes the show after all the previous mess. We thought surely it would be worth it if this place was this packed. The show was absolutely AWFUL. 75% of the show was the club playing music videos on a projector......keep in mind your spending 65 us per person for this. The other parts of the show were really terrible actors lip singing songs in cheesy outfits. The only good part of the show was that the servers constantly made sure we had drinks. However, I drank 5 long island ice teas in the hour and a half we were there and never got a buzz. The drinks were so watered down it wasn't even funny (long island ice teas are supposed to be pure alcohol for those of you who don't know.) We finally just left after an hour of watching music videos and watching fog machines and confetti be blown around the crowd. It was the biggest fire hazard in the world to have hundreds of people jammed into this tiny little room. I think the only way we could have possibly enjoyed this show is if we were hammered drunk 18 year olds in mexcio. The best part of the night was the mexican food we got on the street after leaving and the taxi ride we paid for to get back to the resort. The resort actually had quality entertainment and good drinks all included so this experience was just a gigantic waste of money. If you really want to go to do Playa Del Carmen night lift just take a taxi to the main street and walk up and down visiting the bars. The bars are way better than this terrible event they call coco bongo......avoid and spend your money on something good like swimming with dolphins or snorkeling.

Off the wall. IFyou want one of the craziest,fabulous nights out, it is definitely worth a visitIf you have ever seen Jim Carey ...its like being inside his head.The show is mad, with lots going on...music is greatIt gets packed..so dont go if you suffer from claustrophobia
Brilliant!. Loved this place! It is great for all different types of ages. Different shows and music, entertainment and exploding paper canons! Absolutely not to be missed!!!

Nicest nightclub. It's like clubbing at a concert. Musical performances, open bar, funny shows, great services. I just didn't like being asked to pay for those shooters from the girls walking around with that bottle of liquor, besides that it was super fun

"Best show. My wife and I debated about going and trust me when I say " best show on planet earth. Yes you will have to leave planet earth to find a better show" Its runs late into the night but so worth the fun!!

good show but. we paid about 85 quid each for vip tickets with the guys at our hotel expecting to get a table for 4 as they were 4 of us.when we got in we got 1 small table that only 2 could sit round with the other 2 having to stand above em,heard that a group of 9 were expected to share 1 table,me thinks RIPOFF,wont return because of this,show brilliant

Brilliant night out!!. Booked with Thomson whilst staying @ the ocean maya royale (highly recommended)It cost around $4700 pesos for 2 gold member tickets. Share a taxi & Get there 9:45 ish early for best seats with a table and better views otherwise you get stuck like a salmon on the ground floor. Show starts @ 11pm - 2:30am. The people that got there later around 10:20 wernt happy with the Seats but everyone's advised to go early as poss so it's your own fault!! The show was absolutely incredible We did not want it to end. We had the best night out in here. You have got to go see it for yourselves to understand how crazily spectacular it is. The tributes are the best I've ever seen such a good variety & the acrobatics are truly amazing. Everyone was just buzzing about the whole night. Tip your waiter well on arrival to ensure fast rounds that come before you even finish your current drinks. Unlimited bar too.The toilets are non existent 1 male 1 Female cubicle that's all for a very very busy venue. The porter does an amazing job cleaning & prepping before & after each person though but Would be good to have more loos.Perfect night out , you must must go experience it!!!

Honeymoon . Me and my husband went on a bar crawl and our last stop was coco bongos .. It was absolutely the best night out we had. It was excellent.You get searched for camera's but you can use your phone ?? Lol A night out with amazing entertainment....

Best night out of our lives!. What a place!!!I had no idea what to expect, I didn't really know too much about it but people kept telling me how good it was and that I've got to go so my other half and I booked through Freddy who was absolutely first class in booking it for us and also the transport there. He gave us brilliant information, great prices and was great to deal with the whole holiday. He was the rep at our hotel (Grand Sirenis) so we saw him everyday and he was always friendly and had a smile on his face! We left our hotel on a very nice coach to get to coco bongo at around 9:45 with meant we arrived at around 10:30, after a short walk lead by Freddy down the road to coco bongo, we was directed into the VIP queue (as suggested and booked through Freddy) it was a very short queue and we was in the club around 3-4 mins later which was brilliant as the opposite queue looked quite long. We was given wristbands and guided through security, given drinks and shots on the way in and lead to our seat by staff. We was on the first floor not too far from the stage and had an excellent view, we was shortly after greeted by our waiter for the night who was Uber, he was fantastic, very friendly and never let our glasses stay empty and was very helpful all night. The show started about an hour or so of us being in there and wow, what a show, a show cross club venue, like nothing I had ever experience before, the acts were amazing, the dancing was all brilliant and the acrobats also very very good! I was mesmerised all night with the acts, the standard was first class! I have to give a special mention to the Micheal Jackson act, he was awesome! Also really enjoyed batman and the mask too but there are too many to mention, it was all brilliant! The atmosphere was electric all night, the music was always really good and it looked like everyone was having a great time!! The only draw backs I would say from the entire night was the toilets were tiny and usually had queues (especially the women's) and if you are planning to not go VIP, it looked quite busy and the one time we went to find a friend, it took us a while to get through the crowd so I would certainly advise the VIP package which includes free drinks all night and our own seats. We left around 4, got back on the coach which was all organised with no problems and was taken back to the hotel.I would recommend anyone visiting the are to visit coco bongo, such a good night!!! Would be a mistake not to go!!
What a mental place!. We booked the goldmember package, which id totally recommend. Fab night had, in such a mental place. A must if your visiting Mexico!

Puts Vegas to Shame! Awesome night!. What a great mix of entertainment and social drinks with some dancing... We opted out of the general admission and paid for bottle service. We had a private table which overlooked the entire crowd and gave us a great view of the show. We paid about 240$US for the night which in comparisons to a night out in Vegas, was a steal of a deal... We booked it through the guys in the yellow coco bongo shirts that patrol the beach (Omar). Although the entertainment was great, our pickup was at 9:30 pm and pickup from Playa del Carmen was at 3:40 am. It did make for a long night since our bus driver showed up about 15 minutes late and we unfortunately didn't get back to our hotel until almost 4:30am. I do recommend this if you are looking for a fun night out but make sure you take a long nap before heading out, it will be a late night.

Great Time!!. Family of 5 - Had a great time -- (48, 58, 25, 23) - I have never been to anything like it -- No shortage of drinks - I had to stop because they keep bringing tooooo many. This show is a mix between a broadway show, cirque du solei, club in vegas, comedy act with music from the 70, 80, 90s, present - all in english - place is cool inside - they constantly shoot balloons, confetti from the ceiling - starts at 10pm ends at 3 am - could only make it to 1:30 but you never get bored --we danced the night away -- also there were some 60/70 years old there having as much fun as the 18 year olds --

Misleading. the show was fantastic it was great to meet lots of new people from all over the world. the only thing that really did annoy me was that we paid ALOT for the all inclusive table and drinks and I was extremely disappointed to find we only got ONE bottle!! for the amount we paid and what was explained to us I was expecting and open bar. but if you can overlook that you can have alot of fun

Coco Bongos you need to see it for yourselves.. I've recently returned home from playa Carmen where I spent two weeks on holidays.Whilst we were there we decided to book through our holiday rep a night at Coco Bongos and we are so glad we did.We paid $120 roughly £90 each which seems expensive but that price was VIP goldmember tickets.This included transport to and from the venue back to your hotel, branded drinks,and an amazing close view of the stage.The theme is heavily music tribute acts such as Beyonce, Elvis, Michael Jackson, lady Gaga, with background activities such as famous film characters being portrayed by actors such as Michael keatons beetle juice, Jim Carey Mask , Batman,Spiderman Etc. The show runs from 10pm and finishes at 03:30 and is jam packed entertainment throughout you will not be disappointed the tribute acts are excellent real high quality performances which will leaving you open mouthed and breathless and wanting more.Make sure you take a camera with you for your own memories not somebody else's on you tube. Coco Bongos has been rated a better live show experience than Las Vegas. Having not been to Vegas I can only say that Bongos is up there for fun packed entertainment at its very best go and check it out people

BEST NIGHT EVER!. We opted for the VIP all inclusive package. Being a group of 9 with a mix of ages, doing a joint hen and stag do for our friends mexican wedding, we though this the best option, it was!My husbnad and I have been to cancun coco bongos previously so knew what to expect and had such a brilliant time. Ourseats were at the side of the stage. We tipped the waiter well as we had waiter service all inclusive drinks but it was busy, this meant we did get a lot of his time and very strong drinks, which was perfect for a hen/stag do. The girls also got taken up on stage 4-5 times to dance with the performers, possibly the tips, possibly because we were at the side of the stage - who knows, but it made the night!! Coco Bongos is a not to be missed experience for all ages if you stay in Mexico, brilliant shows, very skilled performers and stage shows for everyone!

Amazing show, terrible staff . The night we had at coco bongos was possibly our best night out ever. The show was incredible, from batman to Chicago to beetle juice...it had it all. The staff...I got lost trying to go to the toilet, was guided to an exit and refused to be let back in even though it was only mid show and my partner was still inside. I was reduced to tears before finally someone let me back inside. Staff were very rude and almost stole the show with their horrendous aggressive manners.

A night to remember. I was very worried reading the negative reviews of this place and didnt know what to expect, it turned out to be one of the best nights out ive ever had.We booked through thomson and got the gold vip tickets for the night. These are more expensive than standard but definately worth it. You get seating in the form of either a stool or padded bench seating, a table for your drinks and a waiter that wont let you go thirsty. You are in the balconies that surround the club with a stage below you and another level with the first row of balconies. You are packed in fairly close to other people but we made friends with another couple from a different hotel and had an awesome time together. I was dubious about how mant people they were cramming in to start with but was comfortable all the way through the show. It is quite cramped down on the bottom level near the stage (standard tickets) with standing room only, you would have to fight to the bar or toilet and have to stand all night from about 11 till half 3 when it finishes. The staff were really friendly including security (which there is alot of), the entertainment was spot on with hi wire acts and cameras showing live feeds of the crowd every now and then "Kiss cam" "funny face cam" etc...Take about 10 one dollar bills each for tips to be one the safe side although we didnt use that many, tupped the waiter every other drink and the same with the bathroom attendant.You can wear flip flops and shorts if you want to although i had light trousers on, not a problem either way as the club is fully airconditioned which is a great feature. Take a camera and enjoy every moment ( ps: jim carrey owns the chain so it has to be mad and fun)

Not what we expected. On our latest trip to Playa, we decided to go to Coco Bongo since it was one of those "if you don't go to Coco Bongo, it's as though you did not come to Playa". We looked up videos online and what not so we went. At our resort we spoke with a Coco Bongo representative who sold us the entrance to the club, got us transportation and the unlimited drink package for $65 usd. They told us to meet at the lobby at 10:40pm as the bus would arrive and only be able to wait for 5 minutes. The bus did not get to the resort till 11:15pm. There were two Coco Bongo reps on the bus who were going to explain how it was all going to work. These young guys looked and spoke like they had already started the party 3 hours prior.. they were really drunk. We got to Coco Bongo and had to wait till midnight to get in.Once we got in, we found the place to be extremely small for all the people waiting to get in. About an hour in we could not even move..the drinks were very watered down and the "special area and private waiter" we were told we would get never existed. Everyone was on their own. My wife and I took a picture from one of the workers there. The picture was $12 usd for pix and Coco Bongo card stock frame and I gave him a $20. He told us that he will return with change and never did. We looked for him and asked around and no one wanted to give us any information. We gave up on the change. There was constant confetti being thrown from canons and we realized that the confetti that was being shot out was the same one that was being picked up from the floor. A lot of the confetti was landing on drinks and it was the same one being shot from the canons. Just nasty! We were in the bottom and we could not see a single show because there were people constantly dancing on top of the bar and completely blocked the view. We left the place early and waited for the bus to take us back to the resort.... unfortunately our bus never came, we had to wait till past 5:30 am till the Coco Bongo people found a bus for all of us waiting. It was a really bad experience and we will NOT return to this place. Hope no one else has the same experience we did.

One of the Best Nights Ever. We tried booking through our tour operator and it was fully booked for the total of our 14 day holiday. However we were lucky enough to book through the travel agent in our hotel, it was slightly more expensive. The cost per ticket was £100 and this included transport there and back. VIP Entry to the club and a VIP area with your own waiter for the night and free premium drinks. There are shows on every 15 minutes or so, Dancers, Acrobats there is something going on to keep you entertained all night. We loved it all and didn't leave till 3.20am and it as still going strong then.
Excelente. Woooow is a great show service is fantastic good entreteidnment is 100% the best of the best ever if u go to playa del Carmen or cancun u hace to go to coco bongo
Grat show. It's an amazing club, great show, great dancers, good performance. Just the line to enter and the walk in is very annoying. The entrance doors are very narrow.

Brilliant.
