The only bad thing that happened was towards the end of the night, were one of the waitresses who walk around trying to get you to buy shots, ripped one of our group off, she wouldn't give change for $20 the shot was $5 so things got a little heated and kicked off. Once they have you in the place they want to get you drunk, shots on the way in etc, then they can try and exploit you into buying shots at inflated prices. 3 of our group were not drinking alcohol. Watch the ladies toilets too, they have girls there, cleaning the toilet before you go in and giving you a towel on the way out, they are looking for a tip. Having said this, would I go again, damn right I would, it was great!!

The worst. The disco is just for business, a lot of people and not quality inside. Surely I will not come back inside. This disco is reserved only by rood people. Finally it' s very expensive for what it offers.

Terrible criminal staff. I got sexually assaulted by a bartender that worked here. He put his hand up my dress felt me up and ran away. I could not positivly ID the guy so it was like they didnt believe me.

Oh my!! Fab!. Right. Let me tell you. Fristly my partner and I, arent the type of people who make it pasr midnight on holidays..we are up early, and go bed early, and our clubbing days are long gone...HOWEVER!We have booked Coco Bongo, purely on the advise of our friends whos been before whilst in Mexico. Pick up from our hotel was 09.15 pm, and when we got there and our driver stated he will be back at 03.30 am to pick us up, we started to worry how are we going to cope all night, so we have prepared ourselfs to spend $40 on a cab back...Guess what! We were still singing and dancing at 3AM! The place is fabulous! Nothing seedy, nothing bad! If you like theatre, shows and musicals, then you will love this place. We went in a week and it was busy, so wouldnt go at the weekend!Make sure you get the VIP tickets they cost extra but well worth it. You get your own table on the first floor, pwn waiter, best view (the stage is really high up). This palce is crazy in a really good way. Best night out in our lives ever. We would go back. So dont be put off by the time and look...remember, live shows throughout! You will love it.
Amazing night. Went for an evening to coco and was amazed by the performances. Booked by vendor on 5th Avenue and was worth every penny. Will do again
Fun Fun Fun. You cant visit Playa Del Carman without a night at CoCo Bongos... its a must. A once in a lifetime experiance. Seeing is Beliving... they will keep you entertained ALL NIGHT LONG
Loud crazy fun. Get a main floor table with bottle service. Approx $240 usd. Its going to be a night you wont forget!!!! Tickets are sold outside the bar or at any local hotel. Party starts 11 pm.
What a party. You are never too old! Just book it! We had a blast, it is exactly what they say it is. We paid extra for the Gold seats and were glad we did. worth every penny.

Crammed!. Fun show, half of the dancers in the shows didn't seem to be having fun or very into what they were doing so it wasn't as spectacular as I had expected. It looks like a large warehouse type room but it is all in a very small area with the stage over your head so if you are to closee u can't see. The reserved seats are super small but at least you have room to breath, they cram you in there like sardines you can't even dance or move. The servers are very good and manage to get around and replenish your drinks in a very timely manner! I hear the one in cancun is bigger and better so if you are going to go I would suggest that one. Nonetheless, it is a very fun and unique experience, worth the free drinks, and they make you feel like you are in the show because it's so small everyone has a front row seat!
Awesome Night. Had a blast! Great Show, Great time! Would strongly reccomend upgrading to the bottle service, you have a bench to sit down if u like and have a better view of the show!!

Crazy Show. A Must See.. Sensory Overload! The show never stopped and changed so quickly you didn't relaize performers were hanging from the ceilings, or bars made into platforms within seconds. We had a lot of fun and enjoyed the night.

WOW. If I was going to recommend one excursion while in Mexico, it would be Coco Bongo. You HAVE to go. It was unreal and just an amazing experience. We booked this directly with our hotel’s coco bongo representative and it was really well organised. It worked out at about £80 each for the VIP ticket but it was worth every penny. Transport to and from the hotel was included, all the drinks you could ever want or hope to drink, and a great table with a fantastic view of the stage. There were people of all ages there so it really is suitable for everyone. We got there around 10-10:30pm, the show started at 11pm and we were picked up at 3am. I can’t recommend it enough, just make sure you go!

Coco bongo booking advice. When booking this exceptional attraction DO NOT use your travel agent/travel provider (Thomsons First Choice etc) they only take your cash Book direct at your hotel with the Coco Bongo agent on site. The price is the same but the level of service is vastly different. The Coco Bongo agent is reliant upon your recommendation and as such delivers a miles better service, the travel company only want your cash and can't be bothered once the transaction is completed. Think about it who will care the most. That said the entertainment is exceptionalTOP TIP book when the agent offers a deal usually on a Sunday for Monday/Tuesday $60 instead of $125 eachEnjoy

Once in a life time. An absolute must if your in mexico. The show is brilliant artists are very talented, even though I enjoyed it wouldn't go again as once you've seen it the magic wears off. Would also recommend going VIP or gold other wise they stick u in the loft space where you can't see anything. Negatives are that they cram too many people in so there is no space to breathe , also for the price you have to pay you get crappy uncomfortable bar stools to sit on which isn't fair,sort it out management. Drinks are included in the ticket price but you still get harassed to buy shots which is stupid. Overall a good experience not to be repeated

Dissapointment. Booked Coco Bongo trip via our Travel Agent. Advertisement said we were going to Cancun but we ended up in Playa del Carmen? we paid $145 dollars each for a Goldmember ticket which gets you a reserved seat on the balcony queue jump to get in and a constant supply of drinks all night which was great. However it's advertised as a show and nightclub, I would say that more than anything it's a nightclub which for the Goldmember or VIP experience is way overpriced and for the standard ticket it's way to cramped. We got picked up at our hotel 9.30 and dropped off at 5 am so long night!The entertainers themselves are amazing at the acrobatics and the dancing, even the bar staff get involved with the dancing and entertaining which is fantastic. BUT the let down to which I'm leaving this review for is that the 'shows' are not exactly that, they're basically 30 second tributes to bands with VERY bad miming. The curtain opens, everyone walks on singing a chorus and the curtains close....not that great. They do get the public involved with the dancing up on stage, although they don't always pick the most attractive to send up on stage on the big screens for all to see so not such a pleasant view. If I was to go again and that is a BIG if I would most likely go as a big group to VIP or goldmember as the staff there can not do enough for you however it is overpriced. That being said although my experience was not that great, it was advertised to myself as both a show and a club but it is really just a club and likely a great night if that's what you expect although I would suggest ladies wear trousers or risk having their bits on the big screen.
Time does fly. It was ok .. I really don't get all the bad reviews .. We had a great time and the drinks kept coming .. We never had an empty glass ;)

Such bad service- DO NOT GO VIP. This was a horrible experience for me. For paid twice as much to go VIP and were told by the Amstar booking agent in our hotel this would get us a table and international bar. What we received was a bar stool, hanging off the top step, crammed in so we literally could not move off our seats, and NO international bar. Sol beer only. We paid twice as much for this experience as we were told it was a show, it is basically a club with 1 song tributes every 15 mins to half hour. If you want to go out and get blind drunk and be crammed up against the rest of the Playa del Carmen population then its definitely for you. If you are looking for a show I'd give it a miss. This was mainly a rave.We tried to speak to the reps etc for Coco Bongo and fight to pay regular price for our tickets (as they had been charged to our hotel rooms) they were quite simply NOT INTERESTED.They had our money and the service could not have been worse.

Amazing, but not your normal club. I had an amazing time, the show is great, speciallly for those who like the shows and songs featured in the show. Me and my friends danced the whole night and neither of us would think twice about going there again. Maybe if you are looking for techno or used to "afterparties" till sunrise you might find this quite comercial. TIP: We had a transfer from the hotel as we bought our bracelet there but we decided to go earlier,to have a walk around the stores. so we caught a "carretera(? not sure if it is written this way, it is a little van)" right in front of our hotel (Bahia Principe) if you ask at your reception they will tell you. And that was the BEST thing we did as we arrived ealier then all the groups from all the hotels. The line gets crazy long, I heard people from my hotel saying they standed for almost 1:30 hours trying to get in. I was in as soon as it opened! Also, if you really are going for the drinks, you better be a cute girl, if you look cute the bartenders will ask you if you want to drink something, if you are a man, you must give them tips, or they wont bring your drinks, the place is crazy full, and if you wont tip them, someone else will. or just ask your girlfriends to get you drinks.

Love me some coco bongo. Had an absolute blast. Will definitely go back. Staff was fabulous. Definitely worth the VIP pass. Our waiter was always around .even the bouncers were fun. I never seen anyone get out of hand there was no negative energy want to go real soon

Worst club. If you're a basic b this is the club for you. It is a huge tourist trap with old people that are not interesting. I was also told a few times I couldn't be in an area because my table wasn't near it. This has never happened to me at a club before and I thought it was strange. If you're in playa and want to go out I highly suggest palazzo or mandala. I will never step foot inside coco bango again.

A must see. Incredible show, great talent, artistic and amazing acrobats The atmosphere is awesome. We have a hard time staying up long even to get to the show but once there we have no trouble staying awake and enjoying the show

A spectacular show and a wild night out!. If you only go for one night out in Player Del Carmen, make it Coco Bongo! This club has a spectacular stage and aerial show, they really go all out. The music, costumes and routines are brilliant. Everything about the venue makes for a fun, wild, party environment. We paid only for standard tickets (VIP gets you a seat) and got the best view from standing up a balcony or two. The bar staff are amazing - remembering what every one is drinking and bringing a constant supply of your drinks to you. Tickets for women are cheaper on Wednesdays when it is ladies night. Its not the best night out if you are sensitive about chauvinism - kiss cams and booty cams abound. However I would highly recommend this show to anyone. Words just cant do it justice.

EYE POPPIN. What a night. Before going we had an idea of what to expect but what a treat. All drinks included in the price was well worth the visit. The music was brilliant and the entertainment was non stop, we didn't know what to expect next there was so much going on. We will defo be calling there again the next time we are in the resort.

Crazy and awesome!. We've heard about CocoBongo for years but thought we might be too old (mid forties). I wanted to go and my husband went along but didn't think he'd enjoy it at all. Its unbelievable! Packed, at least 1000 people, you can't move but its a scream. People dancing on the bar, confetti, balloons, and a show to beat anything you've ever seen....we got back to the resort at 4:30am, best night out ever!!!!

Best night excursion. Coco Bongos is a great night. We were gold members and our drinks were never empty. We had a great worker who never stopped once. The shows the entertainers were fab and they work really hard. There is a mixture for everyone and for people of all ages. It's a must if you visit this part of Mexico. It's a late start so pace yourself.

Best party of my LIFE - VIP/Bottle Service=MUST. Alejandro came to the Grand Riviera Princess to talk to us about coming to this amazing looking club. He had pictures and an iPad to show us everything. It was my boyfriend's birthday a few days prior, so he tried to arrange something special. (Turn of events caused this not to happen but had no effect on our night at all and hadn't cost us anything). He explained about this huge long line everyone waits in, to get inside and wait in line, to get into the actual party and be shoulder to shoulder with people, standing the entire night dancing my face off and drinking from the open bar. Or, you could get VIP bottle service, skip the lines, get a bottle of the liquor of your choice, special treatment as you are whisked through to your private table and seats in the action up from the floor. Reserved. For you all night. Where you can keep your drinks, and your private server handles your bottle when you want to leave your table. Then you get mix of your choice, and the party begins! The shows are spectacular and extremely impressive. We had the best party time of our life, hands down. Jim Carrey, you have done a great job orchestrating these fine pieces of entertainment! All of the performers do such a great job, it was amazing to watch. We would absolutely go again, VIP only. Seriously.

Crazy fun. We went with a group of 5 and were treated great by our server. $75us and we bypasses the line, a table to stand at on the main level which was perfect. Our price got us to and from Puerto aventuras, t-shirts & beach bag. Drinks all included!! THE SHOWS WERE AMAZING. It was loud & packed but completely enjoyable. Highly recommend it!

Amazing. This place is absolutely fantastic, a real mixure of music, theatre, film and a nightclub / party atmosphere, along with a all inclusive drinks throughout.We loved this place and cannot recommend highly enough.
Go coco bongos. A fabulous evening at coco bongos. Non stop entertainment and the drinks waiter was awesome. The best part for me was the Michael Jackson tribute

Amazing!! a must!!. This show was just amazing... service was outstanding i never had an empty glass. shows were brilliant especially the guns and roses act!great value for money.. its a long night so pace yourself... maybe leave out the tequila chasers with your beer. recommend this to anyone and we ever go back to mexico this will be first on our list!

WHat a night. This is a must do what ever age. The best atmosphere ever and the show was just wonderful. Danced all night !! Dinks were flowing and music was the best. NOT TO BE MISSED WORTH EVERY PENNY of the £90 per person entrance fee. A MUST DO

Coco Bongo greatest show on earth. amazing valu,great fun awesome spectacle.. a true sign of a great event is when no one departs before the end of the show.. im going to being my kids there next year. a must see

Amazing Gold. Amazing amazing amazing. 100% recommend the gold package it was soooo worth it the show is amazing, the music is great, the bar staff are amazing and the waiters work so hard and are so good. We booked via the rep of the beach who was sooo helpful, really well organised coach picked us up we had reps onboard took us like 1 minute to walk to coco bongos. Picked us up at 3.40. Was amazing just do it, you will love it.

Awesome Birthday Party !. This is my second trip to Mexico this year and second visit to Coco Bongo as I had a great time on my first visit in Cancun. I decided to go to Playa del Carmen this time as I know that there's Coco Bongo where I can celebrate my birthday with few friends. It happens that Hector, the Coco Bongo rep at Occidental Grand Xcaret had the same bday and was planning to go on a night out with few friends and hotel employees. Again what an awesome show and a great way to celebrate our birthday. We had a great time and ended up going home at 6:30 in the morning ;)

Wow!!. Loved it!! Mixed age group, went VIP which thank god we did coz it was crazy downstairs!! We got there early and had the best table on the balcony overlooking the stage, our waiter was excellent, constantly bringing us drinks, the night was full of action and I couldn't believe how fast it went.. Well worth a visit!!
Mad!!. This is a fantastic night out, you have to see it to believe it. The show does not start until 11pm, however well worth the wait.

Amazing Amazing Amazing !!!. We booked 'gold' tickets and highly recommend these as you get a fast rack entry rather than queuing for ages and a table plus drinks waiter serving you non stop in the seating area on one of two upper levels. The show is impossible to describe other than to say it was incredible, the variety and quality was something else !!! We had a superb view of the stage and the centre area where all the live acts performed including several where they are either on trapezes or ropes suspended from the ceiling. The atmosphere is buzzing, a carnival mad mix of music and mayhem. We had seen mixed reviews before going and decided we simply had to go to see what all the fuss was about for ourselves - soooooooooooo glad we did! it didn't appeal to us to be on show floor area which are the cheapest tickets but if you like being absolutely in the thick of it then maybe it's for you, be prepared to be shoulder to shoulder with the masses if you do. We offered our waiter a tip when he got our first drinks (which we had seen people suggest in other reviews to secure flowing drinks) but he refused, said if at the end of the evening you are happy with my service then tip me then - we did as we were !!!!! Just a point - there seems to be quite a difference in ticket prices - recommend shop around the sellers to get the best bargain!!

Excellent customer service. Bought Golden member tickets on the hotel site from CocoBongo staff. because the bus was late, our table location was not good and we had to wait to get one since the section was full.The day after made comment to CocoBongo staff at the hotel and Alessandra took note of it and did follow to make sure that we don't stay with that unsatifying situation. Great customer service. Kuddos to Alessandra and Edgar from the Iberostar hotel as well as to Ernesto our waiter at the Coco Bongo..It was not just a show it was a great experience

Fantastic!. Visited Coco Bongos as part of thomsons bar crawl which meant we got to watch the show from the balcony - fantastic! Walked through the main floor and gold areas to get to the balcony and it was definitely much better. The show is fantastic!!! We tipped the staff there and my glass was never empty. Overall fantastic show, staff and experience! Would definitely recommend and return!

Insanely Different. It's like a small interactive Vegas style show with lots of alcohol. It was one of the most memorable nights of the trip. We were on the main floor, not in the seating area, and it was crazy awesome fun! It is actually almost hard to describe, but I do recommend exiting when the show is over. That is when the resorts pick up their guests, and there is a dynamic shift in the crowd inside. As a female, I do recommend going in a group, or with at least one male and leaving after the show.

Incredible! Totally Blown Away.... We paid for the VIP tickets which I highly recommend. You get picked up from your Hotel, queue-jump and fantastic seats to the show along with unlimited drinks all night.The staff were so good to us and the show was just amazing - a great mix of tastes in music and genres to suit everyone...great night!

Great show, great service but very cramped!. I was a little wary of visiting due to the late hour! However the show was so entertaining that the time flew and I didn't once feel tired or check the time! From the second you walk in the excitement builds and the drinks flow, it is just a shame that there is so little room around the table to dance, we were literally wedged into place!
Great night out. 1 of the best nights out I've ever had! And it's worth paying extra for vip treatment. The show as amazing and everyone is up dancing all night

Don't waste your money!. Don't waste your money!This place used to be good with ample room and seating for club-goers. However, they try to cram way too many people in a space that is not built for it. Even if you fork over even more money for premium seats or reserved sections, it is still way too crowded. However, there wasn't a line at the bathrooms - oddly enough.What was good was the entertainment. Very interesting and exciting. However, it was very hard to enjoy when you were crammed in tighter than sardines where your elbow was in the gut of the person next to you (and vise versa).Although many places dub this place as better than Vegas, etc...I would suggest going to a local club on the same strip where you can actually breathe. Although you will likely pay for your drinks at these other places (as drinks are included at Coco Bongo), the money you spend will likely be less than the admission price to Coco Bongo itself. This place might be fun if you are into the MTV style Spring Break or if you enjoy tasting the perspiration of the 10 people crammed next to you, but personally, if I go to a club, I would rather dance, move, breathe, and not be afraid of moving one inch to lose my place in the building.

Vegas in Mexico. Wow! Pretty impressive. expected similar quality as I had seen at the typical All Inclusive resorts, which were fine, Coco Bongo is Vegas quality. Although slightly expensive by Mexican standards.

Fun! Fun! Fun!. The Coco Bongo experience is a 2 in 1 kind of experience....all you can drink ...plus a Cirque de Soleil type show! It was fabulous! And for all you over 50's people...don't worry about the late night start...because they pump oxygen into the room...and you will be able to stay awake!!! LOLGo to Coco Bongo, for a late night party, and laugh your face off!!
tourist trap but still worth to see. well you mostly see tourists there and you could tell because the prices are ridiculously high. you get a great show though.

Las Vegas watch and Learn!!!. You will never feel as appreciated as you will in Coco Bongo!! Whether you are in Cancun or Playa del Carmen! As soon as you walk in you can tell that something is different. Especially compared to clubs in Vegas or anywhere in the U.S for that matter. This place appreciates its patrons and makes sure you know it. From a free drink that is waiting for you at the main entrance to the shot of tequila right before you enter the main club, to the amazing shows that entertain you for the entire night. The service is great and bathrooms are clean. All employees are on their tiptoes!!

Go Go Go!. Oh what a night! This was by far my favourite night of our whole vacation! My friend and I went to Playa for a girls getaway and were told Coco Bongo was not to be missed! We bought the basic ticket from the activity desk at our hotel but decided to upgrade based on recommendations from others who had already been. It was definitely the right choice. We upgraded through the Coco Bongo guys who were at our hotel every day. The bus picked us up and our guy Arturo went with us to the club, took us to get our VIP bracelets and found us our seats! He told us be prepared to drink a lot and have a blast. He was right. It was CRAZY fun! The show was amazing! We sang we danced and yes we did drink a lot!!! Our waiter was bringing us drinks and shooters non stop! The whole night passes by way to fast! Would go again in a heartbeat!

A party to remember. If you like night-life this is definitely the place for you. I first experienced Coco Bongo about 6 years ago when we were in Cancun and thought that the Playa del Carmen location wouldn't compare, but I must say it was just as good. Do be prepared to be a bit jostled by the crowd as they definitely pack everyone in - I believe that you can pay extra to get a table on the upper levels though but you likely won't have as good an experience as you do on the main level. Be sure to get a spot where you can see the bar in the center and the elevated stage at the front - when the show starts it is a non-stop display of impersonators, aerialists, and action. The drinks are all included - however beware of the shooter girls as they will charge you extra for their "showy" presentation of the shots (which basically involves them groping you while blowing a whistle in your face). Definitely not pleasant and they will charge you each time - I believe it is $5 USD for a measly little shot so definitely avoid the shooter girls. If you tip your server a bit throughout the evening though the service is next to none and they will make sure to keep the drinks coming all night. The staff there is phenomenal. I was travelling with a large group of friends/family and one of my aunts was in a wheelchair that night as her hip was bothering her. They made sure to get her a table with a great location (they had to take her through the back as the Front doesn't have wheelchair access but they were more than accommodating). Then our server made sure that no one stood in front of her table or crowded her so that she could see the show from where she was seated. Such a nice (an unexpected) gesture.We were there until 3:30am and the party was still going strong - we definitely would have stayed longer if it weren't for our shuttle bus departing. Like I said though you have to enjoy the night life as the show doesn't even start until 11:00pm - I would definitely recommend a late afternoon nap before heading to Coco Bongo. This will definitely be a "must-do" though every time I return to Mexico.

An unbelievable night!. Me and my Husband came to Coco Bongo during our Honeymoon. We had been recommended to go VIP and really glad we did. With this you got unlimited drinks and a table and seat.This place is amazing, nothing like i have ever been to before. when you thought it couldn't get any better something else amazing happened, you didn't know where to look at times because there was stuff going on everywhere. This place is a MUST to anyone visiting Mexico, i just wish we had one in the UK.

Wow, madness personified!!. Me, my wife and friends went to this club after a Thomson ran pub crawl. The whole night was amazing, and we all had a great time. Coco bongo is mental, but great, but I would advise doing the VIP package, otherwise you might not see much.

An experience like no other!!. WOW……this place is crazy good…... the music, the visuals, confetti and balloons dropping all over the place. The energy is contagious and the entire place is dancing from the moment the show starts. I never knew 4 hours could pass so quickly. What an absolute blast. I highly recommend this experience. I don’t think there is anything else like it in the world!(by the way, my husband and I are both over 40)

Just do it. Party, party, party. A superb experience. Fantastic live show with loud sound, lighting and other effects. Well worth the money, we went 'gold' and did not have to wait long to get in. Would fully recommend and go again.

Brilliant night out, great show. . It was a great night out, after talking to the rep we went and paid the extra for the Gold access to see the whole show, rather than the other option which was to go to a couple of bars first before catching the end of the show. Which I would definitely recommend it is not worth missing the start of the show. Also with the gold access you get unlimited drinks which is a good little addition. As for the show there was not one bit where we weren't entertained either by music videos and dancing or by the show being put on itself. So much to do you won't regret coming here.

Gold? Put you were they like and cram you in.. Me and my mum were sold premium Gold tickets more expensive than the usual gold and told we would get past the queues and be seated in the VIP area. Were crammed into tables on the ground floor with a balcony above stopping our view of what was happening above.We enjoyed the show however but did feel let down by the 1hr queue that we were told we wouldn't be stood in.Our waiter was very attentive but once he got our tip he forgot we existed and we had to track him down to get some drinks after not having any for over half an hour. Only then was he apologetic and rushed to get us some more.A coupe near us left early which meant we could all breathe on the seats. so Coco Bongo's sold the table of 2 to a hen party of 8 who were all stood in front of us. someone from the benches we were on complained and some of them were forced onto the dancefloor.People that hadn't paid for the seats and tables were constantly trying to sit where we had paid this extortianate premium and the staff did nothing until we complained. where we were, we didn't get to see much of the show because of peopel walking along the platform and ruining the view, photographers constantly asking if we wanted our picture (must have been asked 15 times) and women selling shots.It was rammed. were looking for fore exits and couldn't see any.All in all i would not go back. Only on speaking to other people did we find out that VIP should have been upstairs not downstairs crammed in with a limited view so we were conned by the Coco Bongo's hotel staff. and paid £170 between us for the 3rd rate treatment and 5th rate seats.Thanks a bunch!!!
Spactular. If you visit cancan this club is a must, it's not just a club it's a show!! The dancers are incredible at what they do! Would go back again..
Great fun. The show was incredible and would recommend. Glad we bought VIP. The music was great. The excitement of the room.

Amazing night. Go... We were a party of four (24 to 53 - mom, dad and two adult daughters). The girls were dancing all night and we couldn't stop singing and dancing to the music! The acts were great and covered interests for all. The tickets were 53 USD and there was a shuttle from resort and back, there is a two block walk from bus station to the venue but a guide leads you ( think smart shoe choice here). I felt perfectly safe and the staff and security were plentiful, we never waited a moment for service. Truly a place to visit. It is packed, loud and non stop so be prepared. The evening ran from 9:55 pm pick up to 3:40 am pick up. We purchased our tickets from Best Day at the resort. There was a Coco Bongo stand at the resort as well for any questions you may have. Thanks for a great adventure on our wonderful holiday.
Brilliant night. Crazy, enjoyable experience. Go vip as it is nice to have a base and somewhere to leave your drink. Excellent night good show atmosphere fantastic

If in the Riviera Maya then you must go here!!. One of the best night i have ever had! the place is just insane!! people on wires flying past above your head!! great Cabaret then amazing night club!!!

COCO Bongo. during our family vacation to Cancun last July we visited the Flea market near COCO Bongo. It is a busy place with lots of activity. There is the flea market near by, night club, and shopping. After visiting the flea market we went to COCO Bongo shopping area. WE want to few souvenir shops and watch the monkey trainers show off their pet monkeys. ON another visit we stopped and had ice creams at the ice cream parlor. great ice cream, but very expensive. The ice cream parlor was a great place to stop and rest and cool off in Air conditioning. It was extremely hot outside that day,

A MUST do!!!!. Great night out and well worth the money. We went through Thompson and got Gold ticket entry. This saved us having to stand in the huge normal line, we had great seats and had a waiter and drinks all night long. Tip your waiter at the start of the night and they will be sure to keep them coming!

Unbelievable xxx. The most amazing experience ever! The club, music, performers are amazing! The atmosphere just keeps you going from the moment you get there until the second you leave.If you go to Mexico it is a must do!Worth every penny! Definitely do the VIP as you will have a seat so you have the choice of sitting down or standing up dancing! Xxx

What a night!. Me and my wife visited Coco Bongo last night and had one of the best nights of our lives! The shows were fantastic, the acrobatics incredible and the service was spot on. I 100% recommend visiting here!

Great Night. Went with friends for the wife's birthday and not sure what to expect. Paid for the gold entry with Thomson's and was not disappointed. I was a bit concerned where we were placed as we were tucked away but did have a good view of the stage.I did not have to worry as our waiter was right on the ball constantly filling our drinks up often before they were quite finished. All in all a show for every one from start to finish. This is a late start and late finish don't expect to get back to your hotel until 0400 at the earliest. Great fun night

Amazing Night!!. What an amazing night! Definitely get a vip goldmember ticket, its so worth your money. You get a fantastic veiw (with a seat), waiter service, queue jump & free drinks! We had a waiter named Angel, he was absolutely fantastic and looked after everyone all night. I didnt expect it to be as good as it was. You HAVE to go!!
Party Time!!. Whoop whoop, get ready for an action packed and exciting night but dont forget the Do Not Disturb sign on your door in the morning!! This is a must visit place!!

dont be palmed off on arrival!. I went twice to Coco Bongo, paid for Gold on both occasions through the hotel we stayed First time had a great time. was in the right area, premium spirits as promised and good service (even if the waiter did ask for a tip at the end rather than wait to be offered one)Enjoyed so much I booked to take a friend the second week as she was to arrive. arrived fine although the pick up was 30 mins late. we were not put in the gold members section but taken to the opposite side and put in the gods. it wasn't for about half an hour I realised we were in with the staff discounted/freebies. not premium spirits and no-one to complain to I mentioned to Marco the next day who sold us the tickets. I wrote a complaint letter (only had 3 nights of holiday left to go) so I wanted a refund on the difference paid UK £90/US $145 is not a cheap night out each.I heard nothing back at all from the management - not even a written apology. Marco had tried his best to deal with it, but wasn't authorised to issue refunds.

Best nightclub ever. Thomson offered us gold member tickets, best nightlife I ever have been too. Angel, my waiter was fantastic - deserved every penny of my tip we left. Constantly topping up drinks, checking we were ok, was worth every Penny what a great show.

Awesome Experience. Loved it! Super crazy and fun. Air con was so awesome - loved the blasts. Super entertaining. Would have totally regretted not going. Met a couple diving, said we had to go - best advice ever! Was just such a fun night out!!!

Amazing. If you visit this area you must go here.An amazing experience. if you are young then the bottom area will be fine for you but we sat in VIP area where the drinks just keep coming. The show starts about an hour after you get in. Then every 15 minutes or so there is another 'episode' of entertainment. Not cheap but well worth it - don't miss out.

The most unbelievable an wacky night out. This is something that experiencing is believing. To try and explain it or to recommend you view it on YouTube wouldn't do it justice - go and seeit live.Pay the extra for the Golden Member pass (£125.00 - £140,00 depending on which day you go) Waiter service and premium drinks included.Tip your waiter $5US early on an you'll be looked after.CNN Quote " Puts Las Vegas night life t shame"

Great Great!. One of the best places in Playa del Carmen to visit. The service was great and the environment was too fun. Everyone there had a great time. On your next visit you must stop buy this establishment.

Awesome. What a greta night out, didnt even consider it at first as both me and hubby are nearer 60 that 50 haha but was recomended by other holiday makers at the hotel and glad we went along. Although a little pricey, we went on the Gold Member section , which gave us a seat on the balcony level with stage away from the disco dancers but the atmosphere and everything was fantastic. You got all the drinks included in your admission and our waiter never let our glass get below half empty/full. The acts and performance were brilliant and the energy etc was amazing, always something happening. Totally recommend a visit.

Great time even for the young at heart. Group of 60 year old went to Coco Bongo on a dare from our younger children and experienced a show and evening we loved. Absolutely well choreographed, lighting and music beyond our expectations. Worried about the late hours but our adventure was over before we knew it. Can't describe all that went on during the evening but we all had a blast. Would not go to Playa without going to Coca Bongo

A Party Like NO Other!. This was my fourth time to visit CoCo Bongo and this visit was on Halloween night-PERFECT! We always opts for the VIP/Gold tickets as it provides you with a stool, a waiter, premium liquor and private restrooms. There are only 120 seats in VIP, which is nothing compared to the 1000+ people on the first floor each night. The show is amazing and is too much to put into words. For a glimpse of what you can expect, check out the videos on YouTube. Our waiter this time was Fernando, and he was absolutely amazing. I never had an empty glass and he was beyond friendly. The shot girls tend to get on my nerves, however Yessica was cool and even convinced me to buy a few shots (by promising to only bother me if I raised my hand) lol. Overall this was a great experience, however I did have a HUGE issue with the staff at the front door. I had purchased my tickets 3 months prior to our visit, knowing that it would likely be sold out. On the night of our visit I did not have access to my email as my phone had been stolen the night before. Since I had my drivers license and passport, I assumed there would be no issue claiming my tickets. I made the reservations under my name, so there should be no issue, right? WRONG. The staff at the door told me I could not get in without the "code" from my confirmation email. I explained that my phone/wallet had been stolen and I only had access to my drivers license and passport to confirm my identity and purchase. The two girls working the door were INCREDIBLY rude and unprofessional and almost ruined the entire experience. Eventually, after approximately 35 minutes, they decided that my photo IDs were sufficient and I was allowed to enter. I find this unacceptable. CoCo Bongo has a sophisticated reservation system that should easily allow confirmation of a reservation with just your name. While I did not have my confirmation, the girls at the door did not have my name or paperwork in their stack, which they should have had. The entry process was poorly organized and due to the rude treatment by the staff I am not sure that I will ever return. My next visit to CoCo Bongo will likely be when they open in Rio in 2016...perhaps that experience will be better than this one.

The Future of Nightclubs. This is a nightclub like no other! It's expensive (for a seat near the bottom - otherwise you'll need to stand all night), but it's a full 4 hours of entertainment. When you first come in, you'll be asked what bottle you want (to share between 2 people). We asked for - and got - Grey Goose Vodka. You can also choose 2 different mixes. Unfortunately, and what I give a strike against, is you'll need to pay $5 US for ONLY 500 ml of water (which is a MUST for anyone intent on going the limit - it's not like you can duck out to the bathroom to get some water of your own). After you get your bottle - sit back and enjoy the show - or get up & dance! Seems that all manner of partying was excepted here. The acts: imitating a whole spectrum of famous singers & their songs, are entertaining and the change-ups are fast. Every so often, streamers of colored paper or countless balloons are released on a cheering crowd, then just as quickly swept away by numerous unobtrusive young people, making way for the next onslaught. The waiting staff is always nearby, clearing your drink of any wet paper or to refill it for you - including ice! The roughest part (for me) is that it goes from 11 p.m. till 3 a.m. But, since it's all fairly loud and non-stop, you don't even notice you're tired - until you get on the bus to go back to your hotel. Here, like everyplace else we visited in the Cancun area (including the airport), the people were SO pleasant and accommodating, it truly makes you wonder why it can't be like this everywhere in the world!

Insane fun. This place is insane! It's a whole lot of fun in couples or groups.You get picked up from your hotel at 10pm or you can make your own way there.We got general admission ($60-$75 USD) and paid $10 per head extra to skip the que and go straight in. They greet you with alcohol and the drinks keep coming all night.The show starts at 11pm so if you can get up onto the first floor and grab a good spot by the stage you'll have the best vantage point all night.The show is non stop from beetle juice,Chicago, elvis, madonna, Michael Jackson, beyonce,tron and many many more it will keep you laughing, jumping, dancing and singing right till close at 3.20am.Look up to the ceiling because the show is not only on the stage.They get the whole crowd involved with balloons, ticket tape, bubbles and more.Once it's all done I highly recommend a taco or burrito right across the road.. Trust me you'll need it!

3rd Visit. This is our 3rd time in Mexico and it’s the 3rd experience of Coco Bongos, it’s for all ages my wife and I are both 55 and I have to say it’s one of the best attractions in Playa del Carmen and Cancun and we have been to them both, great night especially if you have the VIP package great music and great entertainment it’s a must !!!

Absolutely incredinle. Add this to your bucket list!!Absolutely amazing experience, the staff are so talented and should be extremely proud of the show they perform !Really was the icing on the cake to an amazing holiday in Mexico! I would return to playa del Carmen purely for this nightclub!Worth every penny and more!!Well done!!!

Just book it. We got 2 gold tickets £154, great view and a waiter who kept the drinks flowing. Its not your typical club there is so much going on all the time and the hours passed in a flash. Great night out that you won't forget.

Wow! Just Wow!. What a night! We'd been meaning to go see this show for a few years now. It kept getting pushed aside. We finally decided to pull the trigger on this trip and try it out. Unbelievable show! And I mean that. I don't know what I was expecting but it was non stop show and extravaganza all night long. I HIGHLY recommend this to any adult out there.We bought the Gold membership and it was soooo worth it! Even at twice the cost of the floor tickets. You'll easily drink more then your cost. We had our own waiter who would mix your drinks right in front of you. Plus a couple of stools which we used at the beginning, but once the show got going we were on our feet dancing all nightlong. But it was nice to have them.All in all one of the most fun nights I've spent in Playa!

A must do. Went to Cocobongo last night and book the Goldmember tickets..$125 which got you a seat on the first level with your own waiter serving you. We went in about 10.20 and had an hour before the show started. They had dancers on the bar on the ground floor which got everyone warmed up. It was then non stop drink, music and entertainment until 3.30am. Fantastic show, we danced all night. We are in our 50's and loved every minute. It's a must do if you are anywhere near Cancun or Playa del Carmen. Excellent value for money. It's like the best party you have every been to.

You have to go at least once!. Fantastic night! This place is so much fun you have to go at least once! We paid $60 at our hotel and that included all you can drink! We.had no problems m getting our drinks the waiter was al ways right there with another round! In fact they were lining them up after a while ! Show was great and there is so much going on you're constantly entertained. They have the show on stage over your head, they have dancers on the bar and bring up the patrons to dance too, they have Spider-man and other characters flying through the air! The place is packed but it is not hot. They blow gushes of cool air every so often and it keeps the club very comfortable! This place is definitely a "must see"! We have been there twice already and if I go back I would definitely go again! Guaranteed a night of fun no matter how old you are!

Brilliant night. Bought VIP tickets as part of an excursion and would advise you do the same. Great night, great view of everything that goes on and there is a lot. It's non stop entertainment from start to finish. With the VIP tickets there is no long wait in a queue, private bar service and great views of the whole show. Brilliant atmosphere, a must do in Cancun for all ages over 18.

Coco Bongo. We buy the tickets from Playa del Carmen, direcly from Coco Bongo. It cost 60 dollars - with open bar. I recommend to arrive there at the opening hours because later it will be pretty crowded. The show starts at 11:20 PM.The show was absolutely amazing. We enjoyed our night there and have a lots of fun.

A MUST SEE!!!!. Coco Bongo isn't your typical club...it is so much more than that. The shows that are put on are phenominal!! Make sure you buy the bottle service because the place gets extremely packed and having your own liquor right at your table makes everything easier. Definately a must see

Party time!!. Absolutely loved this. I have read reviews about how people hated this attraction, and I can understand their point of view. It is very much a nightclub with some shows thrown in, as opposed to a show. There are a couple of acts, then an interlude, where ladies are invited to dance on the bar and it is generally a massive party/carnival atmosphere.Is it a bit cabaret? Well, maybe, but that didnt detract ANYTHING from it.Is it cramped and difficult to move around? Well, we bought "gold" tickets, which put us up on the balcony, we had a seat all evening, and we got to the bathroom with absolutely no difficulty all evening. At one point there was a queue of 2 people, but I can live with that.Our waiter/server was brilliant, I dont think I was without a drink all evening, with a new one magically appearing sometimes without me even noticing! Very impressed!I absolutely LOVED this evening, and, while it was a very late finish, it was a brilliant experience its how every night club SHOULD be!

Best night - love this place . We decided to go last minute to coco bongo - hotels give you deals and vip use. VIP included your own waiter with the drinks coming all night , there are different type of VIP's as we were up in the third level . Next time will up grade to lower level and towards the center since it's hard to appreciate the whole show from the sides towards the stage . The environment is great - all ages seemed to be having an incredible time . All type of music was played . We went on a Friday night and it was packed . That didn't matter to us - we kept dancing . It was very crowded once you go in and are trying to get your armbands situated and waiting to go to your table , but they had someone serving tequila shots as you wait :) if you are picky and don't want to feel young - do not go here . If you are ready to enjoy your vacation and let loose - this is the place . We did not want to leave !!!

Great night!. I have been to Coco Bongo three times and it is a blast! We went again because there was a special show for Halloween. The show did not dissapoint, it was amazing! We upgraded to VIP for the first time and it was worth it. Coco Bongo is hard to describe, so I suggest that you just go and check it out.

Splurge on the VIP. If you do not splurge on the VIP, you will not be able to sit down, at all, throughout the whole night. Just splurge on VIP. The show is fantastic but there will not be room to walk around, dance, or sit. Be prepared.

Crazy fun night!. Coco Bongo in Playa del Carmen was a really great time the show was pretty cool and the drinks were flowing. You may think it will be long cause you their for 5 hours bu the time just flies by! Only bad experience was the lineup to get in took very long to get in and that it is a bit tight ( but i like that better).I would definitely recommend this to anyone who wants to go out clubbing in the area. Its also not a bad deal either for all you can drink. Highlight of the night were the midgets pouring shots down my throat. How crazy!

Worth It!!. This was a must-do experience!! So much to see and experience with the dancing and performances! Tip the server and drinks flow well towards you! Ladies be prepared to get pulled up onto the bar to dance so perhaps wear shorts or be prepared for a skirt to get blasted up with the air-currents that shoot up from the bar! Overall a fantastic night that I would repeat in a heartbeat!

Must see. Must see. Absolutely brilliant, exciting, party atmosphere. Upgrade to the gold package to get a seat otherwise be crammed on the dance floor. Also with the seats you are level with stage and get a better view of the acrobatics.

Good venue. I have visited both Coco Bongo's many times during my "clubbing" years. This one is my favorite, though smaller and with a less impressive show than that of Cancun's. However you will enjoy it better as it is less crowded than the original one. It has a great location near all 5th avenue night life in Playa.

Awesome! Awesome! Awesome!. Because I am an "early to bed, early to rise" person, I did not plan on staying long. I was initially turned off by the long line to get in and then the lack of "elbow room" once inside. However, once the show got started, I had forgotten all about those things. First, the diversity of the patrons was amazing. It did not matter what age, race, lifestyle, etc....you were BOUND to have a GOOD time and be thoroughly entertained from start to finish. I did not know what to expect. Even if someone described it to me, it still would not have done this place justice. I could not get enough of this place. I was on edge waiting to see what the next act was going to be. I stayed until the lights came on. It is a MUST SEE attraction!! My only advice for ladies...wear comfortable shoes!

so much fun. This is a must visit if you like a fun crazy night out , and to see things youve never seen before. The stage acts, choreography, gymnatics , and costumes were amazing. we paid extra for VIP and was well worth it as the waiters made sure you always had a drink in your hand. Great cocktails and atmosphere.
amazing. No matter what your age, you need to visit this place, but go VIP.you won't be disappointed, all drinks are free but tip the waiter and you will never be without a drink.

If you only do one thing in Mexico-visit Coco Bongo!. dont let the price put you off-it's worth every peso! All drinks are included-served to you by a private waiter all night. We went VIP. Don't get there too early as they make you wait until 10/10.20 to enter. Crazy, fun filled night-watch on YouTube- it's 10 x better live. Time flew by and before we knew it-it was time to leave. Amazing place-nowhere like it on earth!!

BEST NIGHT OUT EVER. The best night of my life, Highly recommended the VIP package, your own terrace to watch the show with the best view with your own waiter with unlimited free drinks, which he will not let your drink get empty. 5* amazing!!
Great experience. I have been there just one night, but it was great! the price is not so cheap but the show is awsome, and there is a free bar; impossible to describe. I wanna go again!
Amazing. Fantastic place..can't forget how good this was..wd go again,if back in mexico,it's not a disco as we thought but more of a show theatre, dancers and true mexican fun,wow factor
Fantastic!!!. We enjoyed it so much and would definitely recommend it. Such great service too - we paid extra for the VIP and glad we did as it was worth it!!!

Wonderful crazy night out. We just got home from our Holliday ,I will never ever forget our night at Coco Bongo my husband and I made complete idiots of ourselves dancing ,my husband even did a mooney,if anyone has any pics pleeeze post them.it was a wonderful night never to be forgotten.10 stars

It's a good show .... Coco Bongo is a combination night club and show. The show is a reproduction of different videos, plays, musicals and movies, meanwhile there's a bar and dance floor. Unfortunately, they pack the place to the point where you can't dance. You can't even really freely move around without some indecent rubbing up against strangers. I enjoyed the experience, but that many people is nuts! I think everyone should experience at least once. It's fun and sometimes interactive. Go! Say you did it! Have a good time! Then come back to sanity! :-)

If you like tacky, you'll love it. Do you like to get rid of 100 box within 20 mins for a few drinks served by girls that are rubbing on you, no matter if you're a man or a girl? You don't care about the music, man thing is you get drunk after spending a couple of grands? it's your place. Regarding the show... well, Cirque de Soleil is cheaper and nicer

Great night. Me and my wife visited coco bongo as part of our honeymoon . It was part of the "juan hellava night" excursion booked with Thomson. It was one of the best nights ever , the show is good the drinks flow and the whole experience had us both smiling all night long totally recommended.

shopping in playa del carmen. would have been really good but sadly it down poured all day. Didnt care at all for the silver factory......found it very expensive, the restaurant that was included was pretty good thats where we hung out until the bus picked us up

What a fun night out. We decided to go to coco bongo one night while we stayed in playacar.... I have never been to such neat place and probably never would in Canada because this place was packed!!! The acts were done so well one of family got put up on the stage to dance and she had so much fun :) I will definitely be back and bring more friends!!!

Amazing show!. We buy the tickets from Playa del Carmen, direcly from Coco Bongo. It cost 60 dollars - with open bar. I recommend to arrive there at the opening hours because later it will be pretty crowded. The show starts at 11:20 PM.The show was absolutely amazing. We enjoyed our night there and have a lots of fun.

AMAZING!!!. My partner and I were staying at Grand Palladium and got our tickets from our rep Nelson (he was awesome!!! very helpful!). Took the bus into Playa Del Carmen and it took about 30 minutes. We did not have the VIP package - but we felt as if the VIP package would have been unnecessary as we had our own table and unlimited drink service. Our bartender ensured we were NEVER without drinks. We would order beers and he would return with 6 sometimes! The shows were INCREDIBLE!!! I was blown away - my absolute favorite was TRON. We went on a Tuesday night and felt that the amount of people inside the club was perfect - super busy, but I never felt claustrophobic. The security was very present and I felt safe at all times. I would go AGAIN 100%. If you have the opportunity... GO!

Coco Bongo. If you are in the least bit claustrophobic, I would not recommend it. This place is a lot smaller than it looks in photos/videos I watched before we went. They cram about 1500 people in about a 2000 sq ft space. Now I like a good party just as much as the next person, but I found myself looking around for the nearest exit and planning my escape route, rather than enjoying the show, which is actually really good, had it been in a different venue.

Coco Bongo - VIP all the way!. What a fantastic night we had, show was fantastic and drink was flowing and danced the night away - awesome atmosphere. We had gold member tickets and I would advise buying them as you get a great seat with a table and are superbly looked after by the waiters. Definitely a must do if you like to party.

Amazing. High energy, fun fun fun, great entertainment, fabulous atmosphere, loved the expierence from start to finish, would recommend anyone to go and have a great night. All age types enjoyed the night, brilliant party x

A night to remember. A big thank you to Hector at Grand Xcarat hotel for our tickets to the best night out we have ever had the place was bouncing from our arrival at 22:15 till we left ar 03:30 for our bus back to hotel. The party atmosphere is incredible and the show gwts better every act for some yyou would swear it was the origional artist not dancers made to look like them(LMFAO for example) it does get very packed and we paid the extra for VIP well worth every penny we had a seat and table could see allthe shows had room to dance loved it

Never seen a show like it!. We took a tour there through our hotel. We paid $70.00 for transportation there and back and open bar, upon arrival there was a huge line which we bypassed for an additional $10.00. The area we had was perfect! The staff there are quick with the drinks and friendly. The show is amazing!! There were singers, dancers and acrobats and they were all fabulous! If you have a chance to go, don't pass it up. Well worth the line to get in!

Watch out for kisscam. Never gets old, they put so much work in to make sure you have a fantastic night!! Try and get gold member tickets which includes your entry, drinks all night a table with seats!! Worth a million visits!!

Great show!. The drinks were plentiful, the show was fantastic, however they do pack a lot of people into the space and therefore standing/dancing in one location for a lengthy period is necessary. Aside from the small space to stand/dance we all had a really good time!

Great night - just go VIP if you do it.. My boyfriend and I went to coco bongos during our time in Mexico. I loved it, he said it was OK. Definetly a must do. The entertainment was great, loved all the dancing/shows, props (such as the balloons coming from all angles), the music and the whole night there is a great atmosphere!The only problem was you literally couldn't move, so next time I would and would recommend getting a table so you're not sardined in and can actually move and dance. Saying that I didn't struggle to get a drink at the bar!

Never too old. What a place, wish we had one in Cardiff. Adjectives, the only way to go. Energetic, pulsating, colourful, vibrant, loved it all. Fantastic tribute artists, acrobats, costumes, this place as it all. If you're claustrophobic ? Not for you, this place is bustin' at the seams with audience

a night to remember. we visited this venue while on holiday in Tulum, it was well worth the 40 minute journey a totally amazing evening of entertainment worth every single penny.The atmosphere was electric with all your senses heightened a truly fantastic evening of musical humorous entertainment with fantastic waiter service.

1st class entertainment. Was on a two week holiday to Mexico and coco bongo was one of the things we did while there.. "Unbelievable" that's how you describe your night there, we tried to book the vip for the fri night but it was sold out so next best thing was the bottle service at your table and I'm glad we got thisFor £200 we got one of the best seats in the place a bottle of grey goose mixers and a waiter who kept our glasses filled all night The show was excellent and the music they played between each act was great A must for anyone visiting playa or cancun

Must do!. 2 nd visit to coco bongo just love this place especially the acrobats.Went as gold members ,drinks were included and were constantly being refilled by our waiter.We went with the guy who sold tickets at our hotel and the price included transport there and back on air conditioned coach and was extremely well organised.

Great night. We had a great night in Coco Bongos in October 2014. We paid for VIP and therefore were sat on 2nd floor and had an open bar, the waiter keeps you topped up so you don't have to move and actually go to the bar! Very attentive .... even when I changed my drink 3 times since I was trying the cocktails and they were great at recommending options, and even changed one immediately that I did not like too much.The show was great, although we had seen the show in Cancun 2 years ago, we were told the venues were similar but to be hones they are not, the Cancun CB is MUCH bigger, but the Playa Del Carmen one ensures there is not a bad seat in the house since you are close to the stage no matter your seat.Good bater and entertainment and would highly recommend!

Best night ever!!!. This place truly was so much fun, We are early 40s and a bit worried it might be a bit "young" for us I said to my husband we wouldn't last all night, but we did and it was amazing. My advice would be to go VIP as its packed! We made our own way to the venue via taxi as we didnt want to hang around for the Hotel bus. It is a late night (doesnt open till 2200) so get some sleep before hand if you can. For 2 tickets it was approx £150 - Gold members, that includes all your drinks and VIP queing to get in. You have your own table and waiter service. Drinks were fast flowing!! Once the show started we were in awe, it wasnt like anything I have ever seen before. The staff were amazing, and friendly, a little tip doesnt go a miss and you will be treated really well! Go have fun you really will have a blast! Top tip DO NOT go the night before you are travelling home like we did!! That 10 hour flight was hard work with the hangover from hell!!!

Unbelievable experience. As a group of 31 we booked the trip through the rep around the pool in the hotel. We received free t shirts, shuttle to the venue, entry to the venue and unlimited drinks brought to our own private area for 65 dollars. The shows we excellent and from start to finish the night was flawless no trouble or people hassling us just good fun and jaw dropping performances for the dancers. For any body visiting riveria maya it is a real must.  It was that good we returned again and even received a discount and upgrade to the third level. But to be honest the second level was better it was closer to the stage and when they drop the blooms etc the land on top of you.

Wrong Market For Us. Positive Notes: The service was incredible! The servers polite, professional and dedicated; drinks were replaced before they were finished. Full kudos to the staff!That being said we did not have a good time (therefore left very early) as we were the wrong market for this attraction and we foolishly believed the hype. The posters at the resorts, on the streets and in the brochures advertise 40 Las Vegas style shows, which, unfortunately we actually expected. The BD Tours people at the hotel were adamant that we would have a great time as it was ‘the best party in town’ (that should have been a clue). The Las Vegas style shows are intermittent throughout the four plus hours of music, and hardly the focus of the evening, as we had expected.The experience will be fantastic for people who like to start their party at 11PM and go through to the wee hours of the morning with non-stop, heart-thumping, brain-bashing, over-the-top-loud, latest-of-the-latest modern dance music. If this sounds like you, pay the cost for a Gold Pass ($125/pp) to avoid the long, long line up and have fun. The entry fee includes an open bar with the exception of energy drinks (e.g.: Red Bull and others), champagne, and tequila shots. Tequila shots are sold for $5/each, straight from the bottle by women wandering through the crowd. On the other hand, servers brought us un-ordered shots of something that we simply gave back to them untouched. The servers seemed personally insulted when we refused their gifts, but c’est la vie.The other aspect that was somewhat bothersome was the sheer volume of participants. It was difficult to move through the crowd at any level due to the number of people in the place. We were not confident that the Fire Marshall would have approved.

Great show but pay extra and go VIP!!!. I loved the show, my mum & I went on the ladies night as it was a right bargain price, you get your drinks included however you can never get to the bar and back as its so packed so not even any point paying for drinks when you are at the first floor... It was so packed we ended getting split up and my mum was actually elbowed in the face by one of the staff members as she wouldn't move because she was trying to find me and it was just too overcrowded to get anywhere!! I would say it's really not a nice experience if you are not in your 20s and don't care about being knocked about, just pay extra and go VIP so you can have your own table, the show is well worth it just it's absolute hell down by the stage, wouldn't ever do that again, I rate Coco Bongos, but pay the extra for VIP!!!

Great night out. Wow what a night out this was.didn't think I'd last the night but you can't help but being swept along with the atmosphere. Show starts at around 11.30pm and ends at 3.30pm,we got picked up from our hotel at 9.30pm and arrived back at 5.00am but would not have missed it for the world. We had vip tickets which meant we had proper seats and waiter service which was well worth the extra money ticket price included all drinks and we just kept having filled up all night. Show was amazing a mixture of cabaret,disco and circus with acrobatics,tributes and dancing.you can also get down on the main dance floor and have a bit of a boogie while it's all going on.time went so quickly obviously we didn't do much the next day so if your going to Coco Bongos don't plan anything the day after and definitely not the day before you go home!!

Absolutley Brilliant. This was a night to remember, had the Gold Member pass, never had less than 2 drinks in front of us all night. Disco combined with show, acrobats, comedy, dancing, Vegas type acts. started at 2230 finished at 0330. What a night.

Night Out. WOW what a great experience, me and my wife were on Honeymoon and decided to go and visit the famous nightclub which everyone had said was a must go to.We paid for the VIP pass and we had fantastic seats and a great view of the shows which were really good and the waiters made sure we were kept in drink all night.A great party atmosphere and thoroughly enjoyable night and would go back if we visit Mexico again.

Wow factor.. This was one of the best nights I've ever had. My partner and I decided to go here while on holiday and wow what a night. Non stop entertainment I didn't even want to go to the toilet for fear of missing something lol. We were the first couple that night the cameraman zoomed in on lol was great seeing yourself on the big screen :). I would recommend a night at Coco Bongo you will never regret it. A massive thank you to every single person from the trapeze artists right down to the door men . Thank you to all for making our night so memorable.

Brilliant night. I would recommend this to anyone travelling to the riviera maya. Travelling from the uk we couldn't get gold member tickets from Thomson as they had none left but we got them direct from the coco bongo rep at our hotel (grand palladium) and it was well worth it. Show was simply spectacular and the atmosphere in there was awesome.
VIP worth it. Great show. VIP was worth it. Shows were great service was great too. Reasonably clean too for a Mexican bar I must say.
Great Party and show. Primary aimed and Young people but all ages welcomed. Show great fun making a very enjoyable evening.Refreshments very generous making good value.

"night life outing". very good show, but be prepared to wait outside in line for a quite a long time. And when you get in you may not get an area where you can sit. It's a 6 hr show so were very comfortable shoes just in case you are at a stand up table with no chairs.
Wow. Nothing more to say than what a phenomenal show. Sadly because of red tape would not be allowed in Europe. If you come here don't miss the chance to go. First class

***WARNING*** Groped by a member of staff.. We went to Coco Bongo on Monday and it was a horrendous experience. I was groped by a member of staff and I immediately reported this to the manager. He did not take my complaint seriously and told me that that 'I was drunk, a liar and this has never happened before'. I pursued the matter and phoned the police who also were uncaring and unhelpful. We left the club and we complained to BD Travel who sold us the tickets to Coco Bongo. They launched an investigation and advised me this was not uncommon. They eventually gave me a full refund and this was the very least they could do, I was not provided with an apology. I have since learnt that this is common within the club (please see other reviews). It is not worth the risk of being sexually assaulted and I strongly advise you boycott this place as more exteme assaults have occurred.

wicked. Wow what a great night, it's like nothing you have seen before so different. We only had a couple of hours in there wish we had more time. Waiter came round regular with drinks. We were right at the top, had trouble seeing though but that might be cause I'm short.
Good Night Out. Excellent show, bit of a long drive from Moon Palace so dont drink to much! It does get filled to capacity so make sure crowds dont bother you.

good night out with a difference. all inclusive night out, drinks never stopped and all branded too. Excellent stage shows all musically themed almost tributes.We had VIP tickets which gave front row seats on first floor. Great night

Brilliant Night Out!. This place was brilliant, the shows were so entertaining and the disco that's in between was just as good, the organizers should be very proud of their team as they make an excellent entertainment team.

when in rome....party like mexicans!!!. OMG....this place was amazing, in Mexico for our honeymoon but we are so glad we spent the money on VIP's for this evening (I certainly drank the cost of my ticket)....fab night out would recommend here to anyone that is travelling to mexico best night out

Great night. What a great night and completely nuts! What a good show was put on and it had to be seen to be believed. Everything from Queen to beetlejuice to Batman to elvis... and lots of visual effects! Once in a life time everyone should go !
ha ha never too old. what a night ..........mid 40's and early 50's we loved it .... paid for butler service well worth it ... never had to move from our seat .......we are now ravers lol
so cool place!. really enjoyed the show! a very cool place to go with friends.Going on a boat the next day was not the best idea ever but I would definitly go back.

Wow what a great night!. This has got to be one of the best nights out ever! It is a real mixed show and be prepared to be amazed. The drinks flowed all night don't want to give too much away as you need to get yourself booked. We went VIP so a good view table and seeting..... But if your young get yourself downstairs just as good. Would absolutely go again great show music and electric atmosphere ....... Prepare to be wowed ....

Out of this world!. we booked through thomsons and had Gold member! queue for non gold members was so long and we got in straight away entrance was easy and fast and soon allocated a seat on a balcony with brilliant views! Show itself was out of this world and better than any other shows i have been too- there is something for everyone to enjoy from queen, elvis, spiderman, tron and chicago and in general it is very fun and unpredictable. the bar staff gave us full attention however kept refilling drinks even though i saw some people were a little drunk and think they done it to get more tips. other than that i would definetly reccomend VIP/Gold member and think everyone should give it a go as it was amazing!!!

Good night .. bit pricey. this was a good night but do not think it was worth the money paid.. really good service for gold member and drinks constantly brought to you.You will have a good night .. but would not be missing a lot if you didn't go...

Great night and great show. Loved it!!. My boyfriend and I went and we were a little sceptical as we're not clubbing people and usually prefer bars to clubs but heard it was good so we gave it a go. I'm so glad we did it was one of the best nights out we've had. We booked gold tickets which are a lot more money but included waiter service and a table. We went through first choice and we got there quite late - this did mean that we didn't have very good seats so I recommend getting there early. Night out was amazing, really good fun and very different to anything I've seen before. The acrobatic shows were brilliant and the other acts were very entertaining. We tipped our waiter early on and he brought us drinks and tequila all night long without asking.

Wow. You have to see this place to believe it. Definitely the highlight of our holiday! Superb shows 10 mins after we arrived until we left at 320am to get the bus home. Had everything from Beyoncé to beetle juice & Spider-Man v green goblin to moulin rouge & lmfao. Our waiter was Angel who regularly came to us with what every we wanted beers/tequila/peach schnapps or vodka. FANTASTIC NIGHT!!!

Interesting. One time visit was great but probably will not go back. Service was adequate but not very personal. Would be great experience for a large group. Glad to have had the chance to go once only.

What a place !!!. Amazing place never seen anything like it , couldnt happen in UK cos we woudlnt have the atmosphere and crazyness. Plus health and safety would prob shut it down. Not saying its dangerous just a truly magnificent show/nightclub/experience/night out !!!

Well out of my comfort zone...loved it!. Both my boyfriend and I aren't really into shows or clubs etc so we were a bit out of our comfort zone for the first hour or so. It's just so different to any club/show we've ever seen before. We got gold member tickets to ensure travel, a good view, a seat and a waiter service. Tip your waiter well and he will dote on you all night, you won't be able to keep up with the drinks! It loosens you up anyway as we were soon singing along and dancing with the rest of the overexcited crowd. The woman in front of us and the couple next to us was clearly off her face on so etching a bit stronger than alcohol and when we were hit in the face for the 20th time by her waving balloons we popped them as soon as she went for a toilet break...I see a few complaints about the drunk girls getting up and dancing on the bar/podium, this actually made out night as we like to people watch. All the girls dancing on the podium knew fully well that a huge blast of air strong enough to lift the tightest skirt was going to be shot up at them and hen acted all coy and 'upset', we thought it was hilarious! Some even went up twice to do it. Anyway, the professional dancers were probable wearing as little as these girls anyway so it wasn't much different from seeing one bum in a thing to another.I politely declined when I was offered the chance....We were seated as close to the stage as you can possible get, although our view was sometimes restricted as hey project images onto the curtains, we still got to see the acts in all their glory.From Tron, Batman, Moulan Rouge to Queen and LMFAO, the cast put in full effort. Some of the areal acrobatic shows are amazing, especially Tron.Yes there were limited toilets for the VIP area, but I never had to wait more than 2 minutes or so. You can always go down to the toilets in the standing area where there are much more.A few people might try and sell you shots or photos, all you have to do is say no, it's barely even a hindrance. Was it expensive? Yes, nearly £200 for the both of us as a whole. But it was worth it (you are on holiday after all!) In 1 word, the experience was insane and you really do have to be there to experience he whole atmosphere. Our coach pick up was at 3.40am and we were wide awake considering we have been so jet lagged and going to bed at 11pm every night. If you have the money, definitely get the gold member tickets or risk standing in the crowd for 4 hours and being ice blasted from above whilst air aid sirens go off every 5 minutes.

Show was great-Best Day Package was not as advertised. The show was awesome. Unfortunately the VIP package that was sold to us that allowed us to skip the line was not what we received once we got there. We paid $70US/ea for VIP. Once we got to CB we were told we had to wait with all the others or pay an additional 10US ea. to jump the line and be on the floor. The BD people should know what they are selling and ensure what is provided is exactly what is sold. We purchased another trip at the same time (Tulum Ruins) and had the same result. Classic bait and switch-buyer beware.

Best place ever! . If you're in Mexico coco bongos is a must do! One of the most entertaining nights out you'll experience, I have been both to the cancun and playa clubs both amazed me. Real party atmosphere with stunning shows all night long! You will not be disappointed!

Amazing music, great night!. I visited coco bongos in playa del carmen monday with my two friends. We booked through the official sellers in our hotel & not through thomson... Because you get to stay there longer. We were picked up at 9:30pm & dropped back off at 4:00am. We had paid for gold member, which means we get to sit down to watch the show in a separate area, we also get waiter service. So we tipped the waiter once he gave us the first drink, which made the night good, we couldn't keep up with his drinks! The show doesn't start until 11:30pm and we got there for 10:30pm, so they play really good music including old music for an hour which makes the atmosphere good. The place was packed! Once the show started we loved it theres 25 different acts including: queen, Beyoncé, madonna, Britney spears, etc. Through out the show theres balloons, confetti and smoke being thrown into the air so the room looks great!
