To our suprise the Courtyard Studio Suite was VERY tiny and to top it off it was connected to another room, so close that we could hear EVERY word they were saying. I think they split up a large room to make the seperate bedroom a room in itself, not impressed! So we changed rooms and got a room on the beach and it was perfect!! We were literally steps from the beach, our room was the perfect size, little kitchen area, nice bathroom etc. The Suite was newly updated and the furnishings were newer but it didn't matter the room at the beach was MUCH BETTER! I like the hotel alot, it had a fun funky feel to it if you are looking for something different than an All inclusive. I would also have to mention that it is definitley for a younger crowd not for families. the Blue Parrot Bar/club is right there so that was convenient and the beach parties are the best! Also the Beach chairs are soooo wicked!! Good Guacamole in the beach restaurant/snack bar mmmmm...wish I was still there!

We were ripped-off during high season. I paid $2,000 for three nights at Blue Parrott Suites before Christmas. I was promised a living room with a sofa bed and two bedooms. Instead, we were given a kitchen with a bed in it and two bedrooms. I had to call and beg the staff for a lamp for the room. The air conditioner in my parent's room leaked on the floor constantly, an accident waiting to happen. I slipped and twisted my back in the water. The floor had to be covered in towels below the air conditoner. The jacuzzi never had water in it although the facility is only one year old. The flat screen TV in the center room never worked. I was told by a desk clerk there would be no complimentary breakfast, but the next day I asked a different clerk and was told it was served on the beach. It's just toast, coffee and juice, and if you ask for more for seven people, they bring you one piece of bread! I did not make a fuss at this place but decided I must let other people know that the managers of the Blue Parrot take their guests for granted.

Major Disappointment. My boyfriend and I stayed at this hotel last February and had a disappointing experience. From the pictures and reviews that I had gathered from the internet the hotel seemed exactly what we were looking for. When we arrived, we were placed in a second story room when I had originally requested a third story room. I had heard how noisy the joint could get and had also placed a "follow up" call to ensure that we had a third floor room reserved a couple of weeks prior to our arrival. Fortunatley we were only on the second floor for a night. Regardless of what floor you stay on, you hear your neighbors and the bar next door as though you were sharing one large open party house. If you want privacy, intimacy, or seclusion I would not suggest the Blue Parrot. If you want beachfront dorm style party accomodations, this is definately the spot. We also had many problems w/ hot water, room service, wake up calls, and message receipt (almost missed our Coba tour). We also had an ant problem (yuck!). The building is architectually stunning and the beachchairs are the best on the beach if you can snag one. Overall, I'd have to say the place was a big disappointment. Playa Del Carman is also incredibly expensive, I would highly recommend going all-inclusive, it really is the way to go. Check out the Gran Porto Real down the beach, it looks incredible and is also an all inclusive and the food looked amazing. We also did a thorough inspection of the Shangri La down the beach which looked SO peaceful in comparison to the B.P.

Depends on what you're looking for!. This was my 4th trip to Playa and we decided to stay in town instead of at one of the resorts on the outskirts of town. We paid extra for a beachfront studio and booked our trip through worldlinks. I called and spoke to a representative as I was struggling with choosing a place. I was going with a friend and looking for a place that was beachfront and would accomodate 2 - 3 people. The representative was helpful but I felt he was deceiving in the room description. I specifically requested a room with 2 beds. He told me the room was spacious and definitely had 2 beds. When we arrived, we discovered a relatively small room with one double sized bed in it and not much room for a spare bed. Considering that we were paying $278 a night, we expected 2 beds and more space. So unfortunately, our trip began with disappointment and the feeling of being deceived. I would not book with worldlinks again.The manager, Mercedes, was VERY accomodating and understanding. She tried to give us two rooms on the inside of the hotel for the same price. I was really pleased with how the hotel handled our disappointment. We ultimately decided to stay in the room and request an extra bed. The beachfront location was too good to give up. After beginning to unwind and get into the flow....we laughed when they brought us a blow up mattress that took up the entire floor space. They were out of cots or smaller mattresses. (We got one on the 3rd night) So..........If you want a total beachfront location and don't mind a smaller room, this is a decent place. ( We saw the rooms that are less expensive and on the inside of the hotel and they are fine but a little claustrophobic for me) The service was very good. Everyone was very receptive to any requests and tried to accomodate whatever needs we had. I agree with other reviews that it is epensive for what you get but if you stay in the beachfront units, you're paying for the location. We were steps from the beach and the water and I loved sitting on our balcony.As far as the noise, we did not have any problems with the noise from the bar. It does get packed but didn't impact us at all. The food was okay- nothing special. Overall, I'd have to say that the service was the best and if it's worth it to you to pay for a prime location, I would consider this place.

Loved It!. My fiance and I stayed at the Blue Parrot for our first trip to Playa Del Carmen and loved it. It was convenient to everything and the rooms were great. The balcony is a great place to lay around in the mornings before you head to the beach. The rooms are a nice size and they have a big bathroom. The service was pretty good too. We didn't tip the maid the first day because we were planning to just leave it all at the end of the week but our room didn't get swept that day. We left a couple of dollars daily for the rest of the week and didn't have any more problems. I think it was just our maid though, not a problem with the hotel because my in-laws left it all at the end and had no problems with their service. The waiter on the beach was happy to bring food and drinks all day too. Be sure to try the guacamole. We didn't go to the bar at night because it was too crowded but the rooms are seperated from it by another hotel so you were never bothered by the noise. Since this was my first trip to Mexico I don't really have anything to compare this hotel to, but we definitely had a good time and would love to go back.

Best dance club in playa del carmen. This club is the best dance club in playa del carmen!!!! At night my hotel I stayed at didn't have much entertainment, so my friends and I went out at night. We went to Senior Frogs and Carlos and Charlies in the same plaza and had an ok time. Then a worker at the hotel told us that the best club in Playa del Carmen was Blue Parrot, so we went that night. They have a cool fire show that last for 15 mins, and then played good american music. After that night I went back two more times! We had a blast their, not to count cheaper drinks than Senior Frogs.

Not impressed. I stayed a couple of nights at the Blue Parrot together with my husband and baby daughter in January 2005. The hotel is nice with stylish interior, good service and a wonderful location, but we were rather disappointed finding our room literally crawling with bugs (moths). The hotel staff were not able to do anything with the problem as we reported it (we also were not offered any discount in the price of the room, which we asked for), so unfortunately what could have been a very nice hotel experience to us turned out to be one of the worst during our holidays. The hotel staff did, however, promise that they would do something about the bug problem before they let someone new into the room. At least that gives us some comfort.

Superb Parrot. Went to Mexico for 2 weeks in April for my brothers wedding, went to the Blue Parrot many times and had a great night each time!Obviously the English relax a lot more when they're out for the night instead of complaining about a little sand like some of the Yanks!Recommended for everything who doesn't have a sand phoebia!!!!
OK. Blue Parrot is so packed the night I went it took me 20 min to get a Sol. Can't walk at all good music.

A great hotel!. My new husband and I stayed here in 8/04 for our honeymoon and it was terrific! We would go back here in a second. It's very open-air, not like a regular old closed-in hotel, and our studio overlooking the beach felt like our own private bungalow. The room was cleaned well every day, the drinks and food at the bar and via room service were very good, the mini-bar was reasonably priced, and we were never disturbed by late-night noise or music or anything. You're only 2 blocks from the main street in Playa del Carmen so it's perfect if you're a vacationer looking to see the city you're staying in rather than being cooped up in a resort.

Pretty Good Bar. I just got back from two weeks in Playa and went to the Blue Parrot Bar many times. Its location can't be beat with the dance floor right there on the beach. Also the fire dancer show is worth checking out.My biggest problem was that bar tenders tried to avoid giving me change on a few occasions. I think they assumed I didn't know the value of the various peso bills and coins. Be careful of that if you go there.

The BEST hotel in town...... First off Playa Del Carmen is a spectacular place to vacation and Blue Parrot Hotel is a great place to stay while you are there. My roomate and I, who are both 24 rented a room for 10 days for a little more than $100 a night. The rooms were very clean and nicely decorated and unique. There was a kitchenette and a giant poland springs type jug of water to drink and a hammock and table and chairs on the balcony. The staff was extremely friendly but all of them did not speak English, nor did I expect them to. Please be an informed traveler and learn some common phrases before you go down, otherwise you look like an idiot to all the other intelligent tourists. There is no pool -- but it's on the ocean so who needs one?? The hotel is located RIGHT on the water and one block away from the CENTER of Fifth Avenue where everything takes place. At night the bar at the hotel is hopping and it is within walking distance of all the other hopping places at night-- Carlos N' Charlies, Senor Frogs, The Mambo Cafe, etc. I do have to say that it is a major couples spot. There are so many romantic restaurants and cafes but it also wasn't very hard to seek out the singles scene, it can be done! We had an amazing time in Playa. I recommend taking the bus to Tulum. I think it cost like $3.00 USD opposed to the private tour that picks you up at your hotel to take you there for a day trip which cost $75.00 usd. Definately do your research and don't sign up for just any offer on the street. Rental cars are cheap and the food and merchandise all over town have great prices. There are internet cafes in town as well. Playa Del Carmen is a MUST stop if you are in the Mayan Riviera, NO DOUBT!

perfect wedding reception!!. The Blue Parrot provided the perfect romantic wedding reception! Beautiful scenery, great food, fantastic service, and a dance floor under the stars right on the beach. We couldn't have asked for more. We are definitely staying there on my next trip to Playa!

FABULOUS!!!!!!. The rooms were spacious and clean. The location was perfect! It's right downtown on the ocean near all bars and shops. The view from our hammock was amazing! the beach was clean and the most perfect color of blue. We lounged on the beach as Pancho served us beverages and food all day! Moon light walks on the beach to some great bars located right on the ocean. Only 8 beautiful blocks to Cozumel ferry. Best vacation we ever had and will definitley will be going back as soon as possible. Can't say enough about it!

5-star prices, 3-star locale. We stayed at the Blue Parrot in the first week of February, 2004. The one-bedrooms are big, sparkling clean, and comfy (with a wonderful bathroom and a shower big enough for two). The balconies are great, although the view could be better. The beach, however, is strewn with cigarette butts and bottle caps and there's lots of seaweed, both in the water and on the beach! If you've ever been to a real beach - or even a decent one - you'll be disappointed by the beach in town. And no, I'm not a snob. The pool is tiny but so clean you could drink the water. We loved the beach-front bar, esp. during Happy Hour (5-7 p.m.) or Ladies Night (Mondays and Thursdays, 8-11 p.m.). If you consider truly mediocre potato skins, burritos, or hamburgers to be "outstanding international cuisine" (as touted in the hotel's brochure), then the Blue Parrot's Restaurant is the place for you! If you're willing to spend $170+ per night on a hotel room, do yourself a favor and go elsewhere. By that, I don't just mean a different hotel, but rather a different town/beach. To the north and south of Playa del Carmen there are plenty of superior beaches and hotels which offer _far_ better value for the money. I wish you good luck on your search and hope you have a great vacation! Brian

Do not use car service. Place is well secured and has a great location close to the main street and on the beach. Would not use the car service. We waited for 1.5hours for the car to pick us up. Recommend organising alternative transportation means e.g. taxi.

pretty good but noisy. Encouraged by all the good reviews, just came back from a very nice week at the BP. It's really a dreamy location and the best beach is right there. Really nice staff but, just to warn you: 1. the walls are pretty thin and you hear your neighbors the entire time, as well as the happy drunks at 4 a.m. I only had one good full night of sleep there. 2. no hairdryer in the room. Which is silly for a beach hotel. And you have to request beach towels every day from an office. Would rather pick one up right there on the beach. 3. the hotel bar on the beach is not so good. The drinks are dreadful, cocktails made with canned juice etc. 4. The hotel employee who took our reservation over the phone offered to book us a "car" to pick us up at the airport for $25. It turned out to be $50. On the way back, we took a cheap $6 bus from the bus station a few blocks away that took us to the Cancun airport in 1 hour.But the room was really nice (large shower for 2) and the satellite TV was welcome on rainy days. All in all, BP is right on a fantastic beach, with a diving shop so you can go snorkeling etc. Great massage on the hotel terrace by a woman from Quebec, Martine. Close also to great bars and fantastic restaurants, that are not cheap (80% of L.A. prices I would say, if not 100%... Be careful, some of them don't accept credit cards.) No time share hassle to report at the BP. We had a great time all in all and I would still recommend the place - just bring earplugs.

Fun Enough. Because we were here in the off-season (Oct 16-20) the place wasn't quite the happenin' scene we thought it would be, but it was still one of the most popular bars in town, and it had a great atmosphere. We also really dug the fire dancing performances. The drink prices are higher than other places in town, and the normal music was American cheese, but for the location and overall ambiance it was enough to keep us coming back every night.

We loved the Blue Parrot and are coming back.. Blue Parrot is the best, employees couldn't be better. They all were great. The beach clean the room always clean. I can not say enough good about the employees and the Blue Parrot in general.

condo sales ****. Just back from Playa, and while the whole town is losing some of its charm tue to inevitable growth, the Blue Parrot has just gone to ****. They now bother with you with timeshares sales pitches from a guy names Tom, and the bar has ggone to total sleeze and commercial, good for kids, but not much else. Sorry to see what has happened, time to find a new destination.

fantastic location. We had multiple couples staying at the Blue parrot Condo's Cielo Tropical. We had a chance to look in rooms on all three floors and I found there was incredible views, not only of the ocean and beach, but of the building itself. It truley is incredible to be so centrallly located, and not to have to take taxi's and buses to see everything. HOT HOT HOT!Why do so many people stop to take pictures in front of the building. One word, Paradise.

Terrific value. My wife and I just returned from a week at the Blue Parrot Inn, Playa Del Carmen. the hotel is an exceptional value and perfectly located directly on the north end of the beach. From every balcony there is a side view of the crystal blue waters of the Gulf. our room was very clean and nicely appointed. Check-in and out was painless, and so were the rates. I have noticed a couple of negative reviews of the Blue Parrot floating around the internet. They are obviously from people who stayed n the Palapas. The Palapas are very rustic (roughing - it) cabins directly facing the beach. They are very inexpensive and you get what you pay for. They seemed to be primarily for young backpackers that would like a little more privacy than a hostel would allow, so if that is not for you be sure and reserve a real room in the hotel itself. Slight warning - do not take a "shuttle bus" from Cancun airport to Playa - they will make you wait until they have a full bus which could take hours.Have a nice vacation - Jay Kahan

Blue Parrot--An Unforgettable Honeymoon Fantasy in Playa del Carmen. When seeking a honeymoon destination on the Mexican Caribbean in late March of 2002, my wife and I were looking for something different from the insulative all inclusives and mega resorts that now seem to be the rule rather than the exception. We wanted something with personality-- a destination that was hip, comfortable and reflective of the local culture. Happily, we discovered the legendary "Blue Parrot" the funkily serene beachfront spot that started it all 20 years ago in Playa del Carmen. The accomodations cover the full range from charmingly rustic palapas to comfy studios with all the amenities just steps from the pristine beach. Wehn the sun sets on a long, lazy day of hanging on the beach, the action at the Blue Parrot's beachfront club begins. Although we were a "couple," we found the on-premise nightlife to be irresistable. The energy generated by the DJ's and the good looking Euro-flavored crowd created some of the best club culture this side of Ibiza. Best of all, when we were ready to turn in, we heard nothing but blessed silence. For someplace with this much personality, service and attention to detail was very buttoned-up. From reservation to check-out, performance was seemless; maid service, dining and assistance by staff in sourcing local side trips was top notch. If you go, be sure to look up Rick Jones, the original owner and a colorful character who still lives on premise and will tell you everything you ever wanted to know about Playa (and maybe take you kiteboarding if he takes a particlar shine to you!) The Blue Parrot truly was the best of all worlds--an unforgettable experience that will bring us back again and again.

Peaceful, Serenity. The Blue Parrot is a have to stop in Playa del Carmen. Right of the beach, the bar is filled with swings, hanging from the roof top. The beach breeze blowling in your hair , a Wonderful margarita and Peaceful swing.Very relaxing. My husband and I were there in Sept. 2001. There was relaxing music playing over the speakers,VERY ENJOYABLE for a afternoon. We stopped back one evening and a totally different seen. Loud music, lot's of kids. We really felt our age, but nice for happy hour.
Great visit!!!. Great staff and had loads of fun. Nando is amazing!!!!! Ask for him :) great ambiance and music is amazing!

Great looking club, no atmosphere, average music, all VIP areas. NO DANCEFLOOR. It amuses me how you can have a nightclub with no dance floor !!! The area is filled with a VIP area which is very dull and staff racing around getting drunk sales.Very disappointing indeed. We were really up for a boogy but if you're restricted to a corridor to dance in and given average music then no chance.Go elsewhere!!!!

Good place to be at.. If you like to dance and have a good time, this is the place to be. Palazzo has the recipie for a good night life time. A bit expensive, but again.. it's Playa del Carmen, so it is what it is.
Good club. Nando gave us very good service good music. Uriel and j Carlos were very kind nice spacious table and the drinks were very nice
Best disco in 12 avenue. Palazzo is the nicest disco and the only one with AC!! They have the best music and the workers have really good attitude, Mr Javier gives really good service :)
Fun place! . Really nice atmosphere, good music, good vibes and great waiters! Nando (our waiter) was awesome! If you're looking for a great time would definitely recommend this club.

Palazzo is the best!!. Palazzo is the one of the best nightclubs in Playa!! I went to this club with my friends on our senior trip and the night we went to this club was the best night of the trip! The drinks was great and employees made it a great experience. I can only hope I can go back someday!!
Best place ever . This place was great. Came into the club and got a complimentary drink . Fantastic!! Good service by Nando & Obama. They are the best waiters.
Amazing. The most amazing club in Playa del Carmen. Best music the service is the indescribable. The decor is nothing you seen before. Must visit for the best party

Woohoo!!!!. I attended a private all black party at this club with my travel group of 500+ people and it was one of the most amazing experiences ever! We were treated like royalty and the club is setup perfectly. The staff was so much fun. I even got some to dance with us! The lighting was perfect for our occasion. I will definitely go back to visit. Drinks were good too!!

So much fun!!. Amazing venue, good music, and the ice cold vapour is refreshing when the club gets packed :). We spent our last night in playa del Carmen here and had so much fun we wanted to extend our stay.
FUN. It is definily the third best disco in playa, it is a must during your trip. However, feels a little too small and uncomfortable at times. But overall is great.

Super nice place to party!. There is a lot of place to party at Playa but the Palazzo is WONDERFUL! Went there twice at the bar open. Service was wonderful and the party excellent with a bikini contest at the end.

On Calle 12 - Try it. Palazzo !
Maybe the best on Calle 12 - Especially for after party .. Music is good and girls are beautiful
You have to try it ..

Such a fun night out!. We went here on a playa crawl for a bschelorette party. It was great, with bottle service, fun music and entertainment. I would definitely recommend this club for a fun night out on the town.

Nice club in playa . I've been here with my friends (total 5 people).It's a nice club bigger that others in playa that are very small .We got a table in the dance room, spent around 3000 pesos so not expensive, similar other clubs. There are some dancers also and big screens around, and an area of tables few steps up on the dance floor. It's a nice club, lot of weird people you meet in playa dressed very bad you won't meet inside, instead there are many girls well dressed and quite cool. I had fun and I liked it.

Ruben Excellent Captain. I live in Playa del Carmen and every time my friends and i go to Palazzo Ruben the captain has always made sure our night was Amazing. I highly recommend Palazzo and if you go definitely ask for Ruben. Keep up the great Job Ruben Mendez and see you soon.

Had an awesome night. Great vibe and great music. The "capitan" Ruben Mendez offered me and my friends an excellent service. We spend our saturdat night drink and dancing. We had an awesome night. Hope you do too.

Trick on the bill, they stole our money. Even the club is good, is really sad to see how the people who run the place is so dishonest, my family and I went there and we don´t drink alcohol, except for one of my cousins, but we love dance and nightclub life, I know sounds funny but is like that. So when we asked for the total bill , that was just 100 mexican pesos , my auntie gave to the waiter 500 pesos bill, and then he came back with the change of only 200 mexican pesos, so immediately we said was a mistake and after a discussion they totally deny the fact they were stealing our money, they really didn´t care, my auntie perfectly said she had just 500 pesos bills and she wanted to change it for cash cause we passed by the ATM machine before got in the club, that was really bad, and it´s unfair for all the people who works honestly in Mexico, in my view was just a bad experience, but on my family point of view they don´t want to come back to Mexico anymore. So just pay attention when you pay the bills or better not to go there.
Great time in Playa. Great music and delicious mojitos! My only complaint would be the size of the dance floor, otherwise this place is awesome!

Palazzo's is Amazing!! . If you want an amazing night out in Playa Palazzo Disco is the place to go! Between Yoel and Alfredo we never had to ask for anything! The staff there is awesome and the atmosphere is beyond words! The first night was so great we went back one last time before our vacation was over!! If we ever head back to Playa we will definitely return!!

Definitely a most!! Excelent service. The club was awesome, the music great all night and the service way better than expected! I will definitely come back soon! Thanks a lot to our waiter Juan Pablo! Everything we asked for, he delivered fast and with a smile. Our night couldn't be better.

drinks and danceing. this was one of the hottest night clubs ive ever been in the music was and scenery was cool the had a cool show and we had a table Jorge and Noe was our waiters they are very good waiters would recommend them to anyone made me feel like jay z they would not let us pour a drink or light your own cigarette every time someone would ash in the ash try one of them would wipe it out I would give them both a 10 out of 10 with service. next time I visit mexico I will go back to this place agian

We'll be back, for sure! . My girlfriend and I went for a quick getaway and ended up visiting most of the clubs in playa del Carmen over the course of our trip. Our night spent at Palazzo was our last one there and we both decided it was our favourite. When we arrived, we were tired from a week of partying but the service staff helped us to get in the mood- before we knew it, the night had ended and we'd been dancing non-stop! I have to give a huge shout out to all the servers for making us feel comfortable and showing us a good time. Our main server was Oliver and I have to say, he was so professional! He paid attention to details and made sure we felt safe. When a drunk girl spilled our drinks, he had refills there for us within moments, despite the club being really busy. The only negative? The woman who took our money at the front door was super nasty to us- thankfully everything got better after that! Thanks to everyone for the laughs! We came home with memories to keep for a lifetime!

“This is a real night club in Mexico”. My coworkers and I went on September, Emilio was our host at the entrance he was charming person he introduced to the club and assign us a Table for all our group, our waiter William Perez take care of us all night long we had Open Bar and he always was one step of us, bringing tasty shots and long drinks without asking, after a while he already knows what everyone was drinking (that was impressive to me), the ambiance is magnify, nice sound, nice location, nice decoration, beautiful. ladies We want to go back!

great time. Very neat disco and cheap to get in for a cover charge. 7$ to get in and about 4$ per drink. You can also do the open bar for about 45$. Me and my cousin went on Mardi Gras night and it was wild. Music is great and the atmosphere was definitely not "sketchy."

Pretty good place to party.. I really like the interior of this place. However, I am FROM NEW YORK and been to places in NYC, and Miami so compared to those places, this place was OKAY. The music was outdated and not so popular. I did like how they did play some hiphop but maybe for Cancun was good. They played mostly EDM that reminded me more of a gay club in NYC.
FUN. Great nightclub; lots of international tourists and locals. VIP and bottle service is the best way to go!

Great night was had by all!. We attended on Thursday April 16th for a bachelor/bachelorette party. We arranged a deal at our hotel and had 2 vans for transportation, VIP area/bottle service access and unlimited drinks for $40 US per person. A great time was had by all. Great mix of tourists/locals and very upbeat techno/dance music all night. We got neclaces, sunglasses given to us and the bride and groom had congrats sent out to them on screen and from the dj. A great time was had by all!!!

Nice Night club. This is one of the biggest nightclubs in Play del Carmen, the ambiance is nice, the music is almost the same as most of other clubs play but service and vibes are good. Drinks are on the expensive side but expect so in a night club anywhere. They open only on the weekends and usually until 6 AM, if you want to party this is where you go late at night.

Super loud and expensive drinks but pretty fun after enough tequila shots. We happened by this place at around 10 pm and since we were a big group of girls, they offered us free admission before midnight. We are on the older side (see 40 year old bday party girls trip) so a free nightclub sounded pretty good since we all planned to go to bed by 1 am before turning into pumpkins. We came back around 11:45 and were all immediately deaf upon entering the club. There was no talking to anyone unless you were a skilled lipreader. It was at least 30% Mexican Bachelorette Parties and 20% middle aged super drunk Mexican guys. The rest was a mix, and although we weren't particularly attracted to any of the patrons it was nice to be in a club that didn't seem filled with American tourists. The the waiters were disarmingly charming and attentive and brought us quite a few overpriced beers and tequila shots. We ended up spending most of the night dancing on the lighted up platform and getting laughed at by Mexicans. There was a large mix of pretty terrible music from all genres including terrible house music, terrible latin music, terrible pop music and terrible rap music (actually that was pretty good.) All in all, with enough tequila, it was pretty good time. But that's true of most things.

Don't let the size fool you!. Smaller than most clubs in the area but the atmosphere is great. Very attentive staff..they understand the club busy and treat their patrons accordingly. An amazing mix of music!

Beautiful people and great mix of music. This is a fun nightclub full of beautiful people. They mixed English top 40 with house and a little bit of Spanish. It's a beautiful nightclub, and I love the staircase. I can't wait to go again.
Return time and time again. I think this is a great place. Service is very good, fantastic atmosphere, everyone always so happy. I visit Playa del Carmen regularly and each time always visit palazzo.

R3HAB concert... great time!!!. We went to the R3HAB performance at Palzzo with 6 friends. We paid in advance and got a great table on the second floor looking straight at the stage. the service was great and friends... not push or rude at all. Mexican's know how to take care of you for a great night out. we had a great time, the music was amazing and the price was reasonable. The place is clean and spacious. Definitely worth a visit for a good night out in Playa.
Small but fun. Was only in Palazzo for a short time.. But along with it's great location (Right in the heart of 12th), it is definitely very small, but was a lot of fun and has a great service team.
One of the best clubs in Playa. Great music, ambience and staff! And the serving of flaming tequila shots is absolutely spectacular!

So fun. This was amazing - never experienced anything like this before great music and great service. They were a little grabby over the tips which was annoying but we did have our own personal waiter.

Shake it baby!!. Well after being disappointed by the mandatory $75 dollar entrance to Coco Bongos... We jumped in to Palazzo and had a great night! Service was great...my wifey and I came in and began the critique ...comparing the nightlife in Ny we were pleasantly surprised by the energy in this place... We were entertained by a body painter....a nice dance set by some couple we met in the plaza earlier in the week...overall great night.... No cover no mandatory drinks and they gave my wife a free drink...only downside is smoking is allowed in the venue...boooo I would go again...nice mix of people....from families...to locals...vacationers good crowd..

Great place with great manager.. Was in every single club in playa del carmen and this one is really good the waiter and prices are great no problems at all i recoment this places to every one that wants to have a good time , good music look for paris he is a great manager with a great attitude thanks to everyone for a great time .
Feels like Vegas. Excellent bottle service, we were sitting in a booth, wich was perfectly located in the club. No waiting in line since we bought bottles and awesome service. Will go back !

from a perfect night to nightmare. we went to palazzo disco at playa, it started very nice , very good music nice people big nightclub, service excellent. we got a vip boot they told us we needed to buy 4 bottles to get the boot so we did even if all the others boots aside only ordered 1 bottle but thats ok we drank it. thats when it gets ugly...we order the tab the bill is 840$ we gave them a credit card to pay the bill, they leave and come 30 minutes after saying that the card doesnt pass blablabla. the start being very ruff, so we gattered all the money we have and it comes out at 875$, so we go see the waiter RAMONE and tell him we have 875 we will go to the hotel and come back to give you tip. he says ok gives me the money. i count another 2 times and he have 875$, he takes the money turns around and i saw him take a bill of 100$ and put it in his pocket and now comes back to tell me we dont have enough money to cover the tab. he calls all the manager and bouncer and wont let us leave the place. now we have a problem cause we dont cover the tab, they sent 2 guys with my friend to the hotel to get the money and they were yelling all the way down to the condo and we were stuck in the sofa not alound to move or even go to the bathroom. we gave them 200$ they said its not enough give more and more.beware of the staff look very nice at the beggining but are thiefs espicially RAMONE

Live music . Opened late...really good live music. Great bar staff, I requested a drink not on the menu and they made it up when I explained how! Impressed! Great selection of drinks. Convenient location. We will be back!

Rocking place after dark. We were invited by friends to meet at Kitxen on a Friday night. We visited a few other establishments before ending up at Kitxen around 9:30 pm. We found our friends and ordered a few drinks. The service was good and the beer/cocktails were priced accordingly as to our location on the famous 5th Av - north of constituents. The band was playing classic rock from the 70's & 80's. The bar - open area was a littler cramped and the dance floor is rather small. Maybe enough room for 10 people - somewhat comfortably.We never saw a menu. We spent time talking with friends and enjoyed the evening's cool night weather - being in an open area. My summary for what little time I spent at Kitxen: Would I return? Yes I would to at least try the food and see what the place looks like during the day hours. World I recommend it to family & friends? Yes I would. However, the night time atmosphere is geared directly for adults only. This Review was done by: You, Me and The Dock - Travel SiteLove, Laugh & Travel Lots

Quite romatic. As I'm sure many are, we were drawn in to Kitxen during a tipsy stroll down 5th by the live classic rock cover band. They were playing Queen, Stevie Ray Vaughn, Journey, The Eagles, The Rolling Stones and more great classic rock covers. We were singing along to every song, playing cards, and it was good times. Most of the seating was outdoor, and the chairs weren't super loungey, so it's not the kind of place you'll stay for hours, I wouldn't think. But overall, you'll get live music and good drinks, and I couldn't recommend a better way to spend an evening in Playa. Quite romantic feel!

Great people watching spot. Popular place with live music in the evenings. Perfect people watching spot and reasonable drink prices as well. Didn't eat but enjoyed the friendly and prompt service. Was my go-to pregame spot. Good times!
Great bar. Great little bar 241 cocktails 80 pesos each :) live band playing, the service was quick and friendly would definitely recommend.

Best Bar on the Fift Ave.. One of the best drinks with live Music ever in Playa del Carmen , the Band that Plays Sunday is soooooooooo God , you need to go to to have a Cold Beer and heard this Band .

Awesome daiquiris !. I love anywhere I can get a daiquiri and they don't try to force me into a damn fruit in it. Lime daiquiris all the way. 2 for 1 cocktails apparently til 7, but think we got them much later than that. Live music always makes us happy !

Great live bands and open to the street bar. . One of the best places to hang on 5th for almost three years. Consistently good. Excellent local micro brews, cocktails and really well sourced bands. A totally talented place.

Great music every night!!!. Had a blast every night we were here. Love the array of bands they have playing. Servers were amazing and remembered what my friend and I had from the night before. Will definitely be back!

Soooooo gooooooooood . My friend and I came here for drinks 4 nights when we were in playa del Carmen for the week, this bar is awesome! Good drinks, awesome service, best live music and hot servers. We had so much fun and we loved being here. So many good vibes.

Awesome place and great music!. We enjoyed our first visit so much we went back every night of our one week vacation! Shout out to Julio - we will be back in a couple of weeks - can't wait! Great music, staff and drinks :))
Fun Nightly!. We swung in for a couple beers and some music and stayed all night. Arnen was a great server and very polite. We will return!

Great place for some drinks with friends. Very nice place, friendly bartenders, good live music. Great place for having some evening drinks with friends. Place is not very big, and they don't have kitchen, but if you just about to have some drinks in good atmosphere, this will be the right choice.

Great Music, Excellent Service, Awesome Drinks. Staff are awesome - engaging and quick, music is very entertaining - this is a happening place for drinks, socializing and music - no kitchen here - parden the pun - popcorn and peanuts are all you will be offered... not known for the food, but the trendy place to be for a good variety of music, drinks and atmosphere! 2 FOR 1 Happy Hour runs 5-7ish.. Need I say MoreSpent many a night here with our friends of all ages!FANTASTIC!

Prices are definitely reasonable!. We partied here with some local friends one evening. This is an excellent location on Quinta Avenida. The band was very much entertaining and the overall atmosphere was great! Kitxen (pronounced kitchen) is slang for “love of things middle class." A celebration of the accessible. This bar is located in the heart of Playa del Carmen, right on 5th Avenue. An open-air concept, perfect for the amazing weather in the Riviera Maya, with plentiful seating and live music every night. The staff are attentive and multilingual...don't speak Spanish? Don't worry, they've got you covered. Sit back, relax, have a Mexican beer and a shot of mescal or tequila while watching the football game.

Great place to hang out but pretty small. The place was great, the bands were even better. However, sitting on the stools for that long was not the most comfortable - but watching the band to the end made it worthwhile.

Cool bar on 5th Avenue. Very surprised by this great little bar on 5th Avenue in Playa del Carmen. Lovely atmosphere, excellent service, cold beer and a good band playing excellent music. Relaxing and thoroughly enjoyable

The Best Bar On 5th!. Just spent a week in PDC with my girlfriends, and we spent 6 nights in a row seated front and centre at the bar! Live music every night is a big draw, beyond excellent staff who keep your drink full at all times, and prices comparable to all other bars on 5th. Love the cozy atmosphere and the complimentary popcorn! Highly recommend and would be back in a heartbeat!

Fantastic!!!. This bar is absolutely fantastic! Great cocktails, great staff, great bands, staff and people! I have had a fantastic time so much that I visited it almost every night during my 10 days vacation. The staff especially is amazing, super fun and friendly.Best place in playa!

Brilliant bar. We came across with this little bar when we were strolling around after the dinner. The band they had was so unique and amazing!! So many people like us just stopped in front of the bar and drawn into to sit down and have drinks to enjoy the music. We saw quite a few places having the band, singers, etc, but this was the best. Great night accompanied by great drinks!

TERRIBLE. Dont say you are pet friendly if you are going to kick people out for having a puppy barking! my husband and I were having a lovely evening when we ordered a second round of drinks, however the waiter told us he couldn't serve us because our puppy was disturbing the customers by barking..., I wouldn't have mind if he had mentioned it before or at least said something but to deny a paying customer and to be rude about it thats something I can't forgive. Before entering we asked if the place was pet friendly since its on fifth ave and lots of dogs are always passing by.. so next time if you have a problem with a puppy or any dog please say so and don't be rude to your other customers by kicking them out.

Brilliant little bar!! . We popped in here for a drink just for the sake of it as we walked past! The live music was really good, the staff were really good and it was so cheap!! 65 pesos for a cocktail! It was in a pint glass!! Can't complain at that!! Would definitely recommend anyone to try it out!!
OMG MUST GO. Have the flaming Lamborghini the best drink ever be careful not to burn your tongue enough said! This place is the bomb.com

Kitxen without a Kitchen. Yep, Kitxen does not have a kitchen. The only 'food' on offer is free popcorn or nuts. However, food is not why you stop by. The music is very varied but generally good to excellent. The drinks are good and priced about right for a bar that offers good music. We stop by pretty much every evening.The staff are friendly and attentive. Just don't believe everything Sergio tells you.....unless he is recommending a beer. Ocho Reales is a good one!

Disappointed. Holy cow this was an expensive stop on our walk. The music brought us to the bar stools, but the drink taste and the drink prices sent us walking after the first round. My strawberry margarita lacked taste so badly, that I cashed out before getting my 2 for 1!! The bartenders were nice, but next time, we'll keep walking!

Such a fun bar. I went to Playa in 2012 and fell in love with this place! We stayed one evening drinking the best mojitos ever, people watching, and listening to live bands. So wonderful! We went back this month, and it was not as enchanting. Still a cool vibe and good people watching, but I think the prices went up and the drinks weren't as good as I remembered. Still one of my favorite bars in Mexico, though. Always a fun, chill time.

Cosy bar, good ale and live music. We like British ales, and Ocho Reales brewed in Monterrey is the closest to our taste. Kitxen serves Ocho Reales, along with other ales and beers. The cool T-shirt wearing staff is very friendly. Live music with nice covers of famous rock anthems starts at 9:15 pm, so if you want a table, be there at 8:30ish.

Rude, bad service. I won't return. The service is very rude. Their tall bald waiter is rude and over charges. The bar tender is decent to your face but after I took care of the issue with him and tipped $50 after his az hole server tried ripping us off he sent out the second of a two-or-one margarita with straight mixer. There is a great bar about 4 blocks to the south on the west side if the street. They have live music.

Terrible Server. This place could be good if they fired the tall bald server. Music was good. Drinks reasonable. Service was b-r-u-t-a-l. First drinks were brought to us and then it was like pulling teeth to get our server to come over to take our drink order. we weren't ordering very two seconds we were leisurely having drinks and every time we tried to get an order in. We would seek out our server who was blatantly ignoring us. Our server was either sitting at another table or hanging out with friends giving him a massage. One of our friends had enough as we were trying to get our bill for quite some time and eventually had to get our bill for us at the bar. Luckily the only saving grace was the bartender who listened to us and seemed genuinely apologetic for the servers behaviour. He ended up giving us a round of tequila to try to make up for it. I wouldn't say don't ever come here. But if you get the same server - I'd move to another section.

Rippoff ! stay away !. I was there a couple nights ago with a couple of my friends ! and we were sitting at the bar ! the bar tenders were friendly ! but sometimes to busy to take the drink order ! one of the waiters took over our check , a tall bald guy ( the waiter ) he tough that he gas doing me a favor to bring my beer , the worst and most rude attitude . we had a couple more beers ! and on top of everything ! he overcharged me . this is a joke ! this people should get fiered ! if you go to kitxen and this guy is your waiter ! make sure you write down how many beers you are having ! this guy is a thief ! be aware !!

Nice bar if you like live music. This is a nice bar and different to many others in that has live music and with excellent location on 5th Avenue. Nothing fancy about it its open to the street very relaxed music is not too loud the prices are fair and it has a good ambiance.

Great music great mojitos!. They get amazingly talented bands. Friendly atmosphere. Always a great time! I have gone at least once on every vacation every year for the past 4 years and have always had a great experience!

"Cheers" in paradise! . This is a fantastic bar with great drinks and awsome service. The boys that work there are fabulous and totally knew us after the first night. We were in PDC for 15 nights and went there every night after dinner because they don't serve food. They have 2x1 cocktails from 4 to 7 pm, be careful cuz sometimes the sign is out that says 2x1 but they are not, but at $5 usd they are not outrageous at full price! Bring cash cuz no cards! The live bands are fantastic and play lots of songs you can sing along with, along with Spanish music and everything in between! Clean bathroom and a great atmosphere, the best bar in Mexico.........maybe the WORLD! Check it out for your self!
Great bar. Friendly, great live music. Drinks not expensive. Different bands on throughout the night. Bar staff happy to help and remember when you return. Just up from forever21

Local love. The best part of this little bar is the drinks, (particularly the mescal drinks with cucumber and chili, my favorite!) and the staff. The staff is incredibly fun and friendly. When I first moved to Playa, this was ome of thr first places where the staff embraced me as a local and were helpful with tips and tricks. Since then, I've visited and they remembered my name (unusual for such a busy place in a tourist town) They have live music from various types of artists, all of which I've enjoyed. Great little place right off 5th to sit, drink, and people watch! Highly recommend stopping for a drink ! (Especially the mescal!)

Great local place with great live bands. Cheap beer. Fantastic local bands (no cover, too). Friendly staff. What more do you need? Whenever we are in PDC we stop here every night. It's that good. Even got to see a fantastic impromptu guitar solo on the street in front of Kitxen last time we were there,. Wish I lived in PDC...this would be my "Cheers" if I did.

Great atmosphere and entertainment. We stayed in PDC for 5 nights and went here every night. We were drawn in by the band initially. We were made very welcome and were brought snacks (we had mentioned we were hungry and asked about food recommendations). We went to some other bars but always ended up coming back here.

Ripoff. Was there last night with 6 couples at 2 different tables. First couple to leave asked for their bill and was given a bill with 2 tables and 3 couples all together. Were then told iof you want separate tabs you need to tell them ahead of time, which we all did. When we decided to leave our bill was wrong - added drinks and so was the other couple at our table.e. Paid and waited 15 minutes for change - hoping we would just leave?? We have encountered this behavior before where they pretend the bill was just a mistake (3 time in a row). I hope this was just our waiter and not representative of the bar. We won't be back.

Live,Local....loved it!. We were staying close by ,Coco Beach, and went to Kitxen 13 nights in a row. No matter where we went for dinner ,we always ended up here for drinks. The guys recognized us the second night and welcomed us in . The place runs like a well oiled clock. Service is excellent, whether you are 20 or 50.Great prices, two for one drinks.The bands are different every night,all local bands. Our second last night the owner was there . Apparently he is a big superstar in Mexico...Saul Hernandez. He was performing a few songs. The place was crazy, the street filled up when he started to sing. It was something to see. If you are going to PDC,the north end, stop by for a drink,enjoy yourself. You won't be disappointed.!

Great bar that oozes cool.. When we last visited kitxen 3 years ago it left lasting impression on my wife and I. Kitxen is one of those bars that if you just so happen to be walking by then its stunning simplicity and live music will surely lure you in.We visited last Thursday to find an excellent band called La Colosio playing live on stage. Drinks were cheap and the service was excellent. Its a shame they dont serve any food because we had to pop across the street to eat but as soon as we finished we returned Kitxen.getting back to the band La Colosio the lead singer was so nice. she recognised that my 6 year old daughter was having a good time and so would momentarily come to our table mid song :)also after the performance they allowed my daughter on stage, gave her a microphone and posed for photographs. thank you for this.My only regret is that we didnt visit Kitxen more often during our time in playa, but once again this charming bar has left a lasting impression on us and i cant wait to return when next in Mexico.I wish we had a kitxen here in Britain :(
Get your Rock fix. Great place to grab a drink and listen to some rock music. Even had decent restrooms, which can be rare at some other establishments.
Great!. the 2x1 deals were great on the cocktails were great and the music was live and music i knew, maroon 5, coldplay.. it was a great bar!

Awesome bar. If you love live music and 2x1 cocktails this is the place to be. Always great live music 7 nights a week and great atmosphere.
People just stop and look at the happening bar . Cool place to be.

Really the best bar ever!. This place has got live music to offer. My friends and I call it "the Rockbar" because this is a rockin' place with a lot of tough musicians. But depending on which band and night it is there's a little bit of everything in genres, so the place suits whoever visits. The place has an unbelievable good atmosphere, and the staff has everything to do with it. They are kind and funny, and they instantly notice you're there.It doesn't cost anything to get in, and the prices for drinks etc are really good. So if you are looking for a cool bar you can actually sit and talk to each other in, Kitxen is the place!

Love it!!. If your a fan of live music then you'll love it here!Staff very attentive and friendly, they make you feel so welcome like you've been going for years! Yes they do only take cash no big deal just go to the cash machine over the rd!! Will definitely be making this our local again on our return next year! You guys rock!!
great music place. loved the band that was playing there. radio zero i think they were called. made a point to find them at wah wah on another night. nice bar - great music.

Music. Ok so back in PDC and it seems the 5th Avenue Live music scene has slowed down, however the still reliable Kitxen is still rocking it. Live music starts at 7pm with a warm up band or individual and then the main band starts at 9pm. Nine means nine, which we like. Drink prices are not outrageous and our favorite waiter, Sergio, is still manning the helm. Be nice and you will be rewarded with peanuts or popcorn. Shout out to newbie Jorge, way to sweat out the second set. Bring cash, Kitxen does not take credit cards. O and locals will try to sell you bracelets, local homemade treats, etc. Buy them, help them out.

Kitxen Rocks!. This is the place I run to when I get off work to relax, hang out with friends, get the buzz going, and then have the pleasure of listening to live music every night. I frequent this place about 5 nights a week and it has never lets me down. It's nice to have a place close by where I feel like it's home. Everyone who works here really know how to make someone feel special and are one the hardest working crew I have ever seen. This is the kind of place where you can form some amazing friendships as well with either locals or tourists. Definitely a great mixed crowd and not as clicky as some other places. I am really surprised by the lack of reviews and suggest if you have been here, to share your experience. The band starts at 9pm, but there's always happy hour from 4-7pm. See ya later at Kitxen!

Great live music. We loved Kitxen so much that we went there almost every night of our stay in Playa. There's a different band playing every day of the week, and most of the bands were really good. It's a really small open-air place, no food, drinks only. Friendly waiters. A really fun atmosphere and a good place to end a night out.

Loved it!. This place is a great spot for live local bands and people watching. It's not very big, but is pretty much open air, I don't recall seeing any food, and they take cash only so be prepared. The bands we seen were terrific, and the service was fine. As noted by others the prices were good and the beer was cold! Don't expect fancy and you'll have a great time! Oh, and the bathrooms were clean when we were there too!

There is always great live music and ask for Sergio!. We would stop there every night on our way home to listen to live music and enjoy some of the best people watching in town. drinks are affordable and the waitstaff (especially Sergio) are nice and attentive.

really enjoyed this place. Authentic mexican bar, great. unlike some people we are not lazy and actually walked to the bank to withdraw peso's so no credit card needed.we were walking by this place on a saturday in playa. its not much to look at but very authentic looking and so we popped in for a few drinks. we had young kids with us and this was not a problem for the staff. the live music was great and the beer even better. it was very cheap compared to other bars we had been in that night i think it was 30 pesos for a beer and non of them cheap gimmick glasses in sight.we shall definitely return .
Don't do it!!!. Crapy service, they don't accept credit cards. Go somewhere else and save yourself a bad time

best bachelorette! . Nicolás and Sol are amazing! The service is fantastic!!!!
ps. Don't bring medicines in your bag (even Tylenol will be taken away)

NOT SAFE ESPECIALLY FOR TOURISTS. They labeled us, verbatim, as "foreigners" as soon as we arrived. The staff there was extremely rude - not to mention, my boyfriend got held up in the bathroom and they took all of his money. One large bald security guard with a sleeve of tattoos and 6 other men came in to the bathroom and threatened him, so he gave them all the money he had in his wallet - FOR NO REASON. Plus, when we were ready to leave, they did not warn us at all that we were spending over our limit, even though they claimed they did. This place is not worth it at all. DO NOT GO THERE
Beautiful and Fun. This is just a great daytime activity. Packed pool full of beautiful people all looking to have a fun time. You really just cannot escape having a good time.

This place wants to be a Vegas/ Miami pool party sooo bad and charges more than they do!. Wow is this place a joke. I have visited pool parties all over from Mykonos to Miami and Vegas and was expecting to have a great time at Corolina's with my husband. We visited during October which is slow season in Mexico and while we read other reviewers saying this place was pricey no one gave specifics on what they were charging so we figured it would not be too bad since it was slow season.Wow were we wrong! It was $100 USD per person to get in and that goes for women too! Not even at the best pool parties in Vegas with famous DJs do they charge these fees to get in. They want to be a Vegas pool party so bad but they are in Mexico and will never be a Vegas or Miami pool party just a sorry imitation!!The door area was completely empty but they still would not budge on the price and would not let us at least go in and make sure there were people and good music. We paid and it was non-refundable and walked into an empty pool with the most annoying deep techno music. For the prices they charge I was expecting to see classy beautiful people but instead the crowd looked like something out of Jersey Shore. Pool is small, ugly, and completely in the shade. I give this place a few months before they drastically reduce their cover charges or shut down. In the meantime save your money and avoid this place!!
Great time. Had a great time! Try to get there early to get a better table or reserve prior if its not a busy weekend

Best Beach Club in Playa!!!. This was the highlight of my trip! Went to celebrate my bachelorette with a group of 12 girls and it was hands down the highlight of my trip! It was so great we went there twice. Jesus was awesome both times and made sure we were comfortable and had everything we needed. I would highly recommend you visit this place if you want to have the time of your life! If you are looking for good music, good drinks and an amazing time Coralina is the place for you. Thank you Jesus for making it an incredible vacation!!

Party Heaven......Middle of playa. Having attended day/beach parties all over the world. Toronto/Las Vegas/Miami/St Barth/St Tropez. I must say Coralina holds it's on. We arrived on saturday without any reservations and Hiram at the door was polite and king enough to hook us up with a day bed. The party started slow and ended with a bang from the food to the champagne showers the atmosphere was amazing. There is a great staff to take care of all your needs Melissa... is a great manager even inviting us out to other spots that which we unfortunately didn't make it too. Our server was trully amazing getting the extra umbrella's running around to get a me a hat. Luzz...thank you we had a great time with you and can't wait for us to attend again.Champage...guns............Amazing

The best dayclub in town. It's simply the best place I've been in Playa to kick start your vacations, if your into: pool parties, live DJ sessions and beautiful people all around. Great place to meet people and make follow up plans for later in the evening! The service y excellent and the party is just off the hook! Dare to pamper yourself and enjoy the best place to be...

Amazing! Definitely recommended . My boyfriend and I loved this spot! Only place in Mexico that had Moët ice rosè. Cool and realizing vibe. We sat on the beach, under our umbrella with provided towels. Food was delicious, 110% better than our all inclusive resort. Kevin and Sara attended to us the entire time and were extremely friendly and attentive. No complains, I give it 10/10. If you have expensive taste like us then this is the spot for you!
Fun!!!!. Manuel El Capitan took care of us! It's such a fun place the staff is amazing. Love was our server and she's so a lot of fun.

Best beach club in playa Del carmen. All is just great with this place, I was on a bacherlote with 10 friend and was the best idea. Music, peolpe, service and location is perfect for a party day with friends

Luxurious & Trendy Beach Club. As a Global luxury events management organisation from London specialising in the curation of bespoke events & impactful experiences for discerning corporate & private HNW clientele, we visited Coralina in order to experience the beach club first hand for upcoming events. Having visited, experienced and held a number of exclusive events at some of the top beach clubs in Europe including in Cannes, Monaco & St Tropez, we were impressed by the overall experience offered by Coralina which perfectly captures the mood, spirit and vibe of the global beach club phenomenon—and delivers it well to its jet-set well presented customer base. With glamorous, fashion forward guests in mind, Coralina is a striking addition to an already spectacular destination. As Playa's new kid on the block, the club boasts a contemporary design complimented by spectacular ocean views. Catering to guests of all palettes, the club offers an array of diverse food & beverage items from which you can explore the flavours of Mexico and beyond. The music takes you on a journey of international sounds from chill-out beach music to afternoon lounging to heart-pumping dance beats, this coupled with bottle service and stylish dancers makes for a fun experience. Coralina is a not to be missed experience in Playa Del Carmen. We look forward to returning in November with our large scale corporate group. Thank you to all of the staff for making our experience a great one particularly Lourdes, Octavio, Veronica (The Shisha/Cigar lady) and Lucas who was a gentlemen :) Muchas Gracias y nos vemos pronto! Noreen Thompson x

Pretty chill beach club on week days . We were at the club on a Monday. There was no admission nor minimum consumption requirement. We got 2 chairs and umbrella for ordering drinks and foods from the club. The staff was friendly but the food wasn't good. We ordered lemon pepper chicken wings. It's 250 pesos for 5 battered wings with lemon salt & peppers. Those were the worse and the most expensive wings that I've ever had. The drinks were ok and their prices were comparable to the clubs. Unlike other beach clubs, we didn't pay for the chairs and umbrella. I would come back again for the chairs and drinks but not the food.
Best beach club in playa Del carmen. This is by far the best beach club in playa Del Carmen, the staff is super attentive and they have very good food, all in a great experience

Outrageous. So we showed up today at 12:30 for the pool party and were told they were over capacity and unless we had a reservation we should try to come back in 2 hours.So we asked if we could make a reservation and the answer was no.We asked how much was the entrance and were told it was $100 US per person. Lol. We just came back from Vegas were amazing pool parties were between $0 for guestlists and $30 maximum with great DJ and ambiance.We sat at the Kool Club just next to it (that had music too and was free as long as you drink/eat) and were able to witness the party from the beach. Looked fun. Definitely not fun enough to justify $100 to get in.Stop taking tourists for ATM

Worst experience thanx to the Manager Manuel . Everything was perfect with the amazing service from Love our waitress but just when some friends were coming to join us, we let everybody know about their arrival to the place and Manuel after he heard from the radio that they were expected he treated them in a nasty way, with attitude... There was no need and the place was empty, we even have a bottle. Thanx Manuel, not coming back because of you!
Best day in Playa del Carmen. We had an amaaazing time !! It was the best part of the trip and Ayma made the perfect conditions for us to be confy and party !! Definitely going back!!
Awesome Experience . Great place and great service. Nicolas and Arnoldo did and awesome job helping our party. I recommend everyone to come visit this club. The ocean view is beautiful too!!
Coralina is Awesome . Coralina is awesome! Great place to chill & have fun with your friends!! Nicolas the waiter served us really great drinks. the food is really good , I like the sushi a lot !!
Loving life at Coralina. Atmosphere, drinks and service (especially Nicolas!) are all couldn't wish for anything more right now

Amazing place to go . I highly recommend Coralina if you're looking for a place to relax & drink during the day! The service is phenomenal, especially the waiter I had; Nicholas! Such a sweetie & made my experience so much better. Management is also very generous, and prices aren't bad! One of my favorite places in Playa!!

Best beach club in Playa. By far the best beach club in Playa! The music was great and the service was excellent thanks to Jessica, Fernanda and their whole team. We're definitely looking forward to go back.
DrinkAdvisor . My friends Arnorld and Pepe .. Know how to prepared a GOOOD DRINK.. Best a service and look for them! We are looking forward to come back to Coralina!
Fun, great atmosphere, kind service. Testy drinks, delicious food, great ocean view, DJ !!! Pool, all you need for a vacation day. Thanks Victor and Luna . See you soon.

Great daylight club. Definitely great for clubbing on daylight at the beach. Excellent service by Freddy. Expensive but worth it. The only one thing I have to say that it was kind of annoying for us, was that they had a group of millenniums on a tour that bother us a little bit, but maybe because it was Monday and I have to say Freddy made it all to change us to a better sun bed with out the millenniums at our side. In general is a fancy daylight club with great music and great service.

Must if Playa C.. Best option if you're going to Playa C. Good music, excelent service, food & drinks melissa was great with anna and manuel very nice one of the best places. A must if yo go to Playa C.

Amazing time on a beautiful beach !!. We spent a number of days at Coralina Daylight Club this past NYE into January 2016. We received excellent service and got to spend great days on an amazing beach. The music and atmosphere can not be beaten as they have great entertainment all day long. Love it and will be back again and again ! So much nicer than the beaches to the South.
Daylight club. If you are looking for a good daylight club, you should come to Coralina Daylight club.Ask for Melisa and Arnold! the best server here!!

Good times. It's always a good time at this place, especially when you have a combination of great music and great service. Jessica and Fernanda were super cool and made sure that we were always taken care of. Ask for them if you wanna have a guaranteed good time as well. Keep up the good work guys.
Rubens 40th's bday. When you visit coralina you ask for Mina ;) is the best server!! I had the most amazing 40th bday celebration. This is the #1 pool party in Playa. Don't go anywhere else.

Good music and drinks!. This is a bar on the beach with some serial levels of beds, rooms, seats and tables, each one more expensive than the previous one deppending on how far are are you to the pool. Service is good, music is good too without being great, prices are really expensive and the place is just average, could be a lot better.There were lots of drunk people and barely any security, prices were really high and seats in the beach felt like just any seat in any beach worldwide, anything special.
Best service . Best experience! The services is the best! The always ask if you need anything else and are always willing to giving the best tips of Playa Jonathan y Elena! Ask for them! Good service

Cool beach club . This place is clean and and modern. Very cool, and it's elevated so you can see the ocean everywhere. Music is great. If you want the best experience, get Gaby...she has the most beautiful smile and and is an awesome waitress!!
Awesome vacation!. The bottle service was amazing especially Gaby!Great music, amazing view of the sea and best service in Riviera Maya!
Great. Awesome people, incredible place! The hottest in PDCGaby help us with lotta love!!! I totally recommend here and her!!!
Gabby is such amazing . Coralina is the best beach club here in Playa Del Carmen but the best part of here is gabby, she was my waitress and she's such amazing, She's the best, I love her !! ❤️❤️❤️
Best waitress. Ask for gaby, super canadian girl. Best service in Coralina!! And also Jose Luis a very good wingman... Really grest place for a hangover recover!
Great Views x Service. Luis our beachside waiter did an amazing job taking care of our every request. The view was amazing and the service awesome to match.
Coralina. This is my first time here. Great for lounging and having drinks! The staff were all amazing, especially Nicholas, who was our server. Clean place and beach. I will definitely be back!
super!!!! great recomendation.. If you don't mind a busy place... cool music... pretty preople and paying for what are you getting!!! crowd, service and beach... great place to spend the day...

Best beach club in playa Del carmen. This is our second time in coralina and we are enjoying each time we are coming here, the food is really good and every time it's a great party. We have nice time - our waiter was Love and both time the service was amazing!!! Definitely we are going to come back here!!!

Best time we could ask for!. Went down to Carolina with the guys during a weekend trip. Our server Love was absolutely amazing, not to mention gorgeous. The atmosphere, music, and weather was absolutely perfect that weekend. Thanks for an amazing time Carolina!

Top choice. One suggestion though.... Excellent service, excellent place to go, maybe the best kept beach. But I have a suggestion though: it would be very keen of you if you to change for plastic washable cups instead of disposable cups. Contamination is a big issue in Playa del Carmen so you got to consider using washable cups instead of disposable plastic ones and also consider not using straws unless the customers specifically asks for them. About the service, Anna and Jose Luis really try to give the best recommendations in both food and drinks.

worth every penny!. Coralina for me is the best beach club ever to start operations in Playa del Carmen, they thought in every single thing to make your experience here unforgettable, from the paints in the way here (if you enter from the street) to the pool and the sun beds.
