And the service, I'm speechless, Ana & Jose Luis, make sure you ask for them, they will make your stay here super amazing, totally willing to give recommendation, I would recommend to get a sun bed instead of a beach chair, they have a "feet pool" so you can take the sand off of your feet if you decide to go to the ocean instead of the pool. The music is AMAZING!
Best beach club in playa!. Best beach club and ambiance in playa! Love is the best waitress ever! Ask for her! Super attentive and great service by everyone!

Best place in playa so far . This is not my first time at Coralina's and this is always my #1 place to be. Amazing vine with the best view, awesome music, excellent drinks and above beyond service, what else could you ask for right? Our favorite waitress is Love she's lovely and always smiling. 5 star place you all gotta go to!!!
Best beach club. We spent here 3 days here! Súper good service - Thanks to Love she was amazing! We really like music, food, drinks and pool! The best party for all vacaciones!! Thanks a lot!!!!
Excellent *****. I came on vacation in Playa and in the second day I met dafne in coralina - she the bedst one!!!Amazing service , a smile and a lot of love ...warmly recommended!
Best Dayclub in Playa. We had a great time for two days straight at the Coralina. Love was a great server both times and made our experience very enjoyable.... great view and great atmosphere!
El día. Say hello to my little friend!! With Anna y Arturo!! Excellence at service ... Best place @ playa !! The music is great and there's an awesome pool in front of the sea.

Best of Playa. The atmosphere in this place is amazing, which makes it really deserve a 5 stars rating. Alan was great, he provided us with an excellent service. Would definitely recommend this place and come back.
Thanks!
Coralina. Ask Arnoldo and Gaby to bring you the best drinks and finger foods in the caribean. The view is amazing, the music awesome..Just spend the day and enjoy it
Afternoon with the girls. Best beach club, best music and definitely the best service! Thank you Gaby and Arnoldo for the great time and for making sure we had all we needed!

The Best party in paradise. The Best place in playa. Go With Adriana! She is one of the Best waitresses at coralina. Great music all day. If you want to spend the day in playa and have an unforgettable party you should come and make a reservation!

Best beach club in playa del carmen. Incredible atmosphere, food and staff. I can't say enough. I pretty much live here. Office during the week and party on the weekends. Love LOVE my favourite woman there. You can't come to playa without checking this place out.
THE BEST!!!!!. Amazing service!!! Forget about Mamitas, this is the place to be!!! If you come ask for Yonatan or Victor, they are the best!!! Will come back tomorrow of course:)

Tier 1 Beach Club. Best beach club in Playa del Carmen. Love and her staff is super highly recommended. we likes everything, the food was amazing, we ate sashimi was amazing. thanks a lot, tomorrow we are going back here!!!

Amazing place with great service!!!. Great service with good people around you, the place has a really good quality, beautiful waitresses, good music and you can spend all day there having lots of fun.
Great experience and service! . Victor treated us very well, extremely helpful and attentive. Will def come back and ask for Victor. Exceeded expectations and gave us great recommendations.

Awesome Bachelorette!!!!!!. Mina, Emmanuel, and Jesus were amazing! After a horrible time at Mamitas, we came here and were welcome with open arms! Amazing bottle service! They even let me do a special dance for my bachelorette party! So nice, so sweet! Wonderful food and service!
There are better places that have style. For one drink maybe but there are soo many better places on this beach stretch. If you are looking for drunk people then you have found the right place.

Great place for a day off!. Came to spend my day off! Service is amazing, quality of music, volume and lay out are great!The manager Octavio Espinosa greeting everyone and making sure everybody is having a good time!A full experience not to be missed!
El mejor lugar de cancun. This place amazing best party ever don't miss this place in cancun playa Del Carmen Crazy party best ever coralina is amazing Luis and Andre are sexy

Great place to Party . This place is great to party.Arrive early because it gets really crowded and it gets harder to get in. In spring break it gets crazy, the music is really good, staff is great. One of the best days of my trip.
The best party at day . It is an excellent place to start the party in Playa since noon. I enjoyed it very much, Erick the waiter gave us the best service in long time.

Fabulous way to spend the day at the beach in Playa!. My boyfriend and I were just walking down the beach, it was a weekday so nothing major was going on, but we weren't looking for one of those places where you have to pay for the bed and bottle service, etc....however we wanted to take a look at the place because it is new, since we'd lived in Playa and it looked really cool.We went in and got a great bed, no charge (of course as long as we buy some food and drink which is what we were planning to do anyways) and the menu was varied and a full list of all the cocktails you could imagine (which were made to perfection!) and overall delicious food and drink at a nice value for the money too. I was pleasantly surprised! My quinoa bowl with veggies and tofu was super fresh and delicious. The wait staff was awesome. Very attentive and friendly. What would have been a quick stop turned into several awesome hours...oh, and they played fabulous music too! Great DJ that came on in afternoon. We had a blast. I will go back. And I highly recommend it!

Best choice for daylight partying. Coralina is a great choice, it offers good music, pretty hosts, delicious food and a wide variety of drinks (by the bottle or by drink). They asked us for a minimum consumption of $700usd in order to get a table.

Not sure I get it. I will start off by saying that at the upper end of my 40's, I am not likely the target demographic for Coralina. This is definitely the new place in Playa for the pretty and pretentious to be seen. Cabanas - check, bottle service - check, faux exclusivity with "reserved" signs on beds that were never used - check, gogo dancers - check, expensive chair prices - check, loud techno music - check. The beach in this area is great so I actually could have cared less about all of that silliness if the food and drinks had been worthwhile. The drinks were ok and prices about average for this type of beach club. The food however was the real letdown. I ordered a fish ceviche which is one of my favorite things to eat in Playa. The fish in the ceviche was still mostly raw and their version of ceviche is made with mayonnaise. Unfortunately, it was awful. I can't recall what my friend ordered but she didn't enjoy her meal either.Good thing that there are many options for beach clubs in Playa and something to suit every taste. This was definitely not ours!

A delightful way to spend the day at the beach. The beach this year was great. The seaweed invasion from last year is gone and Coralina has anything and everything you might want at the beach.This is a club. During the weekend, it can be expensive to park your butt on this stretch of sand, but it's not Mamita's ridiculous and ostentatious. My wife and I went to Coralina during the week with some friends. We're too lazy to carry chairs, so we parked on two lounges with an umbrella. There was no fee but there was a $500.00 peso minimum per person. A few drinks and some food takes care of that.The wait staff is young, energetic, polite and good looking. Most of them have sufficient English skills to get the job done for American and Canadian tourists. Food is delivered in boxes to help keep the wind blown sand and the seagulls out of your meal. The menu is eclectic and includes burgers, sandwiches and sushi. I got the spicy fish roll. It came with tuna and salmon and it was spicy. The fish was fresh the portion was large. It was delicious. I also ordered french fries. I like my fries on the crunchy side, especially compared to the Mexican standard of slightly under cooked and mushy fries. The waitress did not understand "extra crispy" but we worked through it. Asking for them "cafe" was the ticket and the shoestring fries arrived with a beautiful golden brown hue and a little snap when you bit them. Among the best fries I've had.I was also pleased to find a few good Mezcals at Coralina and my wife enjoyed the wine.The club's activity/rental booth was off to the side. A banana boat, jet ski, power board and other toys can be had for a fee. There is no pressure and the workers do not come about soliciting business. The club has music starting in the afternoon. It can be loud up by the pool, which attracts the young, muscular, bucket-of-beer crowd, but on the beach it is pleasant background noise. At one point in the afternoon, the music got a little louder and two attractive women in small bikinis and high heels danced on the wooden platforms and steps. Yet, there were no sloppy drunks, no screaming guys with backwards baseball caps and no creepy old men filming the dancers.Coralina's is a great way to spend the afternoon at the beach.

This is a Lovely Place with Cool Vibe. We spent the day at Coralina Daylight Club which is open to the public if a minimum is spent ($50,000 pesos). We tried entering the Club from the street, however, we were turned away by the security guard stating we must enter via the beach (dumb). We have no problem spending the minimum for food, drinks, comfortable chairs and umbrella. The Coralina Daylight Club has great food, their prices for alcohol are reasonable and the music was fabulous. The beach and location are great and our wait staff, Florencia, did a super job. I hope this place stays awesome and great and doesn't turn into what Mamitas has turned into. This bright and pretty Daylight Club is a great addition to the Playa beach scene. It's a wonderful place to spend an afternoon. Thanks, Coralina Daylight Club.

The best place in the Caribbean!. This place is awesome!!!! Music, food, beautiful people!!! also the staff is so cool! if you ever go there ask for Luz! she's the best staff working there! Thanks Luz and Coralina club!!!!

The best beach day club in playa! . Great music, pool, beach, food, drinks- the whole experience, very high class day club it's the best way to spend the days in playa, above all was the service, we were lucky to be hosted by Love who made all of the above happen, thank you dear Love! You are one of a kind...

Quick Drink to Check Out the Place. Stumbled upon this place while attempting to enter the new Hyatt. Staff encouraged us to come on in...Much more for the younger crowd but was a very nice place. Wait staff was attentive as well. More the club type crowd. Had private cabanas for rent and was overall a fun place.

Great Music, Great Service!. This is currently the best beach club in Playa Del Carmen. Food is way above average, Music is good, and service is amazing. Luz was our server, she was very attentive and helped us really enjoy the day!

Perfect for a group. We were shuttled here from our resort and it turned out to be a fun place. Many servers and the food was very good. No beach vendors to harass you. the staff were friendly and helpful even though English seemed moderately understood.

Very busy, great beach and service. Seems to be a great hotspot for the younger crowd. Very clean, well kept, great service. Not sure about the jet-ski rentals, but they were right there in front of the property. Would have liked to have seen some shops on the property, and I wasn't comfortable leaving the property as I've never been to Mexico before.
Cool!. Music is cool, food is great and drinks are always welcome. Fun and exclusive. Octavio treated us amazingly and the service Ramses gave us was top notch. Can't wait to go back.
Barchelor party. Eliana was awesome, good service, she was great with us and we definetly ask for her next time. Also michel was at the table attending us, ask for both
Awesome place!. This was by far one of the highlights of my trip! I had an incredible time and my waitress Luz was extremely kind, fun and provided excellent service. I will most definitely be back!

10,000 PESOS FOR A BEER!. My husband and I came today to the Coralina and were SHOCKED !We ask the staff where can we sit. They explained that we can either sit on the beach for a 1000 pesos per person or at the bar for no less then:10,000 pesos (!!!) . We obviously asked to sit on the beach for a 1000 pesos that was also very pricy but we we're wiling to pay to enjoy our stay there. BUT that option was not an option apparently!The staff told us that the only places left is on the bar and around for 10,000 pesos. this was definitely a negative experience we won't forget and will not recommend it at all. SO IF YOU WANT TO SPEND 10,000 PESOS FOR A ONE BEER THIS IS THE PLACE FOR YOU!

I don't get it, maybe I am too old?. If all the cars you own cost over $250,000, if all the watches you wear cost over $20,000, if you like expensive champagne and name brand vodka by the bottle, or if you want to look like you have all this, then this is the place for you. Male and female go go dancers, in bathing suits, dancing on stands?They have beach lounge chairs and umbrella's on the beach, and day beds and tents off the beach, all with a cost, or minimum spend. Although this is on Hyatt property, it is not part of the hotel, which can be very confusing for Hyatt guests. I asked one of the Hyatt employees about the club, and she suggested I go and look around. She even walked my wife and I to the front of the club on the beach. Both my wife and I had plastic cups with about an inch of diet coke in them. When I took one step into the club (which probably had about a dozen guest total) I had two waiters jump in front of me one with his hand in my face both saying "NO OUTSIDE DRINKS!" I said I was a guest at the Hyatt, and we just wanted to look around. Once again "NO OUTSIDE DRINKS, NOT EVEN WATER!" I think this is going to turn off a lot of Hyatt guests.To sum up my opinion let me add a quote from a review on EverythingPlayaDelCarmen.com "If you go here make sure to take your Prada and Gucci because everyone else will be wearing it. It is a place to be seen and see others. Enjoy the atmosphere here and music and if this place is too over the top then try Mamitas Beach Club."

Fancy & Stylish Beach Club. This beach club is located inside Hyatt Hotel. Perfect for bachelorette parties!The food is average, the go go dancers are beautiful, is not cheap, so be careful with your budget. I prefer this dayclub instead the crowded Mamita's Beach. The music is pretty good!

Good place out of the fancy clubs . I usually visit this bar very often I like the music, price and the good service.
I recommend mojitos and a good cold beer!
$

Decent bar but not #1 or #2. I do not have anything bad to say. Easy to find and open plan on first and second floor. Music was good. I was surprised it was ranked #1 - I thought Sentenera was even better (atmosphere). No cover charge. Drinks are reasonable.

Great Bar. One of the first bars I got to know in Playa del Carmen and since then I went there almost every night.The prices are cheap compare to other places around Playa and the place just makes you feel like you wanna stay more, there's the bottom floor where you can sit drink and there's the rooftop which is the best where you can grab a drink chill with your friends or even alone, the music is really nice, not too loud so you can have a talk as well, for smokers you can smoke upstairs and if you feel like there's also enough room to dance. I really recommend this bar I enjoyed every single time I was there.

Good drinks and vibes. . Visiting from Miami and would say best prices compared to other spots around it and of course good drinks... Would definitely recommend. I recommend the Long Island or flying octopus.

Cheap drinks and good music. I found this place when I was her last year. My school, Solexico, had an event here on Wednesday nights which was quite fun. My favorite drinks are the Pink Lady or the Mojito!
Best bar in Playa. Such a wonderful venue. Great service. Friendly staff. Has an amazing dance floor upstairs where you can let your hair down and never fails to impress! ✌️

BAR FRANCES EN MEXICO. Its the best bar in Playa Del Carmen. The drinks are very cheap. The place is very good and they play good music. Its also a nice place to meet people. The staff are very friendly.

Cheap cocktails. This place is good to start a night of partying with some cheap 0,5l and 1l drinks. You can still taste the alcohol in your drinks. We had some free shots, but it was just like eating ice. Not sure what was in it, but hey a given horse ... .
Having fun here . This is the best chill bar to drik something and have some fun. I will recommend you if you want to enjoy the night talking and drink a nice margaritas
Huge drinks close to 5th avenue. Hey, this place is spectacular. Just grab one litre drink and head to the beach. You will no regret it! What a day, hot beginning and chilly finish.

Drink. Awesome!!! 1 litro drink on hot day after loooong trip..... this place is so close to fifth avenue in Playa. Go get something nice for you: rum, vodka, tequila, you name it!!! And go to the beach.

Best drink ever. "Miami Vice" it's the best drink in town. Nuff said.
This place has great music and the prices are great. You should definitely come if you are near!
1 Litre drinks!. Great spot to stop and grab a drink while walking along 5th. 100 pesos for a one litre drink, can't go wrong with that!
Woot woot! . I went as a prestart to my birthday night and it was a great way to behind a night. Litre size drinks!! I'd recommended doing this with your friends!

Great little bar just off 5th. had the best time! Check it out!!!woot woot Party on wade!! They serve drinks by the litre! It's a great way to start the night.

Party time. I mean - a free drink is worth 5 stars. I like the fact they have football on, it's a shame that Nicholas cage is doing Coke in the back but other than that it's a wonderful experience
Excellent!. I loved the dove drink! It is delightful, tasty! Excellent place. I recommend this place to relax and take. tasty drinks!!!

Great DJ and great place to start off !! Great vibes around definitely recommend this place ... Este lugar es bien ching. Awesome place !!! Bartenders awesome !!! Diego also awesome este lugar es bien !!!! From New York City and loving this place ,!!! Diego an awesome bartenders definitely great vibes
Great little bar. Right in the heart of playa. Great atmosphere, always pumping. Come here for a good time. Cheap drinks, try the mojito!! Recommend ++
Great vibe . Great bar good atmosphere, had really good music drinks we're cheap and cocktails tasted very good, best place to go in playa
Excelente lugar!. Excelent place to get some drinks and fun! The best in playa del carmen! If you want the best mojitos in the beach you hace to come here.
Best Bar in Playa!!. Friendly bartenders... Cheap & and cold drinks! Definitely a place to stop by on the way to the beach or after dinner!!!!!
Huge. Great, 60 pesos per cocktail, we had fun! We will come back I recommend it to all the tourists, especially students coming for spring break
Amazing bar!. Great cocktails, good vibe, great staff. We had thé best time, one of my favorite bar in playa del Carmen!

BIG cocktails!!. Great place Great serves!!! Very good value for Money .
Nice atmosphere, good music and nice vibe.
Definitely worth a visit, check it out!
Something relax . Nice chilled place having fun enjoying de night in the Maya Rivera Twp story good music good vibe third visit
Very cool place. A must visit bar on Calle 10 playa deal Carmen, such a different kind of bar of the main Quinta avenida, not one to miss on a good night out

Great music and cocktails on a beautiful rooftop. I ve found this very nice music bar on a saturday night. The place is cozy and the music with dj set is amazing. Very high quality cocktails for a good price and nice people all around. I came there again the day after with my girlfriend. The place is right in the middle of playa del Carmen nightlife. Wow!!!. I love This bar! It's amazing! Endless perfect Cocktails! ;-) i'm coming here since few weeks and it was great every time :-) 100 percent Fun!
Awesome. Great bar to start your night out! Welcoming and friendly staff, good music, cheap drinks and happy atmosphere!! I recommend it!!
Night out . One of the best bars in playa del car men, came here my first night out and had a great time. Staff are awesome, drinks are cheap and its overall a great atmosphere
Christian . Best bar in playa del Carmen, cheap drinks. Everybody come here to start and meet new people. And the staff are really nice and friendly!
Estupendo. Great drinks and atmosphere. A must when in Playa Del Carmen! Cheap drinks by the liter. The Pina Colada is a winner every night
Great bar!!. Awesome music and vibes!! Had a really good time with friends and the drinks were really good. I recommend the long island ice tea! Staff were very friendly

Missleading costumers and reviews, giving free drinks for 5 star reviews. This place should not be listed at high as it is reading other reviews I see why, they give free drinks for 5 star reviews they even had a sign at the entrance of the bar. No wonder why the have good reviews but is just a dive bar with very cheap alcohol. Dont expect anything more than that and you will not be disapointed as I was.
Party!!!!. Best drinks in playa Del carmen. Come here and get your drinks before hitting the bars. The drinks are made strong so come thirsty ;-)
Cool lugar!. Really liked this place for late night drinks! Easy to order and no hassle :) ... They're open late so no need to worry
Great night out. This place was a lot of fun! Cheap drinks and good music! Great end to a super fun night - would definitely recommend it to other travelers

Had the funnest time with my husband. Best drinks prices in playa del Carmen. Awesome place to pregame, good house music by an actual dj, I would really recommend this place to anyone! Come in and get ur drink on!!! Whoop whoop!

The best night . This place is just awesome, you can get 32oz drinks for 5 bucks, seriously! The music is very good and you can get the cool-latin vibe if you are here as a tourist, this is a must-go to feel like a local.
Love it. Its a very nice place to grab a drink. I love its lively atmosphere and its people, and its very price accessible.
Asome visit. Is the most funny and cheap place in all playa you have to came and try one of your famous drinks (i already drunk and im looking for more party here)

Not too big but really nice. We have been here on Christmas Eve and it was an amazing experience for us and our group of friends. They had some fans to keep you cool too! The people at the bar are friendly and helpful.
Aiaaia the best bar. Since the first time in this bar.. It gave me the best time ever..... What a crazy loco bar. The best drinks

Great bar! . Inexpensive and great bar! Had a great time here. You can buy a liter of alcohol and walk in 5th without any problem! Music is fun i really recommend this place to start your night. Good service! No CC though.

Lovely and chilled place in a touristic area. We randomly found this bar and was our safety! Bored to be in places where we couldn't even speak with each other this was exactly what we were looking for.. really nice and cheap Mojitos and Diego the bartender is really fun and friendly!
Great bar. Awesome litre cocktails like mojitos, Cuba libre and sex on the beach for really cheap. Good vibe and right on the strip, highly recommend
Good cheap bar. It's really great. Very cheap litre drinks. Does the job. Convenient - close to the centre of town. Good place to start the night.
5 star! Go here. Go here. Great night! Very cheap litre cocktails including mojitos, Cuba liber and pins colada. Does the job! Highly recommend
L'ambassade . Great place, great music. Came out with a bunch of friends from the hostel. Definitely a good night with some good drinks! Cheers

Misleading reviews. Yes, they have cheap drinks with lots of alcohol (so they don't really taste good, but they will get you wasted) - thumbs up for that.
However, they do not deserve 5 stars on TripAdvisor, and the only reason they do is because they offer people a free drink if they give them 5 stars (see photo)

Misleading reviews. Yes, L'ambassade give you cheap drinks with lots of alcohol in them (so they don't really taste that good – but will get you wasted). Thumbs up for that!
But the actual reason everyone gives them 5 stars on TripAdvisor is to get free drinks (see photo).
Pretty cool. I came to playa to have a good time and then I found this place. As Robbie Burns said though , " the best laid plans of mice and men...." :)
Cocktail bar. Very delicious drinks and amazing people. The atmosphere is nice and the music very good for chilling and also partying.

nice pre-party place. I have never seen such a cheap alcohol with so big amounts! Margaritas are not bad, especially when you see them in one litre jug. Already when you look at them you feel that it is not the last one and the night is gonna be a lot of fun. Other cocktails are below average, but who cares after 2 litres of margarhitas? The place is always full of people the atmosphere there is very warm, so overall feeling of the place is quite positive. It's a nice place to start the night, gather with friends and then move to la santanera, for example, which is next to.
Very good!. The best place in playa! Good latin music, the best xl mojitos and nice peopple. Will try to go there every time when I want to have predrinks..
Estupendo!. Nice to be in this place. Especially with a 1-litre cocktail! One night we went when it was raining like hell. Outside the world was going down, inside we went to heaven...
Great drinks! . Come here with a group of friends...lots of fun and great Litre drinks at a good price! Great, quick service! Good music.
Chill vibes . Chill atmosphere at a rooftop, with house music and 1 liter drinks for a good price. Nice service as well! Great place to cool of when the heat gets too much!

Great local bar. This is a bar on 5th ave. Great drinks, friendly bartenders. The owner is there most of the time to make sure the customers are satisfied. Must go to for a chill night with good strong drinks and music.
Always great. We are coming here with our language school several times during the week. Half a liter for 45 pesos and 1 litro for 70 pesos. It's super cheap and very chilling on the sofachairs.
Best bar in playa! . Great drinks. Friendly staff!! Cheap drinks. Free shots. Best bar in playa! Pineapple fizz is amazing. Can't beat this bar.

Great place. Cheap drinks. . Amazingly cheap drinks just off 5th avenue. We arrived and all ordered a drink, the team at the bar then bought us a whole bunch of shots which we couldn't turn down!
The beats were great and the drinks were cheap. Would recommend this place for any person looking for a fun place to hang for a bevvie!!

Local hangout with inexpensive drinks. This is a very local bar and it is casual. This is where people come before going out or just to have a drink with friends. They have expanded the upstairs and have a DJ. The cheap liter drinks are the draw.
go there. fun, good for starting the nigh or meeting with friends. drinks are good and beer is fairly priced. fun good place

Great time. Excellent cocktails with good music. Dance and party the night away. Drinks are strong and the prices are reasonable . one of the best in playa Del Carmen. Get there and have a great time.

Huge selection of cocktails! . They have a huge cocktail menu, starting at 60 pesos which is so cheap for a litre. Nice staff and atmosphere too. Centrally located and surrounded by good restaurants, perfect after a few cocktails!

Fantastic drinks and service!. Fabulous little bar;drinks are delicious,huge and cheap! Louis is a fantastic guy..took great care of us! Ended up here 10 of our 14 nights in Playa,even if just for 1 cocktail before supper.Warm atmosphere,great music,and good people watching spot.Will be back in the fall.Highly recommend!
Nice place to hang out! . 1 liter mixed drinks (many varieties) for 55-65 pesos. Luis is the man! My wife & I went 3 of our 4 nights in PDC. Would recommend!

Strong, Cheap Liters. Go to L'Ambassade before your night out to load up on cheap alcohol. For less than $10 USD, I was all set for the rest of the night. They offer huge liters of mixed cocktails, and they seriously fill it up with liquor. This small dive bar has two floors: a sitting area and bar downstairs, and a small open rooftop lounge upstairs.I didn't see any signs regarding the free drink for 5 star TripAdvisor reviews, but then again I may not have been paying attention.

Lambassade. This is the best bar in Playa Del Carmen. The drinks are cheap. You have to try their Michelada it comes in many flavors. One oof my favorites is Mango Michelada. The mix tequila drinks are also goods. The Diablo is one of my favorites.

Perfect place for drinks. Good and reasonable prices for the amazingly nice drinks. good! You will find a lot of other places that are waaaay to overpriced and not even close to so cool staff, nice music too! Our favorite, 1L drinks, 5-6GBP
Good cheap drinks . Come to lambassade if you want pro drinks at discount prices. The liter mojito is well worth it. I got wasted for 2 for about 25 dollars
Ambassad. Very good place. DrinKS are cheap. Just cost 55 pesos for one liter of vodka or others alcool like whisky. The staff is very cool and nice. And there is a lot girl

Great 1Liter cocktails !. Full menu ( customized like a French Passport) of cocktails in a very international and trip atmosphere at great price!
Nice clin d'oeil for the travelers.
Great staff !
norwegians loves it. had an awsome time here,cheap drinks and good vibes! the people working here is really nice and the DJ is AWSOME! me and my friend loved her and the rest of the people here!
Best bar in playa del carmen. Good bar with a great DJ! Cheap drinks and good vibes. Had such an amazing time at this place. I really recommend this place for friends and couples who wants to go out.
Best bar in playa del Carmen. It's one of the best bar in playa del Carmen for me. The drinks are cheap, I usually go here before I go to club. So, I highly recommend this bar . :D
Really fun bar with cheap drinks . This is a great bar to get your night started. They have cheap drinks and it's a good place to go before heading over to La Santanera for the late night party.

I can't believe you people are falling for these reviews!. Was at this bar... It's a small dive! You get a free drink if you agree to write a 5 star review on tripadvisor! I can't believe more people aren't reporting this on here!
Good drinks not fancy place.. The drinks are good and prices are quite low compared to other bars in the area. It's kinda hot because they only have fans no a/c but good drinks.
Great place!. Great place, wonderful atmosphere, good staff, good cheap tequila, would come again, came her with some good friends. Fly? Si, fly!
Hello. I really really love this place!!!!!!! It's great for shots!!!!!!!!!!!number one favorite of all time!!!!!!!😍😍😍
Excellent place. Non expensive place with great service, good beats and amazing vibe. If you are in Playa this is a must to visit.
Ricky G. A wounderful place for a drink! Located in the heart of Playa, Friendly staff and great service :) would recommend.
Best place to enjoy a cold beer. Close to the party street and a little more quiet. Good music and vibes, Nice staff. Best place to be if you are not 18 on spring break. Ill be back for sure!

Its very fun Its very fun Its very fun Its very fun.why is nobody here everybody should go here especially if you are european because it is owned by a french person so that makes it continental I am from England and it has a great atmosphere come on come on everybody from France and Europe should be here a taste of home!!!!!!!

The coldest Coke in town. This bar is very central (you find the partyblock, calle 12, 1-2 blocks away). There are a lot of great restaurant around the block, so it is a natural place to end up at.It is big enough to have a party in, but also feels Mexican. There is nice mixture of clientel from all over the world.D are cheap and big (and 12 frozen shots are 100 MXN). For a Coca Cola lover (like me) this is the place to start - they, easily, serve the coldest coke (and probably beer too) in town! And this for only 20 MXN a can.On the party street a Coke (but luke warm, or watered down with ice) can cost you 65 MXN plus tip!Be aware! If you have had an early start and been keeping a good pace...you might end up visiting one of the two tattoo parlours on the street. Who knows how to explain at home why you got an itchy left butt-cheek saying 'L'Ambassade'??
Great place. Great place with Nice drinks and good prices. A Nice place to start a fun evening. I recommend it to all :-)

Fabulous!. L'ambassade is a nice place to grab a drink and have fun! If you like house music and delicious food you should diffently go to this place - the food is amazing and the employees are really sweet!!!
Big drinks low price. It is very good. Big drinks for a low price ! 1 liter for 65 pesos ! It is a small nice place where you can talk at the same time there is music ! :) great
Excellent. It's a fabulous place! Good and cheap drinks - and nice service! It's always a nice place to stop by and have fun with your friends and also meet new people.

Great Mood an nice people!. I came to Playa de Carmen for a 10 days holiday and ended up going to this place every time I went out! Its a small beautiful place with a wonderful chilling atmosphere and a great terrasse!I got to know some local people there which I especially enjoyed!!! The prices are fair and they have a nice offer of 1Liter- cocktails. The staff speaks different languages and the music is very nice! The right fun-place to go after a day at the beach.

Love this place! Favorite bar to hang out with friends and male new ones! All the staff is great!!!!!!. Come if you want fun! Great cocktails at a great price , good music and excelente atmosphere. Definitely one of the places you must visit when you come to playa del carmen

If you come to Playa Del Carmen you HAVE to come to L'ambassade. This is my favorite Bar in playa del carmen... from the music to the ambiance... and of course the drinks !!! You can find people from pretty much everywhere... and i do recommend this place to get the party stared ... The staff speaks English and French and they are fun and cool... Sometimes they have shoot Moleculares... they are awesome... So long story short... this place is a must :)
One of my favorite place to get the evening started!. Love the place! Great cocktails and good value! Love the pint of mojito! Good music , charming owners, defenetly recommend it!

Best Bar in Playa Del Carmen!!!. If you're around Playa Del Carmen any nights of the week you have to go to l'Ambassade. A Mexican drinking, partying bar with a "French" touch, right in the best party zone of Playa. If you like good booze (a lot of it!) at a very reasonnable price and if you like hot girls, well here's your place... Thanks boys (Isaac, Alban & Mateo) for the drinks, the tips and the girls... see you next time.

What a great start of a wonderful night. My friends and I were just walking by when we saw this place looking nice and full of people that looked like they were having a great time. We all went inside and talked to the bartender who was very welcoming and had very good English. He was really kind and answer all of our questions about all the drinks in the bar. While we decided what drink to have he was making conversation and make sure that we were having a good time. After we got off the bar we sat outside on the balcony and we were welcome by the owner and the manager of the place, this was a surprised for my friends and I he really cared to see if we were having a good time after the chat the bartender tent us with a surprised a round of shots that they were good and smooth and so very enjoyable. This was a great experience for my friends and I so different of what we were used to, everyone was very welcoming with a great service and the rush to have a good time. This was my spot for my time and in playa del Carmen and I would definitely be going back there.

great little bar to enjoy night's life in PLaya. L'ambassade has a great atmosphere, to start the night or to finish it in Playa. It's easy to meet other party guys in !You can get 1 litter coktails or tequilla shots for really cheap. I really enjoyed it, Thanks Alban for your welcome.

Feels like a second home!!. L'ambassade is the best bar ever! I've lived in playa a few times. This bar is always fun, friendly staff, cheap drinks, and a great place to meet up with friends. The atmosphere makes you feel welcome and chill. Tourists, locals, everyone goes, you are bound to meet some cool people. If you are planning a trip to playa you must look this bar up! You won't be disappointed!! Have fun!! :)
Nice place to get to know people.. Nice place to get to know people, reasonable drink prices . Good location; two blocks from the beach, great to have a nice time!Karime
Excellent place for hanging out any day. Always there's people here, drinks are cheap and people is always having fun. The staff is nice and fun!

Love the LITROS. I spend about 3 months of the year in Playa and L'ambassade is defiantly my favourite bar! The staff and owners are friendly and fun. The bar is usually filled with a very international crowd. The drinks are cheap and as strong or as nice as you want :) It is a great spot to meet up with friends for some cheap drinks to start your night before heading to calle 12 or for just a fun cheap night out! Remember to bring some 10 peso coins for the jukebox and to try their frozen shots. Any visitors I have ever brought to the bar have love it...
